You clung to the boat for dear life and prayed you would at least make it to shore, luckily the rapids were taking you right on to the island but the boat was right under a huge wave and threw the entire boat right on the rocky shore. The boat crashed leaving you both stranded.

"Well at least we made it."

"Guess we wait until the storm clears. But while were here I'm going up to get that treasure."

"(Name) wait the storm.", she warned.

"Relax I'll come right back as soon as soon as I have it. Safer here than a mountain top. I'll only be a few minutes, If I'm not back in a while...just wait longer.", you shrugged. You saw a staircase leading up the mountain and figured that's where you needed to go in order to take the treasure. You quickly ran up it wanting to get back inside the boat where it would be safe until someone rescued you guys after the storm cleared.

Meanwhile Melody rode through the storm in her sisters boat and was bypassing all the storm threw at her. Her skills with a speedboat were most impressive and she handled herself fine. Soon she made it on to fire island but her boat too crashed but she was fine despite the rough landing. Karen went to see what was up but saw Melody out by the bay. "What are you doing here Melody?"

"Coming to check on you guys and bring you back, except now I think I'm along for the ride. Where's (Name)?"

"Up there, he said he'd be back down here."

"No time for waiting I'm going up there.", Melody said ditching her boat.

"Wait he said-"

"I'm not waiting, the storm could kick up any minute and I won't leave him behind.", said.

You reached to the top of the mountain where there was this small shrine located in the center of the mountain. You quickly went inside and saw a red sphere lodged in a statue. You grabbed the treasure pulling it out with some effort. Just as it was released and you took time to fully look at it the treasure glowed for some strange reason. You just assumed that was what it does when anyone takes it and placed it in your pocket. You started heading back down but then just as you were about to, suddenly....
1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.title: You crashed on Fire Island

1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.content:
Suddenly, you saw someone coming from the staircase towards you. You didn't know who it was at first, but after waiting for the person to come closer you recognized her immediately.

(name) Melody?!? What are you doing here?!?

Melody: I came to get you stupid! Hope you're happy Mr. hero because if you had just stayed at the party like I told you, we wouldn't be stranded out here on this island.

Before you had a chance to explain yourself, thunder roared and lightning flashed. Melody yelped in surprise and instinctively clung to you. You were surprised by Melody's sudden reaction and a little freaked about the thunder yourself, but you kept your cool. You two had to find shelter in case that you two would be struck by the lightning. It was too far to get to Karen's boat, so you had no chance, but to take shelter at the next best thing. The shrine.

(name): Come on Melody. This storm's getting more insane. We better take shelter in the shrine. And um.....by the way, you can let me go you know.

Realizing that she was clinging to you like a lover, Melody blushed bright pink and backed away hastily.

Melody: Dah! Yeah....right....sorry.....let's get into the shrine.

(name): Um...yeah.

Then you two made your way into the shrine It may have been small, but it was enough to protect you two in the rain. You both sat on the floor and listened to the thunder in silence. You're heart was beating from Melody clinging to you when she heard the thunder. Not to mention your face was also a little pink.

(name) thinking: What the heck was that about? My heart's still beating like a jackhammer. But why? It's not like I like her or anything. Do I?

You looked at Melody and coincidentally Melody looked at you. When you both saw each other you both looked away in embarrassment. Then you both ended up talking at the same time.

Melody and (name): S-sorry. No....wait....Let me.....

(name): I'm sorry you first.

Melody: No you talked before I did. You go ahead.

(name): Man....this is getting nowhere fast. I gotta lift up the mood, but how do I do that? What do I say? Should I say something or let Melody says something first?

You.....
1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.title: Melody showed up

1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.content:
"You first. I'll just keep quiet if it's fine with you.", you offered.

"You don't need to be so formal. All the guys back home do it all the time and it's annoying. Matter of fact everything annoys me back home. The traditions, the scenery, and the old fashioned way of...everything."

"It can't be all bad. You staying in one place all the time, having people you know there, and just relegated to having pokemon culture jammed in your face at least ounce a year.", you commented.

"You've got some sort of problem against them?", she asked.

"No. I don't hate them, it's just that everyone I know aspires to be a pokemon master or trainer and it's like that everywhere I turn. The cities, the small towns, even the quietest spots are all filled to the brink with them it's maddening. Short time I've been around here, not a single one. At least over by Shamouti.", you admitted.

"Hmm I can relate to not easily fitting in with the flow.", she giggled a bit at how similar you were to her. It got more windy so she sat closer to you making you blush a bit more than previously. "Tell me, how did you find your way here?", she asked.

"My home town was populated with pokemon. But one day I noticed something, I stopped and thought to myself is there anywhere that they don't have such a giant influence on people? So when I was old enough to travel, I left my home and just wandered around getting away from it all. Get out on my own find a secluded spot from them at least to a degree where not every single person's mission in life doesn't have anything to do with them. Never found it. But for the places I've been to, this has to be the closest thing to it. What's it like living there?", you asked wondering why she doesn't appreciate the things you want more than anything.

"It's boring out here. Mostly everyone works, and lives pretty mundane lives. You get to see so many new things I'm jealous to be honest."

"Don't be, it may be new at first but it is stale and it will get old very fast. It's the simpler things in life I appreciate more. They seem small but they don't FEEL small."

"Hmm hmm same code I live by. Only for different reasons. I just want to see everyone just get with the times. It's not all ancient fire circles that determine who you'll be or mystic writings that tell the future. Things are more complex and they're falling behind. Or...maybe I am. Maybe I'm moving too fast and can't slow down to understand why they appreciate such an old tradition?"

"Hey, if it means anything your not wrong, things change and it will come to them sooner or later."

"You know your a good friend.", Melody said blushing as she finished her sentence.

"Uh thanks your a good friend too hehe.", you blushed too. You two both seemed to read a certain vibe that you two liked one another. Melody herself began to notice she liked you a lot but was too prideful to admit it. You knew you liked her but her blushing gave you a hint she liked you back. And you were both awkward by your close proximity just a minute ago. It was becoming clear to you she liked you but now wasn't the time to discuss that. You felt the winds stopping and it looked better to make it to Karen's boat now.

"It looks like the storms cleared a bit, let's get back to the boat.", Melody said wanting to get warm and trying her best avoid you finding out about her growing crush on you.
1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.title: Song of desire

1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.content:
Just as you and Melody ran out of the shrine the smoke and fog within the mountain turned blue and you saw lightning strike in the air. Then a giant ferocious bird of yellow squawked through the air and flew across and perched on top of the shrine itself. Melody was shocked and confused as they were on fire island yet the bird of lightning was here right on the bird of fire's own territory. "This isn't right.", she said.

"What? What's wrong?", you asked.

"The bird of fire, Moltres is supposed to be here yet Zaptos is right in front of us.", she explained.

"So that means something must be disturbing the harmony. We couldn't have upset the balance the ceremony only just begun."

The Zaptos shot out lightning from it's long and mighty wings intimidating you to leave or just show it's superior strength. As it shout a bolt you and Melody staggered back about to make your leave but then something attracted all of the electricity from Zaptos and from above the clouds came a sky fortress draining Zaptos' power. Zaptos flew up and attacked the vessel but then on the bottom hull it shot out rings the were meant to capture the beast. In the chaos and confusion Zaptos flew right over you two making one of the rings activate and capture you two, it took you to the hull of the fortress. Zaptos continued to fight but drained of it's power the trap worked and captured Zaptos bringing it along after you and Melody.

"That was just as simple as with Moltres. Now only the third one remains and then the real prize awaits.", said the man piloting the fortress.

"Alert: While capturing Zaptos we brought something more.", said the computer.

"More?"

Meanwhile in a cage with you and Melody trapped together seeing Moltres and Zaptos caged by those rings devices, Melody glanced over to a stone carving. "Huh what's this? Disturb not the harmony of fire, ice, and lightning?", before she could finish the center pillar of the room lowered revealing the pilot.

"Well this is a pleasure though an unexpected one."

"Who are you?", you demanded.

"I am Lawrence III, and I am a mere collector. As you can see my latest set is nearly complete, Articuno is but the last one.", he said.

"You kidnapped Moltres? Then the storm was a result of your doing wasn't it?", Melody roared in disgust.

"Legendary Pokemon have always been my passion. I began with a single Mew card and now, all of what you see here is mine. I don't mean to be rude but for now you should remain here. It is quite ghastly out there, so until I finish my work feel free to admire my collection. Though do not touch as some of these are one of a kind.", he kindly asked. He pressed a button and her released the lock on the cage allowing you and Melody out.
1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.title: The true villain appears

1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.content:
As soon as you and Melody got out you went to inspect what restrained the pokemon. They were surrounded by a force field and only a strong enough force or an explosion could have any chance at freeing either of them. You decided to try ramming into it but it knocked you back like a putz. You then tried looking for a weapon to maybe cause the field to glitch up but everything of any use was encased in glass or in a smaller field to be sure everything was in pristine condition. "C'mon think there has to be a way to get out of here at least and call up the right people so that they can free these birds. Melody is there anything?"

She sat on the floor knowing there was nothing they could use. She instead went to look at the stone carving again. It foretold of the world being destroyed by the forces of nature should the balance be disrupted. She saw outside and could see Artiicuno freezing the ocean with the others no longer around covering the area in ice and snow. "(Name) look.", she said.

"Jeez.", you reacted.

"(Name) I read this carving, 'Disturb not the harmony of fire, ice or lightning, lest these titans wreak destruction upon the world in which they clash. Though the water's great guardian shall arise to quell the fighting, alone its song will fail, and thus the earth shall turn to ash.' What if the ancient legend is coming true?", she said with concern.

"Well if it is then we need to keep trying to break out of here. There should be a crowbar or something or maybe a weapon that he has on display or.....or....", you kept looking around but there was nothing. You then got down on your knees and hit the floor in frustration. "GAHHHH! This is hopeless! The heck can I do that a pokemon trainer can't? They have pokemon able to do the impossible and do extraordinary things. What can I do? Huh? What does a guy who has no pokemon under his belt have that can stop this catastrophe?!", you yelled.

You bent backwards on one of the tables holding up some priceless artifacts and you felt like giving up. Melody sat beside you trying to comfort you. "Hey, your a heck of a lot more unique than most other trainers. I bet they are no where near as cool as you."

"You never even met any. Have you?"

"No."

"Then how can you tell?"

"Well in the short time I've known you, you are just like me. Were the odd ones out from the herd. So don't let that bring you down. Heck if you do find a way out, it means you don't need a pokemon to do the impossible. That alone makes you better than them.", she encouraged.

You smiled at her words of kindness, "Sigh....you know I could have brought one with me before I left home. But I said no. What an idiot I was, I'd have better odds if it was the most useless pokemon that ever lived. I honestly have no clue how to get us out of here."

Melody thought for a second and looked around and had no idea on how to escape or set Moltres and Zaptos free. She figured you might since you don't rely on pokemon to solve your problems, but you were in the rut. Then she had an idea, "Well maybe all you need is a better confidence booster.", then like a birthday surprise you felt the unrivaled sensations of Melody's tender lips pressed against your cheek ounce more. Your body felt like it was fully charged and working faster than normal. You immediately got up and took another look around to see if anything would work but nothing would disrupt the field. Then you had one idea that might work.

"Melody break everything you see. Even if you can't just try and break stuff.", you said.

She giggled at how well her motivator helped you come up with a pan that seemed to serve a purpose. "Why?"

"Were gonna get that guy mad. So mad he'll come right on down and stop us. He says this stuff is priceless, well let's see if he meant it. He won't want something that valuable meddled with.", you said still on a rush from Melody's kiss. As you tried tearing down and ruining things Melody noticed how you responded to her little kiss. She seemed to be aware now you liked her, she felt flattered but she dared not dwindle on that for long as you and her needed to set things back in order.
1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.title: Hope still lives....

1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.content:
Lawrence III had already begun attacking Articuno by shooting fire shots from the ships canons. Lawrence was quite a strategist having Articuno at his mercy right from the start. He fired his shots precisely and with excellent timing. However your ruckus down below had caught the attention of his computer. As Lawrence was doing battle with the bird of ice the computer voice alerted its master. "Alert: Trophy room 1 is sustaining damage."

"Hmm? It can't have been from Articuno. It's barley grazed the ship.", he said. Then he pulled up a live camera feed from the room showing you and Melody managing to knock down the collection from their resting places and breaking the glass containers. To his outrage he activated a security protocol, "Have security protocol 3 deal with them. I can't remove myself from the battlefield now."

Then in the trophy room the floor sprouted out a pair of turrets set to stun you but incapacitate you and Melody for a while. You knew this wasn't good so you took cover near the bird cages. Melody ducked under the case with the prophecy tablet and managed to avoid being shot. The guns ceased firing but still patroled in a circular motion. You then had a crazy idea and hoped it would work. "Yo hoo!", you waved down the turrets. The shot back again but you went for cover behind Moltres. The shots fired right at the field bombarding it with gunfire. The rounds may be non-lethal but they still packed a punch. With both turrets firing the field began to fail giving Moltres the opening it need to free itself.

In just a few short moments the bird of fire let out a huge blast of fire upward breaking free of it's cage. It fired a few short blasts at the turrets destroying them. Then the titan of fire turned to the titan of lightning and freed Zaptos. However they did not show signs of peaceful intent. As Moltres fired another blast at Zaptos. The birds broke out of the room causing a large hole in the glass window. They wreaked their revenge by destroying and sabotaging the whole flying fortress. As they did the damage Lawrence saw them from his view in disbelief. With the fortress capability to fly now rendered useless it descended on the nearest island.

"Mayday mayday: Prepare for crash landing on lightning island.", the computer said.

The whole fortress began to fall apart at the seems. The trophy room itself was unstable, and you had nowhere to run. You and Melody held on to anything and prayed the debris would not fall on top of you. Then one of the wings towers collapsed on the center of the fortress giving you two a path to escape. You grabbed Melody by the hand and ran for it hoping it would be stable enough until you made it across safely on the island.

As you both ran across the steepness caused you both to lose your balance and topple all the way down. Miraculously you made it on the island ground without injury and ran to escape the fortress from toppling down. The bottom ring that kept the fortress flying crashed on to the shrine of the island. The shock wave of the impact was so great it made you and Melody fall to the ground now coated in snow with Articuno's influence affecting the storm now.

As you got up the shrine's treasure rolled up beside you conveniently intact. You put it in your pocket and picked Melody up and ran for the edge of the island. Above you however were the three titans of fire, ice, and lightning battling for supremacy. Their fighting caused the ice in the mountain to melt causing the water to flow down.

It would be safer if you had a boat but the only one's were left back on fire island. You looked and knew that it wasn't safe and you had to do something. But then a boulder hit the ground and a rush of water washed you and Melody into the flow. You were washed away and were about to hit the icey floor but then out from under it was a whirlwind of water.

You and Melody were carried across the water and taken back to Shamouti island...
1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.title: Lawrence notices your distraction

choices: A giant water spout erupts from the sea and stops the birds
1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.content:
When you regained your senses you found yourself in a meadow of flowers covered in snow. There was also a shrine like the ones on Fire and Lightning island, but it was much bigger. Then you saw Melody. You immediately rushed to her side to make sure that she was alright.

(name): Melody! Melody are you okay?

Melody's eyes slowly opened and she woke up.

Melody: I'm okay. Just a little shaken up.

(name): What the heck was that? Water spouts don't normally save us right out of the blue do they?

Melody: Not usually.

You took a look around at your surroundings.

(name): Where are we?

Melody: I think that we're back at Shamouti Island. I recognize this shrine. I come here all the time.

(name): I see. So what do we do now?

Suddenly you both heard someone coming towards you. To your surprise it was a Slowking. Apparently it lived in the shrine. Then the Slowking spoke to you and Melody.

Slowking: So you're finally here?

(name): Y-you can talk? Melody are there usually talking Slowking on this island?

Melody: No. Not usually.

Then Slowking pointed to the shrine.

Slowking: Take the treasure and put it there.

(name): Huh? Oh right.

You pulled out the treasures from your pockets and went to a statue with a pedestal inside. At first you didn't know where to put the treasures, but then you saw three openings. When you looked through them they each pointed to a specific island.

(name): I get it. Fire Island and Lightning Island.

On the right you placed the fire treasure to the left for Fire Island and on the right you placed the lightning treasure for Lightning Island. There was only one more treasure missing and there was only one place to find it. Ice Island. Then Slowking came up to you and spoke to you which startled you a little.

Slowking: So you're (name) eh? You're one treasure short.

(name): Hold on, how do you know my name?

Before Slowking could answer, there was a loud squawk. You looked in the distance and you saw Moltres, Zapdos, and Articuno fighting and using their abilities to take each other down. Not only that, they were heading towards your current location.

Melody: Oh no! It looks like they're heading this way.

You saw how they were fighting and you couldn't stand it. The fighting was getting out of control. You knew you didn't have any pokemon, but you felt like you should at least try to get through to them. You rushed to edge and screamed at the top of your lungs.

(name): KNOCK IT OFF!!!!

The birds weren't listening. They continued to attack each other and the crossfire of attacks was heading straight for you.

Melody: (name) look out!!!

Just when you were gonna get hit.....
1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.title: Continue

choices: Lugia takes you to Ice island
You try walking all the way there (You moron)
1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.content:
The water erupted from the ice knocking the birds away. From within the water came out a legendary pokemon, the great guardian, LUGIA! It's wings expanded showing it's magnificence and with it's mighty pride hovered in place as thee birds gazed at it. Lugia then shouted a tune that oddly resembled something. The sound it made sounded a lot like the one Melody played from before.

Meanwhile on Lightning island, Lawrence the III had just set his eyes on his prey. Using his old telescope, he saw in amazement as the legendary pokemon rose out from the sea and flew with it's mighty presence. "Finally! My prize! The beast of the sea, will soon belong to me.", he gloated. Despite Lugia trying to sway the titans of the elements to yield they attacked the guardian unleashing their fury. Lugia was outnumbered but held it's own against them, using it's shield and swift attacks things appeared to be falling back into balance.

But soon the titans grew wise to it's game and then started drawing the fight near the shrine where you were. In defense Lugia shielded you and Melody but the attacks overwhelmed and defeated the guardian. Lugia fell into the ice sinking below the ocean unable to fight. But soon as the dust settled as the titans continued their fighting the oceans frozen surface became crowded over the horizon. Thousands upon thousands of pokemon were walking to the sight of this historic battle and all of them simply watched. You saw the hundreds of pokemon and were wondering why they all came here.

"This is bad. Only the chosen one can help the water's great guardian.", Slowking said.

"But the legends says it's song will fail...", Melody replied.

"And thus the earth shall turn to ash."

"But how are we going to find the chosen one if we don't even know where to look?"

"Your already looking at him.", Slowking pointed out.

"Huh?!", you reacted.

"(Name) is really the chosen one..for real?", Melody responded.

"Wait a second....I've literally got the weight of the world on my shoulders? Well why the heck is it me of all people?! Any trainer in the world can do this but no, it must be me?! You must be joking!", you say in response to the realization.

"It is true. You were chosen to be the savior and now it rests on you to save the world now.", Slowking answered.

"How was I chosen to begin with?"

"She choose.", when Melody knew that she put you into this position she immediately regretted placing you into it.

"(Name)... I...I never should have dragged you into this.", she said.

"What do you mean? I'm the one who went along with it to begin with. But jeez! I went into this without thinking, I wasn't realizing what the consequences were, except all that was on my mind was just impressing yo-", you just realized you let your own emotions slips out and prayed she didn't notice.

"Wait? You did everything up so far to try and impress me?", Melody asked.

"Sigh....yes, yes I did.", you confessed not even bothering to hide the fact.

"But why?"

"Well....your......your just wonderful! Your so beautiful on the ocarina, your so full of energy, I like you a lot Melody! I did right from the moment you kissed me on the beach. I know it didn't mean anything to you, but I just began having this big crush on you right from the start. The only thing that got me to go along with this whole thing was you. But now! Now I don't know what I'm doing. I'm crazy for even getting this far. I'm sorry but you have the wrong chosen one.", you let it out.

You sat down facing away from Melody not being able to face her after just confessing everything. You weren't the chosen one, just a boy with a petty crush that lead him on a quest to save the whole world. Then Melody hugged you from behind and said, "(Name)...I know you are the chosen one. Trust me.", she smiled giving off her confidence and never say die attitude. She picked you back up and the both of you blushed, "You don't need to be the world's chosen one, but you can pull off having to be mine. Do it for me, ok?"

"Why?"

"Because your just too wonderful yourself. Except I can't even describe how wonderful you even are. If anyone has a right to be worried about their role it's me."

"Your the festival maiden that plays the song... the SONG! It's just like the sound Lugia made!"

"Your right! Just like in the legend.", Melody pulled out her ocarina and played the song. The song echoed across the islands and from within the depths of the sea, Lugia's strength returned to him. Out of the sea, Lugia arose again.

"The song, the song has restored my strength. But it alone cannot bring harmony to the three warring ones."

"What do you mean?"

"When the treasures of fire, ice and lightning are aligned my song shall harmonize with their powers and tame the beasts both below and above the sea. But it can only come to pass with the help of the chosen one."

"What can I do that someone else can't?"

"Nothing. The chosen one is someone who willingly takes the responsibility to harmonize the world. The choice is always within those who fate thrusts it's sword upon. If you believe you are not worthy then you may choose to stop here."

"(Name).", Melody turned to you knowing you could do it. You looked at her and knew with her motivating you, you could bring one measly treasure back.

"I'M NOT STOPPING!"
1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.title: The song of hope

choices: Hey pokemon waiting to be needed....NOW'S THE TIME!
1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.content:
You mounted up on Lugia and you were headed to the island. The three titans in the far distance continued their fighting with none of them gaining an advantage. You could see from all the other pokemon watching how much it upset them. "Lugia, why are all of those pokemon there standing around?"

"Because they feel they must be here in case they are needed."

"Well it's good knowing they're standing by in case we run into any problems."

You flew across making good time but soon as you were close to the island the three birds sensed your arrival and focused on preventing you from harmonizing the world. "You must make it across on foot. I will keep them at bay while you grab the treasure.", Lugia flew down and let you land safely. You had a bit of a climb but at least you were safe while Lugia bought you some time.

You ran up to the mountain and moved as fast as possible, the path lead to a long cave that lead right to the shrine but it grew tiring as it stretched for what felt like miles. Eventually you made it to the top where the shrine remained in tact but you were exhausted. You crawled up catching your breath and made it up the last flight of stairs. "Whew....who invented that cave?! Could run a motorbike in that thing and it still be as long." You picked yourself up and just tugged the treasure right out. It glowed like the other two and now all that was left was getting back.

You started jogging back to save some energy while still keeping a fast pace but then lightning came from nowhere and collapsed the way back. Zaptos and Articuno were squaring off in the middle of the top of the mountain. Moltres entered the fight but Articuno blasted it with it's ice breath and weakened the fire titan. But then Zaptos took the opportunity and attacked Articuno from behind. Moltres returned the favor and blasted the titan of ice with it's mortal weakness. With two titans attacking one, Articuno crashed on the shrine in defeat.

You quickly climbed over the mountain and ran on the slope sprinting to get away from the battle. But then Lugia flew down and gave you a lift. "I got the treasure!"

Lugia flew as fast as possible back to Shamouti island and were nearly there but then from Lightning island, Lawrence had launched his trap. His capturing mechanism was subduing Lugia painfully electrocuting him and yourself. Lugia resisted capture and launched a beam of energy at the fortress destroying all that remained from it. Lawrence fled as he saw his legacy being destroyed but the trap was too great for Lugia to handle ebbing away the last of his strength.

Lugia fell into the thawed water and sunk into the oceans depths. You swam up to the water but it was a long swim back and the water became rougher than ever before. The waves dunked you into the water over and over. You tried swimming back but to no avail....
1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.title: Lugia takes you to Ice island

1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.content:
Suddenly you felt yourself being lifted up from the water. The thing you knew, you were above the waves. When you regained your senses your realized you were riding on something which turned out to be a Gyarados.

(name): What the heck.....?!?!??!

At first you were a little frightened by the sight of the Gyarados, but the Gyrarados friendly and was carrying across the waves. You also saw that you were surrounded by water pokemon forming a block around you in case that the guardians attacked again. While the water pokemon were the water protecting you, the pokemon who were on the ice were clearing a path to back to Shamouti Island.

(name): Wow. Thanks a lot you guys! I owe you guys one!

The pokemon that heard cried and responded to your thanks as they dropped you off at the shore. As you waved the pokemon goodbye, the storm weather grew worse. Tornadoes grew bigger and thunder roared.

(name): Oh man. I gotta hurry. There's not much time left.

You dug in your pocket to check if the treasure was still there. Thankfully it was. You gripped it tightly with determination and looked up to the stairs leading to the shrine.

(name): I gotta do this. For the world and for Melody. Don't worry Melody. I won't let you down.

Then you made your way up to the stairs. It was a long a slow walk, but you made it back to the shrine. Melody and Slowking were waiting for you.

Melody: (name)! You made it back!

Slowking: Very good (name). Have you got the final treasure (name)?

(name): I've got it right here Slowking. (shows the treasure)

Slowking: Good. Now place the final treasure with the others.

Your eyes begin to water in guilt, "I'm sorry Mel.", she quickly looked right at you with a mixture of anger, concern, and understanding.

"Why are you apologizing?"

"Did....did you mean what you said last night?"

"Huh?"

"Please tell me, just please tell me the truth whether you meant it or not."

"I meant it. I wanted a baby. With you."

"I didn't rob you of your freedom?"

"What? NO! You didn't do anything to me like that."

"I thought that when you were done with the festival. We'd go and travel together and then later on we would..."

"(Name). Of course we can still do that."

"But your-"

"Listen to me (Name). We still have plenty of time to see the world. We have all the time in the world even. We just are going to have an extra passenger on the trip."

"Ok. Ok. That's......that's all I needed to know.", you cried again but out of sheer relief and newly discovered love for Melody. She still is willing to let your future remain the same but not let this new development hinder or alter it in the slightest. Melody felt better knowing you were in a better state of mind having expressed her thoughts on this.

"What are we going to do about the baby then when it's time for-"

"When it get's around to a certain point we'll stop traveling and wait for it to happen. We'll call up Carol and my family and yours and tell them where we are, then we'll take it from there.", Melody said.

"And after that?"

"We'll decide then whether to keep traveling or just come back here and raise our baby. I don't know what we'll be thinking until then.", she said.

"Ok Mel. I..I can work with that. I feel much better. And I'm sorry I just didn't know if we rushed it too fast. But now that it's happened I...I think we should tell someone the good news."

"First off we did rush into it too quickly. But I'm not going to let it stop me from living our dream before we go into being parents for the rest of our lives. We'll be ready when the baby comes. I know that much."

"Your right. I love you so much that I wanted you to still have a long time of freedom before we settled down."

"Pfft, (Name) I went on an adventure with a crazy collector, three giant birds, and the world nearly going into a global catastrophe. That was worth a lifetime of freedom and adventure alone. It's how we got together so fast.", she playfully kissed your cheek again laughing in excitement.

"Remember when you held on to me back on fire island it went like this.", you grabbed her wrists and pulled her into a hug. She tried to get out of it but you were persistent. You wrapped her in a hug and laughed with her.

"I love you."

"I know, and that's why I stuck around this island for so long.", you joked.

"Hmm hmm. Tease. Don't forget to call your folks and tell them your going to be a daddy. I'll tell Carol and spare you the danger of maybe being mauled by her after she reacts to the news. If she does freak out to it. Frankly I'd be more worried if she didn't go nuts."

"Hehe, Ok babe. Love you."

"Me too. And so does our little one.", you two both rubbed Melody's belly feeling it knowing that right now she was going to have your baby.
1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.title: When love is real

1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.content:
A few minutes later, you went into the city in search of a phone to call your parents. At first you had a difficult time trying to find one, but eventually you found a videophone inside the pokemon center. At first you were a little nervous for calling your parents, but after you took a deep breath you felt a lot more calm. You dialed your parents' number and waited for your parents to pick up. After a couple of ring tones your mother's face popped up on the screen.

Your Mom: Hello?

(name): Hey Mom. It's me.

Your Mom: Oh my gosh! (name) it's you! Honey! Your son's on the phone!

Your Dad: What?!? Seriously?!?

You heard a scurrying of feet from the other side of the phone. Then you heard your dad zip by the screen and then you heard a loud crash. Obviously in his haste to see you on the phone, you dad had rushed too fast, lost control, and crashed into some furniture probably.

(name): Dad? Are you okay?

Your father popped up from the screen and smiled and gave you a thumbs up as if nothing had happened.

Your Dad: Don't worry son. Your old man is a-okay!

Your Mom: Oh honey. How many times have I told you not to run like that? You could get hurt.

Your Dad: Ah you worry too much babe. Anyway, how's it going son? Where are you? We haven't seen you since you left the house a couple years ago.

(name): I know. I just...wanted to talk to you two about something. Something important

Your Dad: Important?

Your Mom: Is everything okay sweetie? You look serious.

(name): Yeah. Everything's fine. It's just.... I.....kinda have some news.

Your Dad: Good news or Bad news?

(name): Well....you see....that depends. You see... Okay. Let me start at the beginning. First of all, I'm at Shamouti Island. An island close to the Orange Islands. And while I was here...I kinda met this girl.

Your Mom and Dad: A girl?!?

You instinctively flinched from the sudden change in your parents tones afraid that they were now angry, but to your surprise they had a different reaction.

Your Mom: That's great honey!

Your Dad: Atta boy! I knew you'd get yourself a girl eventually! After all, you did get my good looks.

Your Mom: So what's her name and is she nice to you?

(name): Um..yeah. Her name is Melody and she's a very sweet girl.

Your Dad: Melody huh? That's definitely a cute name. So she's your girlfriend eh?

(name): Yeah. Pretty much. You guys don't mind do you?

Your Mom: Of course not son. You can date whoever you want. As long as you and the girl you chose love each other.

Your Dad: Yup! You'll get no complaints from me. Go for whatever girl you want son.

(name): Really? Thank you.

Your Dad: Is that all what you wanted to talk about son? Because if you ask me, I don't think it's that big of a deal.

(name): Well....um...no. There's something else you needed to know. It's something...serious.

As soon as you said serious, your parents looks changed into looks of concern.

Your Dad: Was is it son?

Your Mom: Yes. You can tell us anything sweetie.

You hesitated before you spoke. You couldn't back down after calling your parents. You took a deep breath and spoke choosing your words carefully.

(name): Look Mom. Look Dad. The real reason I needed to talk to you was that...... Melody's not only my girlfriend. She's.....gonna be a mom.

Your Mom: What? She's gonna be a mother? Who's the father?

(name): Well.....you're looking at him.

Your mother and your father blinked and they looked at each other. Then their eyes went as big as saucers.

Your Dad: Wait. Hold on. Son. Are you...... are you telling us...that.....

At this point you couldn't take it anyone. You immediately blurted out what your word not wanting to take the stress anymore.

(name): Yes!!! I got Melody pregnant and I'm gonna be a father okay?!?!?

There was a long silence. You sighed expecting your parents to be upset and prepared to be yelled at. Then suddenly you father jumped up like a rocket and began hooting for joy with tears in his eyes. He wasn't the only one who was crying, your mother was too. At first you thought they were upset, but you were wrong. They weren't tears of sadness or anything like that. They were tears of joy.

(name): Mom? Dad? Are you two okay?

Your Dad: Okay?!? We're great! In fact, we're couldn't be happier!

(name): Happier?

Your Mom: Yes. You not only got yourself a girlfriend, but now you're gonna be a father!

Your Dad: That's my boy! To think that your old man's lived to see the day! His one and only son has got himself a girlfriend and finally became a man! (cries) And we're finally gonna have a grandbaby!

(name): Wait....you guys....aren't mad at me?

Your Mom: Why would we be mad sweetie? This is wonderful news!

(name): But...isn't this the part where you say, "(name)! You got a girl pregnant without us knowing?!? You're in big trouble mister!" or something?

Your Dad: Are you kidding? We've always wanted a granddaughter or grandson. And now thanks to you, we're gonna get one!

(name): Really? So you're both okay with this?

Your Mom: Yes. We don't mind. Except for a few conditions.

Your mom's face was now stern so you paid close attention.

(name): Conditions?

Your Mom: Yes. One, promise us that you'll be a good father to Melody and take good care of your son or daughter. Two, make sure to call us every now and again so that we know you're alright. And three....

You held your breath awaiting your mother's last condition. Then your mother's stern look now changed to a smile.

Your Mom: Please send us some pictures of the baby when it's born. I'd love to see what my grandbaby looks like.

You nearly fell over in surprise when your mom broke the tension like that, but you managed to regain your composure.

(name): Sure thing Mom. I promise to be a good father and I'll call you and Dad whenever I have time. And yes I'll make sure to send you the photos too.

Your Dad: And introduce us to this Melody girl sometime. We'd love to see her.

(name): Yes Dad. I will.

Your Mom: And one more thing son. You're eating right over there right?

(name): Yes Mom. I'm eating right.

You Mom: Okay son. We'll see you later.

Your Dad: We love you son. And make your papa proud!

(name): I will. Bye.

And with that you hung up the phone and the monitor turned off. You let out a sigh of relief, happy that you got that off your chest. Your parents gave you their approval so it was official.

(name) thinking: Geez. My parents can be so crazy sometimes. But still...they're great. I can't imagine where i would be if it wasn't for them. Thank you Mom. Thank you Dad.

You left the pokemon center and headed back home eager to tell Melody the good news. Then on the way back, you ran into....
1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.title: You went into the city to make a call to your home

1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.content:
Soon as you got back home you saw Carol and Melody they were sitting down talking but from the looks it wasn't very happy from the tone of their voices. Soon as you came in Carol gave you a serious glare, "Care to explain something?", she opened with.

"I guess it's because of the big news?"

Carol then smacked you across the side of your face, "What were either of you thinking?! Melody your way too young for this and you too (Name)! Your not old enough to have a job."

"Carol! Don't be so hard on him! I wanted this OK?! I wanted him to, I'm the one you should yell at."

"Your my sister so I can't vent my anger on you."

"Carol I'll take care of Mel, you know I will. Why are you so mad?!"

"Because one of us has to be and because you guys need to find something to keep you two stable. You've got a kid to take care of now so we have to figure out what to do."

"Carol I'll just take a job here when we get back traveling together, we've already thought through that much. And (Name) will keep doing work with stuff around the islands. Jeez Carol you seriously have to chill out!"

"That's....a reasonable enough plan. OK I'll lay off but were going to start setting up those things first thing in the morning Melody. Mom will need to hear this.", she left.

"(Name) I'm so sorry."

"No I am. I just....aw.....I don't know. But listen no matter what changes the fact that I love you will never change.", you hugged Melody holding her in your arms.

"I love you too.", she said.

1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.content:
Later in the evening, you and Melody went to bed. Melody was fast asleep, but you were wide awake. You were still thinking about everything that happened. Good news was your parents approved of your relationship with Melody and they approved of you being a father. Bad news was that Carol wasn't happy and you had the red mark on your face to prove it. You rubbed your cheek tenderly remembering the pain.

(name): Ouch. Geez, Carol didn't have to slap me so hard. Then again I can't blame her. I'd be mad too. (sigh) I know that Melody said that she wanted the baby, but still.....I can't help but feel a little bad for getting Carol so mad. Not to mention that I have to tell her mother too. Man. And I thought saving the world was stressful.

As far as plans go, you had to find a job to support you and Melody and the baby. That wasn't too hard. The problem was Carol and her and Melody's mom. You felt bad for making Carol angry so you wanted to try to make it up to her and show her that you can take care Melody and the baby, but you didn't know how. You stared at the ceiling trying to think. Soon you eyes began to get a little heavy and then you went to sleep. The very next morning you woke up, you head still filled with your thoughts. You let out a sigh and slowly got out of bed not wanting to wake up Melody. You needed to relax and there was only one thing that could help you do that.

(name): I'm gonna go swimming. Maybe that will help me relax.

You got donned your swimming trunks once more, grabbed a towel, and headed out. Unknown to you, Melody had noticed you leave. As soon as you left the bedroom she sat up and got out of bed. She felt bad for you feeling the way you were. She wanted to cheer you up somehow, but she had no idea how to. Meanwhile you walked through town and headed for the pier. The sky was still a little dark and the ocean was as calm, but you were feeling too down to notice. You sat on the edge on the pier and dipped your feet in the water. It was a little cold at first, but you got used to it after a few minutes.You sat there staring at your reflection in the water trying to think of a way to make it up to Carol and trying to figure out what to do when it came to Carol and Melody's mom when the time came. You came up with nothing.

(name): Man. This stinks. Carol must still be very upset with me. I wish I could try to show her that I can step up, but...(sigh) what do I do?

Smile for Me - Sword Art Online
(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KSbNV0GA...)

Then you felt something touch your feet. You looked to down to find a Luvdisc nudging your feet. It looked as if the Luvdisc sensed that you were sad and it was trying to cheer you up. You smiled sadly and petted the Luvdisc on it's head.

(name): Aw. Thanks little guy, but I need to be alone. Okay? I appreciate it though.

The Luvdisc didn't give up. It could see that you were feeling down and you needed some cheering up. It dove underwater and called out it's friends. A couple more Luvdisc showed up and other different water pokemon came as well. The Luvdisc told them what to do and the pokemon were happy to help. You were back on the pier still thinking about what to do, but still you came up with nothing. You decided it was time to head back to the house. Meldoy was gonna wake up soon and you didn't want her to worry. You had just got up and were about to head back, when a Dewgong leaped from the sea and landed right in front of you. You were so surprised that you reflexively took a step back. When you stepped back, you felt nothing but air which caused you to lose your balance and made you fall into the ocean. You came up to the surface and spit out some water that got into your mouth.

(name): Hey! What's the big idea?!

Dewgong just clapped it's flippers and dove back into the water. Then you felt something lift you up from your feet. Next thing you knew, you were on top of a Wailmer's back and were being carried out to the ocean.

(name): Hey! What the heck's going on?!? Where are you taking me?!?

The Wailmer responded with a big bellow and carried you out to the water until you were a few feet away from the pier. Then the Wailmer launched you into the air using a water spout from it's blowhole sending you into the water again with a mighty splash. You came up to the surface and spit out some water once again. You felt a little annoyed now.

(name): What the heck is going on?!? Geez. I don't have time for this. I gotta get back to the pier before Meldoy wakes up. Better get swimming.

You were about to start swimming, but then a Buizel popped up blocking your way. You tried swimming past it, but it kept blocking your way.

(name): Okay Buizel. I need to get back to the pier so would you mind moving?

Buizel shook it's head pointed into the water. It looked like it wanted to show you something. At first you didn't want to, but from the way Buizel was pointing it looked like it was important. Plus Buizel wasn't going to let you go until you listened to it.

(name): Okay Buizel. You win. I'm assuming you want to show me something right? Lead the way.

You held onto Buizel and took a deep breath. Then you and Buizel dove into the water. At first you couldn't see due to you being underwater, but your eyes adjusted in a few minutes. When your vision became sharper, you could not believe what you saw. Dozens of water pokemon were swimming under the water and there was a beautiful coral reef on the ocean floor. You went swimming many times before so you thought you knew these waters, but you had never seen a sight like this before. Suddenly Buizel began to speed up and you held on to it's float sack. You both swam through a school of Remoraid, some Mantine and Mantyke and many other pokemon. You also saw the beautiful coral reef which was filled beautiful colors and filled with other different types of pokemon you haven't seen before. Out of all the sights you've seen in your life, this by far was the most beautiful. Then some air bubbles came out of your mouth and your lungs felt a little tired. You tugged Buizel gently and pointed upwards signaling that you needed to come up for air. Buizel nodded and helped you to the surface. You let out a big gasp as you resurfaced above the water.

(name): Wow! That...was incredible! I've never seen such a beautiful reef.

Suddenly three Gorebyss sprang out of the water over your head and dove back into the water. Then they began leaping around you and Buizel wanting you to play with them. To be honest you kinda wanted to, but you didn't know if Buizel had the speed. You looked at Buizel and Buizel looked at you. Then Buizel smiled nodded signaling that he knew what you were thinking. You smiled back.

(name): Let's go Buizel! See if you can match their speed!

You held on to Buizel for dear life as Buizel's tail spun like a powerful propeller and took off ahead of the Gorebyss in an incredible speed. The Gorebyss followed suit, leaping about in the water. Buizel dove into the water with you barely being able to catch your breath and then Buizel shot out of the water and leaped into the air like the Gorebyss. You were a little surprised at being launched like that, but at the same time it was a lot of fun. You and Buizel raced the Gorebyss and played with other pokemon all morning until the sun was coming over the horizon meaning that it was morning and Melody was gonna wake up soon. So you headed back to the pier with Buizel giving you a ride. Soon you made it back to the pier feeling a lot better. You climbed onto the pier, got out of the water, and dried yourself off with a towel. As you dried yourself off, you saw Buizel heading back into the ocean. Buizel looked back and waved. You waved back and watched as Buizel swam out of sight.

(name): Wow. I never had that much fun before. It was almost like a dream. But I wonder. Why did those pokemon send me to that reef anyway?

Then the very same Luvdisc jumped in front of you getting your attention. When you saw it, you could only smile.

(name): I bet you were the reason for all that huh?

The Luvdisc jumped about as if it was saying yes. You reached out and petted it on it's head.

(name): Thanks a bunch little buddy. I feel a lot better now.

Luvdisc jumped out of the water and gave you a smooch on the cheek as a way of saying "you're welcome" and disappeared into the water. You feeling a lot better about things decided to head back home before Melody woke up. Then...

(voice): You know, you looked kinda cool swimming with the pokemon like that.

You jumped in surprise and looked behind you to see...

Soon as you saw who was talking you saw Melody and Carol on the pier. Melody was giggling a bit seeing you interact with a pokemon after saying long ago how you were so tired of seeing them everywhere. Carol was behind Melody looking at you, still her face was filled with anger, but this time it wasn't as bad as before. This time she cooled down a little but still held resentment for the mess you two got yourselves into. Melody came down toward you her eyes sparkled with her smile radiating. The look on her face showed her obvious affection but when she grasped your hands, her eyes looked deep into yours. She could feel your fear and worry, she knew you were thinking you wouldn't measure up to raising your child. However she knew more than anyone that you would do your best to be the best dad you could be. How you would sacrifice, protect, and devote your energy to one person. Her experience when the world nearly fell out of balance showed her you were capable. Saving her life, the world, and determination, that is why she trusted you. Yet as she smiled comforting you, you lowered your head in grief. You thought how can I be deserving of someone like her? Yet without a single word, she reassured you that all would be fine between you two. She raised your head and gave you a single look, it washed away the very last inch of doubt. You two were better now, you felt ready for the coming chapter in your lives.

You two hugged tightly, embraced by the love you two had. Today was a long and bracing day, and it would only get more difficult from then on fro a long while. ''(Name) none of it was your fault."

"I know. I was only scared and I'm doing my best to adjust. But we'll get through this ok?"

"I love you."

"I love you too.", you both kissed lightly to avoid making Carol disgusted. Soon as you went down and started heading back home Carol stopped the both of you.

"(Name), I'm sorry. I am legitimately happy for you and Melody."

"Thanks, I appreciate it. Really.", you replied. You went back home with Melody, heading to bed. However you felt a little awkward after what happened. But Melody took your hand and gently pulled you in with her. You cuddled until you both rested peacefully this time. With a new life in the making you couldn't help but have your hand over your lover's belly. Feelings of happiness and joy overflowed in your body that you cried happily as you drifted off to sleep.

1113322221112222222222222222222222211212.content:
Nine months had passed since that day. It seemed like a long time, but to you it seemed like yesterday. Especially since how things were going nowadays. You finally landed a job in a restaurant off the coast from town. You were a little nervous because you weren't sure that you would get the job, but the owner of the restaurant was more than happy to hire you since you were the legendary hero after all. The staff members also welcomed you with open arms and treated you like they were a member of the family. Since you were hired, you worked hard all day taking orders, cleaning up, and even sometimes making the food. It was exhausting but the pay made it all worth it. When you first started working it was all overwhelming for you, but eventually you got the hang of it.

Cook 1: Hey (name)! Another order for table three!

(name): I'm on it!

Waiter 1: (name)! Please escort these two to a table.

(name): Sure thing. Right this way please.

It was another day at the restaurant. You were helping the other waiters wait tables. You along with the other waiters went back and forth taking orders and serving orders. It was especially packed around the afternoon. You guessed it was because of the food being so great, but you eventually learned that it was for a different reason altogether.

Girl: Excuse me. Can I have some more water please?

(name): Coming right up! (pours water)

Man: Waiter! Check please!

(name): I'm on my way! (places check on table)

Girl: Excuse me. Where's my order sir?

(name): Right here ma'am. (places order on the table) Please enjoy miss. Call if you need anything.

As you were taking care of the customers, your boss and a couple of other workers were watching you work.

Waiter 2: Wow. Look at him go.

Cook 2: Yup. (name) has to be one of the biggest hard workers I've ever seen.

Your Boss: You better believe it. Not only does he work hard, but he's pretty popular with the customers. We've never have gotten so many before. I must say that (name) has changed our lives for the better.

A few hours later, your shift was over and you were looking forward to going home and getting some time to yourself. Then your boss came up to you.

Your Boss: Hey (name). Nice job to today. Same as always. You've attracted a lot of customers as usual.

(name): Thanks boss.

Your Boss: Heading home right?

(name): Yup. Looking forward to getting some rest after a hard days work.

Your Boss: So how is everything back at home? And how's Melody getting along? Has the baby come yet?

(name): She's doing fine and not yet, but I can safely say that the baby's due any day now.

Your Boss: I see. If I recall that's the reason why you asked for this job right?

(name): That's right. Since Melody and I are gonna be parents, might as well earn my keep somehow. Plus I was planning to raise some money to go on a trip with Melody and our baby.

Your Boss: Sounds like fun.

(name): Yeah. By the way, I have forgotten to tell you this before, but......thank you. Thank you for this job. It really means a lot to me.

Your Boss: I'm the one who should be thanking you. You're really a good kid and you helped my business. Plus this place wouldn't be standing if you hadn't come to Shamouti.

(name): Aw shucks. It was nothing. It was the least I could do. Well then. I better get going. Melodys waiting for me.

Your Boss: Oh (name)! Before you go, you forgot something.

Your boss handed you an envelope.

(name): Is this my paycheck? Don't get I get paid until Friday?

Your Boss: Yes indeed. I decided to give it to you a little early to show my gratitude. Make sure you use it wisely.

(name): Thank you boss! You're the best! See you later!

After that you set off for home, eager to see a certain someone who was waiting for you at home.

111332222221222111221.content:
Another weird dream

That's all your thinking of as you weave your way through the busy streets of Tokyo. For the past few weeks, you have been plagued by several dreams that seem real. You find yourself in a kingdom that looks to be on the moon. You’re a foot soldier in an army, one of the stronger ones though not as strong as what you deem the 'knights' of the kingdom. It's a figure of speech, as the knights are actually young women in sailor fukus. The last dream was the strongest, you found yourself fighting against an army of humanoid monsters. You held your own until you fought what looked to be a general. Involuntarily, you shudder as you remember being killed after a brief fight.

It felt so real though, like a past life

You shrug the thought off; you were never one for believing in reincarnation. You cut across a busy intersection at the green walking light. Your steps are faster than anyone around you. Without sounding smug, you are in better shape than most of your peers. You are coming back from a karate lesson. One of the top students, your stamina outweighs even some of the instructors. At this point, you’re at one of the higher levels in the dojo, when you should be at the beginner stage. You’ve even picked up some Jiu Jutsu as well. You've chalked it up to your unusual ability to process lessons faster, almost like your mind is a sponge.

Your inner rambling is brought to a halt by a little girl screaming. You notice her running into a abandoned house. It's almost as if she is being chased. "What the hell?" You start running towards the house; if the girl is in trouble you want to help. You think you see a flash of purple out of the corner of your eye, but when you turn it's gone.

You enter the house at a brisk pace. You see the girl slump against a wall, terrified.

"Hey!" You call out; the girl turns to see you. She's crying, obviously scared. Closing the distance, you jump as the girl wraps you in a hug. You feel a little weird, being a stranger, but allow her to embrace you.

"Please! Help me...I'm being chased by a monster!"

Confused, you open your mouth when the ringing of bells and a feline meow catches your ears. Both of you watch as a figure appears in front of a window. Your mind can’t process what your eyes are telling you. The figure had a feminine figure, wore a white dress, with her skin a shade of purple. Feline ears and tail gave her the look of a catgirl. A small part in the back of your mind finds her pretty, but you quash that thought from taking over.

“I don’t believe it.” You’re in disbelief. A catgirl only exists in anime, and yet here was one standing in front of you. Landing gracefully on the floor, she stands upright and addresses you.

“I’m here for the girl’s crystal that lies in her pure heart. Step aside.” The voice carries an underlying threat; you know a fight will happen if you don’t leave. Swallowing, you stand firm in front of the girl.

“That’s not going to happen.” You adopt a defensive stance, one that would be quick to react to any movements.

The catgirl looks at you, before grinning. “Fine by me. Time to sharpen my claws!” She then launches herself at you.

1113322222212221112211.content:
"Run!"

The warning barely leaves your lips before you dodge a set of claws. Your arm snaps up to parry a blow from the monsters other arm. You hear the girl run off to another part of the house. The cat monster tries to follow but you shift in front of her.

"Sorry, but you need to get through me first!" She growls and swings her tail at you. Moving quickly, you jerk your head to side as the appendage almost takes it off. Adrenaline floods your body as you move on autopilot. Muscle reflex takes over as you dodge several strikes, and launch a few of your own.

“What the Nell!” The cat lady shouts as she jumps back from a punch. She launches another clawed hand at you. Quickly, you sidestep allowing her hand to get stuck in the wall. As she struggles to free it you quickly land a solid hit on her side. A second strike is thwarted as her tail wraps around your ankle.

“Shit!”

You go flying as she flicks her tail. A second later, you land flat on your back. Grunting in pain, you see the monster come towards you. You kick your legs up, hitting her in the stomach before catching her on the chin. To your surprise, you find your strength is enough to flip the monster over. She lands on her stomach, grunting as she pulls herself off the floor. Back on your feet, you assume a defensive stance as a voice rings out from the shadows.

“Only a black hearted monster’s targets a young girl!”

Both you and monster turn your attention to the voice. There is a group of young women wearing sailor-like outfits. Amazingly, they look exactly the same as the ones in your dreams. As one, the girls shouted.

“The Sailor Senshi are here!”

Really? You can’t help but wonder why they’re wasting time announcing their presence. One of the scouts, in a red colored fuku, calls out to you.

“What are you doing here? Get back!” As she speaks, both she and another ‘senshi’ in a green colored fuku are surrounded by energy. You don’t know what they’re doing, but you distance yourself from the catgirl just in case. The monster turns her attention to the newcomers, though she glances at you.

“Mars Burning Mandala!”

“Sparkling Wand Pressure!”

The two attacking girls send their fire/lightning combo at the monster. Your eyes widen in amazement. The catgirl doesn’t seem too disturbed. In fact, she’s smirking; you don’t know why until her tail flicks.

“Watch out!” Your warning comes in time for the lightening based senshi to dodge as both attacks are reflected back. The fire senshi wasn’t so lucky; she cried in pain while being slammed into a wall. The other two girls are able to get out of the blast zone.

“Mars!” You now know out the downed girl’s name. You quickly counterattack while the catgirl is admiring her work. A fast kick catches her between the shoulder blades. You dart right as the tail comes up. As you fight, you call out to the other senshi.

“Where’s the little girl?!” You parry an incoming claw as a blue haired girl calls out.

“She’s ok. Sailor Moon is taking her to safety.” You give a quick nod, hoping this ‘Sailor Moon’ knows what she’s doing. The monster changes tactics and aims a kick to your chest. You catch her foot with both hands. At the same time, you sweep a foot out and knock her off balance. The tail shoots out, forcing you back.

“Oh come on Nell!” The catgirl shouts in frustration. Taking a stance, you can’t help but wonder where the monster came from, and why she was after the girl.

“What are you?!” Picking herself off the floor, she looks at you quizzically. The other senshi look confused as well. You pay them no attention; you stay alert in case the monster attacks.

“I want to know who’s giving me the fight of my life.” Despite the danger, you never felt more alive! The catgirl tilts her head to the side, wondering if you lost her mind. The senshi have the same look, but say nothing. The catgirl takes a moment to respond. “I’m a Daimon.” That answers nothing, but you continue.

“Why are you attacking that poor girl?”

“I’m to take the crystal that’s inside her pure heart. That why I was made.”

“Made? Who made you?” You notice the senshi are now listening in, protecting the wounded Mars.

“My mistress is Kaolinite. I answer to her. That’s all I know.” Still not breaking your stance, you ask one final question.

“Why answer your mistress? She’s not helping you now.” The monster’s face goes blank, deep in thought.

“That…that doesn’t matter. My purpose is to get the crystal, at all costs.” Flexing her claws, she looks ready to attack again. A small part of you is sad; you don’t feel right fighting someone (or something depending on point of view) who can’t choose for herself.

“Sorry, but I won’t let you hurt that girl.” The senshi get ready to fight as well before voices ring out.

“World Shaking!”

“Deep Submerge!”

To your horror, you realize that the new attacks are coming at you and the catgirl. Quickly, you flip to the side, avoiding the planet shaped orb. The monster was not so lucky, and took it full force. A feline screech hits your ears as she explodes into millions of pieces.

“Damn!”

That’s all you can say as the shockwave blows you off your feet. You land in a heap in front of the senshi. Picking yourself up, you glare at the two newcomers. The girl’s seem just as shocked.

“The girl’s pure heart wasn’t taken. We don’t know if it had the talismans.” The taller, blonde woman mutters.

“We’ll just have to wait and keep an eye out.” Her compatriot, a senshi with long-blue hair replied. Looking disinterested, they started to leave.

“What the hell was that all about?!” You’re mad at almost being killed. The blonde woman glares at you.

“Make no mistake; we’re not allies with that group.” She turns to leave, then makes one final statement. “You should spend more time fighting monsters than talking.” With that, they disappeared. Still angry, your mood changes as you notice the pieces that were once the catgirl start to come together.

“Whoa.”

You watch as she puts herself back together. Stumbling, she holds her head in pain. “I can’t take that again.”

The words are picked up by the senshi, who quickly launch their attack. To their credit, they move in front of you to avoid hitting you. The monster reflects the blue haired girls attack, but gets hit with the other two. She screams again, but you can’t see anything as the reflected attack fills the room with mist.

“Spread out!” The blonde senshi shouts as the unwounded trio moves out. By yourself, you wonder what to do next. Noticing the mist does not go all the way down on the floor, you lay flat on your belly and peer at where the monster was. The puzzle pieces are moving at a much slower pace. She forms up again, but it’s clear to you the monster is in no shape for another round. Her cat ears perk up, as if someone is calling her. With catlike grace, she slinks out of an open window.

Where’s she going?

Quietly, you slip away from the senshi and follow the monster. As she jumps up onto the roof of a nearby building, you climb up a ladder. On the roof, you call out.

“Hey stop!”

She starts running and you give chase. You follow her as she jumps from one building to another. Crying out, you make the jump roughly before resuming the chase. The next jump makes you blanch as the monster jumps across the street. You stop before you become road pizza. Across the street, she smirks at you.

“Well that’s not fair!” She appears to laugh at your misfortune.

“My mistress calls for me. Sayonara!” With that, she waves at you before disappearing. The chase now done, you turn back to the old house, only to see the rest of the senshi standing in front of you.

“I have some explaining to do don’t I?” The long blonde haired senshi just nods. You groan; it’s going to be a long day.

11133222222122211122111.content:
*This passage will be told in third person*

With a grunt, Nekonelle propelled herself off the roof to the next building. She winced slightly; the pain was lessening but still present. The Daimon frowned as she recalled what just happened.

I didn’t think it was gonna be this hard!

She let out a grunt as her feline figure straightened out. So far, her mission had been a disaster. It should have been a simple snatch and grab for her mistress. Instead, the purple skinned Daimon had tangled with the Sailor Senshi…

And that human.

Despite her appearance and speech pattern, Nekonelle was not what a person would call stupid. All Daimons had an average amount of intelligence incubated in their egg form. Dr. Tomoe was not one to make his monsters brainless. She knew that an average human was no match for a Daimon in terms of strength or speed.

So how the Nell did he fight me?

The feline monster contemplated how the human was able to keep her from taking the girls pure heart. As she jumped from rooftop to rooftop, Nekonelle could not help but keep thinking about the male. Like the animal she took traits from, she was curious. While her mission was still to find a pure heart crystal for her master, she wanted to learn more about the human who gave her one hell of a fight.

“Nekonelle!”

The sharp cry brought the Daimon to a halt. Startled, she looked up to see her mistress. Kaolinite stared down at her with cold eyes. Inwardly, Nekonelle gulped. She knew that a disappointed mistress was a dangerous one. Standing up straight, she addressed the witch.

“Mistress!” She bowed at the end of her statement; it was an involuntarily gesture, meant to placate the woman.

“You failed to bring me the pure heart.” The woman’s words stung Nekonelle; she knew how dangerous the situation was. The Daimon stumbled for words, trying to explain herself.

“I was attacked by the Sailor Senshi, and a human male got between me and the targ-”

“THAT’S IT!?”
Kaolinite stopped Nekonelle from her defense. The feline Daimon shuddered at the harsh words.

“You were designed to kill the senshi if needed, and a human?! They are weak and should not be a problem. You failed against an inferior enemy!” The witch was furious, and looked down at Nekonelle like she was nothing.

“I…I’m sorry mistress.” The Daimon was truly afraid; she knew that the witch had to power to kill her. “It…it won’t happen again. I will find the pure heart.” Nekonelle finished the sentence with determination.

“Who said you’re getting a second chance?”

The Daimon looked at her mistress with fear as Kaolinite raised her hand.

“We do not tolerate failures, die!” The blast hit Nekonelle before she could dodge. The energy blasted her into a set of power lines. She let out a feline screech as the energy and electricity mixed. The red witch watched as the Daimon fell into an alleyway below. She scoffed at having the deal with trash, before disappearing.
Unknown to her, the blast had not killed Nekonelle. The Daimon was, for all intents and purposes, unconsciousness. She lay there unmoving for hours, unknown to the passersby’s of the city. Soon, the sun dipped below the horizon, angry clouds blocking the moon. Thunder soon followed.
____________________________________________________________________________ _________________________________________________________
Raindrops woke Nekonelle up. Her attempts to move brought waves of pain. Moaning, the monster curled into a ball. The rain came down heavier, soaking her dress and hair.

“Why?”

The monster cried softly, shocked and hurt by the betrayal. Now, the Daimon didn’t know what to do. Defeated, she lay there, whimpering as pain kept wracking her body. Slowly, she brought her fingers to her mouth. Pulling them away, she saw…

Blood?

It didn’t make sense for Nekonelle to have blood. She ignored this as she struggled to bring herself upright. The night had become chilly, and a small part told her that she had to find shelter.

“But where do I go?”

She spoke to herself. Wincing, she stood up shakily as the pain was becoming bearable. She started walking, trying to find a sense of where to go. The streets were deserted; everyone was keeping out of the downpour. After what seemed like hours, she was ready to give up and brave the rain when she saw him.

The human from before?

He was carrying a bag of groceries, and quickly ducked into a building. Looking, Nekonelle realized it was a house. It was a simple two story house with a small balcony. Biting her lip, the Daimon contemplated her next action.

“Maybe if I ask nicely?” It was a long shot, but Nekonelle had no other options.

1113322222222222212222211.content:
You were born a Britannian and you are nobility within the social class. Your parents aren't royals but a respected friend of one of the heirs to the throne. You were close to one of the royal families, mainly Lelouch and Nunnally vi Britannia. You didn't know them well but you spent some time together, and they always liked you. However when news struck that they were exiled and their mother dead, then later presumed the siblings perished during the invasion of Japan you took the news quite hard.

Years later, now a respected young man having his whole life ahead of him, you were at Ashford Academy to study abroad while you were preparing to finish your last couple years in highschool. Normally this would be saved for college, but your plans involved getting a job close to home, so this would be a good chance to have a taste of freedom.

Your dad was supportive but disagreed very much with your choice of setting. Seeing how many attacks occurred through the continent, he was concerned for your safety, however you managed to get into the school and thus far have had no incidents. You arrived at the gate and walked on campus just carrying your things. You headed to your dorm room, from there you unpacked and walked around the campus hoping to see new faces. However things took a dramatic turn when you were greeted by the student council, and among them was someone you believed to be dead, Lelouch.

"AAAAAAAAAAANNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNDDDDDDDDD HIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!", the tall blonde one cried out. "Welcome to Ashford Academy, here our policy is have fun, or have a nice life because you're never going to have it be this exciting again. Now normally we'd be doing this event on the holiday but here we do things out of order.", the same girl handed you a note with a heart shape.

You were far too shocked to see Lelouch alive and well, with him feeling just as in shock as you were. "Allow me to introduce myself and our council, I'm Milly Ashford, this is Lelouch Lamperouge , Shirley Fenette, Rivalz Cardemonde, Nina Einstein, and our unofficial member is right behind us Nunnally.", Milly introduced.

Just seeing Lelouch was enough to make you stand still in disbelief but Nunnally caused you to flat out freeze like a statue. "Big brother, is there someone new were meeting?", she asked.

You remembered when she still had her sight, and ran around the gardens when you were children. Now she is blind and in a wheelchair. She may have been disabled, but her lovely smile still managed to form one even in her present condition, enough that it warmed your heart and mind enough to break you out of your shock.

"Madame president do you mind me and ths student talked in privet for a bit with my sister?"

"Huh? Lulu what do you mean?", Shirley reacted.

"I just happened to realize he's an old friend of ours. It's been years do you think we can steal him for just a while?", Lelouch insisted. You guessed it was due to his nobility stance he wanted to make sure you wouldn't speak of it accidentally to the wrong people. So you played along.

"I'll happily introduce myself until I catch up Miss Ashford.", you said.

"Sure sure, go on.", she allowed.

You Lelouch and Nunnally entered your room and locked it. For a moment you both stood in silence, then you broke it by hugging Lelouch and gently getting Nunnally in it as well.

"So bloody happy to see you two!", you said.

Nunnally for a moment couldn't recognize who you were, she never met you again when she was disabled, but she took a minute to recognize you when she heard your voice. "Is it you? (Name)?"

"Yes! Nunnally! Oh my goodness, you look beautiful."

"Hmm, I must admit you surprised me.", Lelouch replied.

"You're both alive? Why didn't you say something?"

"Our father exiled us here, the girl, Milly, her family is keeping us hidden here while we keep our names hidden. We've been here for a while now, but so far things have been good.", Lelouch explained.

"Yeah I heard about being exiled. Listen I'm amazed your here and alive, I missed you two."

"So did we (Name), I remember how we used to play together.", Nunnally recalled.

"Yes. Those were good times. Did you know we were here?"

"No. No idea. I'm here to complete my final two years, nothing more. Don't worry, I won't tell anyone about you guys."

"Thank you. You were one of the few people back home we missed."

"Yeah, I missed you guys too.", you replied feeling very glad to have managed to be talking to them again.

"(Name) today is our school heart event, were supposed to give a special card to someone we like and then on Valentines day we get them back and write our feelings of that person on the back. I wasn't planning on giving any, but I made one in case, take it."

She handed you a heart shaped letter like Milly's only Nunnally's had words in them, Milly's only had just the who sent it stuff. You gave Nunnally that card as a way of returning the favor. "Here since I feel the need to give you something."

"Thank you."
