1113322222222222222222222211221221111121.title: Jeagers vs bandits

1113322222222222222222222211221221111121.content:
The Jeagers walked up the steps to the bandit's hideout until they stood right at the front door. They were immediately welcomed by a whole squad of bandits, each one with a gun, knife, or any other weapon pointed directly at them.

"You got some nerve walking up to the front gates like this!" a bandit said. "You guys must be stupid! Get them!"

With a cry in unison, all the bandits charged at the Jeagers in overwhelming numbers. Seryu stepped forward along with her Imperial Arms Koro.

"Koro. Number 5," she commanded holding out her right arm.

Koro acknowledged with a yip. He started out as some kind of cute dog like creature and then it grew in size having several rows of sharp and giant teeth. Koro then chomped on Seryu's arm causing a like blood to spew out, then he let go returning back to his usual small size. From where Seryu's arm was, a giant drill took it's place and Seryu wore a look that showed nothing, but complete blood lust.

"Judgement of the Ten Kings! Enma's Spear of Justice!" Seryu shrieked as she drilled right through the enemy.

Blood and body's fell everywhere. Koro chomped on Seryu's arm again engulfing even the drill and repeated the process. This time, a giant long ranged anti-tank rifle took the place of the drill.

"Next Number 7! Taizan's Cannon of Justice!"

Seryu fired her canon right at the front gate destroying it and anyone who happened to be standing by it.

"What do you think fellas? Those weapons were made by the Hands of God, Perfector. They increase my speed and precision a hundred times over. Truly the most stylish Imperial Arms you've ever laid eyes on!" said Dr. Stylish proudly.

Then the rest of the Jeagers joined the fray. Leaping past the smoke into the fortress, Kurome slashed and slaughtered any bandit she saw with her sword in an instant.

"Don't worry. After this is over, I'll put you all back together and we'll have some fun. Like cute little dolls," she giggled.

Just then a bandit that was hiding in the corner, pulled out his gun and prepared to fire at Kurome, but luckily Wave saw him and knocked him out with a kick saving her.

"No need to thank me by the way," he said to Kurome. "We're a team after all."

"I wasn't going to," said Kurome. "I already knew that he was there."

"Like hell you did!" snapped Wave.

Meanwhile other bandits were battling another member of the Jeagers named Bols. His Imperial Arms was a flamethrower with jet engine that heated the air around it. Bols fired shooting flames all over any bandit that was got in flames. The bandits screamed in agony and the smell of burning flesh was in the air. Some of them tried to douse the flames, but no matter how much they tried the flames wouldn't go out.

"Sorry fellas. Don't take it personally," said Bols. "But my Imperial Arms, Purgatory's Invitation: Rubicante has flames that are so hot, they can't be doused even with water."

The bandits that still remained tried to run away with their lives intact, but then arrows shot out from above and went right through their heads. No doubt that they were as good as dead. Just before one of them died though, he happened to see where the attack came from. The arrows turned out to be feathers and came from the last of the Jeagers Run who up above them flapping his beautiful angelic like wings.

"An...angel?" he gasped just before he fell to the ground dead.

"Just a man with a winged Imperial Arms," Run said. "The Thousand-Mile Flight Mastema. Sorry, but I'm not letting any of you leave alive."

Soon it was all over as everyone of the Jeagers stepped from the flames not a single scratch on any of them. You awed and at the same time horrified at the Jeagers destructive power.

"Un... Unbelievable." you breathed.

"(name). You'll be able to do that too," said Esdeath. "I'll personally train you myself and soon you'll be as strong as them."

"You really think so? That's kind of you to say."

"We're you expecting me to act different? To be honest with you, this is the first time I'm acting like this myself. My first taste of love. And it feels...wonderful," said Esdeath blushing.

Soon the Jeagers came back. Esdeath congratulated them on a job well done and then you all headed back to headquarters.
1113322222222222222222222211221221111121.title: The power of The Jeagers

1113322222222222222222222211221221111121.content:
The next day you spent the morning in one of the conference rooms having breakfast, Wave and Kurome were the only ones to show up but one look at you and they were really concerned by your present state. Your head was on the table, with you sleeping as if you were drugged, but you weren't.

"Uhh (Name) you alive?", Wave asked.

"No. Lemme sleep.", you answered with your face flat on the table. Though muffled you could still speak clear for the two to hear.

"But we all managed to get back here at a decent hour."

"Esdeath....body pillow.....death threats.....snm.......no rest......", you muttered.

"What was the one before the no rest?"

"Nothing happened, which I spent alllllllll night making sure of.", you answered.

"Jeez (Name). What's the attraction? I mean she looks great, nobody is faulting you for that, but personality?"

"One-sided. I got dragged kicking and screaming Wave. I Never agreed to join the team."

"You did steal an Imperial Arms.", Kurome stated.

"Does it count if the Imperial Arms stole me? Swear to god it has a mind of its own."

"If the doc found that out, he'd keep you as a lab rat waiting for a test result.", Kurome thought.

"Then I'm SOL positive then. Wave just hit me over the head as hard as you can. Talking is making me more wide awake, I need to catch some Z's.", you asked politely.

"Maybe drink some coffee.", Wave suggested.

Then Esdeath came in, "Wave, Kurome, (Name) good morning. Get yourselves ready soon. We will be going to the countryside to hunt bandits as well as hunt danger beasts."

"Mmmmmmmm!", you screamed into the table.

"Do you protest (Name)?"

"The part that includes me. Can I PLEASE get some sleep, too damn exhausted.", you asked.

"I won't have that be a reason for sitting out a mission. If you intend to be mine, then you better give me your best even when you are still at your worst.", she replied.

"Makes no sense.", she yanked your collar and slapped you across the face.

"There you are woken up enough."

You were quite ticked at her and just wanted to get out of there. She's crazy and in all honesty, why fight at all? With a groggy start you went to the countryside with your new team.
1113322222222222222222222211221221111121.title: Cleaning the cobwebs of morning

1113322222222222222222222211221221111121.content:
You were at the countryside, there wasn't civilization for miles. You all split into teams. Esdeath with Kurome and you with Wave. You managed to get yourself awake enough to the point where you were ready for action. Something the wild was known for, was that you needed to be alert at all times for anything. So your survival instincts kept yourself alive and alert.

"Hey (Name), I'm glad were on the same team. Catches a break from having get stuck with the general for so long.", Wave started talking.

"I do appreciate the space. Out of everyone I feel your the one sane man back home. Rest is run by crazies. Well, maybe Boles, counts too. He's freaky but polite when you aren't his enemy.", you commented.

"Thanks. And hey if you need time to vent, I'm all ears. Besides I feel like were both going through the same problems.", Wave thanked.

"I'd say not in a million years, but all the others combined would equal an Esdeath. And boy, if I wanted to vent, I would vent, so much I'd be able to generate a room full of air conditioning."

"Hehe. Geez I have to ask though, what's it like?"

"If you enjoy pain, sadism, believe in Darwin, and have a powerful skillset on you, then she's no problem.”

“Jeez, that rough huh?”

“You have no idea.”

You and wave continued to scout the area, but thus far hadn’t come across anything yet. “I don’t see any bandits. Maybe we should double back.”, you suggested.

“I’m not sure if we should. General Esdeath might not like us ignoring her orders.”, Wave replied.

“You’re right. Very least in case we don’t find anything here, we might need to hold position in case anything from her position comes to us.”

“Good idea.”

Then suddenly you heard some movement behind you and Wave. It sounded like rocks moving, but it sounded like it was coming closer. You turned around and saw some sort of hand reach out to Wave. You activated your suit and used your tendrils to slice in half whatever it was.

“What the hell?!”

“Danger beasts! Pull out your imperial arms!”

“On it!”, soon a herd of danger beasts rose out of the ground. They appeared like dead trees with hideous faces engraved on the bark. “Back to back!”, Wave called out. You and him did just that and stood in your fighting stances preparing to attack. “You take your side I’ll take this one!”

“Gotchya!”, you both waited for the right opportunity to strike. Then when one of the beasts lunged in, you and Wave retaliated in force. In just no time you and Wave destroyed them all.

“Whew, that wasn’t too bad. You handled yourself well-“, soon as Wave turned around you were gone. “Uh….(Name)?”, it occurred to him you took off and ran. “NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!! I’m too young to die! I GET WHY BUT PLEASE DON’T MAKE ME COME BACK WITHOUT YOU!!!!!!!”

You weren’t having any of that, you had a chance to get out of the capital and away from Esdeath. You just wanted to be left alone, so you took your chances and got the hell out of dodge. But things only got worse when before you could get a good enough distance you were confronted by someone in armor.

“Go away! I just want to be left alone! I’m not taking part of this stupid war!”, you yelled.

“Wait? Who are you?”, the man in armor replied.

“Wave?”

“No. Wait? I recognize you, from the arena!”, the man in armor realized.

“You’re not him. Just let me go, I want no part of whatever it is you came here to do.”

“Sorry, but you are the reason why I’m here. The suit.”

“Sorry, but even though this thing has been causing me trouble, I sure as hell ain’t giving it up!”, you attacked the guy in armor with a swipe of the suit’s tendrils. The guy in armor dodged the attack and flew up in the air. By the time you started fighting, Wave, in a similar but darker colored armor, came to the scene.

“(Name)?! Oh thank god I’m saved! Huh? Is that Night Raid? Of course, that’s why he left me hanging. He went to take him on by himself.”, Wave thought to himself. “Hold on (Name)!”, he called out.

“NO! This other guy flagged down Wave and now I won’t be able to escape!”, you thought.

"A member of Night Raid, don't know what your doing out here but that's just too bad. You're out numbered.", Wave said to the the other guy.

"Crap, I didn't expect there to be two. That guy who Leone said got hold of the suit said wasn't well trained. But after a few days and another guy from the capital, probably should make a run for it.", the guy in the white armor thought. He lept up and tried to escape for you and Wave. You didn't try and go after him since you didn't want anything to do with this. But Wave went straight after him. The two armored combatants fought fircely in combat, Wave wasn't going all out since he expected you to come in and help but you had already abandoned him. You ran deeper into the forest trying to use the trees to cover your escape. With nay luck, you hoped they would fight long enough for you to get a fair distance away.

"Whew. Finally. I might be branded a traitor now, but screw it. Whatever life I had back there didn't matter to me. I'm better off finding somewhere else to settle in.", you said out loud. Suddenly you felt yourself move in a dodging motion, for a split-second your suit went on auto pilot and saved your life.

You saw a young girl with black hair and a long sword, with a guy with green hair and a long jacket. "Night Raid?! Gah! Just go away all of you! I'm sick of people trying to come after me for one reason or another!", you stated.

"Lub can you deal with him?", the girl asked.

"Leone gave this to me, so I'll handle him fine.", he held out some sort of capsule with a blueish color.

The girl ran past you at top speed. She didn't seem interested in you apparently.

You formed your suit into extending out spikes across your body, in an attempt to intimidate him. "Heh! News flash assassin, you've never dealt with someone like me before!"

Then the guy threw the capsule right onto your suit. "HA! Sorry I don't need a breath mint."

"It'll chill out your breath, buuuut maybe beyond that too.", he smirked.

You were confused but suddenly you felt ice forming around your body. It came from the capsule and a body cast of ice formed around you now. You were totally incapable of movement and couldn't say or breath. You blacked out from the shock.
1113322222222222222222222211221221111121.title: Outside of the Capital....

1113322222222222222222222211221221111121.content:
You woke up and found yourself tied up on a chair, you took a second to adjust your vision but you could see what appeared to be a group of people surrounding you. When it cleared, you realized it was the entire Night Raid group of assassins. “He’s come around.”, the guy with green hair said.

“Good,”, the girl with black hair from earlier held a sword at your throat, “Tell us how you got your hands on that suit.”

“Fuck off.”, you tried using you imperial arms but it didn’t work. It wouldn’t activate.

“Nice try but elemental attacks really aren’t that thing’s best friend. It’ll be a while when it’ll regenerate.”, Lubbock said.

“I just wanted to get away from those crazies alright! Lemme go!”

“Hey, listen I’m sorry about earlier but you should hear us out. The government at the capital needs to be changed. What were doing is to help others.”, he explained.

“Except I couldn’t care less about it. That damn country openly conquered my home. Forced me to live there, in a hell hole. And because of you people I had this imperial arms attached to my body in the first place. SO NO FUCKING WAY AM I HELPING YOU!”, you yelled out.

“Wait? Small village, few years ago…”, someone in an eyepatch and had a metal arm walk up to you. She seemed familiar, you couldn’t believe it!

“YOU! You were the son of a bitch that conquered my home! YOU’RE THE CAUSE OF THIS!”

“Listen, I’m sorry. I was doing my job. You were on the wrong side of the fight. But I’m trying to do right by that.”, Najenda said somberly.

“Go to hell. I won’t be apart of your little theater troupe.”

“Listen I understand why you don’t want to work with us, or be in this fight.”, she then untied you, much to the shock of her comrades, “And you are free to leave. But we just want the suit.”, Najenda said.

“I can’t get it off of me. Somehow it stays inside of me when it’s not covering my whole body. I think it’s in the blood.”

“Hey boss, he might be right. Cuz I heard that crazy doc, mention how it was impossible to remove every time they tested it.”, Leone mentioned.

“Neglected to bring that up with his lab rat. I really did not like that guy. He had that vibe that just read, douche.”

“You’ve seen the Jeagers?”, Akame reacted.

“Seen them? I’ve been living with them. I know what they can do, to a small extent.”

“Hey guy,”, Leone tried to stop you from walking out.

“(Name), please.”

“We really could use your help. Why not become a member of Night Raid and help us. If not for us, at least so that no other village goes through what you went through.”, Leone pleaded.

“I disagree, if you were to go back among their ranks and be a double agent, you could be able to provide us intel and we’d pick off the Jeagers one by one.”, Akame suggested.

“Akame, that’s far too dangerous. Esdeath would get wise to that the second one of her own was somehow killed unexpectedly.”, Najenda objected.

“Ok, not that I’m willing to go through with that plan, cuz I won’t do it, but Esdeath is head over heels for me. And I’m not bullshiting. Why I’m trying to flee from the capital is so that I can escape from her!”

“I don’t even know how to respond to that.”, Najenda replied.

“Good luck guys I’m gone.”

Suddenly the walls bursted inward as someone broke in with a cannon. Soon as you regained your composure you discovered it was one of the Jeagers, the ‘good’ doctor himself, and with a whole army of freak experiments behind him.

“Ah! (Name), so it is what I thought all along. You were a spy for Night Raid, and stole my precious experiment.”, Stylish declared.

“I’m not with them you idiot! They captured me! “

“Not what the general will hear, when I deliver her your lifeless body.”

“Hey! Wait! You want your suit back? How about you have it, I walk out of this.”

“Oh hehehe. Failed to mention this, but that suit was never meant to be removed. Not unless the host is dead. And unfortunately that is what I already intended to do.”

“You son of a!”, you managed to have the suit form around you and lunged at the doctor.
1113322222222222222222222211221221111121.title: Continue...

1113322222222222222222222211221221111121.content:
Your suit finally was able to form again, you tackled the doctor over the edge of the hole in the wall, which was a good seven story drop. When you hit the ground, you were sure a fall like that would kill any simple man. Then the rumbling from the epicenter of the impact reminded you, "Oh right, Esdeath recruited these guys herself. Why did I think it would be easy?"

When the rubble arose the doctor had transformed into a mutated version of himself. His mutated form was the size of the whole base they fell from. The doctor's real body was fused on the forehead of the mutated one. In one strike, the doctor smashed a chunk of the base collapsing the structure, intent with burying any and all Night Raid inside.

"How marvelous! I not only crush this bothersome rebellion but have left the one true enemy of my work the last one standing! You who stole my work from under me, after I poured everything into the best weapon the world will ever know!"

"I didn't steal it!", you yelled out. You latched a few tendrils onto the forearms of the mutated body and launched yourself up to the doctor. "It found me!", you hit the doctor in the face with your knee and threw in two punches before the giant body staggered back hitting the rock behind him. "I AM SICK OF PEOPLE-", you grabbed the doctor by the throat and started wailing on him, "Assuming I GIVE A DAMN-", then you started crushing his wind pipe, "ABOUT THIS FUCKING EMPIRE!"

The doctor's experiments suddenly broke out of the debris the doctor created earlier and dog piled you off of his body.

"Such ferocity. You know the longer you use it, the more it will modify your behavior."

After cutting down the annoying pests you took a second to interpret his words. "You mean it will control me?"

"I designed it purely to enhance the most potent aspects of a warrior. Aggression, anger, brutality, all of them are fueled every minute you have it engulf your body."

"THEN FIX IT! OR GET IT OFF ME!"

"Hehehe. Nonsense, this thrilling drama of my work is a work of art that can't end so abruptly. Either you die by removing it, or you lose yourself. I never planned on the user being so inadequate, like you. I had so many other people who would make excellent actors for this role, but you came and swiped it from under everyone!"

"Grrrrrr SHUT UP YOU RAMBLING LUNATIC!"

1113322222222222222222222211222221.title: Kuesu?

111332222222222222222222221122222111.content:
The world is filled with dangerous and evil spirits called Ayakashi, you are a child to one of the great Demon slayer clans who were once feared by the Ayakashi. You alone were the last of your family to the Karasu family, who specialized in sword combat. Your agility and skills as a warrior were well taught to you by the age of 15, but tragedy stuck by the time you were proficient in your swordsmanship. One day your family died in a house fire, and due to traumatic stress you had forgotten much of the events that happened. But the stress didn't affect just your memory on only that day but a fraction of your life as well. All you had was your Uncle Ezon, who never spoke a word to you, but you were never sure if it was by choice or out of disappointment of some kind. Ezon took you in his home and you attended at the local highschool where you had been handling fine at. However you found joy mostly in helping your uncle teach at his Kendo dojo.

But today was a special day for it was your birthday and the cogs began turning in motion for the events that would lead you down to your destiny. Suddenly in a hotel room, a young woman was reading in her room when she felt a surge of magic pulse from across the area. "It is time now. He is ready." In Japan where you lived now you walked across town picking up some new practice swords for the students. Unknown to you, you were being watched.

You met up with your friend Ono who you could casually talk about anything to. "Hey Ono!"

"Oh hey (Name)! Didn't notice you! What has you lugging the sticks?"

"Training swords needed restocking, Uncle needed me to fetch them. What is up with you?"

"(Name) word on the street is that there is a party in the park over by the river trail. It's going to be loaded with our pals from all of our classes and clubs. Including ahem...the girls."

"Hahaha! Well who am I to decline an friendly invitation?"

"Sweet! It starts actually in a couple of hours. If you hurry I can let you tag along with me and we'll get there in about 10."

"OK I'll hurry up!", you ran back to the dojo where your uncle was in a meditative state. You quietly placed the training swords in their proper place and left a note stating where you would be until he woke. You met up with Ono and made it to the park. From the lights illuminating the dark and the sound echoing across the park, it was clear that this was the spot. Thankfully though some adults were chaperoning so it meant no one would be getting too crazy. Unknown to you as you walked up toward the action, the steps you took were the first of your new chapter to your life.
111332222222222222222222221122222111.title: A very long introduction

1113322222222222222222222211222221111.content:
You made it to the party where you recognized most of the people there who you spent the past 11 months being around. Some were from your classes and others were people who trained at the dojo. Ono was right about the girls though since you never saw so many in one place socializing. "What did I say? Am I right or am I right?", Ono asked with a smug smile. You shook his hand thanking him for treating you to a soon to be fun night. While you and Ono went getting a feel for the corwd one of the guys in one of your class was talking to two girls about something. It didn't seem like much until he said, "Hey (Name). There are these two ladies asking about you."

"(Name) beat me to the punch already smoooooth.", Ono joked.

"What were they asking about?", you inquired.

"They wanted me to tell you that they wanted to speak to you. In private."

"Uhhh is this some sick prank that someone planned or are you being serious?", you asked finding the situation to be far fetched.

"Hey if someone is planning anything I'm not in on it.", the student said leaving.

You looked to see the girls he was talking to, one was a long brown haired girl with red eyes and the other was another long haired girl with blue hair and matching ocean blue eyes. For some odd reason these two wanted to be alone with you? Was it one of them having a crush on you and the other is a friend who was going to tell for the other? From the body language they displayed the blue haired one was blushing and poorly hiding it, almost like she was advertising the fact. The other was more calm but had a confident grin on her face and waved you over to them.

"You are in for a treat tonight (Name) good luck.", Ono said supporting you.

You walked over to them and they smiled excitedly. "Hi my name is Brie.", the brown haired girl introduced, "This is Xyla.", Brie walked behind you and nudged you closer to Xyla. Xyla was acting like a typical shy school girl with a crush the way she lowered her head slightly and figited with her hands. She raised it up and asked, "Could you come walk with us?"

"Sure.", you answered. You knew where this was going, she wanted to be away from the crowd and have it be just with her friend and her crush. Made perfect sense. You three walked by the river path where you were all alone with them. You looked over by the railing seeing the water reflect the night with Xyla and Brie conversing before finally Xyla spoke with a more relaxing tone and more confidence.

"So (Name) you train people at that sword fighting dojo?", she asked. You replied casually with a yes. "So tell me, do you have any special girls in mind or are with?"

"No one actually.", you answered feeling a little nervous.

"That makes me happy to hear.", Xyla let out a brilliant smile and started walking toward you. Brie crossed her arms looking away. For some reason Xyla became so much more beautiful than you initially took. The moonlight seemed to reflect on her in a way that made her look stunningly beautiful. Xyla’s smile was so dazzling it distracted you. Her blue eyes were beautiful, and the way her hair swept over her shoulders was just graceful. You tried saying something really intelligent but all you spoke was, “Uhhh?”, Xyla was getting closer. She held out her hands preparing to hold your face in her hands, but then something caught her attention.

"Excuse me but last time I checked there was a woman he's with. His fiance', me.", said a girl with long silver hair and a crescent moon on her forehead. SHe was standing atop a lamppost with a book in hand.

"The slayer!", Brie reacted in anger.

"(Name)! Get away from those two, they aren't normal girls!", the woman yelled.

Her voice seemed to be coming from a long way away that it didn't feel important. The silver haired woman leaped down and from out of her book pages flew out blocking Brie from Xyla and you. It took all of your willpower to finally notice what was happening in front of you. The silver haired woman extended her arm saying, "(Name) listen to me they want to kill you! You can trust me remember?"

“Oh, come on,” Xyla protested. “You don’t need to come to her. How about I give you a kiss instead?” Now with her being so close to you, you noticed that she smelled like roses and clean animal fur—a weird but somehow intoxicating smell. You were so enraptured by her looks and offer that you felt compelled to allow her to indulge you.

"(Name) get away from her now!", the silver haired woman cried out.

"She’s just jealous.", Xyla said holding your face with her hands and just about to lock her lips, but the silver haired girl shot a colorful magical blast at Xyla and quickly summoned a barrier around herself and you. It all snapped you out of your beguiled state but you were afraid of who had just saved your life without you realizing.

"You were truly flirting with death just now. Have you gotten reckless?", she said.

"Who are you?! And how do you know my name?!", you replied.

This time she held your face, "My my it is unforgivable to forget the closest person in your life. Because of our love I can't believe you didn't come to me as I ordered you to."

"Just who are you?", you said trying to pry her hand away from your face.

"Your uncle and my family told me to look after you and that you would be by my side. But it appears you really don't remember anything, do you?" She then began to pull your face closer to her own. "The protective charm placed on you must have been extremely powerful.... But I'll make sure you remember." she said as she kissed you on the lips. You then had a little flash back about her as a young girl and how she kissed you before. The memory flashed and you noticed the young girl had the same mark as this one. Soon as she broke it off she teleported you and herself away. Leaving you inn confusion and bewilderment.
1113322222222222222222222211222221111.title: Friendly company

11133222222222222222222222112222211111.content:
Within a safe area away from the park you were at first unsure of what was happening and who this woman was. You staggered back a little but she grabbed your shoulder but with gentle restraint. "It's alright (Name). You're safe.", she said. Finally as she said so, most of what was happening started making sense with the memories of your life resurfacing.

"Kuesu?", you spoke wondering if she was the same girl from the past you remembered.

"Yes my darling.", her face changed from stern and overconfident to pure joy. Her smile still stayed the same but now her eyes melted from the cold and callous attitude she had earlier. She hugged you forcefully as if she had just been reunited with a long lost friend.

"Kuesu it's been years. Your hair is different, you're suddenly in japan, and I forgot all about you. Exactly what happened?", you asked.

"(Name) I promise you I will explain but now we must return to the nearest sanctuary from the demons."

"The dojo. Uncle might still be there.", you replied.

"Great, not that far. C'mon we have to hurry before they find and come after you.", Kuesu said taking your hand.

"You mean Brie and Xyla? Who or what were they?"

"Obviously they were much harder to detect for you given their nature. Those two were demon hybrids. A mesh of demon and monster designed to hunt demon slayers like us."

"Demon slayers? I remember now! I'm one of them and so are you. And they're basically literal demon slayers who hunt us specifically."

"Precisely. They blend in with humans because of their monster type nature on disguising themselves from hunters and humans alike. The ones you saw were empousa, creatures who prey on young men for their blood. They were going to kill you, they're great at seducing men which made me not very happy to see you for the first time after all these years flirting with other woman.", she explained. She held your hand being whisked away across the town at an incredible speed with her casting non-verbal charms and spells hiding their trail from the general populous.

You both managed to make it to the front steps of the dojo where she explained the rest, "OK listen to me (Name). That necklace your uncle placed on you after your parents death. That was meant to hide you from the demons while you lived the last few years in around here. We needed you to retain your skills as a swordsman so your uncle let you teach and train with him at his home. Do you remember what you are? Where you came from and what happened to your family exactly?"

"It's all coming at once. I need to sit down and-", suddenly Kuesu saw from afar Xyla and Brie. You turned to see them to but this time you reacted properly in fear.

"Don't worry so long as we remain around the dojo's perimeter their tricks are useless. They'll come back another day.", Kuesu said confidently. You both went inside where the two creatures angrily curled up their fists and teeth knowing they missed their chance.

"Sister we failed, we almost had him.", Brie said.

"Do not fear. Even if he doesn't come out the girl will. And we will be ready next time.", Xyla said.

"True but we must plan this delicately."

Back in the dojo...

You sat down in your room where Kuesu helped you to bed. Your head was hurting like a migraine making it hard to fully digest everything right now. "

"Take it easy (Name). Everything will be clear in the morning. For now let your mind be rebuilt and allow you to process everything."

"Kuesu...", you felt groggy and it was a chore to open your eyes anymore. You gently laid down and fell asleep. Kuesu left your room only once she reentered the training area she saw your uncle Ezon looking unpleased.

"Ezon."

"Hmm.", he muttered.

"I can't express how grateful I am by how you took care of (Name). I understand how hard it must be for you."

"Hmph."

"From now until the foreseeable future I shall be staying with him where he goes. But if it's all the same I plan to have him leave here soon."

"Mmhmm."

"Well...goodnight then.", she awkwardly left leaving him alone.
11133222222222222222222222112222211111.title: Your memories return part 1

choices: Hunt the demon girls from last night
111332222222222222222222221122222111111.content:
You woke up feeling better than you did last night. Your headache went away and now you understood most of what was going on. You got out of bed and into some new cloths and went to find Kuesu. Soon as you entered the training room she was kneeling down with a pot of tea and some breakfast laid out. "Morning.", she greeted.

"Same to you. Ugh...head feels better but a little sensitive if that makes sense."

"Well can it take having some of the blanks filled?"

"Sure."

"First what do you remember?", Kuesu asked first.

"I'm the last of a demon slaying family, my parents died in a fire caused by the demons. You and I were friends before that happened, and you mentioned we were promised to each other last night."

"Indeed, though you were never told that. I knew when we first met you were my fiance'. Yet still we ended up being great friends regardless. As for your uncle's necklace it blocked parts of your memory to hide yourself from the demons lurking across japan."

"Why did you and my uncle erase my memory of you and my parents' death?", you asked irritated by the explanation. You felt a bit betrayed by the outcome given your strong friendship you had with her.

"I swear that I had no involvement other than I knew about it and that it was to protect you until the charm wore off. When I say 'we' I mean your uncle and the other families who still remain loyal to your own. We did it because you weren't ready to fend off against the demons or kill any. But now you have reached that point and now the time has arrived."

"For me to carry on my families legacy of killing demons. Yeah...I remember why I was going to go ahead with it. But just one thing is still fuzzy to me."

"Oh?"

"Our time together as friends. I remember about me but you...I can't."

"From how you responded to seeing me I wasn't surprised."

"Why?"

"I don't know. But I think it will come back eventually. From now on you and I will be together fighting the demons and stopping whatever plans they are up to.", Kuesu said explaining the full situation.

"Alright then.", you said.
111332222222222222222222221122222111111.title: Your memories return part 2

1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:
Kuesu led you an open field free from any common eyes. You quickly learned this was a test to brush up on your skill. "Kuesu I assure you I'm just as sharp with a sword as you are with magic.", you said.

"The skill is there, no denying, but you need experience against real foes. Your job for today is to get a hit on me by any means. Do this then we will head out.", she instructed.

You decided to humor her, you took out a katana and readied yourself. She had a book of spells on hand ready to be cast. Both of you waited for the other to make the first move. Kuesu did having a fire ball summoned right at you, you dodged it easily and charged. She continued firing a few more and you evaded with ease, you were close to landing a blow but you pulled back. The sword was an inch from her, she smiled and then blasted you point blank.

"Gah! What the hell?! I got you?!"

"I said land a hit on me. You didn't. See what you just did, if it was against those two girls, you would be dead. Try again and this time swipe at me just don't decapitate my limbs."

This time you were going to do it however she fired a flurry of them making them impossible to evade. All you could do was block or slice the flames. You could feel the fire from the close proximity but no serious burns. You were close enough to her again but this time you lunged your katana and tore through her left sleeve without making contact with the skin. "Good. Now when we head out to find those demons any sign of them, eyes on me. Understand?"

"But how am I going to be able to look for them if I can't see them?"

"Don't be a smart ass. Listen last time you weren't ready for them but now you are. You are a demon slayer and a bred warrior, so you can resist their good looks enough to maintain your wits. Besides I'm the only girl in your life worth eyeing at. Eventually we will be husband and wife."

"Kuesu I barley know you."

"You will remember in time my love. Come, we have work to do."
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.title: A quick test

1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:
Across the city the two demon girls were waiting for one of you to come out of the dojo area. To their delight they sensed you were out of bounds from it. "Brie he's out, and with the slayer."

"She must be confident to have him face us after she no doubt jogged his memory. I was prepared for just her not both."

"Well then what can we do? If his memories are fully returned then he'll know not to trust either of us."

"Now now Xyla, even if that were true the slayer can't give everything away about the circumstances of that night. Which means either case he comes to us. But we need to separate the two in order for us to sway him."

"Brie I have an idea...", Xyla explained her plan which from the sound of it gave Brie an excited and sinister grin. "Excellent. This time I will persuade the warm blooded male. You create the distraction."

"Best of luck.", Xyla jumped down from one of the buildings and blended in with the general populous. Brie waited for her sister to create the signal.

Meanwhile you and Kuesu were hunting down the monster girls with Kuesu keeping an eye on you knowing you were a moth to their falsely charming flames of radiance. You and her went to a crowded area where you let your guard up knowing it would be a trap. Still Kuesu and you ventured onward.
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.title: A plan of attack

choices: Brie ambushed you in the crowd
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:
While you and Kuesu stayed close together you both tried scouting for the two ladies, however the task proved to be too difficult given their presence was around within the town square and it being packed full of people. There were various establishments they could be hiding in and any could be a bigger net to snare in yourself or or worse the both of you in. Kuesu was hoping that whatever trick they used would be something that was deliberately targeted towards your sex appeal or something glaring everyone's attention. Kuesu felt hopeful for those possibilities because she herself was immune to any type of mind charm they could dish out due to having the mental focus and the deep rooted feelings towards you. In fact she felt overconfident in that aspect though not without merit. As you and Kuesu passed by the flocks of civilians your ears suddenly caught wind of a sound coming from one of the buildings, a karaoke joint filled with a bunch of young men inside. You felt naturally drawn to listen closer but you were far from mindlessly compelled. You tugged Kuesu and explained to her what you felt and knew. "They're in there. Singing a duet."

"Go and follow. I'll ambush them around the back."

"That is a terrible idea."

"They won't stay put if you don't take the bait. Besides I have faith in you this time, your not the willing victim you were last night."

Kuesu ran to the back of the building and you slowly headed inside. You focused your mind on the fact that these weren't normal girls, they want to kill you. You kept repeating that in your head. Soon the song became clearer, it was just them singing a's in a musical beat. You remained calm, you weren't helpless this time. You could still think about what was going in your head not what was around you. The crowds were cheering and whistling no doubt because to them they were hearing angelic vocal singing from a sexy duo.

Kuesu was behind the stage where she definitely heard them singing and ensnaring the audience. Kuesu had out her book reciting an illusion spell so to cover the inevitable fighting that would quickly break out. You stayed at a distance from the stage not willing to take the risk of testing your will. From there you saw Xyla on stage. But all by herself with no sign of her partner. You knew that Kuesu must be in trouble, the other one must be back stage performing her duet leaving Kuesu unprotected.

You struggled to pass through the crowd making your way toward the stage. Kuesu was about to attack and was ready to fight. However a strong voice compellingly whispered, "Come with me."

As soon as that sentence ended Xyla finished her song walked off into the crowd.
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.title: A siren's song

1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:
As you were passing by everyone loud and cheerful guy crying out to Xyla, you were too distracted by all of the stress and confusion that when Brie walked up to you and fully unleashed her demonic glamour on you. Your words of repetition still echoed in your mind, 'they're not human, they want to kill you', you looked away from Brie. Then she said, "Come with me.", very politely. She extended her hand out and gave such an adorable smile. It was so cute, so sincere, why not? "No! Stop!", you yelled. You wanted to run away, look away from her at least. Her hand touched yours and suddenly you didn't feel so scared anymore. Brie felt like she was ok to be around. She lead you away, wherever she took you didn't matter, she was a friend, or at least a very attractive ally.

When Xyla got off stage Kuesu fired a sphere of magical energy at her. It directly struck her and made her very angry. "Slayer! You are a nuisance!"

Kuesu quickly realized only she was accounted which meant the other one may be alone with you which worried her greatly. "Where is-"

"(Name)? With my sister Brie. She has a lot of things to tell, and do."

"He isn't that weak minded to your tricks!"

"Not against my sister though. She will have him drooling over her."

"Demonic scum!", Kuesu blasted a few more but Xyla staged dove into the crowd carrying her away. Kuesu couldn't openly attack her within a crowd of innocent lives, in fact firing while in a crowded area was dangerous on its own. She relented and tried following her but it was too late for she eluded Kuesu and you were Brie's slave for the time being.

Meanwhile Brie and Xyla took you to a place that was a hiding ground for demons. With no room for interruption Brie began to enact her game of manipulation. She flung her hair back giving you something to idolize before she started. "(Name) do you remember me and my sister Xyla?"

"Nnnnnooo.", you answered.

"We met you before, that night your parents died. We gave you something to remember each of us by. Do you remember what it was?"

"Can't....think...", you replied.

"We'll show you. Come here...and give me a kiss."

Suddenly your thoughts formed of desire, the object of your affection requested you to provide a token of affection. Brie placed her hands under your chin, you quivered and felt scared, excited, confused, delighted. Then it all went blank except the feeling of her lips and tongue dancing and rubbing around your own. The scent you remembered from Xyla last night overwhelmed your sense of smell. The euphoric feeling felt unreal and yet so within reach of your body. Sure enough Brie pulled away and handed you off to Xyla. "Good work sister, now with this last kiss he will be able to remember everything."

You hazily opened your eyes as the kiss nearly conked you out of consciousness from being so intense to your senses. When Xyla had exchanged control she was somehow more beautiful than her sister, dare to admit even more than Kuesu. Comparing them to her seemed like an unwinnable debate but still. Her face seemed more attuned to your deep personal desire of beauty. Her smile stalled your heart beat. And time merely stopped the moment she spoke, "Hi there."

Unlike Brie who forced herself onto you Xyla knew from before you were attracted to her and now could see you were in awe of her. "(Name) do you know why you can trust us?"

"You love me?", you answered.

Brie laughed mockingly. "No it's because we will make you remember what that slayer made you forget.", Brie explained.

"I forgot?"

"Just give me a kiss now (Name). One kiss, for love.", Xyla encouraged. You leaned in, Xyla placed a hand over your cheek and placed a soft kiss on you rather than the more passionate and harder one Brie gave. Your vision became dark and suddenly true to their word, the gaps began filling in what was left blank in your memories.

It turned out Kuesu's family did force you to forget, but worse her family could have saved your family that night but chose not to. This wasn't even a falsehood they made up, it was all fact. Now with the knowledge of betrayal from your so called fiancee' and your family the sisters were pleased having successfully accomplished their mission.
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.title: It was all a lie!

1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:
Kuesu managed to track you down thanks to her magic. She at first saw nothing out of the ordinary of this part of the park where the empousa girls were hiding. But knew how she could draw them out. "(Name)!", she called out. In no time both girls revealed themselves.

"You're too late slayer. Your boyfriend knows the truth about your families abandonment of his own. And with that in hand he'll be devoted to our cause.", Brie stated.

Kuesu didn't let that knowledge surprise her. She simply held a blank cold stare at them and didn't lose her cool, "It was an eventuality.", she simply replied.

The empousa girls were confused by her statement, "You would have told him yourself? How reckless.", Brie responded.

"He is my fiancee', I would never hold any secrets from him. He needed time to piece together enough so that coming out with it would be smoother. But having you manage to skip that step for me only makes it easier."

"What?! You planned on this?! Impossible!", Xyla reacted.

"He wasn't strong enough to resist against the two of you in the state he is in now. Which was why it made it so easy for you to believe you won. But you underestimated my faith in him. I know regardless of his feelings he will have against me and my family, he won't join you.", Kuesu smirked.

"Let us test that then.", you said emerging from the trees. You had your sword out and got in the middle of them.

"(Name) I understand your resentment towards me right now and my family. But I had nothing to do with their decision to let your family die.", Kuesu explained.

"They died that night because your family abandoned mine! I was there, I remember seeing them! They stood and did nothing! Why?!"

"They told me your family was brash and impulsive. You and your family was the very last of your line. It was considered a waste to give aid against such powerful demons. If you hadn't found them then those two would have drunk your blood dry and I would have been promised to another."

"Don't listen to her (Name) she doesn't care for you. We do. We showed you.", Xyla used her charm on you influencing your choice.

You lowered your sword in disgust and in anger. You looked at the demon girls again. Flawless, beautiful, truthful. You turned to Kuesu. Harsh, cold, liar. In the heat of the moment it seemed like switching sides was viable, until Kuesu triggered a memory when she said, "Just know this, I will have your back (Name), always."

You suddenly remembered what that meant. It was the promise the two of you made together while her family sheltered you and took you in. You two were sitting on the edge of a hill and said the same thing to her. You saw flashes of the moments, the times you and Kuesu had that gave you a history that she faithfully believes in even though you didn't remember. At that exact moment there was no choice, only action. You lunged your sword at the empousa girls without mercy or hesitation.
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.title: Your memories return part 3

1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:
You swung your blade at both of them however they narrowly dodged it in time. "Sister! We can't fight him now!", Xyla said.

"I know! It's no use now! We will return slayer!", Brie threatened. Xyla and Brie both dissolved into dust escaping to wherever they were running to. You wanted to persist but Kuesu stopped you knowing it was pointless now.

"Don't worry we will hunt them again tomorrow. This was a victory today."

"You deliberately let me get captured by them?!"

"Of course not! Listen I knew in the event they did they would reawaken your memories faster than I hoped to. And I knew no matter what you saw and remembered you wouldn't betray me."

"Still! How come they abandoned my parents that night?! Why?!"

"I'll explain everything back at the dojo. It isn't safe here now.", Kuesu teleported you both back within the dojo. As soon as you both settled and finally made yourselves comfortable Kuesu was ready to explain her family's motives. "My family is the lowest slayer family among the 12. We have been gaining power by any means necessary. It's why we combine western magic with traditional. Because of your family's brashness when word got out they would be attacked they stood by knowing there was no hope for them. Until you survived their attack at which point they figured if someone with exceptional skills could be properly trained, then it was worth bringing you in."

"So they arranged us together because of our potential to be the strongest warriors of our generation. You snapped some memories of our past, when we were childhood friends. But they're still hazy. And I don't even know if what I felt for you before is the same as I do now.", hearing those words broke Kuesu's heart a little.

"How about I talk about what happened. What is the one you remember best?"

"When we first met."

"Ok, well I'll try to tell it best as I can although I'm not a good storyteller."

"Fire away."

One day I was told I would be meeting someone who they said would be my future husband. Then they took me to my great grandfather's old lake sanctuary, where you were staying at the time. They introduced us, I was unimpressed. You were so uninteresting and not very special. They had us interact with each other much as I wasn't pleased. We went for a walk along the path across the woods by the lake and the whole time I didn't speak. And you were quiet too for a while, but I believe you were just nervous talking to me. Until you saw a flower along the way and asked me if I wanted it. I shrugged you off disinterested, but I was flattered by that being honest. When we went back to the house they made us sleep in the same room. Then before we fell asleep you asked me if I hated you. I finally replied, ''No. You're just boring.''

"Quite a switch from how you act around me now."

"Believe me (Name) you were persistent. But you did soon enough steal my heart, rather you still have it."

You blushed, "Kuesu..."

"I think we should get some sleep for now. But hey, if you ever want me to talk about our past I will always be happy to do so."

"Thanks.", before she dozed off you said this to her, "Hearing you talk about it makes me feel at home. If that makes sense."

Kuesu's heart danced, "It doesn't matter to me.", she said smiling before shutting her eyes.
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.title: Your History with Kuesu

1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:
You woke up after a long nights rest. Soon as you got up and started to get dressed preparing for the day, Kuesu had already woke up and notice you had slept in a little. "Morning.", she said. Seeing her around and having her brightly lighten up the morning felt strangely right. Like you realized a piece was missing and now having it fit in with the others makes the picture clearer now. You knew what it was, nostalgia.

"Good morning. Yaaaawwwwwwwwn.", you replied getting out of bed.

"I haven't had any time to bathe, wanna join your financee'?", she seductivly asked.

"Uhhh no! No I think that will need some time to sink in. No.", you hastily answered.

Kuesu smiled amused by your reaction though a part of her wished you had said yes. But despite the progress you have made she accepted the fact you two were going to have to reaffirm the bond you once had together as children. After the typical morning routine you and Kuesu began training outside the dojo prepping for more active combat this time.

"I don't want to hurt you while we fight."

"Don't worry about me. Now take up your sword and fight."

You two fought in a small battle with Kuesu using her spell book to attack and defend herself from you. This time it was like last time where she used her more aggressive and powerful spells so she wasn't going easy this time. You spent most of the fight trying to break through her defenses but you managed to find an opening in her technique. Her spells had you consistently moving around tiring you but some of them were slow enough for you to get it close. So just before the next powerful spell came, you ferociously cut passed her defenses and held your sword to her face. Kuesu seemed pleased by your sudden advance but she still assumed she'd win.

"Yield. ", you said.

"You didn't beat me, you are exactly where I want you.", Kuesu laid a trap and summoned an energy prison around you. "I had you at a distance for far too long easily taking advantage of the fact you need to be near me to attack me. Be more aware of what your opponents strategy will be in defending themselves from you.", she explained.

"Good tip, now can you let me out please?"

"Of course.", the energy lowered and turned into dust. "I will say if you had taken that chance sooner I'd be done for."

"Oh? So I should take more risks?"

"No you'll be killed that way. Know. Don't assume. Take what action will assure you victory."

You shrugged off the sourness from all the training and went back inside with Kuesu. She held out her hand wanting you to hold it. Hoping to take advantage of any opportunity to rekindle your old romance. You couldn't immediately fall back in love with her but you couldn't shake the desire to want to. You accepted her offer and held her hand which made a few more memories resurface.

You recalled the night after your first kiss with her and she became different to you. Now she would clung on to you all the time and she was more cheerful and happier around you. Those were her happiest times in her life you felt.

"Let go of me!"

"No! You're my fiancee' you can't get rid of me!"

"Just let go of me please!"

"I won't leave you. I won't let you go.", she said.

"Kuesu! Come back inside now!", her father called.

"I must let you go. But I'll come back my future husband." The memory felt nice. You changed her for the better perhaps. She never did leave you alone after you two kissed for the very first time. Something that remarkably wasn't yet fully developed in your memory. You went back to your room and sat on the mat with Kuesu. She poured some tea for you and began making small talk. "So how have you been doing?", she asked.

"Just fine I guess. It was boring having just doing mundane things all the time. All I did was work at school and just work here all day.", you said taking a sip.

"It does seem boring. I could have made it more interesting though.", she flirted.

"Hehehe I believe you. But enough about me for once, what's been going on with you? Your hair is different for example, I remember it was brunette when we were younger. What happened?"

"On one of my missions the only way I could stop a group of demons was by using a forbidden and dangerous spell. It was very risky as it nearly cost me my life so now I have silver hair as a mark. A permanent edition to reminder of weakness for having relied on such unstable magic to get me to this point in my life."

"I like it this way honestly. It matches your skin and you look more radiant because of it."

"Hehe, you always had a way with words (Name). Anything I thought was painful, you could make me feel better about it. Truth be told it's one of the reasons that got me to fall in love with you.", she came closer holding your cheek.

"I remembered when you clung on to my arm after our kiss. You were so cute."

"I didn't know how to express my feelings back then. But now I do.", she pulled your face closer until you stopped her lips from touching yours again. You leaned away.

"I'm sorry Kuesu. I'm...."

"I get it.", she quickly said. Her heart felt crushed a little by your rejection but knew that patience was what she needed to do. "Come on, were wasting daylight. This time we don't rest until those two demonic abominations are ashes.", she said now more determined than ever. This time your confidence was higher than ever and you had no doubts for them to exploit. Kuesu and you left the dojo on the hunt.
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.title: Patience is a hard virtue

1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:
You two walked around where you first encountered them hoping to show up again. So far everything was normal and only difference was that there were less people than before. Things seemed calm until when an explosion came from a hotel nearby. You both rushed inside to see where it was coming from or who may have caused it. Kuesu stopped you from entering though as she pieced something together, "Stay here. It's too risky having you up there."

"If you go into battle I go with you. Besides I can handle them this time!", you protested.

"(Name) wait here. I'm not sure those demon girls are the ones who did this so we don't know what were up against, if I need help I'll call you.", she pecked you on the cheek and left with her book. You didn't want to disobey her but you took out your sword and tailed her when she got far enough in. You kept your distance so she wouldn't notice you but close enough to watch her back.

Soon after making to where the explosion hit, Kuesu saw that a demon was talking with another one. They spoke in another language so she didn't know what they were saying. She tried seeing who one of them was but one disappeared. The other was a brutish bull from hell and started charging through the walls trying to collapse the building on itself. Kuesu casted a protection barrier on the structure causing the demon bull to knock back. Furious it went looking for who conjured the spell. Kuesu revealed herself to it planning something, "You are one ugly demon. I actually know a girl who at least looks easy on human eyes when she turns into a cat.", she mocked.

The demon bull charged at her but ran into another trap. This time a mini tornado blocked it and flung him near the edge of the building. But he regained his balance and charged around it flanking Kuesu. Seeing that spells were too long and ineffective she took out her hand gun and as soon as the dust cleared she fired a few shots. The bull charged again but she teleported behind the demon and shot at it again. The demon bled from the bullet wounds but didn't seem to do enough to weaken it. The bull turned around and ran at her again, but this time she teleported again and the demon ran out the window falling all the way down.

It tried to cling to the building but flew too far off and crashed into the pavement. Kuesu looked over to see it vanish from existence. To her delight it did and it no longer threatened anyone. "You can come out now (Name) I know you-", she cut herself off upon seeing who she saw.

"Sorry to disappoint. ", Brie replied coming out.

"Least you saved me the trouble of looking for you. Where is your sister?"

"Oh she's around. Want her? All you need to do is get past me.", she challenged.

"That demon I fought was meeting with someone, another demon. Discussing about a secret plan you demons are concocting?"

"It just tried to bury us all alive so that there were no witnesses. I doubt us being here was pure coincidence."

"Well in the meantime...", Kuesu holstered her gun.
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.title: Continue...

1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:
You ran up through the stairway searching for Kuesu. But the debris and sounds of the building collapsing gave off an unsettling vibe that made you more worried about her. You thought you heard Kuesu come down the stairs but it was really Xyla who seemed surprised by your arrival. "(Name)!" You holstered your sword and without even stopping for any reason and lunged at her swinging it ferociously. "Wait! We didn't do this!"

"Liar!"

"I'm serious my sister and I are innocent in this matter!"

"You're still dying demon! You won't turn me into a pawn anymore!"

"Your right!", she managed to grabbed the hilt of your sword locking your hands together, "And that's what I want to free you from.", you remembered the games she played before you were ready to see her in that lovesick vision you felt when she pulled that trick. But not this time. This time she spoke what she said only no glamour spell to lull you into believing her. It didn't fool you though and you went on to kick her in the gut and tried impaling her. Xyla jumped over the space in the middle of the stairwell and flew up. "She isn't who she says she is.", she said and again nothing feeling like she was tricking you.

Then out of the wall beside you crashed in another demon! It was very spider-like and fast moving. It's body was skinny and had many limbs with a mutated face of spider and human meshed into one which made it disturbing to look at. It wasn't aimed at you but rather was focused on destroying the building itself. The spider-demon spat out acid around the stairwell and walls weakening the structure. You knew your best bet was to run down back to solid ground but some of the acid melted through the stairs on your way down and you fell right off!

You were sure you would fall down but you felt someone grab your left arm, Xyla?! "What are you playing at?!"

"We had our reasons for coming after you. But first we must capture that demon so we can learn who sent it."

"There is no we!"

"I'm a demon yes, but I work under a family who also hunts demons. Even your 'fiancee'' can't deny that others haven't done this."

"Why didn't you say so?!"

"Truth is, Brie is only my half-sister. She was bred to hunt demonslayers her entire life. I had a choice. If you remembered back far enough, you know I'm telling the truth."

"I don't trust you!", you swung your blade at her again. She blocked it and grabbed you by the collar.

"(Name) living under Kuesu's wing is not set and stone. You have me too. Your Uncle. He knows. And I'll prove it to you.", she let you go and flew up to combat the demon. You felt normal not a single moment of feeling manipulated. Why? She was telling the truth? Nothing that came from her mouth had any validation after setting your memories in their proper place. Either way Kuesu needed help, you knew and that spider-demon needed to be stopped one way or another.
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.title: Xyla's hidden agenda

choices: Xyla and (name) come to her rescue...
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:
Back with Kuesu, she was locked in combat with Brie. She was fired her spheres of magic energy at her, but Brie dodged them with ease. Brie countered with attacks of her own and Kuesu dodged them as well. She jumped back until she was a safe distance away from Brie's attacks. She was focused on the fight right now, but at the same time she couldn't help but get worried about you.

"(name)... I hope you're safe," she thought.

"Hey. It would be wise not to take your eyes of me," Brie said as she went on the attack again

Kuesu sensed that Brie was coming and was about to point her gun at her, but her reaction came too late. Brie knocked the gun out of her hands out of sight and fired a spell at her. She barely managed to dodge it, but it grazed across her arm making a small burned mark. She then fired a spell of her own. The spell hit it's mark and sent Brie skidding back, but she managed to stand her ground. Then Kuesu pointed her gun and started firing at Brie bullet after bullet. Brie tried to dodge all of the bullets, but couple of them managed to graze on her. Brie leaped back attempting to gain some distance away from Kuesu, but she kept on the attack by firing another spell. The spell hit it's mark and sent Brie flying making crash against the wall. Brie groaned and felt like her body was hit by a truck. She was about to get up, but then she found herself staring Kuesu standing right in front of her with her sword drawn.

"It's over," said Kuesu. "Now, I need you to answer some questions for me."

"If you think you're gonna get me to..." began Brie, but then Kuesu pointed her sword dangerously at Brie's throat cutting her off.

"It would be wise to comply, otherwise I'll won't hesitate to kill you."

Brie immediately froze not moving an inch knowing Kuesu would make good her threat.

"Now then, first things first, tell what you know about the demons. " said Kuesu.

Suddenly out of nowhere, a glob of acid shot from out from the darkness and knocked the sword out of her hand. Then another glob shot out straight at Kuesu. She jumped out of the way and fired a spell from where the thread came from and assumed that she hit, but then a shadow leapt out of the darkness and went straight from Kuesu. Before she had a chance to react, the demon threw a powerful bunch straight at her stomach. Kuesu gasped as she felt the wind get knocked out of her and the force sent her slamming to the ground. Brie seeing this looked at the shadow as it landed to the ground. It was the spider demon. The spider demon talked to Brie using the same language. Kuesu couldn't make out what they were saying due to her still feeling dazed from the impact. If she had to guess, the spider demon must have come to help Brie which was bad for her.

"Damn it all," though Kuesu. "This is bad. If those two are working together and without my sword, there's no way I can take them both on at once. If I can just get my sword..."

Kuesu made an attempt to try and reach for her sword, but the spider demon saw her and shot webs at her arms and legs preventing her from moving.

"Damn it!"

Brie looked at what the spider demon did and glared at it.

"What the hell are you doing? I had her."

The spider demon spoke to Brie saying 'it didn't look that way to me' Then it said something that made Brie's eyes widen in shock.

"What?"

The spider demon continued to talk. From what Kuesu can gather just by looking, she guessed that the spider demon was making some kind of deal or explaining something to her. When it finished, Brie nodded.

"Alright. I understand."

She then walked towards Kuesu and began charging a spell in her hand and aimed it directly at Kuesu.

"Sorry demon slayer, but I'm afraid it's time to die." said Brie.

Kuesu tried to break free from the spider demon's thread, but it held her in place. Just when Brie was about to fire the spell to finish her off...
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.title: Kuesu v.s Brie and Spider-demon

1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:
"Back off! GRRRRRRAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!", you darted right at Brie and swiped your sword at her arm. Brie only registered your presence when the blade made contact with her left arm. It cut clean through with blood spurting out for a moment then dripping over like a faucet. She didn't scream or speak just a look of absolute rage.

"You're dead mortal! You won't die admiring my beauty but terrified of my real form! I'll will cleave your head from your very shoulders!", she threatened.

Kuesu grabbed her sword and made a B-line to Brie. Kuesu stabbed and jabbed at the demon-hybrid mercilessly on the offensive. Brie grabbed the blade and kicked Kuesu in the gut again with her prosthetic leg. The blow was worse than the last one having her insides already sore but the blow was harder and deeper. Kuesu knelt down and Brie was ready to thrust it into her head until suddenly...clang! Xyla kicked it out of her half-sister's hands.

"Sister?", she said being confused and felt utterly betrayed.

"I'm sorry sister.", without another moment to sink in Xyla clonked her demonic sibling off the roof with her fist. Now all the was left was the Spider-demon but as with most others it wouldn't go quietly.

It pointed directly at Xyla like it was placing her as a traitor of its kind. Xyla without hesitation lunged at it wither her nails extending like claws and with you alongside her ready to cut it into pieces. The spider-demon used its strength to crush the roof enough to get the both of you to fall. Xyla flew out of the way but you completely fell in. You managed to cling onto the top by sticking your sword into the structure. The spider-demon breathed in and spat out a stream of acid at you. Luckily Kuesu placed a protective sphere around you saving your life. Xyla flew in behind it and cut into its skin but it was too thick. It grew out an extra pair of arms around its back and clung to Xyla's wrists. The next pair grew out and grabbed from its rear a thread of webbing and tied it around her neck. The web was strong as piano wire chocking her to death. Kuesu then began using a string of lightning strikes from her spell-book and electrocuted the beast. The shock fried it making it collapse to the ground.

Weakened it couldn't defend itself having now the three of you corner it. "Ask it a question. It won't have much time left before it dies.", Xyla said.

"Why did you try to destroy this building?"

"It horded the clans of the demons. It was our army."

"Why destroy the army?"

"Break clans and the survivors go into hiding. Go into hiding and flock toward our new one eh hahahahaha-ack!"

"Where is this new army?!", the spider-demon shriveled and had its limbs in a curled state around it's belly. You kicked at it in frustration. "Jerk."

"So he wasn't working for you? And you aren't working for who had you hunt (Name) as of late. What are you up to ayakashi?", Kuesu asking ready to blast her to cinders.

"I was a spy for another demon-hunting house. And I have no idea where this new demon army is being gathered. I was with only the biggest group of ayakashi that were known among most in hiding. We were unorganized and not capable of destroying what was done here today. At least not so blatantly. Whoever did this wanted as many to rally behind against the 12 families. And you two are their #1 targets now."

"You haven't answered!", you threatened holding your sword to her neck.

"I have left them, I'm a rouge. Judge me now for what I have done. Or am I to be blamed for a crime I didn't commit?", she sternly protested.

"What you have done was trying to brainwash my fiancee into a slave."

"It was all a cover, besides he wasn't a bad kisser."

"You fu-", before you could do anything Kuesu stopped you.

"For now I'll reserve judgement. You may accompany us back to the dojo but you will be kept prisoner until I verify that you are one of us."

"Kuesu?!"

"There are families that have housed rouge ayakashi (Name). I want to be sure so that we have alleys in the fight to come."

"Thank you.", Xyla bowed, a hidden smile sprouted just as Kuesu casted the spell, then you and Kuesu and Xyla teleported back to the dojo.
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.title: The fight has only started

choices: "I'm not sure I feel ready for that yet..."
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:
Afar from the rooftop....

"Did you see that?! She let them take her prisoner! If that were me-", said one demon in the shadows furious over the outcome.

"Hush! The spider rescue worked perfectly and Kuesu fell for it. Now, the closer she gets to the girl, the closer she gets to (Name). And once she has him all alone the 12 families will fall from the inside.", the other demon replied.

"I could have made him a slave if you had let me."

"Your hypnosis is primitive and out of control. The only tool we have is subtlety or else he'll wise up."

"It would overwhelm even Kuesu. Just lemme get a chance!"

"No. Right now were in a delicate position. Trying anything now would be crushed and we all die. We need to bid our time."

"Then what's our next move. Now we let the new army make the first move. We'll sit back and watch until Xyla gives the signal the next time she is outside the dojo. Which eventually they'll have to."

"Grrrr. I could be the leader if you'd let me."

"Quiet Trik. Let the real leaders take command and just watch.", said the demon who was more calm about the plan going ahead without incident. From the sound of their chatter Xyla planned to break apart the demon hunting families through you. Yet the details were still so sketchy only time would begin to unravel the rest.

Back at the dojo Kuesu had transported the three of you back to the dojo where Kuesu cautiously escorted Xyla to a certain part of the area where she used her most powerful sealing magic to keep Xyla imprisoned until Kuesu was certain. "It's too dangerous Kuesu we should kill her and be over with it."

"Believe me I would but we need her alive until I figure this out. If we kill a demon under our protection then we'll cause more harm than good among ourselves when we need to be unified for the danger coming. She won't leave until I'm certain beyond reasonable doubt she is on our side."

"Ok but still I feel uneasy after she messed with my brain."

"Even if you visited her, her powers are restrained by the spells. She can't get to you and trust me they never will. For now lets get some rest and plan out our next move. If you want....you could sleep with me tonight."

"Kuesu I have had my mind being tossed around like a soccer ball I can't do anything or feel like what I do is is right at this point. I want to feel how you do with me but so much time has passed and it feels weird having everything come back and still not be the same."

"I'm sorry (Name) I should have known how you were feeling after what I and those demons put you through. I'm just too impatient. Good night.", Kuesu said leaving to her room.

I can still feel what I felt but it doesn't feel the same like before, almost like it is our first time being together as anything. Xyla was there that night but what is she playing at? If its true then maybe she was protecting me from her half-sister. Certainly make sense. But then again I don't trust her even if she was a double agent. My darling (Name) I feel so ashamed of myself for leaving you alone. All the time we could have had just by being together without our duty interfering with our relationship.
