1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.title: "I'm not sure I feel ready for that yet...

1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:
As Kuesu woke up she stretched out her body letting it have as much flexibility as it could. She quickly got dressed so she could see you as soon as she could. When she got her breakfast ready she already made an extra meal for you. She hoped it would spark your interest or at least make you appreciate her generosity but it was passed 10 o' clock and nothing from you. This made her uneasy so she hastily went to your bedroom to check on you but to her surprise you were still asleep. You were sound asleep breathing heavily. Kuesu found you to be so cute while like this, she quietly walked in your room knelt down and looked at you as you were asleep. You were so tired that you didn't even know she was there next to you. Kuesu gently stroked your cheek feeling your warm skin over her fingers. But Kuesu felt the presence of someone behind her, luckily it was just your uncle.

Kuesu didn't say anything feeling awkward and embarrassed by him walking in on her inside your room. He came in to and knelt beside Kuesu. The middle aged man didn't say a word he didn't have to explain a thing because there was nothing to explain. He gently patted you on the back still showing his love for his nephew. "You still care for him?", she asked.

"Hmm.", he said answering her question.

"Is there anyway I can reach out for you to help?"

He shook his head, his face changed from calm and collected to twisted into a saddened face of pain. Tears rolled down his face and he gripped his hands into his pant legs. "I'm sorry about that night. I wish I had him to keep and take care for. I'd have given him everything."

Hmmm.", he grunted.

Kuesu got up and began to leave, "Tell him food is on the table, it's getting cold."

Your uncle rubbed his hand over your back gently, he may have made it tough for you but it didn't mean he cared any less.
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.title: Morning starts with Kuesu

1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:
Meanwhile your friend Ono, who you last saw a couple days ago, was starting to be more curious about why you have't been at school. He was at his usual hangout by the arcade texting you a bunch of messages. "(Name) it's me. What happened last night? Seriously call me dude." He was planning to go to the dojo to be sure you were safe since being MIA for a few days straight with no communication made Ono more worried you got kidnapped or something.

He decided giving you one more call would be the last straw before heading there. "(Name) pick up the damn phone. If you get this I'm headed to the dojo to see if your fine. You better be sick, dead, or mute when if I find you there. If not...I really hope nothing screwed up happened." Soon as he hung up he was making his way to the dojo from the arcade. Then while he was walking past the more vibrant area of the arcade a faint voice came into his ears. "Over here."

Ono turned around thinking he was about to be mugged. He saw nothing but the mindless attention of several gamers glued to the screens of flashy machines. Ono figured it was nothing and went on, then the voice was louder. "Ono! Over this way." He knew this wasn't background noise from a game, this was some freaky anime stuff. "Go inside the janitors closet. You will be safe."

"From what?!", nobody heard him as the volume of noise drowned out his conversation.

"The spell that will be casted in 5 seconds. Go now.", it said.

Ono went in and shut the door. When the 5 seconds were over the door creeked open by itself. A girl with pink hair, blue eye shadow, red lips, and emerald green eyes appeared before Ono. "Walk with me."

"What happened?"

"The area around us has been frozen. Time has slowed to a quarter of a second that movement has been rendered minute. Let me get to the point, (Name) is in danger."

"What? Is this some kind of crazy epic fantasy thing where he's the destined messiah to beat the ultimate evil?!"

"No he's not that central, but you have the right idea about what he faces."

"I must be chosen because I'm the moral support and he needs me?"

"Not exactly, you put yourself down. You will be invaluable to (Name) and his survival."

"What is that exactly?"

"You will see...now boy look into my eyes.", Ono had his attention on the girl. Before she finished her words he eyes caught Ono's attention as she bugged one eye at him. Then without blinking had opened up her eyes in a staring gaze. Then the irises in her eyes rotated like wheels in opposite directions. After they completely spun around at first the lights were moving normally again. But their positions all seemed to be centered around her now. Like she was the center of the light in the whole arcade and the light exploded off her whole body outward.

But that was moving much slower for Ono. When her irises rotated Ono thought he was getting dizzy. Then he noticed that it made him feel light headed. The sensation was odd. Unnatural.

By the time the irises made a full rotation the white in her eyes began changing into a fiery yellow. Her irises went from just a green shade to a turquoise, orange, and red. Three layers of color forming with Ono in sheer awe. Ono's focus was on her eyes as she asked him. They were telling him something, something important. At first Ono couldn't make out what her eyes were telling him. They were just a morphed blend of color with no pattern. Ono wanted to focus, he tried.but it made him feel spacey.

Another rotation, this time he felt compelled by the eyes to focus. He still couldn't understand even though he wanted to. Then another rotation, this time the blurred splatter of color was taking shape. Ono was amazed, it looked unbelievable. His body felt numb. Now having seen a glimpse everything around him felt lost.

Another, then when the picture became more clear his feelings were being replaced with a level of impending danger. It looked horrifying. Ono began backing away from the eyes. His numbness was growing butt it was hard to tell if the increased disturbness of what he was seeing made him stagger back in fear or his body growing limp. Because of this his vision was blurred again like static.

His own eyes were turning lazy-eyed. As if one eye wanted to follow the one it was fixated on. They were going back close together but, the dizzying effects were taking their tool. His head bobbled side to side with an audible moan of motion sickness escaping his mouth. His eyes were rotating opposite of each other mimicking the eyes he was seeing. His head jerk around a couple more times until he staggered back further until he fell on his knees.

Now his body was motionless with his mind centered on the girl's eyes. Ono's fear was gone then as his thoughts were becoming harder to form in his head. It was all just processing what he was being shown. Now it was all a full kaleidoscope of color, the images were making sense. The entire process was draining him, but Ono couldn't resist to soak in every detail this girl was showing him.

"Aren't they the most beautiful eyes in the world?", she asked.

Ono could't answer.

"What you have seen can never be forgotten. These eyes bring you great knowledge, great pleasure, but foreshadow great danger. Do you understand your role Ono?"

Ono nodded.

"Let this be our link to each other. You and I are connected in a way not many share. We share everything, we complete our gaps, we have a gift that is rare as the winter rose. We share the omniscience bond. Go and may our next encounter be soon."

Ono's next thoughts and feelings could never be brought to words but what she described was all true. Finally as Ono felt allowed to blink everything strange and odd ended instantaneously. "Till we meet again...", he thought.
1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.title: The Omniscience Bond

1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:

As if they're claiming their boldness. You entered an arcade, which was the same one Ono was not long ago.

1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.title: Back to you...

1113322222222222222222222211222221111111.content:
Inside the dojo Kuesu was sitting in her room, the stress of the day combined with everything else she had to deal with was just frustrating her to no end. She stared blankly off in her room, letting her mind circulate in thought. Then her attention got directed toward her desk. She went to it and pulled open a drawer, inside it was a scrapbook, in it were photos of you and her when you two were kids.

The first one was the day after you first met, her hair was still brunette then and her attitude was stoic. You were next to her smiling and having your arm around her neck. Kuesu smiled thinking back on that moment. When that was taken she had nothing to feel good about, but now it felt like a good memory now.

Kuesu flipped over a few pages and looked at another picture. This one had a heart around over it, she remembered when she was making this that this picture was her favorite. It was the two of you, hugging and rubbing your cheeks together, with both of you smiling. Kuesu teared up for a moment, the happiness from the nostalgia hit her more than she expected. She thought maybe another look at one more would be enough.

She turned to the very last page in the scrapbook. The last picture was one of you and Kuesu waving to the camera and you were sitting over by the mountains. Kuesu looked at it with intent wondering where those good times went to all these years. But then she noticed something in the background. Out of the circle came a bearded middle aged man with with a fencing sword. "Hello, my name... is Inigo Montoya.", the servant introduced himself.

"Huh? I don't understand, I thought I was getting a Caster class servant. Which one are you?"

"I am the lancer class. And I promise you, I shall not fail you when I go out there to take the grail for you, master."

"Hmmm? The feather must have been something significant near the end of his life perhaps. The name strikes a chord, oh yes! The man with a vendetta against the six fingered man, from the classic story of The Princess Bride. Interesting that he was made a heroic spirit. Whats done is done I guess.", you thought to yourself. "So you are Lancer. Well then it is great to meet my servant.", you extended your hand expecting him to shake it.

He obliged and gave a firm grip signifying his liking to your introduction. "Thank you. I never believed I would be summoned. But what do you wish of me to do?"

"For now nothing. We must wait for the other masters to summon their spirits. I have a plan though. You may leave until I have need of you, but stay close at all times to me Lancer.

"Very well.", Lancer said following your command. You looked at your right hand, the symbol of the lancer class was etched into it like a tattoo. You went to bed mentally resting for the long road ahead in this coming war.

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Ok so your probably guessing my situation. Who, where, why, and all that. Well let me make this 100% clear, I have never believed in the boogeyman. Yep, for my whole lifespan I never believed in monsters, nightmarish terrors, those creepy looking masks you see on Halloween. Never once got scared or believed any existed. But that might be because I'm one of those pessimistic douche bags who suck the life and fun out of everything but that's beside the point. For some reason my parents always loved getting me into the spirit of Halloween, and all those cheezy but admittedly cool movies. Sure I didn't believe in any of what was going on but I'm never going to trash the story of Frankenstein.

Now with my distaste for the wishful thinking of the supernatural being real in mind your guessing wait? Isn't this a self insert type story? Well your absolutely right, But I'm not the one who gets the girl, that would be you, lucky bastard. Well anyway I'm someone who comes in later. No it is not Ko. Too obvious. No, I'll show up to drag this story's plot along. But the real meat is getting you into the arms of that succubus that's destined to be with you.

Now ordinarily these stories begin with the typical, you were born here, managed to get wrapped in this location, adolescent drama ensues. But in this story that isn't the case. No, your being saved for later. for we are taking a glance at the other most important character of the story, our young lady Kurumu.

It was a terrible afternoon, the worst kind, nothing was going to keep it from ruining everything. A young schoolgirl sits in the shade, crying her eyes out upon learning devastating news. She cries and can't stop for any reason. In the distance a group of people watch her feeling for her situation, pitying the poor girl. her only hope of survival is to find new love, one that can surpass her first love. She needed someone, she needed you. Her time was growing short now, you needed to be the one she gives her heart to now, but how long will she have?

She cried whispering to herself, "Tskune.......I can't love nobody else...."

Unrequited love has been shown, some have seen it turn for the better, but more often they are devestating. This Tskune character chose another girl over her. And for those who don't know succubi thrive on love. To her, that succubus is living a fate worse than death, that poor girl is Kurumu. But hope is just beyond the horizon.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Plot 1

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a7ouDfay...

In the music room, the classroom and instruments were empty and bare. Nobody was around. Not a sound could be heard. The brokenhearted girl stepped inside, seeking an outlet to try and express herself. In the past she sung her heart out and it always fueled her passions and motivation. But her tears and choked up throat couldn't let out her voice. She sat on one of the chairs laid around looking at how such she always loved the beautiful sounds that were made when she attended class. As her eyes wandered around the room, she noticed a new instrument that was added, a piano. She always loved listening to just the piano but never could learn to play it. Too complicated. But for some reason she thought to maybe try and play it.

She sat down and started off tapping a couple keys. Then she went and started tapping on another set with her other hand. And suddenly, as if music began forming life, she played, and she was playing well. She couldn't believe it. She never prided herself on learning things so complex, but here she was creating a song that sprang to life so many notes and the emotion of her broken heart began to speak, or at the very least cry through those musical notes.

So she kept playing,she didn't know how she was doing it but she kept playing, and playing, until she heard someone open the door inside the room. "Oh!", Kurumu reacted.

"Oh sorry, I thought you were someone else.", Kurumu's friend, Mizore, was the one who broke the succubus out if her musical bliss.

"Did you think I was Yukari?"

"No. Nobody was supposed to be here now since all the classes are done for the day. I thought you were a ghost."

"Don't we literally have ghosts as students here?", Kurumu asked.

"I honestly don't know.", Mizore sat next to Kurumu. "Was that you playing?"

"Believe it or not."

"It was very good. I thought you were a singer at heart."

"Well, you and me both know, our hearts got really broken just now."

"Tskune chose Moka over us because it was who he wanted to be with. Sigh....but I hoped it would be me."

"Same here. Only difference is, I will die from it. You'll at least live to get someone else.", Kurumu pointed out.

"You certain nobody can fill the void Tskune left in your heart?"

"I'll die from this, it's only a matter of time. If I can't live on love, who knows how long I got."

Mizore comforted her, hugging her in a chilly but tender embrace, "You aren't alone. Even if Tskune doesn't love you the way we love him, then at least know he doesn't hate you. He is still your friend. And we love you too Kurumu so don't die.", Mizore said. She kept her monotone as she said these things but her emotions could still be heard within them.

"You saying you love me?"

Mizore blushed, "I mean...we love you like family.", she affirmed.

Kurumu looked at Mizore intently, "Kiss me.", Kurumu asked.

"Kiss you?", instead of a violent reaction Mizore kept comprised and while surprised she didn't feel a harsh sense of rejecting the idea. This wasn't the first time they had kissed. Kurumu did it at a time when Mizore was at her lowest point. That moment made Mizore think that perhaps this was what Kurumu needed too.

"I need to know something, just a kiss.", Kurumu explained.

Mizore nodded and leaned in, the two girls were on the verge of closing the distance....CRASH! The window shattered as something was propelled into the room with Mizore shielding Kurumu and herself in an ice dome protecting themselves from the derbies.

"What was that?", Kurumu asked.

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
One day you get a letter, your grandfather has passed away and has left you his mansion, staff, land, and fortune. Obviously excited about what you have just received now, you make a hasty trip there first chance you get. He lived very far away, and up high in the mountains. For about two straight days, you took a plane to the area, then a solid 3 more to hike up the mountain.

"Whatever grandfather left me, had better be worth it.", you said exhaustively.

Day Six

You finally reached the top, you made it and could see the place miles away. Just from the high view, this place was the most beautiful location you had ever seen. Although the lack of people made you a little on the nervous side. With all the landscaping and excessive care to make this place such a marvel, there had to be people living here. More accurately the hired help had to be around and about working.

You got nervous, maybe you took a wrong turn. Or maybe this was the wrong mansion located in the mountains. The townsfolk said there was two so maybe he took a wrong turn up the trail.

You continued walking to the mansion itself passing by the gardens, maybe anyone there might give you directions. But then you felt a tremor, the ground was shaking and a loud noise was booming. "Earthquake?!"

No.....a herd of maids came busting out the main door coming right at you!

"AHHHHHHHHHHHH!", you screamed.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Story 1

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
"GAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!"

The maids were all screaming in excitement, having their arms extended out eager for an aggressive greeting. When they caught you, the world around you vanished, they had sucked you into a mob, from which you had zero chance of breaking free of. You were shoved, crammed, and felt the hands of several women all man handling you. Hugging, petting, glomping. It was as if it would never stop, and you would be dead, but a overpowering voice came from somewhere inside the crowd. You could vaguely see who, but in seconds the crowd spreaded out a bit. "Welcome!!!", the voice said.

This maid had two large pigtails on the sides of her head, wearing an orange-esque color. She held out her hands and cupped your face. You were exhausted from the swarm you managed to love through so you couldn't be in much of a demanding mood as you were gasping for breath. The touch of her hands made you feel more awkward with having this much physical attention. But as she had her hands on your cheeks you felt this girl pulling you towards her. You felt confused by her gesture, but it hit you then, she was pulling you into a kiss. Your heartbeat grew steadily faster, the stress of everything was making this sweet moment in your life feel like you were in a war-zone. Just moments before you made contact, whether instinctively or in an attempt to speak against this, you opened your mouth for her.

Finally your lips touched hers, her soft lips felt smooth and you felt yours somehow remain locked. But she didn't intend you to have your very first kiss be cute, she intended it to be quite passionate. She pressed your mouth further into her own, her lips moving around your own, massaging your own. But it quickly went from a passionate kiss, to a full on sucking of face. Just before the audible smooching sound coming off the two of you, you moaned from the sudden force and pleasure this brought out. She moaned following yours either because of the force her kiss was delivering or she interpreted your own as a sign of enjoyment.

She held you in a lip lock for a few more seconds snogging you until she pulled away ever so slightly. A small gap was between the corners of your mouths but your lips were still touching. From a small window it could be vaguely seen, the tongues that were dancing within this forward force of affection. She kept pressing hers onto your own, with you only succumbing to the passion, giving no feasible resistance you wanted to offer.

After one final moan from the girl, she fully pulled back ending the kiss, to your relief. Your heart was slowing pace from the sheer shock of the last 2 minutes. As soon as you regained your senses, you stepped back and demanded some explanations. "Ok, what was that for?!"

"It is our tradition, which is why..."

Then two more girls who looked like the one you just kissed stepped in, "Were all getting our turn."

"All...", you blankly repeated.

And then the swarming mob went back again, although instead of ripping you apart, they were getting more literal with your clothing. You could feel the various pecks and sucking noises being made by a bunch of maids, all kissing you. Not limited to your lips this time, but all over your upper body and face. For maybe a solid minute they all sought to plant lips on you. It was less pleasurable with your body being restrained and the crowd forcing their way to you, kissing you forcefully, and quickly. But their lips still provided a level of affection that wasn't all unpleasant.

Finally it came to an end when somebody called out requesting it to cease. By the time it did, you had kiss marks all around your upper body from your arms, chest, belly, and forehead. Either everyone was wearing lipstick or they were skilled in leaving noticeable hickeys.

"Isn't the master uncomfortable? Oh hello I'm Mariel, head maid of the mansion."

"Thank you. Do you mind explaining what is going on? And why the neardeath experience?"

"My apologies. Our maids here are very affectionate and we have been anticipating your arrival for a while. Please join me as I discuss what you have inherited.", Mariel said.

"Sure."
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Too many kisses!

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
"Ok so long story short my granddad left me this mansion, fortune, and staff and he wishes me well that I take advantage of the fact I'm the only male in the estate. On top of that whatever I ask you will be required to do, no matter how insane the request? That's basically what your saying."

"Indeed. Many of our traditions were modeled after your grandfather's wishes."

"YOU GOTTA BE KIDDING?! YOU MEAN TO TELL ME YOU ALL MADE OUT WITH AN OLD GEEZER?!"

"No. He was very flirtatious but only went for women his age."

"That doesn't answer my question!"

"Oh then its a no. The original staff was let go due to his passing and most of us have only been maintaining the household and learning the traditions for when someone would inherit the estate."

"Just hearing that I'm being labeled as a sex manic on sight thanks to my granddad's reputation doesn't make me feel any better."

After Mariel explained the details you were less the enthusiastic. "This is still too sudden. 'Feel free to do whatever I want?' Do you expect me to just treat you like slaves?"

"Well its a dark way of putting but, more or less."

"Well don't! You can spread the word to every single maid here. Nobody is being treated like mere objects while I'm around. Now I'm opposed to being roped into this, but I am not going through the hassle of going back home the way I came, so for now this is my home."

"Excellent news master (Name). I shall give word out to the others."

"First things first, where is the lavatory?", you asked politely.

You scampered across the halls looking for the bathroom until at last you were successful. However soon as you found it you were confused, two staues of naked women beside the seat, but no sign of a flusher. "Where the heck do I flush?"

"Press the statue's nipple.", someone replied.

"You can't be serious."

"Oh no it's true.", soon as you did, an audio of a women's sexual moan hit the room with the flushing sound in the background.

"Was that geezer the biggest pervert of the rich people world?"

"He was envied by many as having access to many women in his privet home."

"Oh well, that makes sense. By the way why am I talking to some- gah!", it finally hit you someone was invading your privacy. "Wait I know you! You were the first girl that made out with me! And you were there, and YOU were there. And you were there too!", you said pointing at the reflection of yourself. "Oh yeah, no shit."

Suddenly the three identical girls were out of sight, but you felt your pants being unbuttoned and loosened. "WHOA HEY! GET OFF ME! Hands off the belt!"

"The old master told us to do this.", one of them said.

"I AM NOT HIM! Geez did he buy your silence?! That can't have been legal! STOP UNZIPPING IT!"

"Please be quiet, and stay still, you are making it harder."

"OTHER WAY AROUND! STOP! I CAN'T HOLD IT IN!", you really needed to go, but now their intervention had brought up an unnecessary motivation below deck. Your needed to go, bad but now you needed to go in less than 3 seconds.

"If you-", you interrupted them.

"GO AWAY OR I'LL...I'LL!", in normal adolescent situations, this is typical for a young man to wet his pants while the opposite sex is present. But when has it happened when said sex had tried taking off your pants and forced out said outcome, the embarrassment levels couldn't be more higher.

"Just go away and let me change out of these.", you spoke in a very angry tone.

"Now now, WE must do the changing!", one of the identical maids said. They grabbed your pants much to your disdain.

"I SAID STOP! CEASE! DESIST! That's an-", with that you were naked from the waist down. They finally left soon after in a blink of an eye, leaving you beyond bewildered. Luckily the baths were right beside the bathroom so you went to wash yourself. If not from the trip, then to cleanse yourself of that horrible ordeal.

"Swear I will fire those three! Ahhhhh but at least this will calm me down. Uhhhhhhhggggggghhhhhh! These maids need serious personal space rules. I'm not going through that again.", you got in the water, rested on the stair and relaxed. The room was very lovely. Beautiful architecture of statues decorating the room. If this wasn't run by crazy hire help this wouldn't be so bad.

That changed soon as you thought it was over. Suddenly those three spawned from under the water, and like you, were stark naked! "I TAKE THE FIRST BATH IN OVER 5 DAYS AND STILL I GET NO PRIVACY?! JUST WHAT IS THE MATTER WITH YOU THREE?! HUH?! WHEN I SAY NO, YOU GET THE DAMN PICTURE, GOT IT?!", you said snapping at them.

Sure enough they backed away and lowered themselves in the water. "We apologize master.", one said.

"Were are only following our duty.", another said.

"If we don't then we lose our only jobs here.", the last one finished.

"We are sorry master (Name).", they said in unison.

Personal space invaded 3 times over and then some, you at least relented your anger at them enough to allow them another chance. "Ok. But I ask if you hear me say to hold back on your duty, you will do so when I ask."

"Absolutely master. Shall we begin washing you then?", the one in the middle said.

"Ok just for reference who are you three?", you asked.

"I am Ichigo.", the middle one said.

"I'm Ringo.", the left one followed.

"And I'm Sango."

"And we shall be taking care of you.", they said together.

"Sigh. Fire away, just leave the personal spots to me please."

A few hours later...

You were in your personal bed. The day was done and you had so much on your mind. "Ahhhhhhhh........this is just crazy. One minute normal life, next a harem is now my life until further notice. Jeez louize. At least I have my rest to get me through the night.", you thought to yourself. You turned off the light and started going to sleep.

But you put your foot in your mouth when you saw and felt three lumps under the covers. Shocked, you turend back on the light only to find the triplets being what startled you.

"Master going to bed now? Well then let us give you the final service of the day."

You backed away at the end of the bed in a mixture of embarrassment and horror. One of them turned out the light and from there darkness. You couldn't see but all you could do was feel. Feel them around you. From the sense of their actions, they had simply gave you a goodnight kiss, while they each ended up spooning with you through the night.

"What kind of insane asylum is this?!", you cried out. Truth be told you couldn't tell if you said it aloud or thought it so loudly you assumed you yelled it out.

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Last night, post late night shenanigans, you managed to sleep well. The girls all didn't bother you in the middle of the night and just slept with you, though if you had to be frank their spooning did make the night far more relaxing. They ended up being surprisingly tender and their warm bodies did their job to keep you warm through the night. Morning finally came by and you started to wake up. As you started feeling yourself drift out of your state of comfort and you began feeling your environment, you felt as if your breathing felt like your breath was muzzled. You were mostly breathing through your nose in your sleep, but for some strange reason your mouth felt weird. You were too tired to care so you just tried getting more rest.

The girls on your sides were awake finally and their first sight of the morning was a bit of a shocking one. "GASP! Sango!", Ichigo and Ringo both screamed.

Their cries didn't shock you out of sleep but they did wake you up. You slowly opened your eyes, your vision adjusted to waking up. It took you a couple moments to realize but you saw Sango's face extremely close to yours. You figured she was resting on your chest, except you still felt your mouth muzzled by something. You looked down and noticed your lips were locked with hers. You were starting to put two and two together. Weird breathing. Kissing Sango. Weird breathing. Kissing Sango.

"Master (Name) can you breath?!", Ichigo asked.

"Hmm? Yeah I'm breathing through my nose just fine. Soon as I stop kissing Sango I'll go back to-. Wait wait wait.", your thoughts were finally running again but moving at a snails pace. Mornings make you take time for your coherent thought to finally kick back in.

You started moving back to try and get her off of you, and you started screaming into her mouth with the audible hint you didn't like this. Ringo started pulling Sango off, while you pressed her off too. Soon as your mouths broke apart and a loud, "Mwah", came out of the separation immediately following that was a huge scream from you, "AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!"

You breathed heavily trying to make sure you weren't dying. Ringo tapped her sister's face to be sure she didn't pass out from oxygen deprivation while she had her mouth blocked by yours. Sango woke up not realizing what she was doing just a moment ago. "Oh thank goodness. Sango-chan what were you doing?", Ichigo asked.

"Huh, I was sleeping on Master (Name's) chest last night. Nothing more."

"My morning breath would beg to differ.", you replied.

"Sango you must have slid your head downward to the master's lips during the night. It's incredibly lucky you both didn't suffocate.", Ringo explained.

Rather than be worried or filled with apology, she instead was ecstatic. "A kiss! A kiss! The young master kissed me!" Her sisters face palmed as did you. "That was the longest kiss of my life then."

"Forget it. I'm brushing my teeth, and I may need to drink the mouthwash to get the breath out of my system. I'm just relieved nobody was seriously in danger.", you said.

The girls were all relieved hearing your warmer tone and not a repeat of your attitude from yesterday. "Sango you couldn't be more of an air-head.", Ichigo said.

"Sorry. I was just, flattered. I wasn't fully awake, but it kinda felt nice."

"Perhaps we need to rethink how to approach things with him. Huddle up I have an idea.", Ichigo suggested.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Wake up call

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
After an extended period of brushing your teeth, gums, and any oral hygiene you could think of, you finally got outside to get some fresh air. You sat by the fountain with the main garden looking tranquil. You always savored moments where you could enjoy scenery like this, when so often you rarely get a chance to enjoy the things in life you can just look at. Mariel came by in a pleasant mood, "Master (Name), I am aware that even though you are the inheritor of this estate I have some news you should be made aware of."

"I don't want to run an economy here. Someone else has to be more qualified for that. Besides I don't know squat about business."

"No. It is much more important, you see you have become your family's new head.", she explained.

"Wait? Like in terms of everything about my family? I now dictate where it all goes? But my parents are still alive!"

"Worry not, I already checked if they were fine. They are both alive and well, it's just that in your grandfather's will we just found out something. Since he gave you the estate and his shares, that legally puts you in charge of the family."

"Anyway I can give it to anyone else?"

Just then the sky got a lot darker. "Uhhhh is the daylight here schizophrenic?"

"No, it's an airship. And not just any. Master (Name) despite your reluctance, you will need to be the family head right now."

You took heed of her words, her tone and just how serious nature this was all turning into, you stood up and tried appearing as formal as you could. The airship landed with a pair of secret service looking people on the sides of a red carpet that was laid out once the ship landed. Then a pair of ruby high heels tredded down the steps, followed by a red dress with a purple bow tied behind. A refined and lovely girl with orange hair and huge pigtails walked across the carpet meeting you face to face.

"Hmmm. This place looks so dreadful, well anyway you there servant, go fetch your family head."

"Sorry for the confusion but I am the new family head.", you spoke politely. Her mocking the mansion really urked you seeing how it looked gorgeous, what would she know.

"Huh? Oh please that can't be you. Just tell the new family head that I am Ryuuka Jihiou, and I must speak with him."

"Excuse me ma'am, but- "

"What are you gawking at? Oh, well I can understand how you must be attracted to my unsurpassed beauty."

"I just told you it's me. I AM THE NEW FAMILY HEAD.", you said emphasizing the painfully obvious to her.

"WHAAAAAT? But your just some random guy who could have been plucked out from any hole. I have to deal with you?!"

"Please the compliments your giving are just too much. While I'm at I'll return the favor with, your angry face makes your teeth look crooked.", you jabbed.

"HOW DARE YOU!", she said punching you in the face.

That punch was so hard she knocked you flat and made you pass out for 2 minutes. You woke up in one of the lounge areas where Ryuuka was sitting across from you with Mariel beside you, with Ichigo, Ringo, and Sango tending to your injury.

"I suppose I should apologize for attacking you. My temper is something I should show some restraint on given the circumstances."

"No kidding. But I will admit that was a hell of a punch.", you said turning the mood on itself. It even earned a giggled out of everyone.

"Hmm amusing, you have a sharp tongue, however I hope your maturity is sharp when you need it to be."

"Ok Ms. Ryuuka, from what I can assume your family isn't buddy buddy with mine."

"Indeed. However that is going to change, since in order for me to be the new head of the Jihiou family, WE MUST MARRY.", she dramatically declared.

"Marriage?! No way!", you reacted.

"It sucks I know, believe me I'm not happy about it either, but that is how it has to be."

"But I don't like you."

"Me neither."

"SO WHY DO YOU WANT TO MARRY ME IF YOU HATE ME!", you said getting confused by her strange motivation.

"I just told you, if I am to be the new head of my family I must marry into yours. Specifically you."

"Anyone else want some snacks? I haven't eaten this morning.", you offered. One of Ryuuka's guards was interested so you kindly offered up some food laid on the table between your seat and Ryuuka's. But your scatterbrained attention drove her into being overly ticked again. She smacked the tray of food and then grabbed your collar.

"Do you have any objections to this marriage?!", she said angrily.

"No shit I do."

"What's wrong, don't you like me?", she started to act all gentler putting on a pouty face to try and get you to change your mind.

"You've given me no real reason to in less than a minute. I'd say you flunked the first impression.", if her attitude wasn't crap you would actually said yes. She looked very nice and to be honest it didn't matter who you married as long as they weren't scumbags. But she was acting like a real scumbag.

"Grrrrrrrrrrrrr! Well I won't take no for an answer! I will marry you!"

"You know being the head if this family draws in more attention than I'd like. In fact I'm planning on passing it down. So when I set that up, I'll try and make sure he meets your specifications. That way everyone wins.", you suggested trying to diffuse the situation.

"Do not mock me!"

"I was serious."

"I have to be married to you, so we will have to live with it."

"Still no."

"Well what will it take for you to say yes then?"

"How about leaving, I can be open to that snowball in July's chance we could end up together."

"FOR REAL! I am willing to be submit to your demands, but only through a fair way of expressing who's wishes beat the other's."

"Like what a challenge?"

"Exactly! One single test to have our family's future be decided. Do you accept this proposal?"

You thought about it for a second and figured if it would stop her harassing you it would be perfect, "I do.", too bad your choice of words couldn't have been any more poorer.

"HA! I GOT YOU! Then it's settled!", she said laughing like she won a popularity contest.

"I didn't mean the marriage proposal!", you clarified.

"Your words were spoken exactly 'I do' and in front of witnesses. Don't worry, the wedding was already arranged to be here on the spot.", Ryuuka grabbed you and hauled you off.

"HELP MEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!", you screamed.

Mariel and the maid triplets just stood in disbelief. "Do you think she will allow us to keep our jobs with Master (Name)?", Sango asked. Ringo and Ichigo facepalmed again.

"We can't just let her get away with this. Right?", Ringo asked Mariel.

"Don't worry, I'm sure there must be a way to get him out of this.", Mariel replied.

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
In record time outside the mansion, the place looked like it was transformed for a wedding in just a few minutes. You had to admit it was impressive but you were still against the arrangement.

"Ms. Ryuuka for the last time I never agreed to this."

"You said I do, after I said do you agree to my proposal. Just wait here, the tailor's will take your measurements and have your suit ready. Oh and to make sure you don't get any cold feat,", she handcuffed you to her wrist, "I'm breaking the seeing the groom before the ceremony."

"What I want is to NOT BE MARRIED!", you loudly objected to her ear.

"I'm aware your not crazy about it, in fact that's all we can agree on. But it is best for our families in the long run. Besides at least you are getting the better end of the bargain. I at least have to get used to your looks."

"Not really, your personality is so ugly I can see it seeping through that angry face you make when you get too volatile."

"Grrr! If you make one more remark like that, then I will bury you soon as we are legally bound!"

"But after the honeymoon?", you joked.

"WHY YOU!"

Meanwhile Mariel and the maid triplets were going through some documents seeing any legal loop hole they could exploit to get you out of marriage.

"I can't find anything. Apparently (Name's) grandfather never anticipated marrying into a rival family. All the others are about certain others.", Mariel said.

"Is it really nesecary? He doesn't like her, much less marry her. In fact we'd be better brides than that hot-tempered wench."

"Hot-blooded females are his substitute? C'mon Ichigo. He'd never want to marry us. And even then he would have to pick me, you or Sango. Were just his servants, nothing more.", Ringo said.

"But...sigh. You're right.", Ichigo replied somberly.

"I don't understand, I don't see why we can't just voice our opinion. We've slept with him, made out with him, only thing we haven't is f-"

"Sango shut up!", Ringo yelled.

"No wait! She's right!"

"How?"

"Ryuuka isn't a fan of (Name) at all. But if we made him out to be a womanizer, Ryuuka might become too disgusted to marry him."

"I don't think it will work. Ryuuka is determined to be the head of her family, (Name) could be the exact opposite of her type and still go through with it.", Mariel explained. "The only way to get him out of this is to have a legal excuse to make sure she can't go through with it."

Then they heard an organ playing an overture which meant the wedding was starting right now. "Oh no! Girls, stall it however you can. I'm going to keep looking."

"Ohhh why can't his grandfather have let (Name) have his way?!", Sango said. The triplets ran to the ceremony as fast as they could.

Back to you...

You were chained to the stand where the priest was there awaiting Ryuuka to walk down the aisle. You tried getting out of your restraints but you couldn't break out. Surprisingly the priest didn't seem to have any issue with it. Then the music was playing the typical dum dum da duuuuuummmm which as expected Ryuuka was walking down now. She didn't look entirely happy as she did, maybe because you were still trying to break free, or she didn't want this anymore than you did yet dealt with it anyway for the sake of her family. She walked up to the stand and stood beside you, while you continued yanking your chain. Ryuuka grabbed your hand and squeezed it real tight forcing you to stop struggling and wince in pain.

"Dearly beloved, we are gathered here today to join this man and this woman in matrimony. "Ryuuka Jihiou, do you take this man to be your husband, to live
together in matrimony, to love him, to honor him, to comfort him, and to keep him in sickness and in health, forsaking all others, for as long as you both shall live?", the priest said his lines to her.

"I do.", she answered.

"And do you-"

"NO!", you yelled out. Ryuuka squeezed harder.

"You already agreed to this (Name) don't give me cold feet."

"I never agreed! Your ah! Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!", now she was on the verge of snapping your bones.

"He's just shy, go on.", Ryuuka insisted.

"Then (Name), do you take this woman to be your wife to live together in matrimony, to love her, to honor her, to comfort her, and to keep her in sickness and in health, forsaking all others, for as long as you both shall live?", he asked you.

The pain of Ryuuka crushing your hand was way too much for you to resist again. You nodded but mostly out of sheer pain. "You may exchange rings."

Ryuuka pulled out yours and placed on your mangled hand, "With this ring, I thee wed.", in a very loving tone.

You didn't have one but Ryuuka pointed to your suit pocket where her ring was waiting. She still had hold of your one hand so you just got it over with and placed her ring on hers. "Then by virtue of the authority vested in me under the laws of the Jihiou, I now pronounce-"

Then the triplet maids finally made it yelling out, "WE OBJECT!", causing Ryuuka to be beyond pissed. But at least she released your hand finally. "Ms. Jihiou, we would like to enlighten you on our master of his miscellaneous deeds in his very short stay with us.", they said in unison.

"Heh, there is nothing you can do to stop me. Were just three words away from being married."

"Ah! But you forget you have to pucker up and land a big fat one on him and then you will be married!", Sango replied.

Ringo and Ichigo face-palmed again at her clear stupidity. "Just to rub it in I'll do that."

"I wouldn't if I were you. His breath probably would kill you."

"Oh please.", she took a small whif of your breath and suddenly she felt incredibly sick. "Eullllllllllghhh! Have you eaten wild boar?!!"

"My breath still reaks from this morning?! I thought I got Sango's breath out of my own!"

"Huh? You've sullied your own nest?", Ryuuka said in shock.

"Not just me. Ichigo, Ringo, and most of the entire staff. It's an all female staff and he wasted no time enjoying the benefits. We had such a pleasant night together."

"You...you....you.... hoar.", Ryuuka said in disbelief.

You figured out what the triplets were up to and ran with it. "Yep, and if you marry me. That behavior is part of this package. Married or not I'm still staying home, with my lovely maids. All of them willing to please me, however, I, desire."

"AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! You had to be the sleaziest little man I could have gotten to be a husband! I would never marry you!", she cried out causing the reception to gasp. "But I'm far too close to becoming the head of the Jihiou family, so finish the speech.", she told the priest.

"Man and wife. You may kiss.", he finished.

Ryuuka closed her eyes, puckered her lips, grabbed you by holding your shoulders, and then darted in closing the distance. You had no time to say or do anything before she roughly crushed your faces together. Her lips squashed over your mouth aligning perfectly in this one-sided kiss. Her open mouth smooch was loud and sloppy, either on purpose or that was how well she could kiss. You were shocked and wide-eyed at the sudden turn of events was, in total disbelief of what was happening. “Mmmmph?! MMMMH!”

You clamped your eyes shut, and struggled to pull apart in a vain attempt to free yourself. Her grip held firm, as your head couldn’t budge an inch within the girl’s strong grasp, allowing Ryuuka the freedom to kiss you for as long as she wanted. She moaned softly as she did while her warm, soft lips puckered and pressed, in a forceful, rhythm over your lips, while she ignored your muffled cries of protest.

The triplets looked away in disgust by Ryuuka's unromantic sign of affection.

When Ryuuka’s lips finally pulled away from yours, with a sharp wet pop and a vocal “MWAH!”, you let out a barrage of disgusted retching, hacking and spitting.

"Now we are married and I'll be sure you don't go sleeping with the hired help, HUSBAND.", Ryuuka declared in victory.

"I'm afraid he isn't your husband Ryuuka.", just then Mariel stepped behind the priest with something in her hand. "This proves that this marriage wasn't legal."

Mariel held out a document in front of Ryuuka, a passage was highlighted which you and her both read very intently. "The will of (Name's) grandfather and his recorded message both repeat this line. '(Name) shall do whatever he wishes with the maids within the mansion.' That line was part of his inheritence."

"What does that have to do with not making the marriage legal?"

"Because Master (Name) is already married. Therefore he can't be married to you when he is already with another."

"Heh?", you reacted.

"Since when?!", Ryuuka asked demanding an answer.

"From this photo, you see our young master with his lovely bride the moment they were pronounced man and wife. We have the entire staff as witnesses, plus all the paper work that legally binds them. Feel free to look them over.", you checked the picture. It was you and one of the triplets making out the day you came. You were beyond confused and baffled as equally as Ryuuka.

"Why didn't he tell me this? LIES! This is all lies! You mean you married one of them?!", Ryuuka said tossing out words in total rage.

You didn't want to waste the chance, you went alone with it, "I was trying to tell you, but you kept shutting me up! Now you look like an idiot not knowing your groom is already hitched.", you played along.

"AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! This isn't over! Gimme those papers! I'll have my lawyers and best people figure a way to let me into this family! And you will regret making a fool out of me! When I figure out a way to marry you, I'll be sure it's legal, binding, and you will learn to love me you sniveling bruuuuuuuuuuuuuuuute!", she yelled storming off.

Soon everyone left and you managed to evade marriage but you had tons of questions. "Thanks alot Mariel. But how they hell did you fake that stuff in such a short time?"

"That would be me! Ikuyo Suzuki, I orchestrated most of this. Mariel only gave me the idea.", a maid popped out of nowhere. She was like most of the other maids except she wore glasses, stereotypically indicating she must be a genius mechanic or something brainy. "You see that picture actually I took to capture the moment. Though I gotta say never thought it would come in handy. But the marriage paperwork and all that other jaz. They'll know it's fake in about two days."

"What does it mean then?"

"Means we stalled them.'', she answered smiling widely.

"No, if they know its fake and it is then I'm technically married to her."

"Not true I recorded the entire thing, again capturing the moment, and legally your not married. Never said 'I do'. So what you need to do before they come back is marry one of those fine young maids there, until she doesn't come back again."

Your face went red as you could already tell what that meant. Ichigo, Sango, and Ringo all squealed. "WERE GOING TO BE MARRIED! IT'S ALL OF US OR NO DEAL! DON'T WORRY WE'LL SHARE YOU.", they all said in unison.

"Mariel is what the Ms. Suzuki, marital attorney at law, saying true?"

"Hahahahhahahaha! That was a good one. I think I'll put it on my resume.", Ikuyo said.

"Yes."

"Not that I don't appreciate the effort but was that the best idea you had?"

"When Sango said why your grandfather didn't let you marry who you wanted, it reminded me of a line in his will. So Ms. Suzuki managed to create a convincing story that would allow Ryuuka to leave. You not saying 'I do', might actually make it stick now.", she explained.

"So then what now?"

"Your getting married either way but at least they aren't forceful as Ryuuka.", Ikuyo said.

"Frankly not by a whole lot."

"But we WILL change master (Name) we will change!", the triplets said in unison again.

"Sigh...it can't be helped. But thanks. If not for you three, I'd be with that crazy psycho."

"Ok then, everyone gather around, gather around we have a wedding to fall through with. Were in the mood, we have what we need. Now we just have to seal the deal to make certain they buy it for real.", Ikuyo said leading a few maids around.

"No time like the present I guess.", you said.

"Alright (Name) I just need you to do a few things. First order of business, make me in charge of all marriages within the estate."

"Done."

"Good. Now do you take Ichigo, Ringo, and Sango, your maids who tend to your physical health, your physical desires, your lustful fantasies, and obvious kissing fetishes, as your lawfully wedded wives. Which you will all cycle through daily to spread evenly so that he'll be fair.", she started off. You felt embarrassed by her exaggeration of how the triplets did their jobs, but they didn't mind, which worried you even more.

"But we all sleep with him at night?", Sango asked.

"Yep."

"Yay!", the triplets let out an excited cheer.

"Back on track, will you take them, to have and to hold, in sickness and in health, so long as you all shall live?", Ikuyo finished.

You looked at the triplets, not two days in they have more than shown you plenty affection, but if this was going to be a temporary set up it wouldn't be so bad. Besides, they helped you get out of an unhappy marriage. Might as well be stuck in a troublesome but overall far more pleasant one. "I do."

"Ok you three, same thing?"

"WE DO!"

"Then by the power invested in me by our master (Name), and legality of this marriage that was done through loopholes, technicalities and other convoluted stuff. I hereby pronounce you four, Husband and Wives.", Ikuyo proclaimed.

Instead of an kissing onslaught they instead went with a loving group hug. The maids all clapped, some crying, some cheering, some confused. But for all that happened this did feel nice. After the ceremony you went to bed to enjoy a good night sleep.

But of course that wasn't going to fly with your new wives.

"We've been waiting (Name).", Ichigo said.

"We intend to make your nights a dream (Name).", Ringo followed.

"Lets, do, it.", Sango finished.

"GAH! AHHH!", you weren't very enthusiastic after having suffered enough affection for one day but given how its the night after marriage it couldn't be helped.

The girls all puckered up and closed their eyes, they stuck out their lips seeking your face. In your eyes, their faces started smashing together and their lips started forming into one. And then you could only see nothing but pink, and hear the sounds of smoochy sounds. And so they kissed you yet again. Their soft lips frantically were placed all around your face. You were getting used to the feeling of being kissed that way to the point it started being less unbearable. You weren't sure if it was a sign of losing your sanity or just warming up to the triplets.

A few minutes of that happened before finally you all rested for the night.

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
In 2126, a Dive Massively Multiplayer Online Role Playing Game, or DMMORPG, called Yggdrasil was released. It stood out among all other's due to its ability for the players to interact within game to high degrees. But after a 12-year run, the game servers were about to be shut down. Within the game existed a guild named, Ainz Ooal Gown, once consisting of 41 members and credited as one of the strongest guilds in the game. Now only 5 of the members remain, the other 36 having quit the game. Of those 5 only one actually continues to play; his name was Momonga and he remained the guild leader, maintaining their headquarters, The Great Tomb of Nazarick. He invited the remaining guild members but of those only two appeared...

"Hey guys. Great to have you back in-game.", Momonga said. Sitting around a large round table with the two other guild members sitting in opposing directions. To Momonga's right was a slime avatar called HeroHero, the other was you, a Dark Elf avatar you named Elven Black. You preferred to create your names based of of your characters classes or backstory you established in-game.

"Good news for you Momonga, with this being the final day, I'm planning to stay until servers shut down."

"Oh really?! That's great. You too HeroHero?", Momonga said excitedly.

"Naw, I have work tomorrow and I feel how my Avatar looks. I'm not staying long. But hey serious kudos. This place looks great. I can't believe you kept it up and running for as long as you have. I hope we meet IRL dude. See ya.", the slime avatar said with a sad emoji as he teleported away. Logging off the game one final time.

"This sucks. I'd have thought maybe the others would come back one last time.", Momonga said slamming his fist on the table.

"Sorry dude. The game ran its course. I guess people prefer to get on with their lives."

"Oh what about you? Don't you have work?"

"Between you and me I'm only 12 IRL. The avatar just looks like I'm 16.", you confessed.

"A 12 year old with a job?!"

"Kind of. I don't work work like you guys did, but I have consistently done yard every season. Shoveling the snow, mowing grass. I've done enough to where it kind of counts."

"Man, you're lucky. I have to get up at 4 in the morning."

"Yyyyyyikes. Sucks for you dude. Maybe you should take my job instead."

"No thanks. I'd rather keep mine that doesn't have me sweaty all the livelong day."

"Eh it makes the cold showers worth it. Anyway, lets enjoy what we made here dude. I don't want the last few minutes to be in a dull room with skeletor."

"Lol! Good one Black! Hold on, maybe we should bring the staff. SInce it holds all of our old friends' power in it. The culmination of our hard work in this one item. Make the last few minutes fitting."

"No reason not to. Besides makes everyone else not being here less depressing."

You and Momonga walked out and saw a line of servants greet you as you walked out. "Hmm, maybe we should let them do something for today."

"Dude, nobody else is here. And were minutes away. Nobody will give a @#$% what we do. We could nuke the entire tomb and get away with it."

"See your point. Follow us.", Momonga commanded the servants. The two of you walked into the throne room where the strongest NPC guardian stood beside Momonga's guild leader throne. The undead overlord sat on the throne looking at the legacy he and the others left behind. "You know what. I've spent so much time here. I feel maybe I can let it go knowing I'm not the only one who cared as much as me. Since you don't have to get up so early, how about I leave Nazarick in your hands?"

"Whoa! But your the leader. I don't deserve it."

"Hey, you joined while there was just me and the other three. You may have started out weak, but all that time you spent with me when there was nobody else. It was nice watching you rise up the ranks. Jeez I sound so sentimental.", he reacted with embarrassment.

"Hey I wouldn't have gotten to as high as you without your help. But I don't deserve it. I'm not worthy of holding that staff."

"Like you said, nobody cares, its the last day after all. I can't let the only other person who was dedicated to this not get a chance when I've had my fill. You earned it.", Momonga handed you the golden staff and you felt like you inherited a fortune. You got a little emotional, after years of working and playing the game, this felt like such an accomplishment. While saddened by the inevitable state of things, he accepted the reality that the game was over and it was time he logged off.
"Goodbye, hope I see you IRL too.", the guild leader left with an empty seat left in the wake of his absence.

You sat in it looking at the NPC's and navigating through the menus. You looked at the NPC who stood next to the throne, the succubus, and looked through her settings. "Hmm wait? her personality is she's a bitch? Who would put that in there? Those perverted sick bastards never could keep from acting like trolls. Maybe I can fix it for the reminder of the night.", you used the staff to change her data and entered the words, "Has huge crush on Elven Black.", you chuckled thinking you were being a total geek for doing that. But you had little care since you noticed the game was on its final minute.

"Well that is the end. And with his last mark, the Dark Elf inherited, though briefly, the leadership of the legendary guild. And with the final minute counting down, second by second, he rested, peacefully drifting with the knowledge he earned the greatest power in all the world.", you monologued keeping to your character's roleplay. And so, you stayed in the guild alone until the servers shut down.

With the time being midnight on the dot, there was nothing but darkness. It was official, the game was over. Then the time kept going, the game was over, but your stay in the tomb, had only begun.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Yes

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Soon as you opened your eyes you immediately panicked, "Huh? HEY WHY AM I STILL HERE?!", you yelled.

"Is there a problem my lord?", you turned to where the voice cam from, and to an even greater shock it was from the NPC. "What is troubling you?", Albedo asked again.

"Gah! Why did you speak?!", and it occurred to you then your voice changed, possibly to reflect your avatar.

"Forgive me lord Black, I did not mean to speak out of term.", she apologized.

"N-no! I was just rattled by something. You are forgiven.", you took a moment to gather what was going on. You tried opening the menu but nothing happened, making you more panicked. "What the heeeeeck. Ok two things have happened, either I'm stuck in the game unable to call anyone, or I'm in a totally new world that happens to be exactly like Yggdrasil. But wait, if that is the case, I get to stay here, and command the Tomb to my design. THIS IS AWESOME!", your fear turned to excitement as this revelation hit you.

"My lord, what do you wish for us to do.", the head servant asked.

"Sebas, I want you to scout the outside of tomb. I have high suspicions about our current whereabouts.", you addressed the servant by name having memorized all of the Pleiades by name.

"Is there anything for me my lord?", Albedo asked blushing.

"Actually can you come over here please?", you asked her politely. Her smile grew and did as you asked. The proximity from her felt strange, you could smell her, feel her body heat, her own breath tickling your face from her excessive panting.

"May I touch you Albedo?"

"My lord! I never dreamed you would take me so soon, I am in awe of your forwardness!", she said in total crazed bliss.

"NO! I mean I just need to touch your body and that's it! 'What did she mean by take her?' Just don't be so excited."

"Afraid I may have trouble with that command my lord."

"Maybe not take that remark so literally.", you placed your hand on her shoulder and trailed it down her arm all the way to her hand. This was honest to god real. She was alive. "That will be all Albedo.", you said getting up from the chair. You noticed the staff was still in hand, it hadn't occurred to you if your powers still worked as it did in the game. You let go of it to see if it still acted like normal. Luckily it seemed fine, but this required a test.

"Albedo, gather the guardians in the 6th floor.", you then used a teleport ring had equipped to go right to the 6th floor. "Good I can still use my items. Now where are those twin elves? You know I'm technically an elf and yet never met those two I wonder what they're like."

When you walked out of the hall leading to the 6th floor you saw it was a giant battle arena. When you were in the center one of the Dark Elf twins came to greet you. "Greetings lord Black! It was great to finally meet you."

"Always nice to see a fellow dark elf. And your name?"

"Aura Bella Fiora."

"I see and where is your twin?"

"Oh my brother is over there. MARE! Get your butt over here!"

"I'm fine over here thanks."

"MARE!"

"OK!", he replied frightened.

"Oh geez. Those freaks made them cross-dressers didn't they?", you realized as Mare ran to you and you examined Mare's clothing.

"Hello lord Black.", Mare greeted you.

"Yes, anyway you two I would like to have you both perform a test for me."

"What test?", Mare asked worried.

"Simple, I'm going to summon a monster and you will destroy it. Think you can handle that?"

"Of course Lord Black!", Aura replied.

"Good.", you looked at the staff and took a moment to admire the power you and the other guild members spent creating it. You focused on what spell you wanted to cast, then yelled it out. "SUMMON FIRE ELEMENTAL!"

Out of the ground the beast engulfed in flames arose exactly like in the game. "This proves all of the magic works like before. and the NPCs seem to be just as powerful like in the original game.

Just then you received a message. "A message?! From the Administrators?!", you answered it hoping it would be, "My lord", with those two words those hopes were dashed away. You may have been excited to be here with all the power, but some answers on why you are here would be nice to know as well. "Yes Sebas, what news do you have?"

"It is rather a large problem, perhaps you should see for yourself."

"Come to the 6th floor, the other guardians must be made aware of this new development."

"As you wish."
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Continue...

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
With the twins having already defeating the elemental more guardians started arriving. You noticed a portal open revealing the lovely True Vampire Shalltear Bloodfallen. "Well, it seems I am the first to arrive."

You knew she wasn't real but you still had a crush on Shalltear, having a fondness for goth women, but now that she was now alive you wondered if the idea might be worth trying. "Shalltear, my darling.", you regretted those words since you forgot you have never interacted with Shalltear before. In-game you did go and train with her to max out your exp. But never fully interacting with her since talking to NPCs was only just recently added in, or so it seems.

"AHHH! A supreme being flirting with me? Oh my. Lord I knew we grew close during your time rising through the ranks but surely you jest.", Shalltear blushed waving air into her face. Apparently time you spent with the NPCs was in their memory, interesting fact.

"Eh, forgive me. My joy to see you got a little exaggerated.", you replied.

"My lord the others have arrived.", Albedo called out. Two other guardians walked behind her, Cocytus, a bug warrior with very powerful martial arts stats. Demiurge, a demon lord who is like the tomb's second in command should it ever be in crisis. With all of them gathered before you, they all began pledging their fidelity.

“To me! My loyal followers.", they all bowed their heads and called out to you pledging their undying loyalty to you. This was it, you had control over the rest of the tomb and everything in it. You became sucked into the role and started reveling in it. "As the sole remaining supreme being here, I will command the tower from this day forward! You all shall obey my commands and become the very extensions of my power!”

"We hear and obey, all hail Elven Black!", the guardians shouted.

“NO! That name no longer has meaning for me. I have decided to change my name, Elven Black died when I became the last to lead this tomb. We are in a new era for Naverick. From this moment on I am Lord Ravage Norfleet!”

“We pledge our loyalty to you Lord Ravage Norfleet!”, they all shouted even louder than before.

“Rise my loyal guardians.”

“My lord you look so marvelous, I do find you to be so, authoritative.”, Shalltear complimented.

“Your words are wasted on me.”, you answered back.

“What do you command of us, my lord?”, Albedo asked.

"If I may Lord.", Sebas appeared. You believed this would be good to hear his findings.

"WHAT? The tomb has been transported?!", you reacted.

"Yes. By what we have no knowledge of. And it is in plain view since there is not much to hide ourselves in with the surrounding area.", Sebas reported.

"Very well. Mare I want you to hide us from the outside world. Do whatever you have to, camouflage the walls with the the vegetation in the area, and make sure were are not out of the ordinary with some illusion magic."

"As you wish, but if I may. Should I set up dummy hills to help us blend in?"

"Yes, actually that will be perfect. Magic will only get us so far, the less smoke and mirrors we need the better. Excellent call Mare.", you said with benevolence. “Now then, the world in which we inhabit now is new to us. Which means we were pulled in by unknown forces. To be frank I do not know what we will discover or what lies within this foreign territory. But I do know what we can expect to see from it, MYSELF AS IT’S SUPREME MASTER!”

The guardians were in awe of your new goal. “Incredible my lord. You truly believe we can accomplish this?”, Demiurge asked.

“We were the most unbeatable force in Yggdrasil. This is not chance that we were pulled into this, but a test. To see exactly how worthy of our power we are.”

"What makes you say that?"

"Why else? Nobody stood equal to us in Yggdrasil. Surely a new challenge must be met. I intend to pave way for Nazarick's future. I will grant you all a goal worthy of our unstoppable power. We will rule this one, and lead it into an eternal rule under our banner. And should I ever leave to join the other supreme beings, never you fear. A line of descendants for you to follow will be granted for you. Making my rule immortal!"

“Your words of wisdom pierce through our doubts my lord.”, Albedo said.

"Before I allow you all to fulfill my orders, I have a question for each of you. How do you all see me exactly?", as if compensating for the fact you were handed this role you wondered if they truly felt you were worthy of the role of leader.

The twins started off with Mare being the first, "You are a firm but fair leader, you started from nothing and now our leader."

Aura was next, "Someone who never gives up even with the odds stacked against him."

Cocytus followed, "A fierce warrior in spirit as well as in battle. If Lord Momonga lend you this role, it would only be due to you being equally worthy to lead us into battle as he was."

"A prodigy that makes you a force to be reckoned with, also your passive nature makes your actions near impossible to predict.", Demiurge said.

"You stayed with us until the end, you were just as loyal to us as Lord Momonga and graciously serving us as justly as we do you.", Sebas answered.

Albedo chimed in next, "You are one of the highest ranking supreme beings, our master and ruler of Nazarick, as well as the captivator of my heart!"

Lastly, "You are a tremendous and heartwarming man to Nazarick as only few would ever see past any faults between that and true beauty.", Shalltear praised.

"I shall leave for now, do as I command. And rejoice, for the true fight of our lives begins today!", you said teleportating to your quarters.

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
"You, come here.", the vampire who singled you out was a tall woman vampire with a large bust and long blonde hair. Followed by her was a younger looking vampire with pink hair and a slightly older one with blue hair dressed in a maid looking outfit.

The other two vampires picked their meals and those unfortunate to be picked out walked toward them. The vampires hugged them for a moment, until the bared their fangs and bit into their necks. Blood leaking out and coating their vicious teeth, seeing that you were next you tried to make a run for it. You shoved any kid out of your way and frantically tried to run as far away as you could, hide somewhere, hope they forget-

"Naughty boy. You didn't honestly think you could runaway?", the vampire who pointed you out said arrogantly.

"NO! I don't want to die! Please!", you yelled crying and pleading.

"Hmm? What would you be willing to give me in exchange?", she chuckled.

"Anything!", you didn't care you just wanted to live. Seeing the others killed so gruesomely terrified you. Any price was better than that.

"I'm hungry though. I need to eat. Would you be willing to put another child in your place?", she asked.

You looked at the other kids, you grew up with them. Condemning them to that fate was too high. Anything else. Surely there must be something else. "No! Is there anything else? I'll do what spares them and keeps me alive!"

"You foolishly demand much out of me, boy. But there is one compromise that fits both of your demands, in part."

"I'll take it!"

"You will hmm. I like the sound of that. You promised me boy, so deliver it, gnahahhahaahhaha."

The last thing you see is her fangs diving toward your neck. The pain, the feeling of your life ebbing away. She lied. She...

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
You woke up. You were in a nice bed, and the room was dimly lit. As you started to get up, you felt strange, it felt like you had woken from a long nights sleep only felt sick as soon as you woke up. Your mouth felt bitter. You breathed but the inside of your body felt hollow. You felt something hurt inside your mouth, you felt around with your tongue and noticed two sharp daggers in your front teeth. You tried pulling them out but when you took a second to feel them, you realized they were connected to your gums.

You knew what this meant but you were too afraid to accept the fact.

“Welcome to your new life.”, one of the vampires from earlier came to greet you. The young pink haired vampire who you saw sucking the blood from one of the others. You staggered back from your bed afraid.

“Calm down. Your in your new home.”, she said kindly.

“What happened to me?”, you asked.

“My friend made you an offer, which you accepted. You wanted to live, she gave it to you. A much different one though.”

“You… turned me into one of you…”

“I know it feels scary now, but trust me, you will learn to like it.”

Your heart sank, the irreversible fact has been spelled out for you. You regretted sparring the others from being eaten. You were a monster for the rest of your life. It felt like when you felt sick in your body, and your most depressing moment in your life. As you moved and got used to this new sensation, it was like those moments were the norm for your body.

“It will feel hard to get used to unless you feed. I assumed that you would feel terrible, most who are newly transformed often do. Here.”, she offered you a glass of what looked like, BLOOD! You swung it out of her hand, spilling it and breaking the glass.

“I’m a little hurt. I offer you my blood to drink from as your first taste into our way of life. And you reject it so swiftly.”

“I want to leave!”

“Oh no no no. You see, we own you. You wanted to live. So now you will serve us, more accurately, you serve me.”

“You’re just a kid too!”

“Oh you think Horn was the one in charge. She’s my subordinate. I’m actually 700 years old. She hasn’t been a vampire nearly as long as I have. Ah! That reminds me my name is Krul. And yours?”

“(Nnn-Name).”

“Well. Walk with me (Name).”

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
You paced down a long hallway where you saw vampires taller and much more sinister looking than Krul and Horn. Despite being one of them, you still felt terrified of them and their domineering presence. “Don’t be frightened, they are your kind now. They will pose no harm to you.”, Krul said trying to reassure you, but the looks you were getting made you believe otherwise.

“Krul, Horn has been wondering if her new pet has woken up.”

“Funny you should mention him, Chess meet (Name), our newest member to our society.”

“Ick! Why did she play with her food and just eat him? He looks worse off than he did as livestock.”

“Chess, behave yourself. He’s scared and all alone. His only friends now are the ones who remade his life. Surely you can be a little more decent.”

“If he is a good fit, then perhaps.”

“Fine. Where is Horn?”
“In the next room waiting for him.”

“Excellent. Come along (Name).”

Before Krul opened the door you asked her something that was buzzing in your mind, “Krul?”, she stopped herself for a second to listen.

“What?”

“Will I be forced to kill other people like you did earlier tonight?”

“I think you already know the answer.”, she opened the door and Horn, the vampire responsible for your transformation sat in a chair, with another vampire sitting across from her. It was a tall red head male vampire who from what you could tell, was sizing you up.

“Crowley, this is (Name).”

“Hmm? The new recruit. He is quite young.”

“He is, but he has promise. It takes a large amount of courage to try and bargain for your own life with a vampire.”, Krul replied.

“Is it bravery or cowardice?”

“Cowardice from what it looks like. Look at him, he’s shacking.”, Chess answered.

“I figured since he showed such audacity perhaps he could be well groomed to be one of us. He has something to allow him to appear before us.”, Horn insisted.

“Hmm. He could be a powerful ally. But ultimately it is Krul’s choice if she wants to bring him in. Personally I don’t mind so long as he isn’t more trouble than he’s worth.”, Corwley said.

“I say we keep him around. Train him. See if he has what it takes to at least fair against our enemies. If he performs below our expectations, we’ll leave him to starve. Fair compromise?”

“I will take him.”, Horn offered.

“Of course, but I will watch his growth. I will pass judgement to see if he will ever earn to be among us.”

“Do you object, (Name)?”

You had your head hung over, what choice did you have? “No.”
