1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
In the ruins of Tokyo Japan….

“Sir a vampire is approaching.”

“Take him out.”

The soldier rushed against the vampire with a large lance-like weapon, instead of hitting the vampire, the lance grinded against the metal of the blood sucker’s own weapon. A cross guard sword, with an appearance of a cross. The vampire struck back with deadly precision and power. In just a few swings he cut down the human soldier. The other one tried to escape but the vampire appeared right in front of the terrified young man. The human tried attacking the vampire, but unable to hit either blade or body. The soldier’s last swing was cut off by the vampire’s own grasp, the vampire pulled the human helplessly over him with the weakling kicking his feet trying to reach the ground.

“Good work, doesn’t he look delicious? I can smell his adrenaline from here. Take a bite, embrace your nature.”, a voice coming from behind the vampire holding the human.

The vampire let go, moving aside. “Very well, one vile of blood to make up for your payment.”, then out of nowhere another vampire grabbed the human and bit into his neck. After the vampire drank the human dry, it gave the other one a vile as promised.

Out of the shadows came Horn Skuld, wiping the blood off her mouth. “Excellent work, my dear (Name).”

A few years had passed, by now you were a permanent addition of Krul’s team. You were proficient with a crossguard sword and served as Horn’s personal bodyguard. You haven’t fully accepted to your vampire side yet. But you have been quenching your thirst for blood through Horn’s blood, much to her objection. Your emotions have grown more and more lost as time passes. You have lost almost all semblance of joy, and only find solace in sleep. The only time when you can picture and recapture the last few moments before your transformation. The nightmares of your transformation haunt you, as your biggest regret looms over you.

You had just finished crushing a small rebellion of humans who have been defying the vampires. And your fellow vampires congratulated you on your success.

“Beautiful work (Name). You have truly become part of this unit.”, Krul congratulated.

“You surprised me today. Any chance you want to celebrate the fruits of your victory?”, Chess said flirtatiously.

“If anyone is going to celebrate with him, it should be his master.”, Horn intervened.

“Were finished here. Have Crowley, set squad to take the survivors to the camps.”, you answered. You walked away from them.

“He hasn’t fully embrace his nature yet?”, Krul said puzzled.

“He just does what I tell him to do. Nothing else.”, Horn replied.

“A shame. He has a long life ahead of him. Chess, you seem to fancy him.”

“I admire his, decisiveness in battle. Brings out a certain cute feature in him.”, Chess answered blushing.

Meanwhile…

As you were wandering in the ruins of what was once a great city teeming with life, and an example of humanity’s achievement, you sensed someone following you. “What do you ask of me?”

“You’re getting weaker. When you ran off, I noticed you drank that vile as if you had never drank anything in your life.”, Horn stated.

“You’ve been cutting off my supply of blood. I give you one human per day on the battlefield in exchange for one weeks worth. But now its one human per vile?”

“Let’s cut the charade. You need to stop denying your nature. I am tired of feeding you my blood. It is time you embrace what you have become. That vile is the final one I will give you. From now on, you must feed on the real source of strength.”

“Why?! I’ve served you faithfully. I demand-“

“What? You making demands? Do you forget? Who you even owe your life to?”

“I have forgotten nothing. But why now?”, you demanded to know.

“Because Chess and I have grown fond of you. We want you to stop pretending and be one of us.”

“Fond? Fond how?”

“Need I spell it out? Chess, and me, have grown attracted to you. And we all agree that your attempts to stay as human as possible have grown stale now.”

“You knew me when I was only a boy. Now you think of me like that?”

“Age is irrelevant to us. The heart likes what it likes. And as far as I have seen. Your only source of pleasure is by dishing out your blade against the humans.”

“I won’t become like you.”

“You will have little choice. Soon the starvation will consume you. Either you become a mindless monster, or revert to a full vampire and become immortal. It is your choice. I don’t require your affection or my permission, only that you continue to perform what I need.”, she said leaving you.

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
With no one left to turn to, you sought help from your leader, the Vampire Queen of Japan, Krul Tepes. “(Name)? What is it?”

“I wish to drink your blood.”, you requested.

“Well now. Years ago you refused mine so disrespectfully. But now?”

“Horn has cut me off from her blood. She won’t give me hers anymore. She’s pushing me into being a full vampire.”, you explained.

“Can’t say I blame her. You had to have known she wasn’t going to let you keep it up forever.”

“It’s not just that.”, you hesitated to tell her but you came out with it anyway, “Her blood hasn’t been enough these past few days. I’m hurting even now. I thought your blood as a queen might be able to satisfy my craving.”

“You wish to take my blood? I don’t know. Horn and Chess prefer you to embrace your vampire side. They have grown to fancy you quite a bit.”

“I don’t feel any joy or pleasure anymore. I just want the blood.”

“If I were, what would you offer me?”, she said forcing you into a deal you knew would strip you even less of your old self.

“What can I give that don’t already have?!”

“Your companionship. If you want my blood I want you to be mine. It would put me one up over Horn.”, she mocked.

“You all disgust me. How much lower do you want me to sink?!”

“Either that or you starve. But tell me, why do you continue to prolong your turn into a full vampire?”, she asked. Her tone shifted indicating she was serious in her questioning.

“I let Horn turn me because I wanted to live. Now I have lost my reason to live at all. What is the point when all I have is just a lifeless shell continuing to kill my own kind?”

“You're not them anymore, remember you chose this life because you wanted to survive. We have done much of that in our history. In fact, I did my share for a majority of my life. Most of the others were turned much earlier than I. But do you know why they enjoy it?

"No. Tell me. What enjoyment lets them kill them so easily?"

"When you accept being a vampire. All of your old senses are charged to their fullest potential. Many say live life to the fullest. Every second, is that moment humans try and isolate for a moment."

"But where is the joy in it?!"

"When you embrace that euphoria, (Name) many who turn are often drunk on this feeling. Years of trying to keep it make the memories of your old life fade away with enough time. I know you have been feeling more cold recently. But take things into perspective, me and Horn's team have cared and fought beside you for years. You may deny it but you have a bond with them. Tell me, do you think you could find happiness with us?”, Krul asked.

“If I were honest, it would be in paradise. I deny these senses their full power. Now every day I get a taste for it and it hurts everyday I hold it back. I’ve fought along side you and the others for years. The only family I have, sad is it is. If I became a full vampire, maybe I could learn to live again. Again as the irony sets in.”

“You have only so much strength to last as long as you have. Believe it or not, we do care for you (Name).”

You left. You're blood thirst was calling again. You needed blood. You had only two options right now, you could try to steal blood from another vampire or unleash your desires and finally feast on a human.

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
You were a boy that was born from a clan of shinobi. You were trained and raised to become a strong ninja to uphold your family's legacy. Your mother was a great shinobi in her own right, so she was the one who trained you on everything there was to become a ninja. The training was hard and your mother was strict, but you were able to push through and grow stronger and better as a ninja. Unfortunately you were still a novice, so it wasn't enough for your mother. She wanted to become one of the best ninja in the world just like her was to make her proud of you. So your mother decided to send you to a place to take your training to the next level. Hanzo Academy.

At first some people in your clan were against it, for a lot of reasons. The one that stood out most of all was the fact that you were a male. The ninja that were trained at Hanzo were all girls and sending a boy over to that school to train was unheard of. They were probably worried that you would end up fooling around with the girls there. But your mother still sent you to Hanzo for she thought that there was no room for that sort of thing in the ways of the ninja. All that mattered was completing your mission and becoming a strong shinobi. The head of the school also accepted you and so it was arranged. You would enrolled into the academy, but not before you passed a final test first. Your mission? To infiltrate and steal a secret scroll containing secret arts. You would be graded based on your performance.

It was a dark night with the moon shining above. In a small building in the middle of town, many guards stood alert keeping an eye out for any enemy. In the entrance of the building, two guards stood standing guard.

"Make sure you keep a sharp eye out," one said. "Don't let your guard down for even a moment."

"Understood," said the other. "There's no way that kid's gonna get his hands on that scroll. Not without getting past us first."

Keeping vigilant, they continued to stand by the gate. Then suddenly, the guards saw something move close to the trash cans. One guard immediately went on guard and shone their flashlight at the bushes. A startled cat yowled at the guard and ran away into the darkness.

"Oh man. It was just a rabbit," the first guard said.

"Poor thing," said the second. "I feel kinda bad for scaring it."

"It'll be fine," said the first. "At least we didn't hurt it."

Then the guard returned standing guard in front of the gate. What the didn't know was that cat was distraction. Just behind them past the door hiding from them behind the door was you. You were able to sneak past them while they were occupied by the rabbit you set up hiding your presence.

"Too easy," he thought. "Guess that trick worked after all."

You pulled up your mask covering your lower face and ran through the halls of the building. Pretty soon you were in a big and spacious room. You hid behind a corner of the hallway and peeked out. You could see the scroll in the middle of the room standing on a pedestal. There were lots of guards in that room all standing around on high alert. Not to mention there was a couple of lasers here and there. If you tripped on even one of them then it would all over.

"Damn it. Looks like security's even tighter than it was before. I gotta catch them off guard."

You looked around and you saw a guard. He was standing in front of a door that said 'Maintenance. This gave you an idea. You dug into your pocket and pulled out a small tube which is also known as blowgun and a small needle laced in something yellow. You took careful aim, took a big breath and blew. The needle shot out and hit one of the guard that was walking around right on his neck. The ninja clasped his neck and pulled out the needle. Then he fell over unconscious. You grabbed the guard by his legs and dragged him into the maintenance then shut the door behind you. Then you took off his clothes and put them on while putting your clothes on the guard.

"All right. Now for the next part," you thought to yourself.

You turned to the circuit breakers which controlled the power and the building went completely dark. You heard a commotion outside the room.

"Hey! Who cut the power?!"

"It's gotta be him! He somehow got into the building!"

"He's gotta be in the maintenance room! Quick! Everybody head over there before he escapes."

You immediately went to the door and banged on it and made noise like you were struggling. Then you got on top of the guard like you were putting him in a hold just as the door opened and multiple guards came into the room.

"Hey! Help me out here guys!" you said pretending to be the guard. "I got the suspect apprehended!"

"Nice work! We'll take it from here!" said one of the guards.

They all got on the guard that was dressed like you thinking he was the culprit. Seizing your chance, you then quickly stepped out of the room pulled out a small ball. You threw it in there and then shut the door locking it behind you and breaking the knob. In a few seconds the door began to leak out smoke.

"That takes care of that," you thought. "Now to take care of the rest of them."

"Hey! What's going on over there?"

Your head snapped to the voice and there running towards you was a guard. When he saw you he was about to scream to alert the other guards, you immediately took out your blowgun, loaded some needles and fired one at the guard hitting him right on his neck. The guard reeled back and them fell to the floor unconscious. You looked over to where the scroll was and saw that there was at least a few guards left and they all heard the commotion.

"Hey! It's him! Sound the alarm!"

"Oh no you don't!" you thought and fired a couple more needles. Before the guards had a chance to react, the needles struck them all in their necks and then fell unconscious. You let out a sigh of relief.

"That was too close," you said. "Now all I have to do is get the scroll and I don't even have to worry about the lasers."

You went over to the scroll and were just about to take it, but then you hesitated.

"Wait a minute. Now that I think about it, this was way to easy. What if I'm walking right into a trap?"

You carefully looked around trying to see if there was something that you missed. The only thing you could see were the guards lying unconscious on the floor. Then you grabbed the scroll and put in your pocket.

Then suddenly, out of the shadows a smoke bomb rolled out and exploded covering the area in smoke. When the smoke cleared, you eyes widened in shock. You were completely surrounded by ninjas. If you had to make a guess as to how many there were, you had to say that there was at least two dozen of them.

"Damn it all," you muttered. "I should've known it was too easy."

"All right you," said a ninja wielding her sword. "It's over. Hand over the scroll or you're gonna get hurt."

You took a stance and prepared to yourself. You had one of two options. To either make a break for it or fight every ninja here and then make your escape. Then after a few seconds of thinking...

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
"OK, OK. You got me," you said calmly slowly walking forward. "Guess you can take it now."

You dug into your shirt making it seem like you were gonna pull out the scroll. You dug through your shirt until you found a smoke bomb in your shirt.

"OK then," you thought. "I only have a couple of these so I better make them count. I can't afford to fail this mission."

"Hurry up!" snapped a ninja. "We ain't got all day."

You looked at the ninja and pulled out your grenade in your shirt.

"You want it? You asked for it!" you shouted as you threw your grenade straight into the ground. With a loud bang, smoke billowed everywhere covering the entire area. You immediately ran towards the other room and leaped on top of the railing above. Then you jumped towards the ceiling grabbing a hold of a metal beam flipping yourself up and getting on top of of it. You ran towards one of the windows and jumped straight at it crossing your arms. You broke through the window and landed outside in a roll. You then broke into a run trying to get as far away as you could. You thought you had given the ninjas the slip, but then you heard the the pittter-patter of multiple feet coming from beside on your left and right. You quickly looked beside you both ways and saw that the ninja were in hot pursuit of you.

"Damn it! I should've known that they wouldn't be thrown off by that," you thought.

You leaped off the rooftop falling a couple feet until you landed on another rooftop. The ninja landed in front of you cutting you off each one throwing a shuriken or kunai. You dodged by using a back handspring multiple times before landing on your feet on the next building. Immediately a ninja jumped and went straight you with her ninja sword raised. You quickly drew one of your own and raised it blocking the blow. Both swords locked with a sharp clang grinding against each other sending small sparks. Using your strength, you pushed the ninja back sending her stumbling and then falling to the ground.

Dodge!

Following your instincts, you leaped up again dodging two weighted Kusarigamas. You landed on the next building and made a break for it again.

Block!

Raising your small sword, you rapidly slashed deflecting multiple shuriken that shot out at you. Two other ninjas threw their Kusarigamas, big sickles with chains attached to the ends. You leaped out of the way dodging once again into the air and landed on your feet. You straightened up just as the ninjas landed in front of you. With the ninjas in front and the edge of the roof behind you, you were trapped like a rat.

"This is getting me nowhere," you thought. "I have to ditch these girls and get to the destination. On the other hand, I can't just use my smoke bomb in an urban area like this. I gotta give them the slip."

Making a quick decision, you jumped backwards off the ledge.

"What the hell?!"

"Is that guy crazy?!"

"Don't just stand there! After him!"

You ignored the ninjas shouts of surprise as you dove straight down towards the ground below with the ninjas falling after you. Each one used a small string with a grappling hook to catch themselves so they wouldn't fall to the ground below. This was what you were waiting for. At the last minute, you saw a flagpole on the side of the building. You grabbed the pole and did a horizontal bar flip like an olympian launching yourself up. You zipped past the ninjas and then you threw your shuriken cutting the strings holding the ninjas up. Not having anything holding them up, the ninjas fell to the ground below. You landed back on the roof and then bolted away as fast as you could before the ninjas could get back up on the roof.

"I can't believe that worked," you said. "Now I can hopefully get to my destination without any trouble."

You ran across rooftop to rooftop until you saw your destination in sight. You destination was a local subway station. When you got the scroll, you were instructed to catch a ride on one of the trains and head back to your place and wait until further instruction.

"Looks like I'm in the clear," you said to yourself. "All I need to do is get on top of one of those trains and it's mission accomplished."

You jumped on the roof of the station and looked around at each train trying to remember which train you to jump on.

"Now... Let's see... if I recall correctly, I think the train that I'm supposed to catch is around here somewhere," you muttered to yourself.

You looked at each train searching for the right one. Then you saw the train you were looking for. It was blue with a white stripe on it's sides and it was about to leave the station.

"Crap. I better get on," you said as you ran towards the train. You prepared to jump, but suddenly a chain shot out and wrapped you around your arm.

"Shit!"

Then another one wrapped on your other arm and a ninja landed on both of your sides holding the chains that wrapped your arms. You pulled trying to break free, but the chains held you tight. You moved to pull out something from your shirt, but suddenly two more ninja landed in front and behind you and pointed their blades dangerously at you. One from behind pointed her blade at your neck and the other pointed her blade at your lower area.

"Don't even try it."

"Take one false move and you'll get neutered."

You gritted your teeth and did as you were told. Then one more ninja landed. She walked towards you until she was a few feet away from you. She dug into your shirt until she pulled out the scroll that you were supposed to take. All you could was stand there not able to move unless you wanted to die.

"Well, well. Looks like this is the end for you kid," she said. "I'll give you credit though, you were a lot tougher than expected and you almost got away with it, but sadly you failed this test."

She then dug in her outfit and then blew powder right in your face. You screamed as you were temporarily blinded holding your eyes in pain and also coughing. You left the chains loosen on your arms and the ninjas blades of you. You couldn't see anything at first, but eventually you regained your vision. There was not a soul to be found with you the only one standing there.

"Damn it," you said "They managed to get the drop on me."

A person going through what you just went through would be upset for letting the ninjas take the scroll back, but you grinned. You dug into your left calf in your outfit and pulled out a scroll. This was the real scroll. Back when you were in the building where the scroll was stored, you hid the scroll in your outfit and had a fake one in case that you had the scroll taken from you.

"Heh. They fell for it," you said yourself wearing a victorious smirk. "Good thing I had a fake just in case. I may have had to endure a little pain, but it was worth it. Now then, I better get out of here before they realize it's a fake."

You tucked the scroll in your ninja shirt and jumped onto the train just as it was leaving the station. As the train sped along, you pulled out an earpiece and put it on your ear. You pressed a button on it and spoke into it.

"This is (name) reporting. Mission Accomplished."
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: You make your escape

choices: "We come on to him with heavy loads of flirtation!"
"We just go and talk to him."
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
You were on a boat heading for Hanzou Academy. After your mission you were assigned to head there infiltrate it and hone your skills as your mother instructed. Dead to rights you knew this would be a challenge as you never faced socializing with girls your own age. You didn't know what to think, but you knew they were a force to be reckoned with. In reality you were daft to attraction of the opposite sex altogether. You've never had any flirt with you, talk, or so much as hug you so you were in uncharted waters.

Still things were looking optimistic. You finally reached the academy and met with your teacher adviser. He was an old guy with white hair and wore all black. "Hello Kiriya."

"Ah Mr. (Name). Happy to meet you.", you two shook hands, "I taught your mother here and she was a good student here. I'm holding you to a higher standard, Specifically behaving among the other students."

"Don't worry I just talk, train, and be polite to them like any other person. I don't need the experience."

"On having a decent reputation but i assure you, here you will be accumulating all the experience needed when handling life's greatest mystery. Women."

"That bad huh?"

"Depends. Now this room will be your dorm and here are your roommates. Oh by the way, eyes up here.", he warned pointing at his own eyes.

Soon as he opened the door 3 girls were all lined up. The first was a small girl with pink hair and eyes, looked very young for a ninja. Second was a tall blonde, with blue sapphire eyes. Next to her was a medium tall tan girl with brown hair.

The small one introduced herself first, " Hi I'm Hibari!"

The third one spoke next, "I'm Asuka."

"And I'm Katsuragi! Great to have a boy all to ourselves!"

"My name is (Name). Nice to meet you three."

"Ok introductions are out. I'll leave you to get settled as I return with your next assignment.", Kiriya said as he left the room.

"So why you here in an all girls academy?"

You couldn't answer to maintain secrecy so you made up a random explanation, "I asked for it and said please!", you said acting like a big-shot when you were only making an ass of yourself.

"Liar.", Asuka replied.

"I buy it.", Hibari followed.

"Could that work if I transferred?", Katsuagi asked to herself.

An awkward pause filled up after that last comment. "I'll just unpack.", you walked away sheepishly.

The girls then huddled in secret, "What do you think? A spy?", Asuka questioned.

"Too cute to be one.", Hibari answered.

"Cute how?", Asuka asked.

"The funny kind.", Katsuagi replied.

"Nobody can fake being funny cute. He's clear.", Hibari followed.

"So what then?", Asuka asked.

"Are we going to fight over him?", Hibari followed.

"He's cute, I'd least want one date.", Katsuagi replied.

"He's worth two.", Asuka said.

"Relationship level?", Hibari questioned.

"That level of funny cute?", Katsuagi followed equally curious.

"Possibly. Deserves further investigating.", Asuka replied now getting on the wagon.

"Are we all going to conduct our own investigations?", Katsuagi asked believing this may be war between the three of them.

"Every girl for themselves?", Hibari wanted clarified.

"Hell yeah.", Katsuagi answered.

"Not to get in bed with him right?", Asuka asked making sure they weren't going too far.

"Hell no, never think that far on the first impression.", Katsuagi replied.

"Just dating?", Hibari asked.

"Just dating.", they all said at the same time.

"How do we get his attention?", Asuka asked.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Group Huddle

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
They all said in unison. Strangely they were all on the same page yet with them forming some strong and sudden opinions. "So guys what do you think Ikaruga and Yagyu will think? We have adjoining rooms and were all friends. What do you think they'll say?", Asuka asked.

"I doubt they'll be as invested as we are.", Katsugari replied.

"Ohh I wonder how his skills are.", Hibari thought aloud excitedly.

"Funny you brought that up, because that reminded me of yesterday. Remember the whole spirit animal business?", Asuka mentioned.

"Oh yeah, how'd it go?", Hibari asked.

"I managed to get a grasp on it, but me and Ikaruga were attacked by an enemy ninja."

"Whoa! Is she alright?", Katsugari reacted.

"I don't know about Ikaruga, but Yagyu told me she was just blowing off steam."

"Well we better ease our new guy to the news. And then we get friendly?", Katsugari suggested.

"Ditto.", Hibari and Asuka replied.

You were still unpacking but you got a little nervous. They seemed very social, a quality you weren't prepared for, at least in terms of gender. You thought to just act serious until the end. That way it could be easier to keep them guessing. But then maybe it would draw too much attention and feel like you were honestly infiltrating the academy. Which you still were technically.

And the danger wasn't just those three, there still were other ninja that you might encounter throughout your time there. In any event the fact that this would be your greatest mission finally got through to you. Then you heard a knock on your door, you pretty much finished unpacking so now you had to start with creating the act. You opened the door to see...
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: The current situation

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
"HI!", they all said.

"YAAA!", you came dangerously close to attacking them through sheer reflex. "Never do that again! How do I know you were about to kill me just now?!"

"Hahahaha. You call yourself a ninja?", Katsugari joked.

"Considering I just managed not to slice you all open, I figure the answer is YES!"

"No not that, I mean you call your self a ninja after reacting like a 5 year-old? I'd expect a, 'Be less noisy in the future', or a, 'Knock 4 times to know you mean informal conversation. But instead we get a, 'Don't scare me like thaaaaaat, I could have killed you guuuuyyyyyysss'.", the girls all laughed at Katsugari's joke. You stood there and looked both embarrassed and quite ticked.

You slammed the door in their faces, the girls then quickly snapped out of their fit of laughter. "Hey c'mon we were just teasing.", Asuka said.

"Awww please come out. We won't tease you again.", Hibari followed.

"Hey (Name), I'm sorry for busting your chops but honestly I didn't mean to offend. Fresh start?", Katsugari apologized.

You opened the door, "You can make it up to me when we train."

"What's the terms?", Katsugair asked.

"If I beat all of you, alone, I get first choice for mission assignments for the next week.", you wagered.

"And if, ALL, of us win.", Asuka stated hinting the other girls off of something, "We get first pick, AND, you take one of the winners out for a date!"

"Huh?", you reacted. You were inexperienced but you knew what that meant! "Do I choose the date?"

"Why? You want to lose that badly to get someone alone with you? Hehhehehe.", Katsugair giggled with Hibari and Asuka.

You were blushing a little bit, "NO! I- I mean no. I just would prefer it not be someone random. I don't want to be pulled into a 9th circle of hell in the off chance I lost.", you stated.

"Crushing hard on someone already? Ooooohhhhhhh.", Hibari teased.

"I already said I ain't planning to lose."

"You think you can take everyone in our group?", Asuka goaded.

"Yes."

"Right now?"

"Any-time!"

"Great! Now?!"

"YES!"

"NOW!"

1 minute later...

"What the &*^% was I thinking?", you said. You were expecting 3 on 1. Instead they brough two more. Unknown to you, they had two other friends that they meant by their group. You had handled 3 ninjas in the past, all were quite skilled. But that was when you had ways of compensating for the disadvantage of numbers. A full-on fight against 5 competent ninja that you have had no experience fighting? Clearly you needed to be smacked upside the head because no inexperience with women would be excuse enough to be this stupid.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Note to self: Women don't make you think rationaly

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
The training arena had been accommodated for a 5 to 1 fight. The teachers were watching all with their degrees of interest and varying degrees of optimism. Hibari, Asuka, and Katsugari had lined up front and center. Their other two friends, Yagyu and Ikaruga were in second position. They all agreed to this formation to at least have the fight be fair for a little while.

You had only 3 weapons to choose from which consisted of some smoke pellets, a blow-dart, and your signature weapon, a pair of ninja claws. A glove consisting of two blades around the knuckle. With just these matching against the 5 others, whose skill and weapons you had no idea of you had only a single plan to fall on when the battle commenced.

3...2....1!

The teacher rang the gong and everyone was now in full battle mode. Asuka charged first she pulled out a pair of small katanas from her waist and started with a clean diagonal slash from the bottom left. You countered her slash by managing to get both her blades stuck in between one of your claws, then proceeded with a horizontal uppercut. Asuka leaned back missing the blades, she wrapped around you looping her arms around your upper body, using the claws as a way into your defenses. She held her swords to your neck smirking at how easily you were beaten.

"Thinking of where you're gonna take me? Figured the one who does you in, gets to be the lucky lady.", she teased.

"On the contrary.", you replied. Just then Asuka heard something fall to the ground, it was a smoke pellet that just as she noticed surrounded her and you in smoke. Hibari in an attempt to help Asuka ran into the smoke with one of the other girls, Ikaruga following her into it. Yagyu and Katsugari held back from going in, either too afraid or too cautious to enter it.

The smoke was very thick and large, a deliberate move hoping to take them by surprise. Asuka lost her grip leaving herself to wander aimlessly through the smoke. She kept her guard up trying to find you. "No fair! This is meant to be a REAL fight!'', she complained.

"Ninja's best strength isn't force.", you said whispering in the smoke. Asuka felt a quick pain in her arm. She rubbed it to find a little needle sticking out. "It's stealth.", you finished appearing in front of her. Her eyes peeled over and collapsed right on the floor.

"Asuka! Asuka! Cough! Where-", without taking any chances you used your blow-dart to fire another needle at Hibari. She got nipped in the leg by it and squealed in pain from the sharp pinch it made. Real quickly she as well passed out.

You got a little overconfident seeing how you knocked out two out of five but suddenly, you heard a sword being unsheathed from their hilt. Ikaruga tried cutting you from behind, however you blocked the attack holding your forearms up.

"Coward! Using cheap tactics to win?", Ikaruga said.

"When your best element is only stealth, you use it whenever you can. And when you can't find it, you make it!", you acknowledged. "After all I am a bit outnumbered."

"You won't hide from me in here.", she said confidently. She pressed the attack and wailed away giving you no room to evade of parry. Blocking slash after slash she just never relented. With the fight being so intense the smoke began dissipating. She had you worn down from her onslaught, leaving your arms weary and sore. "Give up?"

"Oh not at all. Pleasant dreams darling!", you answered.

Ikaruga looked confused by your reply, but then saw you lift one of your ninja bands around your arm with your teeth. It had another smoke pellet hidden underneath, spraying a bit of smoke into her face. But instead of smoke, it was an anesthetic gas, rendering Ikaruga asleep instantly.

Katsugari and Yagyu saw that last move you had just used and knew not to let themselves open for any trickery. You were tired, both arms were hung over like they had done over a hundred push-ups. No way you could fight head-on again with either, and this time they were ready for another giant puff of smoke. And they knew to watch for any chances to spray them in the face with stuff.

Katsugari and Yagyu partnered up and made a collaborative array of moves against you. Katsugari attacked using mostly her feet and nothing else, giving you no idea how to even latch onto her in anyway. It was like throwing punches only replace fists, with feet. And Yagyu kept Katsugari's movements blind to you by opening and closing her umbrella in your face.

Your arms were just getting battered all the way through and you just couldn't find any way to counter back. You had one last gamble, first when Katsugari made contact with your claws, you opened your arms parrying her back. Katsugari landed behind Yagyu to which she opened her umbrella, however you retaliated with throwing a pellet directly at the umbrella. The smoke only blinded for just a moment, being ineffective.

When Katsugari went in for the attack again she didn't see you, you attacked her from the side. It gave you enough time to get a chance to get a quick reprieve to attack her one on one. You were about to connect a hit on her and...
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: 5 on 1 (You actually might win!)

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
You just narrowly missed her, but you weren't planning on actually stabbing her, you were aiming at her shoes. You were about to, essentially, nail her in place. But you underestimated how agile she could be. Thus while in mid-air as she dodged your misleading blow she somehow propelled herself to kick you in the face with her foot. It was so hard it flipped you like a coin, making you land flat on your back.

"And the Winner is the team consisting of Katsugari, Yagyu, Ikaruga, Hibari and Asuka! Also in the future please make a team name, saying that is a mouthful.", the teacher commented.

With the last two panting heavily after having gone through an intense match they saw first hand just how resourceful you were. Asuka and the others began waking up, though it took a few minutes for them all to fully regain consciousness. "Uuughh. My head. Tell me we won.", Hibari said feeling dizzier than the others.

Asuka blankly told her, "Yeah we won."

"Great. Now I cannnn go back to sleep knowing Iiiii did nothinnn......snoorrrrreeeee", Hibari wasn't one for having a high tolerance to knockout drugs it seemed.

"I can't believe he got me there. I had him right in my hands.", Ikaruga said feeling very angered.

"I give him credit, for misdirection. He used mainly his wits through the fight and just easily took you down one at a time.", Yagyu commended.

"Well we can all agree on one thing. He may have lost the bet, but this certainly wasn't a lose.", Asuka said.

"That makes no sense.", Katsugari replied.

"You get the idea! He's a very skilled warrior. I'm happy we have someone like that in our ranks.", Asuka said.

"Now there is the question of who he takes out?", Katsugari mentioned.

"Huh?", Yagyu reacted.

"Oh yeah, we didn't say this, but he takes one of us out if he lost.", Katsugari explained.

"Well seeing how Yagyu and you were the last ones standing, it would be fair to be the ones he forcibly takes out. Rubbing it in his face even more.", Ikaruga suggested.

"Great idea! But who?", Asuka wondered.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Winner takes loser out....for a date

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
"By rights it should be Katsugari. She did land the finishing blow.", Yagyu said.

"Perfect. We'll tell him when he wakes up. Uhhh if he does.", Ikaruga said noticing you haven't had a sign of life since you got kicked in the face.

"Ah! No he's ok. Still breathing, just very faint.", Asuka said with relief.

"Well guess I got some plans soon. Hehehehehehe. This will be so fun!", Katsugari said giggling with the other girls.

You woke up in the infirmary with Kiriya being the first you saw. "Afternoon. You put on a show there."

"Am I missing any teeth?"

"No. But you did lose your hair."

"AH! My-", you quickly touched your head to find, he was just kidding.

"Sorry, wanted to have a good laugh. Anyway, despite your loss, you certainly came out of it with high praise."

"Never got praise for failing something.", you replied.

"There is a difference between failing a mission, and earning as much victory as you can muster. At least to quote an old master whose name escapes me.", Kiriya said.

Just then the five ninja girl brigade had entered, leaving you somber with a feeling of 'oh great'.

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
"Hey there (name). How are you feeling?" asked Asuka

"Well other than the slight throbbing on my face and it's a miracle that I didn't lose any teeth, I'm good," you said.

"I gotta say though, you really caught us off guard," said Asuka. "You definitely got the skills of the ninja."

"Yeah. You were super awesome!" added Hibari.

"Even I have to admit, you were pretty good. Even through your tactics were more like tricks," said Ikaruga.

"Hey. A ninja's greatest weapon is stealth and trickery," you said. "That's the path to victory."

"Yeah. That path to victory made you lose," said Katsuragi smirking.

"Hey! I underestimated how agile you were that's all!" you said.

"But you still lost," said Yagyu. " and because of that you have to take one of us out on a date."

"I know, I know," you said. "I'll accept my defeat. So which one of you girls do I have to take out?"

"It's your lucky day (name)," said Katsuragi. "You get to go on a date with this sexy girl right here."

"I see," you said. "Well since you were the one that took me out, I will take you out on a date."

"Yes!" cheered Katsuragi. "Oh boy we're gonna have a lot of fun! Hope you're ready for an awesome time because you are gonna love what I got in store for you!"

She finished by giving you a flirty wink and left the room.

"Yagyu are you sure you don't want to take you out instead?" you asked.

"Sorry (name). Since Katsuragi was the one who beat you, it's only natural that she'd be the one for you to take out right?"

"Yes. I know," you said sighing,

"You lost fair and square. So accept it like a man," said Ikaruga.

"I know. I know."

"What wrong (name)? Do you not like Katsuragi or something?" asked Hibari.

"It's not that... it's just... well... dating's not really my thing."

"Oh come on (name). You'll have a good time," said Asuka. "You and Katsuragi will have a great time."

"If she doesn't jump into his bones first," Ikaruga muttered.

"Now that I think about it, I don't think I've ever been on a date before," you thought. "I wonder how one goes about on a date. Well... I guess I'm gonna find out soon enough. Until then..."

You grabbed an ice pack and placed it on your throbbing chin. The coldness made your chin throb in pain making you yelp in pain.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Continue...

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
"Well Katsugari, tell us, are you psyched?", Hibari asked.

"Oh yes. Although I'm half worried. He's never done this before?"

"I think it'll be sweet to be his very first date. He might cherish it.", Asuka added.

"Ok, now I'm forced to think whatever he plans is sweet thanks to you Asuka.", Katsugari replied with an annoyed attitude.

"You were being very flirty don't forget. In fact I'd say you were looking forward to it.", Ikaruga mentioned.

"Well me, Asuka, and Hibari were. What say you and Yagyu?"

"Not interested.", Yagyu answered.

"Cute, but I respect him more than I fancy him.", Ikaruga answered.

"Well then we'll keep this between the three of us.", Asuka said.

"Please do, so try not to mix us in with your crushes again.", Yagyu replied.

The two more serious ninjas left while the three started theorizing how the date might go. They continued their speculation but things took a turn for trouble when they were on their way to meet their sensei. When they got to his office another ninja was awaiting patiently outside the sensei's office. Sensei popped out of nowhere just from a puff of smoke startling the main trio.

"Hello girls."

"Hello master sensei.", they said together.

"A new mission has just come to our attention. While on this mission you will all be working with this girl you see before you."

"Who's she?", Asuka asked.

"My name is Yuuta Kesho. I'm studying here but will be working primarily solo given my early experience.", she proudly presented herself.

The girls all eyed her down assessing her. She was a very odd looking woman, for starters she was rather plump for a ninja. In fact none of them believed it given her large size. She wasn't overweight but she had noticeable curves where being a ninja would find detrimental. Her face was highly well groomed, eye shadow perfectly painted on, and her eyelashes stretched out very well. Another thing that caught their attention was her lips. They were coated in lipstick so much it was almost like they formed another layer. She wore a fancy extravagant dress and wore other various jewelry she accessorized herself with.

The girls paused a moment and asked, "Is she really a ninja?", Katsugari asked.

Without a second thought, Katsugari was slapped in the face by Yuuta. The fancy ninja crossed her arms in disgust, "If you think I can't handle the job then you couldn't be farther from the truth."

"She is correct. Her experience has ranged from thefts of various enemies of the academy, and assassination of our greatest rivals from the other academy's. Don't let appearances deceive you. Now head out, and report back. That is all.", sensei puffed out and so the girls did their assignment,
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: A new ninja

choices: Later...(The ninja girls all return from their mission)
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
The next day you got up as usual with your gear ready, and replenished. This time around you were tasked with being trained how to improve your combat skills. While your battle with the other five was impressive it showed clearly direct combat was an area you were sorely lacking in. Kiriya would be teaching you personally in the methods to compensate.

You went back to the training arena, but this time this wasn't drawing an audience. It was just you and him doing a simple exercise. You were curious why nobody else was around so you asked Kiriya-Sensei. "Pardon but aren't the others supposed to be here?''

"Three are on assignment, while the other doing their own specific training."

"Are they alright?"

"They are expected due shortly. Mean-time let us review your battle with the 5. Now in your words, what was the toughest moment in battle?", Senesei asked.

"When Ikaruga fought me. My arms were numb and I couldn't think. I could only react."

"That is good. You reacted rather than thinked."

"Why is that Sensei?"

"You relied on the unexpected to gain victory."

"But I didn't."

"Very true, in fact the way you were beaten was a single act of carelessness. But you showed adaption when the odds stacked against you. That is a remarkable asset. So tell me what connects those two moments. How you beat Ikaruga and how you lost to Katsugari?"

You thought for a moment wondering what it was, "I acted quicker than I thought?"

"Yes you're very right. But not what I meant. What was it that made you beat Ikaruga, yet you lost to Katsugari?", Sensei repeated

"Aha! I didn't expect the unexpected! I used it against Ikaruga because she never guessed I'd have another way of incapacitating her. Katsugari won because I didn't account how versatile her technique could be, which resulted in my guard being wide open."

"Good. You recognize the flaw you made. So today, you will be tested on the unexpected. Which means one thing."

"Yes sir?"

"I will assist in your preparation for your date with Katsugari!", he yelled.

"Huh?", you blankly reacted.

"A man's greatest challenge doesn't await in the field of battle, but in the pursuit of love! No man here has ever managed to have a peaceful, loving, and genuine relationship within these halls! It has been a method used for assassination, manipulation, and a cruel joke designed to break the spirit of the ninja! My young lad, no matter your reasons, whatever you do, TAKE THIS AS SERIOUSLY AS YOU DO WITH YOUR VERY LIFE!", Kiriya screamed.

"Ok.... you want me to make I don't go through with this too plainly?"

"YOU DO NOT GET IT YOU FOOL! True romance has a chance to bloom here. I am not saying, 'don't take this too plainly', FOR THAT IS A GROOSE UNDERSTATEMENT! I AM SAYING YOU DO NOT SCREW IT UP! IF YOU ARE DOING THIS TO BE ANOTHER BACKSTABBING NINJA LIKE THE REST, THEN CONSIDER YOURSELF ON MY LIST! And do you know what happened to the last rookie who wound up on my list?", he whispered.

You shook your head slowly as if it sounded like a rusty machine. "Do you want to know what happened to who was on my list?", you nodded now. "You don't wanna know what happened to who ends up on my list.", now you shook your head but in agreement.

"But most of all, YOU ARE NOT TO MENTION A WORD OF THIS TO ANYONE!", he pointed at you.

"Yessir.", you said cowardly.

"Good. Then let us review, have you done this before?", Kiriya began rapid-fire questioning you about what you knew about dating.

"No."

"Have you had any girl friends outside of family?"

"No."

"Have you had a crush on any girl before?"

"No."

"Do you have a crush on any girl here?"

"N-no."

"Excellent, then you will be able to pull this off in no time. Now here is what you need to do..."
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Word to the wise: Don't get on Sensei's List.

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
A couple of hours passed an Sensei had given you the basics to make sure you gave Katsugari a proper date. Just as you two ended your session a messenger came by delivering an important message. Sensei looked at it and without delay left. "Sorry (Name) I must attend to something. Go out to the lake's to meditate on tonight's events.", with that he disappeared in a puff of smoke.

Sensei appeared into the infirmary to see the ninja girls return from their last mission. From their condition's things were not well. Hibari and Asuka were in the worst shape as they had bandages around their bodies with bruises and cuts all around their arms. Katsugari and Yuuta were the only ones who weren't in grave shape but had a couple smaller bandages applied for smaller wounds.

We tracked the puppet assassin from her rendezvous point but we lost her. She wasn't alone though, she had us ambushed by a group of foot ninjas and we barley escaped.", Yuuta explained.

"She was vulnerable!"

"Appearances are never the best reliable course of action."

"I did my part exactly to the letter. I was efficient, and precise. It was these rookies who deserve the blame, not me! I was perfect.", Yuuta argued.

"You were barking orders, putting everyone down, and never cared about anyone else but yourself! You're just acting like a big fat prissy-", Katsugari got cut off when she received another slap in the face from Yuuta.

"You can think what you may about my attitude but my skills were never the problem!"

"Ok, that was strike two sister! Wanna test your luck again?!", both girls grrred at one another but Sensei got in between them before things got out of hand.

"Enough! Settle things later, for now I believe both of you should relax, and allow the simple fact that everyone is alive and will recover."

The two ninja girls left with great disdain for the other.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Later...(The ninja girls all return from their ...

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
You were meditating in the gardens. You felt the sense of peace, quiet, tranquility within the air. You breathed smoothly, you were very relaxed. The thought of tonight's event was nerve-racking, however Sensei's advice helped immensely. You were contemplating how to end the date when you heard a sharp noise within the gardens.

A piercing whip of the air was being repeated over and over again. Someone was swinging a sharp object around. You saw that near the edge of the garden trees was another ninja practicing her knife throwing skills.

You watched silently, enjoying someone show off their prowess. But it quickly ended when the ninja threw her knife next to you. "I didn't have to miss, you know.", she pointed out.

"I believe you."

"Spying on me?"

"No. Just heard you practicing and figured I'd not disturb you."

"I would be less disturbed if you acknowledged yourself. Among ninja, it is a sign of trust, or at least honor. Hiding yourself shows you're either hiding to kill, or you're a coward."

"I guess I'm more used to hiding then. But I swear it wasn't to kill you."

"Spy?"

"If I wanted to spy on you, you wouldn't have found me."

"Or you are just that bad at stealth."

"Not in my case I assure you."

"Then show me. Hide in the trees, I bet you I can find you in under a minute.", she challenged.

"Alright. Good luck.", you ran into the forest, where tall trees and full grown leaves provided excellent cover.

You jumped and scaled and had, without a sound went across several trees. When you stopped and rested, you leisurely sat back and relaxed while the ninja tried finding you. You have the ninja the slip for a good 50 seconds, just 10 more to go. You started to get impatient wanting to show off, but then about 5 seconds before time was up the ninja jump-scared you.

"BOOOO!", you fell out of the tree and fell flat on the ground.

"I was so close!"

"No you weren't. I caught up to you half way when you tried giving me the run around."

"You caught up? You're super fast!"

"I know, I'm among the fastest in the entire academy."

"You're skilled ninja, what's you're name? My name is (Name)", you introduced yourself.

"I'm Yuuta Kesho.", she introduced back.

"I must say you look nice.", you complimented.

Yuuta blushed at your compliment, "Really?"

"Mm hmm. You just fit in so well with the garden it's almost like you were apart of the scenery.", you meant it in earnest. Yuuta had always taken pride in her appearance. But very rarely did she hear someone, other than herself, compliment her beauty. Immediately she liked you already, and was curious to see how much.

"You seem really nice (Name). Do you mind walking with me?", Yuuta asked.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Back to you....(other)

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
You decided to accompany Yuuta on a walk to get to know her. She seemed friendly, like the others, so why not hang out for a bit. Yuuta and you walked around the garden talking about yourselves with some simple ice breakers. You told each other why you chose your weapons of choice and your preferred method of attack. Then things started getting juicy, "So (Name), how does it feel to be the only guy in the academy?"

You weren't flustered by her question, it was a fair one to ask. "It's a little odd, but despite the competitive nature around here, the others are really nice. I don't mind it.", you did kind of mind it. Women were a mystery to you, but you knew better than to advertise that.

"So do you like anyone here? Not as a friend, I mean LIKE like.", Yuuta wanted tease you on the subject of who you had a crush on. She found that stuff to be very fun to discuss.

"Uhhhh! No! Nobody! Well, I'm going out with someone tonight, but only cuz I lost a bet."

"Awww that is still so sweet. I hope you sweep her off her feet."

"It might not be so easy. But what about you? Who do you like?"

"Good question, you see (Name). I actually like girls and boys.''

"Hmm?", you didn't know what she meant.

"I'm bisexual (Name). I think girls are as attractive as boys are. So in a way I do have two people I might be crushing on. But that's a secret."

"Fair enough. But I never knew anyone who liked both sides of the sex."

"There is no shame in that, just as there is no shame with my body. You think I look beautiful, right?"

"Yeah."

Yuuta pulled out her mirror and lipstick. "Why do you wear so much makeup if you don't mind me asking.", you said.

"I keep my body to look as beautiful as I feel it is. Everyone assumes because I'm plump, I can't be a ninja. You didn't judge me, you just treated me like anyone else here.", Yuuta applied her lipstick as if to reapply another coat, like sunscreen.

"I guess I'm not quick to judging.''

"Tell me (Name), have you kissed a girl before?", Yuuta asked. Soon as she asked that, your throat felt squeezed, your stomach's insides were being pricked by needles, and you were mildly shaking in place.

"KISS?! When was that on the table?! Why ask me?! I've never! I've seen it but I don't know-", your thoughts were making you unable to answer Yuuta.

"Speechless? Awwww, you've never been.", she walked up to you. Those feelings in your body were increasing, "Do you want me to give you your first kiss? I wouldn't mind kissing you."

You said nothing, just being bombarded by the feelings of odd pain in your body. It felt like you were in a blizzard with the pain stinging and numbing your body. But you were feeling warm at the same time. Yuuta lowered herself and was really close to your face. "I won't kiss you unless I have some way of you telling me it's ok.", she kindly said.

You were blushing, you felt your heart thumping hard, like a drum banging inside. You could feel her sweet breath touching your face while she was in proximity. you started focusing on her question now. Did you want to let her? You were more than nervous, but you were curious all the same. You looked at her lips, they were colored pink from the lipstick, and their size was as big as everything else. He looked her in the eyes, her lovely eye shadowed eyes, they were somehow telling him what she wanted. She wanted a yes. The emotions were bubbling up, you were in the heat of the moment. You gave a gentle nod.

She smiled, puckered her lips and was closing the gap. You just stood still, waiting for her to make contact. Just as she was an inch from your face, she immediately pulled back!

"I have your permission, but I don't give a kiss for just any reason (Name).", she winked giggling.

You felt normal again but felt totally confused. "But- um, I thoug-", you said.

"Listen (Name), I'm think your very sweet and I kinda like you. But you need to earn the LIKE like status."

You felt a bit angered but disappointed. "This is why I can't understand women, they lead you thinking one way, then turns out they meant the other. UGH! And why did I nod?! Do I really wanted my first kiss from her? She's crazy! Wait? Why do I want one at all? I'm here to spy and get stronger here! I can't grow any attachments! ARRRGH! My head hurts from all the confusion!", you ranted in your head.

"See ya around (Name)", she blew a kiss at you. Now your thoughts were stirred into a frenzy.

"Wait what does that mean? Why didn't she then? And- AHHHHH dammit! I think I have a crush on Yuuta! He! But now the only thing good about the date tonight is that I will get her out of my head."

"Hello (Name).", Katsugari said. You turned to her to find her in a cute casual outfit. A plain white t-shirt and miniskirt. She was ready to be taken away by you now.

"Oh no...I'm trading one for another. And this one is worse!", you thought. "Ready then?", you said.

"Lead away."

You went with her to take her out, you steadied your thoughts and kept what Sensei and you talked about as your train of thought.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Mixed Signals

choices: You see a shooting game with prizes
A shinoni Barrier envelops the area around you both
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
You and Katsuragi headed for one of the most basic places to have a date. A theme park. Sure it was basic, but it's one of the best places to start out for someone on their first date. At least that was what Kiriya Sensei had told you. One thing was for sure, Katsuragi was excited.

"Oh hells yeah! I've always wanted to come to this place!" she said excitedly.

"Glad you liked my pick," you said. "Well then shall we..."

Before you could ask Katsuragi of where she wanted to go, Katsuragi grabbed your arm and dragged you along.

"Come on! Let's go on some rides! I wanna ride every single one!"

"Every single one?!" you yelped.

"Yeah! Come on! Let's go!" said Katsuragi still dragging you.

"Oh crap. What have I gotten myself into?" you thought to yourself. "Maybe I was better off choosing other options besides a theme park. Like a mall. Or maybe a walk in the park or something. Just get through it (name). You're on this date because you lost a bet. Just suck it up like the ninja you are. Besides, we're just going on the rides. It could be fun."

First they went for the roller coaster. It was about 120 ft tall with a 105 ft drop. Katsuragi wanted to start on that one first. You both were seated in the front car and were strapped in. You couldn't help but feel a little nervous. After all it was the first time you've ever ridden a roller coaster. The coaster went up and up until it was at the top. Then it surged straight down in an incredible speed. Kasturagi screamed with glee raising her arms while you held to the bar for dear life.

After that you both went parachuting. You and Katuragi each had a parachute strapped to your backs. Then you both had to jump off a very high ledge and jump down. Katsuragi jumped off doing a small flip as she dove down. You looked down and dove after her. As you both fell, Katsuragi couldn't help but show off a little by doing tricks in mid air as she fell. You simply rolled your eyes and opened your chute slowing down your decent. Eventually you touched down on the ground making a perfect landing. You just turned around checking to see if Katsuragi came down yet, but then you saw a pair of striped panties slam right in your face. Next thing you knew, you found yourself on flat on your back with Katsuragi sitting on your stomach.

"Hahaha. Sorry bout that (name)," said Katsuragi scratching her head. "Should've warned you bout that."

"It's... no problem," you said trying not to ream her a new one.

"At least you provided me with a cushy landing," she joked.

"Whatever."

Then you happened to look down and saw Katsuragi's underwear. When you saw them, you immediately blushed a bright red and looked away. Katsuragi tilted her head in confusion, but then she smiled mischievously.

"Like the view of my panties (name)?" she smirked. "I don't mind if you see them."

"Just get off me will you?!" you said your eyes clenched tight in embarrassment.

After that, you both went for a ride that had something that neither of you expected. Extreme zip-lining. It was like a normal zip-line, but this one was several feet high above the park. It was high granted, but the view above it was spectacular. You could see the park from below as well as a few other sights. Katsuragi was especially hyped to try this ride. She couldn't wait to get on. You on the other hand were a little nervous. You've been in high places before, but never this high up.

"Holy...crap," you breathed as you were strapped to the zip-line behind Katsuragi.

"What's the matter (name)? You scared?" teased Katsuragi.

You quickly kept your mouth shut and remembered what Kiriya Sensei said. You have to show that you're willing to do anything for your date! Even if will make you sick, beat up, or die. That what a real man is! At least that's what Kiriya told you. None the less, you couldn't let this slide.

"No way. I'm not scared. Just watch me. This'll be a piece of cake," you said.

You looked over the edge of the platform and prepared to jump. You instinctively gulped as you looked down to the ground that was several feet below.

"OK... Here I go. I'll go on three. One... Two... Th-"

Before you could say three or even attempt to say it, Katsuragi came up from behind you and gave you a shove sending over the edge and down the zip line.

"KATSURAGIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII!!!!!!" you screamed as you surged down the zip-line.

"Don't worry (name)! You'll thank me for that later!" called Katsuragi as she jumped after you whooping with joy.

The force of the air blew right in your face forcing your cheeks back a bit. Katsuragi giggled and yayed as her hair danced in the wind. You had to admit it, you may have had your doubts at first but it was starting to turn fun. The view was pretty nice too. The trees, a couple houses, and the mountains; everything was beautiful. Eventually you could see the end of the zip-line. You touched down to the ground with Katsuragi following suit.

"That... was fun!" you breathed smiling.

"See? I told ya," said Katsuragi grinning.

"Technically you said that I'd thank you for pushing me which I won't," you said. "But yeah. It was fun."

Later you and Katsuragi sat on a bench eating some ice cream.

"Man! This has been the best date ever so far!" said Katsuragi.

"Yeah. I hate to admit it, but it has been fun," you said. "Not too bad for a first date."

"Hehe. Be honest with me. You were scared on that zip-line weren't you?" asked Katsuragi. "You screamed like a little girl when you went down. Hehe."

"That's because you pushed down the zip-line!" you said blushing a little. "Any person would scream if they got pushed down a zip-line!"

Katsuragi laughed. "You're just too cute (name)! You're also fun to tease!"

You glared a little and turned away with a huff.

"In any case, what do you think we should do now? We got plenty of time left," said Katsuragi.

You thought about what to do next when...
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: The Date

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Katsuragi squealed like a sharp ringing in your ear. "Oh my gawwwwd! They have the last plushie I need to complete my little collection of my favorite anime! I must win it before anyone else!"

"Just 1150 yen for a single try."

"1150? What a jip! But take my money anyway! I'm getting that plushie!", Katsuragi said with almost possessed determination.

The game looked easy enough, it was one of those shoot the water gun in the center type games. A few other participants made their way so that there could be a game to play so you watched Katsuragi play for her prize. Soon as the bell rang, she only missed the target for only a second but got the water spraying inside perfectly the rest of the way. She kept her hands steady and firm, she could see her number rise to the top, and then ding ding ding! She lost her chance! That single second costed her the match.

Graciously the kid who won didn't want the prize Katsuragi was aiming for. But she still felt pretty down. "Hmph, c'mon (Name) I won't put you through-", before she finished you placed yourself in the next round. "(Name) if you win this I will owe you BIG TIME!", she said.

"Shut up and hang back. Only got one shot.", she did exactly that. You made sure to align your shot perfectly. Needed to be absolutely certain it would hit the target soon as the gun could fire. 3...2....1! Soon as the next round rung, your gun immediately fired out the water. You pressed the triggers before the bell rang and you managed to get your shot within the center. Just like that despite Katsuragi watching with tense anticipation, she screamed aloud in joy as you won.

"That one sir.", you asked.

The guy ranging the gallery got it down and you handed it to Katsuragi, "And that is why you can never worry about me winning a prize in one of those.", you boasted.

Katsuragi swiped it out of your hand and held it up like a pet. "It's beautiful! My childhood collection has been complete! Thank you (Name)! I could kiss you!", she said.

"WAIT WHAT?! NOT THIS AGAIN!", you screamed mentally.

"Sorry- I got too hyped. Nobody does that on the first date. At least the couples who want it to last, from what I've heard." At least she gave you a straight answer this time. You didn't understand completely but it sounded like she wasn't messing with you. "Anyway I- GASP! Limited edition plushie! MUST GET!", but where she was looking from was like looking into the pits of hell, the claw machine.

"(Name)?"

"No."

"Please?"

"NO!"

"Pretty please?"

"NOO!"

"I'll owe you twice."

"NOOOOOOOOO!"

"Owe you twice, plus a kiss on the cheek."

"NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO OOOOOOOOO!"

"Owe you three times, plus a kiss on the cheek, from me Asuka, and Hibari."

"Not going to happen. Those things eat money more than anything. It is no different than gambling!"

"Owe you three times, peck on the cheek from three girls, plus one on the lips from anyone of your choice."

"What is it with girls trying to lock lips with me?", you asked.

"Probably because your very cute, and the only boy in our academy. Boys who look as handsome as you would be jumping the gun by now! C'mon or else the deal is off and we leave with me in a sour mood.", she urged you.

"UGH! Alright! But get rid of the parts with the kissing and stuff."

"Why?"

"Because I- I don't think that feels right.", you didn't want her to know off hand that you have never been kissed.

"So chivalrous, thank youuu.", she said batting her eyes at you flirtatiously.

You inserted the money into the machine, and positioned the claw above the plushie. You had it exactly over it, you lowered it and it grabbed it, but soon as the claw hoisted up, the claw would suddenly be bumped open a smidge causing the plushie to fall out. After a series of close calls, half-grabs, half-lucky breaks, and 3446.34 yen spent just to get that single plushie, you eventually managed to win.

"Thank you so so so so so so so so so much (Name). I had a great time.", she thanked.

"I just spent all my money getting you that thing, I hope it was worth it."

"Oh trust me it was (Name)!", she replied very seriously. "I'll mail them to my home and make sure they are properly placed in my room."

"You really seem to like that stuff. Never imagined a ninja would be an anime buff."

"I still like those things regardless of my profession, besides I don't live and breath ninja like most do."

"Not saying it's bad, I'm only saying I never see that from anyone."

"Well you learn something new every day. Hey, first thing I owe you is the money you spent winning these for me. So consider that you have only two favors to call from me.", she said.

She was a bit whacky while there but you ended up feeling satisfied, and ended up enjoying it overall. You enjoyed hanging with her and did find her to be very cute throughout the experience. And it didn't hurt to have her flirt with you occasionally. You enjoyed it, but at the same time hated it. You liked when she did it, but got annoyed by having her be so wishy washy. Was she interested? You couldn't really tell, your experience with women nowadays was testing you. But really all it was amounting to was, which girl was actually throwing themselves at you?

In the end the date went well and you headed back to the academy...
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: You see a shooting game with prizes

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
When you and Katsuragi were on the way back you recieved a call, "Hello?", you answered.

"We have a situation, just now an assassin is committing a robbery not far from your location. A ninja has broken into the history of Shinobi exhibit in the museum building and has engaged local law enforcement.", Sensei explained.

"Understood. We'll head there now."

"Back-up will meet with you in 20 minutes. Good luck."

"What's wrong?", Katsuragi asked.

"The Shinobi exhibit in the city museum is being raided. We need to intercept. Think you can handle it?"

"I dunno, think maybe you can not get knocked out by a kick in the face this time?", she joked.

You both hid yourselves from public and changed into proper ninja gear. You put on a hood and equipped your ninja claws, while Katsuragi equipped her boots and wore her usual school uniform. "Don't you think it's less conspicuous?"

"Hey I've never bothered wearing ninja gear. They never gave me my own, you just have yours."

"It's no big deal, right now our priority is capturing this ninja and find out what they're up to."

You both made it to the museum where the alarm was still going off and the building seemed empty. Nothing seemed amiss yet, but that was what worried you. Things looked and felt too quiet, that meant this ninja was a natural using stealth as their use of attack. Whoever was still here wasn't the boastful type.

"(Name) you sure the intruder is here?"

"I'm sure, only until we've swept the area. Let's split up."

"Good idea."

So you and Katsuragi took different parts of the building, where you both remained on guard until every inch was clear. On the outside, through the windows you could see the cops forming up around the building. They were getting ready to invade the museum at any time, which meant you needed to keep your movements under-wraps or else they would storm inside. You had 16 minutes before your back-up could arrive.

As you continued through the empty halls and rooms, statues and wax figures of ninja of the past, you kept your guard up immensely, as you expected any to suddenly come to life and kill you. Sure enough they did!

You were grabbed and had your mouth covered, however a few moments went by which made you understand the situation.

"SHHHH! It's alright, son."

"Mom!", you realized. She let go and met you face to face.

"You're the one who broke in? This is dangerous! I thought I was meant to be undercover!"

"Keep your voice low. Listen, I didn't trigger the alarm here, but I needed to come because of what was being stolen."

"What?"

"An artifact, a real display of an original piece of history from Shinobi history, was being stolen. The ninja who attempted this, is still here, and she is trying to escape with it."

"Then you're going to help?"

"No. I can't be seen here. Not while you still learn while your in the heart of a hostile environment. But tell me, are you managing well there?"

"Fine. Though I wish you prepared me for dealing with girls a lot better."

"I could never give you the experience you would be facing here. But hold fast, soon as you get what you need, they will never be the wiser."

"Ok. Where is the ninja?", you asked.

"Trying to escape on the narrow side. If you can, take her alone and, keep the artifact for yourself. If you can smuggle it into the academy without them realizing you have it, then we'll have an edge."

"On it. Love you mom."

"Be safe hon."
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Suddenly trouble!

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
She was walking through the halls looking around trying to find the perpetrator. She was feeling a little bored and at the same time annoyed.

"Man... where the heck is that thief at?" she grumbled. "Looking at all these museum displays is getting me bored. I wish he or she would just come out already and me and (name) were having so much fun on our date too."

She walked past more exhibits and displays, but she still didn't find anyone. Her annoyance was slowly turning into impatience.

"Damn it come on! Why won't the stupid thief come out!? I'm so freaking bored right now that I feel like I wanna scream!"

Suddenly Katsuragi sensed someone coming towards her. She quickly hid behind the corner of the hall and peeked out. There was no one there. Then she heard running footsteps and saw a figure go past her. As the figure ran, Katsuragi saw that the figure was carrying something in a small bag.

"That's it! That's gotta be the thief!" she thought. "Time to kick some ass!"

She came out of the corner and leaped towards the thief with a kick aimed directly at her. The figure saw the attack coming and blocked it crossing her arms. Both fell to the floor and landed safely. Katsuragi looked up and could now see who the figure was. She was a young girl with pale skin with green hair amber eyes that had a feral look to them. She wore a yellow torn up shirt with gashed up blue jeans with the zipper down. She also had leather constricts on her arms and legs carrying knifes and had a couple snake tattoos here and there.

"Looks like I finally found you, ya thief!" said Katsuragi. "Now hand over that thing you stole! Or I'll pound your face in!"

The girl looked at Katsuragi and smiled and held out the bag. "You want this? Then you're gonna have to take it from me. That is if you can. Shinobi Kekkai."

Then the surrounding around Katsuragi and the girl turned into a strange eerie blue color and began to twist and distort.

"What the hell? A Shinobi Kekkai?!" exclaimed Katsuragi. "Then... that means that you're a..."

The girl whipped out her knife and with a twisted smile gave it a lick as she prepared to fight Katsuragi.

"Now then... Let's have a little fun shall we?"
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Back with Katsuragi...

choices: A young woman with violet hair in a bun with bangs. (Rin)
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Back with you, you suddenly felt a surge in energy coming from another part of the museum. You immediately knew what it was.

"What the...! Someone's activated a shinobi kekkai!" you thought. "Damn it all! Katsuragi must have found the ninja first! I gotta get there and get that artifact before she does! Not to mention there's no telling how much danger Katsuragi's in!"

You ran down the hall towards the direction of where you were sensed the shinobi kekkai. As you ran, you heard the cops outside.

"Get ready men! If no one comes out in the next 9 minutes, we're gonna bust in there!"

"Shit!" you thought as you ran faster. "I gotta hurry! There's no much time left!"

You ran down the hall to right and you felt the shinobi kekkai's presence get stronger. Which meant you were getting close. You turned around the corner and then you felt it. The presence was very strong from where you were standing which meant that the shinobi kekkai had to be somewhere close to you.

"Come on, come on, come on... where is it?" you muttered to yourself looking around.

Suddenly something zipped by you your face scratching you on the cheek and hitting the floor. You immediately jumped back and branded your claws. You felt a little bit of blood drip down from your cheek.

"Who's there?! Come out!" you shouted ready to fight.

Then you heard a voice belonging to a female.

"Are you the one who calls himself (name)? The son of the ninja of the (name) clan?"

"It depends. Who wants to know?" you asked looking around trying to find your unknown enemy. Then someone stepped out from the darkness...
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Back with you

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
She was young about Katsuragi's age with brown hair that was curled at the ends with a large pink bow on top wearing a school girls uniform that was colored black with red lines. From the looks of things, she was from another school.

"Hello there," said the girl as she calmly stepped out of the darkness. "I'm Haruka. The one who 'wanted to know."

You brandished your claws keeping your guard up. "So I take it you're in cahoots with the ninja who's trying to steal the artifact am I right?"

"Oh you must mean Hikage," said Haruka. "Although... cahoots is a pretty strong word. She's more like a dear friend of mine."

"Hm. I see," you said. "So, you mind telling me what you two are doing here stealing the artifact in this museum?"

Haruka waved a finger clicking her tongue. "Ah, ah, ah. I can't really tell you that now can I?" she said.

"You better tell me. Otherwise you're gonna get hurt," you threatened.

"My, my. So feisty and hostile. Like a little puppy being held against it's will. How adorable."

You didn't know why, but your face instinctively turned a bright pink from being called adorable. You shook your head trying to shake the embarrassment off. Then you heard a voice that came from a loudspeaker.

"Attention hostiles! We will be storming the building in five minutes! If you do not give yourself now, we will show no mercy!"

"Damn it," you thought. "I don't have time for this, I gotta help Katsuragi and get that artifact before the cops get here and to do that I'm gonna have to beat this girl quickly."

You immediately took a great leap and slashed at Haruka using your claws in a blinding speed. Haruka fell to the floor in a heap as you landed behind her.

"Sorry Haruka, but I have no time to be dealing with the likes of you. I've got a comrade to save and an artifact to get."

You looked back at Haruka's now dead body, but something was wrong. You felt it in your gut. You went over to Haruka's body and touched her neck to check her pulse. Her skin was hard as a rock. You looked at her face only to find that her face was a face of wood.

"Wait a minute... It's a puppet!" you said. "Shit!"

You straightened up only to find that the area around you had changed to pink color and had strange objects floating here and there which meant one thing.

"Crap! She trapped me in a shinobi kekkai!"
