You then heard Haruka's laugh echo throughout the kekkai. You looked around trying to find where she was. Then you saw her standing on top of what appeared to be a giant teddy bear.

"Now, now. Let's not be so hasty," she said. "I wanna play with you just a little longer okay?"

"Let me out. If I do I promise I won't hurt you," you said.

"Hehehe. How cute. The puppy thinks he's a wolf. Shinobi Transformation."

In a burst of light, Haruka's clothes changed into her shinobi attire. She now wore some kind of pink and white lingerie with white cups with a diamond shaped opening revealing her cleavage. She also had white garments on her legs with she wears thin white bottom with pink high heels. Lastly on her back was a large white lab coat lined with many different vials. She appeared to look like some kind of scientist.

"Now then, shall we start this dance?" asked Haruka beckoning you with her index finger.

"Fine by me," you said. "Once I'm done with this 'dance' I'm gonna get Katsuragi and the artifact and call it a day!"

You ran towards Haruka with your arms trailing behind you making your claws scrape along the ground. You jumped up and fell towards Haruka, your claws aimed right at her throat. With a battle cry, you slashed at Haruka with the intent to kill, but Haruka simply side stepped dodging the attack. You skidded to a stop and then slashed again, but once more Haruka dodged the attack elegantly. Haruka attacked you with a punch aimed for your midsection, but you dodged by moving your hips. Haruka attacked again with a kick aimed for your left leg, but you dodged by raising your leg like the way a ballerina would. You attacked again with a straight punch, but ducked dodging the blow and suddenly you found her face just inches away with yours. Haruka giggled and touched your chin lifting it slightly.

"My, my," chuckled Haruka . "You're quite the dancer my little puppy. Would you mind dancing some more for me?"

Your eyebrow twitched in anger upon hearing the word puppy.

"Stop screwing with me!"

You attacked Haruka once more using your claws to stab her. You stabbed something, but it wasn't Haruka. Instead you stabbed a teddy bear. Haruka then landed behind you with that same teasing smile making you turn around and look at her.

"Hehehe. Are you done my little puppy?" she asked. "Come on... dance with me some more."

You clenched your hands in anger feeling more irritated, but then you took a deep breath and calmed down.

"I need to calm down," you thought. "She's just messing with me. Just ignore her and take her down."

You took a fighting stance and prepared to attack Haruka again.

"Aww what's the matter little puppy? Did you want to play some more?"

Haruka once more began to tease you, but you gave no reaction. You stood in your fighting stance waiting for Haruka to leave an opening.

"Not talking huh? Come on. Why are you being so cruel little puppy? I just wanna play with you so we can be friends."

You crouched low and then rushed toward Haruka in a blinding speed and with a fierce cry and clear head went on the attack again.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Another female ninja

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
As soon as you were within range, you broke off one of your claws and held it like a sword on your right arm, while the left still had the traditional 3 still in normal position. Haruka chuckled and was easily expecting you to attack up front. Then you threw the blade on your right, missing Haruka's shoulder easily, she side stepped away with little effort. She now had you vulnerable to an attack, however instead of evading her attack, you reached out and grabbed the same blade you had thrown. In a swift motion, as soon as you grabbed the blade, you swung it directly behind you, causing Haruka to visibly show a sign of shock.

You felt your blade land, but it was caught with two hand narrowly stopping it from reaching Haruka. One of her puppets formed right behind her, and stopped you. In retaliation, Haruka said with tones of her anger breaking her image of her gentler demure, "I was far too careless. You actually have had some experience against other shinobi."

"This dance being too much for you?'', you joked.

"Nah, this dance is sweeping me off my feet, but you're not the one who's getting flat feet!", she went on the offensive and relentlessly punched, jabbed, kicked at every conceivable placement your body was moving to. You could block and deflect her strikes but you were overwhelmed by how fast and precise she was. "And the most elegant way to end all great dances, has the leading partner dip the other.", she said.

She pulled back from you and made an awkward jerking motion, as if she was pulling something out of thin air. But then you felt yourself being forced to fall back, as if she leg-swept you. You then could see the seeming endless array of strings covering your body now.

"A puppet master is never controlled by their own puppets, my little puppy. They always bow to their master's will.", she snapped her fingers and suddenly you were forced to bow from the entanglement of strings that bound you.

"Pity. If I was in the mood, I'd let you be one of my own personal servants. You do serve as darling eye candy while wrapped under my power.", she said feeling disappointed. "Now- uh? Wait?", she noticed you had something. You lifted your head up to show you had a smoke pellet in your mouth. You spat it out in her face. Haruka brushed off as much of it as she could, but when she regained herself, you were out of your entanglement and her strings lied still and tangled on the floor.

"Impossible! Nobody could escape that trap. He can't have gotten far.", the strings came to life and returned to Haruka. Her genuine scare of someone breaking one of her most powerful puppet techniques made her search for you incredibly tense. Probably the first time in her life.

"Boo.", you said in her ear. Haruka swung in a reflex behind herself. You narrowly dodged it but you had a clear shot and stabbed Haruka in the rib-cage. Your smoke gave the illusion of camouflage which made her believe you got free. "HA! Now I got you!", soon as you looked up at her face, it turned out to be another dummy of Haruka.

You looked back to see her clenching her side, "You almost had me. For a second I thought you were going to kill me. So now I'm going to keep my distance. I'll make this fun though. Since I'm growing very fond of this game of ours, and growing a liking to how powerful you are, I think a loyal puppy like you should be encouraged to come to their new home. Come to mommy, c'mere puppy. Let mommy gives you kisses."

After all the awkwardness from Yuuta and Katsuragi, you wondered if you were some sort of cosmic magnet for girls wanting to smack lips with you. But this wasn't the type of kissing you had in mind. She blew you a kiss, but hearts came out of her mouth when she pressed against her fingers, then a literal heart came at you and in moments blew you half to hell!

The attack was so out of the box, it was a direct hit. You were weak and bruised, you couldn't defend against another, or let alone evade another incoming attack from her. "Now stay. Mommy's going to take care of you, you'll be such a good boy. Hmm hmm, I may not be sure what I'll do with you if you miraculously make it out of this.", Haruka walked towards you, confidently expressing her glee in her victory. However you still had one last card to play.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: You vs Haruka

choices: Someone gets the signal from Haruka
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
You could barely lift your arms, you were hardly able to so much as raise your head. No smoke pellet would work since you wouldn’t be able to move, and camo would stall for seconds at best. The only trick you had left was your trusty blow-dart. A shot from it, and Haruka would be out like a light. You pocketed it, while crawling away from her to try and give the false sense of victory.

Haruka giggled, “Tsk tsk, is that all the fight you have? I thought you would at least try and put up a fight in your moments of defeat. This is just making me disappointed by how well you fought, but then when your beaten you try and escape with your tail between your legs.”

“Biggest problem with ninja like you, is that I can never know”, you took the blow-dart and fired it at Haruka. The dart managing to hit her arm. ”When to get the drop on them when they get caught up in their own victory.”, you smirked.

Haruka took out the dart and began to feel dizzy. Her shinobi kekkai was beginning to fall, and she was losing balance. But she took something from out of her labcoat, and drank a vile of some sort of liquid. She started to get back up now as if the dart had no effect. “Ohhhh clever, clever, clever my little puppy. You managed to break my focus, so now I can’t bring it up until your little drug gets out of my system.”

“Damn! She had an antidote!”

Haruka walked over to you but stumbled as she made her way. Your sleeping drug was very potent, even with Haruka shaking off the sleeping agents, it still didn’t work completely. “Ugh, you are being more stubborn than I imagined. Whoooa!”, she dropped to the floor with her knees keeping her from falling all the way down. “But you still can’t get away. I still have you. When this stuff clears out, I’ll keep you on a very tight leash.”

“I bite.”

“I’ll bet.”

Then you heard the sound of the cops starting to enter into the building. You were in no shape to move but you needed to get out of there. “Cops. Because of your drug we might not get out of this alive.”

“Least you won’t be getting out of here.”

“True, nnnnghhhh. But maybe I can still- gyahhh!”, she tried to stand but tumbled down. “How long is this going to last.”

“Too long.”

“Don’t you have something to totally knock out that stuff. Neither of us will walk out of here if I can’t get us out of their sights.”

You didn’t want to be carried off by her, but you had little choice, “In my left front pocket.”, you said.

Haruka crawled over to you and took out a small container having the antidote. You saw the cops starting to barge through the doors. Haruka swallowed it, and almost immediately regained enough of herself to pick you up and sneak away from the cops.

She took you to the rooftop where she placed you down gently, “Too close.”, she said.

“Frankly I wish I didn’t let you talk me into it.”

“So still going to try and put up a fight?”, she asked.

“As long I’m still able to think.”, and in one blow to the face she kicked you, knocking you out.

“There, now you’re beaten.”, Haruka shook her head, still feeling nauseous. Seeing how hairy things were getting, with Hikage still inside, Haruka sent a flare, signaling someone.

Meanwhile Katsuragi was locked in a heated duel with Hikage....
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Continue...

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
She was battered. She was weary, but she was far from unbeaten. However, she had suffered multiple bruises and a couple cuts and her clothes were tattered and sliced. while Hikage had hardly suffered any damage at all. Katsuragi attacked with a flurry of kick, but Hikage dodged them and slashed her with her knife. Katsuragi jumped up dodging the attack or so she thought. She felt a slight twinge of pain on cheek. She touched her cheek and saw the blood on her hands.

"Damn it! This is crazy!" she thought. "I'm kicking her as hard and fast as I can, but she hardly has a scratch on her! How is she doing this?"

Hikage stood there lazily as if fighting Katsuragi had been nothing but child's play.

"Come on... I'm getting bored," she said lowering her knife. "Is that really all you got?"

"Shut up! I'm just getting started!"

Katsuragi ran forward and jumped up bringing her leg down giving a downward kick with a great force, but Hikage crossed her arms blocking the kick. The force of the kick sent a shockwave that spread throughout the shinobi kekkai. Katsuragi's eyes widened in shock while Hikage licked her which were in a predatory smirk. She threw Katsuragi off of her by pushing her leg and before Katsuragi could react, she attacked with a slash of her knife that so fast Katsuragi couldn't dodge. Katsuragi screamed in pain as her clothes were torn and she was spent sprawling to the ground. Hikage lowered her knife and licked her lips.

"How pathetic. You're even weaker than I thought."

Then suddenly a bright light flashed just above them. Hikage knew what that was. She put away her blade and turn to Katsuragi.

"Sorry. As much as I want to continue this, that'll be enough for today and I'll be taking this with me," she said as she held up the bag containing the artifact. "It's been fun. See you around."

Then she started to walk away and she dispelled the shinobi kekkai. Katsuragi struggled to get up refusing to be beaten. She managed to get on her feet and stared at Hikage's back with defiant eyes.

"Get... back here... I'm not done with you yet..."

"You shouldn't be focusing on me blondie," said Hikage. "You should be focusing on yourself and apparently your boyfriend."

Katsuragi didn't know what Hikage meant, but before she could even ask what Hikage meant she heard a voice down the hall.

"Over there! I think I heard someone!"

"Crap! It's the cops!" cursed Katuragi.

She turned back to Hikage only to find that she had disappeared. She wanted to pursue her, but she knew that it wasn't the time for it. She had to get out of there as soon as possible before the cops caught her. She quickly made her way towards the rooftop while staying under the radar from the cops. Eventually she made it.

"Whew. I managed to..."

Then Katsuragi was welcomed by a startling sight. There was you lying there covered in bruises, your clothes tattered, and completely unconscious.

"Oh my god! (name)!"

Katsuragi immediately rushed to your side and gently shook you trying to wake you up.

"(name)! (name) wake up! Come on! This isn't the time to be taking a nap!"

You did not move nor did you respond.

"Damn it! He's out cold. I gotta get him over to Kiriya sensei so he can be treated!"

Having no other choice Katsuragi wrapped your arm over her shoulder and lifted you up grabbed a hold of your waist and then took off running, jumping over to the next rooftop and heading back towards Hanzou Academy.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Back with Katsuragi

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Hours passed, you were still out from the battle and Katsuragi was almost done being patched up. Kiriya sensei was talking with her about what happened, "And then we escaped back here.", Katsuragi finished.

"Hmm, this is new. That academy is not known for making daring moves in public. It sounds like they are after something, whatever it is, we have to either figure out what it is, and stop them form doing what the plan to use it for."

"(Name) could have a clue, whoever he fought could have unintentionally given us a hint to what they were after there.", Katsuragi said.

"For now remain here, and rest up. I will look closer into this matter.", sensei disappeared into a puff of smoke.

Katsuragi laid down with the nurse patching her up stating she was fully patched, all Katsuragi had to do was get some rest and wait until she recovers. Not long after, Asuka and Hibari went to visit you and Katsuragi. "Holy shit. You guys look like you went through a mine field.", Asuka reacted.

"Why isn't (Name) waking up?", Hibari asked.

"He got very beaten up, went toe to toe with another ninja I didn't see. He got messed up. I was lucky. Just some disjointed limbs and a lot of bruising in and out. But a couple of days of sitting on my butt and doing nothing will heal me up. (Name) will need at least a week. He's got 4 cracked ribs, mild internal bleeding, and he's 45% bruise mark. If he didn't have a healing prescription he'd be here for weeks."

"How terrible!", Hibari said.

"You didn't see any ninja fight him?", Asuka asked.

"We split up, he fought alone with somebody, and he paid the price. But good god the guy must have given a decent fight enough to survive.", Katsuragi replied.

"Well where do we go from here?", Asuka asked.

"No idea. Sensei is working on things, trying to figure out what they took and what they might want to use it for."

"Sorry they need time to rest.", the nurse called out.

"You guys go, me and (Name) will rest up and be back on our feet in no time.", Katsuragi said motivating confidence with her teammates.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: At Hanzou Academy...

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Meanwhile Hikage while carrying Haruka made their way back to the school where they came from. The Hebijo Clandestine Girls' Academy. It's a school that's similar to Hanzou Academy, but in this school only evil ninja train here. The training was harsh and if you were too weak to handle it, you would die. When Homura and Hikage arrived at the school, they were greeted by two girls. One wore an eye patch, was practically looked young and had blue hair that went to her shoulders and the other was dark skinned with a long black ponytail that went past her hips.

"Hey you two. Welcome back," said the eye patch girl.

Then she saw Haruka was feeling a little unsteady.

"What the hell happened to you Haruka?" asked the eye patch girl. "You look like hell."

"I'm OK Mirai," said Haruka. "Let's just say that I met a cute puppy and he didn't like me."

"You wanna head to the infirmary?" asked the ponytailed girl.

"No thanks Homura I'm fine. Besides we have to go see Shizune to make our report."

"Does that mean that your mission was a success?"

"Take a look for yourself," said Hikage and she showed them the pouch. Then another girl came up to them. A blonde with blue eyes.

"Hey guys! I've got something important to tell you!" the girl said.

Hikage sighed. "I'm afraid to ask, but what's the problem now Yomi?"

"Well I was walking around town, when I saw the new prices of the sprouts! They were ridiculously high! Which is very unfair and..."

"Yeah. I'm gonna ignore that and just gonna go see Shizune," said Hikage as she walked past Yomi.

"Hey! You're not listening to me!" complained Yomi pouting.

"Come on Yomi. You can rant about the rising prices of sprouts later," said Homura. "We gotta go."

"All right fine," grumped Yomi. "But I still think it's unfair."

Later, the five of them gathered in front of a woman who was wearing a samurai uniform with a mask on so they couldn't see her face. She was Shizune. Hikage stepped forward and gave the pouch to the woman.

"Well done you two," said Shizune. "You obtained the item just like I thought."

She turned to Haruka.

"Haruka. You should go get yourself treated," she said. "I can tell by looking at you that you've been poisoned."

"Poisoned? By who?" asked Homura.

Haruka chuckled. "Oh nothing special. I just met an interesting boy from Hanzou. He really showed me a good time."

"Hold on... a boy? Are you pulling my leg?" asked Mirai. "Since when have you been interested in a guy?"

"Enough," said Shizune. "We received brand new orders from the top."

"You mean from the headmaster?" asked Homura.

"Correct," said Shizune. "All of you are to infiltrate Hanzou Academy and find the good ninja's secret base and also..."

She placed a picture in front of them.

"I want you to find this person and when you do, capture the person and have this person brought here."

All the girls looked at the photo and nodded and disappeared into the darkness to start their mission.

Back at Hanzou...
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Other....

choices: Back to Katsuragi and the other good ninjas
Back to Haruka and the other bad ninajs
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Meanwhile... at the Hanzou academy one of the ninjas receives a phone call. "You shouldn't be calling here."

"We have a new assignment. Are you familiar with......", the call continued. "Can you manage to weave yourself into the mix?"

"They'll never see me coming. by the way, heard that scuffle did a number on you. Feeling alright?"

"I'm fine. The effects wore off hours ago.", the mystery callers were the ninja girls who were sent to retrieve somebody at your academy. Haruka was the one making the call.

"We can't be too careful. Anyway, how is it going to work on your end?"

"Hikage will be recognized on sight. But I can still get in unless he stays asleep."

"Leave that to me. I'll keep him in an induced coma."

"Perfect. That will make things go by faster than we hoped. Be ready to move."

"Just remember though, don't forget who handed you this victory. And no foul play."

"Of course, Yuuta.", Haruka hung up the phone, while Yuuta did as well. Yuuta took out something from her dresser, a flower. She sprayed a purple spray on the flower and then started to bring it to, where one could only assume your infirmary room. Sure enough she did exactly that and left it next to your bed as a guise for others to believe it was a courtesy gift.

However, just before she left, you woke up. "Uuuugh. Yuuta?"

"Shhhh. Go back to sleep (Name).", she said gently pressing her hand over your chest. You didn't think of anything being suspicious and you were exhausted without anything to keep you that way. "You were in a hell of a fight. The doctors want you to rest before you can go back fighting again."

"Ok. Yawwwwn. ugh! Yeah think my best anesthetic is to just sleep off this pain.'', you replied.

"Good. Btw, I left you something.", Yuuta said pointing out the flower.

You looked at it, never was one for flowers but a gift from anyone was highly appreciated. It at least smelled great. One last yawn escaped your lips and you drifted back off. Yuuta smiled, "Sweet dreams boo. Mwah.", she blew a kiss at you as she exited the infirmary.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Other...

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
The good ninjas were hard at work training. Asuka was hanging from the ceiling practicing her sword swings. Habari was having a sparring session with Yagyu although Hibari was more flailing than training. Ikaruga with also practicing her sword swings only in her case, she was practicing on a dummy. Lastly, Katsuragi was training the hardest of them all. With a fierce kick, she split a giant daruma with a single blow. Asuka couldn't help, but notice and was impressed.

"Wow Katsuragi, you're sure training hard," she said.

"Of course I am," said Katsuragi. "There's no telling when those Hebijo girls will attack again, so we have to be ready for them when they do! Not to mention I'm gonna get back the skank who hurt (name)! When I see whoever did it, they're gonna be sorry!"

To make her point, Katsuragi unleashed another power kick. They shock wave alone destroyed a row tunuki statues in an instant.

"Don't worry (name)! I'm gonna pay back the person who this to you!" she thought to herself. "And I'm gonna get back at the snake bitch! Just you watch! I'll train hard!

"Whoa... and here I was thinking she was strong enough," said Asuka. "Wow... even when she's just recovered from her last fight, she's still awesome."

Kiriya was watching from afar and saw how hard Katsuragi was training.

"I guess Katuragi is feeling bad after what had happened," he thought. "Not only did she lost, but she feels responsible for what had happened to (name). Not to mention that (name) is in pretty rough shape and they got away with an artifact they stole from the museum. I don't know what they're up to, but we have to be ready if those girls of Hebijo decide to attack us again. We must train so that we can be ready the next time they attack."

He looked behind him for some reason and thought about you in your condition.

"I just hope (name) is okay."

Meanwhile outside the school...
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Back to Katsuragi and the other good ninjas

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Everyone of the students were going about their way heading for their next class, but unknown to them or the good ninja was that the evil ninjas had already infiltrated the school. Haruka and Yomi stood above the tennis courts watching the students below with Yomi in one of her rants.

"Damn them... They everything they could ever want and yet they still complain," she said clenching her fists. "They don't appreciate how privileged they are as if they are entitled to such generosity. It's people like that that make me sick to my stomach. But we'll teach them a lesson won't we?"

"Now, now Yomi. You know that we're not supposed to do anything to them," said Haruka. "But I think I can understand you. They would become such beautiful puppets. It's a shame that we can't do anything to them. Oh well. I guess I'll have to settle for one for now when we complete our mission."

She giggled in delight giving a light lick of her lips.

Meanwhile in another part of the school, Haruka and Mirai walking around the school heading to the main building.

"Man... how boring," complained Mirai. "Why the hell are we walking around like this again?"

"You know why Mirai," said Haruka. "We have to search the campus for the good ninja's base of operations where they train."

"I know. I know," said Mirai. "It's still a pain in the butt. While we're on that topic, why would they hide something like that in a college prep school anyway?"

"If you think about it, It's as a wise old man once said," said Homura. "Hide a tree in a forest, hide a student in a school. Although... they do seem to do things the roundabout way for some reason."

"Who cares? As long as we get to outsmart those goody goodies who cares how they do things," said Mirai with a smirk. "By the way, where's Hikage? Isn't she supposed to be here too?"

"Hikage is working with Yuuta on capturing out target," explained Haruka. "She's also briefing her on a plan she has going."

In another part of the school, Hikage was also walking around the school searching for your training school. Then she met a girl who was standing under a tree waiting for her which turned out to be Yuuta.

"Are you the one Homura speaks of? The one called Yuuta?"

"Correct," said Yuuta. "And you must be Hikage. All right then. Listen up because I'm only gonna tell you this once. Here's what you'll do..."

Then Yuuta began explaining her plan to Hikage making sure that she knew what to do.

"You got that?" asked Yuuta after she finished explaining her plan.

"Yeah I got it," said Hikage. "I gotta say, your plan is kinda devious."

"In the ways of the ninja, it doesn't matter how devious the plan is," said Yuuta. "What matters is getting the job done."

"Yeah, yeah. I hear ya," said Hikage.

Later after searching the entire school, the Hebijo girls came to an old building which was in fact Hanzo's main base.

"Well, well. We've searched the entire campus and this is the only place left," said Haruka. "You think that is might be it?"

"It's pretty old than the other buildings," said Yomi.

"Not to mention it's not of use anymore," added Homura. "Probably here for historical purposes."

"Off limits except for authorized personnel huh?" quirked Mirai looking at the sign. "That practically spells secret base. I think we found it girls."

"Mirai's right," said Yuuta. "This the Hanzo's main base. I guess you better get started then. Hikage. You know what to do?"

"Yeah. I know," said Hikage. "Well then, let's get started shall we?"

"Yes. We shall," said Yuuta. "Now then... "

Back inside the base...
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: The evil ninjas....

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
The good ninja were sitting through another lecture from Kiriya Sensei about ninjustu and other things.

"Ninjustu is always and has been a skill of the mind using the body as an extension," he said. "But if you pair a strong body with a capable mind, your true skill will show. You do so by standing with your feet firmly on the ground and..."

As he droned on with his lesson, Ikaruga and Yagyu were giving their upmost attention. Hibari looked like she was paying attention as well, but she was most likely pretending to pay attention because she didn't understand. As for Asuka and Katsuragi, like any other normal student in school they started to feel drowsy. Asuka was on the brink of falling asleep trying to stay awake. Katsuragi however was completely asleep and unfortunately Kiriya noticed.

"Katsuragi!" snapped Kiriya. "Wake up!"

Katsuragi opened her sleepy eyes and looked around sleepily.

"Huh? What's going on? Is it lunch time already?"

"Oh boy. She's in trouble," said Asuka.

"Katsuragi! You have to pay attention!" said Kiriya. "How are you supposed to get stronger if you're gonna be sleeping through my lessons?!"

"Come on Sensei! It's not like we're learning anything. You're just teaching us the basics over and over again," said Katsuragi. "Besides we should be focusing on something else. Like finding those skanks who attacked us and hurt (name)!"

"I understand Katsuragi. I do, but you have to train to get stronger in mind and body," said Kiriya. "That's why I'm teaching you all the basics."

"But Sensei! We should be out searching and you know it! I hate to say this, but it's a big waste of time!"

"Katsuragi! That's enough!" snapped Ikaruga. "I understand you want revenge believe me we all do, but have to get stronger and come up with a plan. If you really want to get payback, then you'll focus on getting stronger. Physically and mentally."

Katsuragi clenched her fists and was about say something else, when Yuuta busted into the room.

"Sensei! Girls! We got trouble!" she said panting.

"What is it Yuuta?" asked Kiriya.

"I saw her! One of the girls... from Hebijo Academy... she's right here in the academy!"

Everyone's eyes widened most especially Katsuragi's.

"Are you sure?" asked Kiriya.

"I'm positive! Take a look on the periscope!" said Yuuta. "She's right by the courts!"

Kiriya snapped his fingers and a periscope came down in front of him. He looked through it and searching through the school. Then saw her. There walking to towards close by the tennis courts was Hikage. She looked at him as if she knew she was being watched and waved.

"Impossible! How did she get here?!"

"I don't know," said Yuuta. "But I do know is that we need to drive her away before she gets close to the base."

Ikaruga stood up. "Yuuta. What does she look like?"

"Let's see..." pondered Yuuta. "She had long green hair and kinda looked like a delinquent."

Katsuragi immediately stood up as well. "No doubt about it! It's that Hikage skank!"

"What should we do sensei?" asked Yagyu.

Kiriya turned to Yuuta. "Yuuta I want you to pursue her and drive her out and try to get information from her."

"Understood Sensei," said Yuuta.

"Sensei let me go with her!" said Katsuragi. "This is my perfect chance to get even!"

"Absolutely not," said Kiriya.m "Besides Yuuta can handle it on her own."

"Actually Kiriya, I need Katsuragi's help on this one," said Yuuta. "I could use a little extra muscle. Besides I'd feel a lot safer if she's with me."

"Hmmm... very well," said Kiriya. "Just don't go fighting into the school Katsuragi. Need I remind you that you're a ninja."

"I know sensei!" said Katsuragi cracking her knuckles. "Now then, time for me to get some well deserved payback! Let's go Yuuta!"

"Katsiragi wait!"

Katsiragi dashed out the door with Yuuta close behind her.

"Wow... Katsuragi's sure raring to go," said Asuka.

"Well can you blame her? She still blames herself for what happened," said Kiriya. "She thinks it's her fault that (name) got injured."

"But it wasn't," said Hibari. "Those mean old Hebiji girls are the ones who hurt (name)."

"That may be true Hibari, but Katsuragi feels responsible," said Kiriya. "Not to mention that she was utterly defeated by that girl called Hikage. She wants to make it right by defeating her I think."

"And she really loves (name) after all," said Asuka. "Ah! The power of love is such a beautiful thing."

"I'm gonna pretend that you didn't say that Asuka," said Ikaruga.

Just then, a very loud alarm began to blare throughout the base. Asuka, Hibari, and Yagyu all jumped in surprise while Ikaruga remained unmoved.

"Oh crap! That's loud!" complained Asuka covering her ears.

"Someone's tripped the intruder alarm," said Ikaruga.

"Oh no!" said Hibari clinging to Yagyu."Intruders?!"

Kiriya looked at the periscope again. This time at the entrance to the base. Sure enough, by the entrance there was two boys standing by it looking like they were loitering around.

"Looks like they're ordinary students," he said.

"So there's no need to worry?" asked Hibari.

"Yes. Don't worry I'll take care of this girls. You all stay here," said Kiriya as he headed for the entrance to the base.

At the entrance, Kiriya walked up to the boys.

"Hey! What are you boys doing here?" he demanded. "Surely you do realize that students are not allowed in this area. You two playing hooky or something?"

The two boys said nothing. They stood up and glared at Kiriya ready to start a fight with him. They rushed toward him with their fists aimed right for him.

"Not talking eh?" said Kiriya.

He dashed forward in a blinding speed and punch them both in the gut. Then then grabbed them both by their collar and walked them both outside the entrance and dropped them to the ground.

"All right you two. Tell me your names and classes or I'll take you straight to the faculty office," said Kiriya.

The two boys still said nothing. Then suddenly they slumped over completely motionless on the ground. Kiriya went over to them checking to make sure that they were all right. As soon as he touched one, the head rolled to it's side and revealed a wooden face of a puppet. He checked the other one and it had a wooden face too.

"They're puppets?" puzzled Kiriya.

Then his eyes widened in shock. He had been tricked. The puppets were a trap to lure him away from the building.

"No! The girls! (name)!" he said as he turned around to run back to the building, but he was too little too late. Right then and there, a shinobi kekkai wrapped all around the building with Kiriya outside of it. Kiriya tried to break through it, but he couldn't.

"Damn it! I should've known! An evil ninja sneak attack!"
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: The good ninja...

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
You were still asleep from Yuuta's gift from before which led you to remain unaware of everything going on. The ninja girls inside the academy noticed that they were surrounded in various shinobi kekkais around the building causing most of them to be separated.

Your room happened to be within one that was controlled by none other than Haruka, the ninja you faced a while ago. She walked inside your room verbally taunting you.

“Ooo hmm hmm hmm. I don’t know if your faking being asleep, or you really are passed out. But I feel you should know, I found our fight to be a very kinky. It is going to be soooo much fun wrapping you around my fingers.”, she then started planting something on you but suddenly...

“Take your hands off of him!”, Asuka yelled.

“Oh dear, sorry I didn’t know he was taken.”, Haruka teased.

Asuka blushed, “Back away! I don't know who you are but you won't take him!”

“Now now. There is no need for trouble. I won't even put up a fight, really, I swear I won’t lay a finger on you.”, Haruka said but waved her hand over you. Suddenly like a puppet you were moving despite your sleeping state. You took out your ninja claws and got into your fighting stance, "But he will."

“Oh shit.”, Asuka reacted pulling out her blade in defense.

“(Name), go and play with her.”, Haruka said then pointed at Asuka and then you lunged at your fellow ally.

You're eyes were half open but all they showed was the lifelessness you felt while being forced to move against your will. You were totally unaware as your mind was still drugged but now Haruka had control over the body.

Asuka didn't or rather couldn't go on the offensive as she clearly knew this wasn't your own doing. "(Name)! It's me! Asuka! Your friend! Wake up!", she tried pleading.

"No use trying. I control his actions and all he can do is follow them. Doesn't matter if you wake him, I'll still be manipulating his movements.", Haruka mocked.

"Thanks for the heads up coach!", Asuka knocked you down by tripping you while she held back both of your arms. She lunged at Haruka but only to find that when Asuka swung her blade at Haruka, she missed. "What?"

"Tsk tsk tsk. You ninja never learn. You think I don't notice that by singling out the fact I'm the one pulling the strings, you lend me yours. A trap I lay around myself and it always works.", Haruka mocked.

"Can't...move...somethings wrapped all over my limbs.", Asuka thought.

"Two playthings. So cute. You two are like dolls, which reminds me what do kids do with them again? Oh that's right they play with them", Haruka said.

You and Asuka sat down on chairs sitting across a table. It seemed like Haruka was taking that analogy a bit literally. "You won't get away with this! Better hight tail it out of here before the others get here.", Asuka threatened.

"Nope I doubt it. You see, I'm not the only ninja here, and we've got most of you preoccupied. Think I'm entitled to a little fun. So tell me, what is the connection between you two? Ohhh I know, truth or dare. Yeah, that will be hysterical. What do you want first?"

"To slit your throat.", Asuka answered as she tried moving her arm that still held her sword in hand.

"Dare then. I dare you, toooooo kneel down and propose to him.", Haruka waved her hand and suddenly Asuka felt forced into doing a kneel and extended her hands as if she was proposing. Haruka manipulated your body to do an exaggerated physical reaction like your were all awestruck.

"Awww, look how happy he is. What now?"

"When I get out of this-"

"You will do dare again, man, you really are a daredevil. Ok now what to make you do next?", Haruka acting too playful didn't notice Asuka subtly motioning her hand to cut a few strings off. Didn't matter what they held on to, they would weaken Haruka's grip on her. "Oooo, care for a little frisky massaging?"

Luckily Asuka freed her arms and in a frantic fury sliced off all the strings attached to her and you. You collapsed but Asuka held her sword over at Haruka, just on the skin of her throat. "You got far too careless.", Asuka threatened.

"Heh, if I was worried my mission wouldn't be completed, I'd never send my best ninja to deal with half-baked ninja in training.", she said with a smile.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Back in the infirmary...

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Back with Hibari, she was in a separate shinobi kekkai looking for anyone of her friends.

"Oh no... Where is everyone? I sure hope everyone's okay..."

Then Hibari heard a voice that made her jump.

"You shouldn't be worried about your friends. You should be more worried about your self."

Hibari turned around and saw one of the evil ninja which turned out to be Mirai. When she saw her, she couldn't help but feel a little scared.

"Eep! You're one of the evil ninja aren't you?"

"No duh Sherlock," said Mirai. "Did you figure that out all by yourself? You may have gotten away last time, but this time you won't get away! I'm gonna pay you back for those lousy bunny attacks! Shinobi Transformation!"

Then Mirai's outfit quickly transformed into a black, white and dark teal frilled dress and bonnet with cat ears, cat tail, and what looked like black angel wings on her back with an umbrella with her right hand. With two hands she aimed it right at Hibari like a gun and then a nozzle from a gun appeared from the tip.

"Now you die!" said Mirai as she fired at Hibari.

Hibari ducked down and thought she was a goner, but for some reason the bullets never hit her. Hibari peeked open one eye and saw why. There stood Yagu who had activated her shinobi transformation and shielded Hibari from the bullets using her umbrella.

"Yagyu! You saved me," said Hibari happy to see her.

"It's OK Hibari," said Yagyu. "I'll always be here to protect you."

"It's you again!" growled Mirai. "I never thought I'd see your face again you hussy!"

"And you're just as annoying as ever," said Yagyu. "I take it you're the one who hurt Hibari before am I right?"

"And so what if I did?"

"Then you will pay."

Yagyu took her stance and pointed her umbrella at Mirai like a sword.

"Anyone who hurts Hibari is gonna pay. I'll make sure of that," said Yagyu.

"Yagyu..." murmured Hibari her eyes filled with admiration.

"Ooh I'm so scared," mocked Mirai. "The only person that's gonna die today is you! You and all of your friends! Including that lousy boy that's here too!"

When she said the word boy, Hibari suddenly remembered you being in the infirmary. Which meant that it was mostly likely that you were in a shinobi kekkai too. Yagyu knew this too.

"You're talking about (name). Where is he? Tell us right now and we'll let you go."

"You're in no position to be making demands!" snapped Mirai. "Besides there's no way I'll tell you!"

Then Hibari stepped forward. She was a little timid, but she plucked up courage and stood up to Mirai.

"Where is (name)?" she said trying to sound demanding. "Tell us right now... or you'll be sorry!"

"You're threatening me? Oh please! You're not strong enough to take me on!" said Mirai.

"Hibari stay back and let me handle this," said Yagyu. "She and I are a lot stronger than you."

"No Yagyu... I wanna fight with you!" said Hibari. "I know I'm not as strong as you and I may be the weakest ninja, but... (name) is in danger and... I'll fight if I can protect him! I'm gonna do my best to protect him"

Then Hibari came running straight at Mirai with her arms flailing around like a child's.

"Hibari..." murmured Yagyu who was clearly impressed with Hibari's courage.

"Oh please," sneered Mirai. "You couldn't fight out of a wet paper bag."

She aimed with her umbrella gun and fired at Hibari, but then Yagyu came to the rescue by shielding Hibari once again with her umbrella.

"Hey! Would you stop getting in the way!?" cried Mirai. "You're pissing me off!"

"I told you before, anyone who dares try to hurt Hibari will have to answer to me. So if she wants to fight, then I'll fight with her."

"Yagyu..."

"Don't worry Hibari. I swore to protect you no matter what. If you wanna fight to save your friends including (name), then I will fight with you."

Hibari smiled. "Thank you Yagyu."

Both ninjas nodded leaped into battle straight toward Mirai.

"Everyone...(name)..." thought Hibari. "Me and Yagyu are coming to help...so please hang on... I'm gonna do my best!"
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Back with Hibari

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Meanwhile, Ikaruga too found herself in a shinobi kekkai of her own which was a landscape of green with strange ribbon things floating in the air.

"Damn it," she said to herself. "How could I have let my guard down to easily? The puppets from before were decoys to divide us."

Then a laugh echoed throughout the kekkai. Ikaruga looked behind her and there stood Yomi.

"You upper-class kids are so gullible," she smirked. "This is one of the reasons why I hate people like you.."

"So you're the one responsible for this kekkai," said Ikaruga looking at Yuna up and down. "And that uniform... I get it know. You stole our school's uniform and then infiltrated the academy to search for our base. That's quite the bold move."

Yomi twirled around making her skirt flutter in the air. "Of course. After all a school for rich students would have such material. Although I'm not particularly a fan because the thought of how much uniform like this must cost makes me wanna puke."

"Enough!" snapped Ikaruga. "What do you want with us? What business do you and your comrades have here?"

"How typical," scoffed Yomi. "Always demanding more and more. Very well then. I'll tell you even with your snobby attitude. However you'll have to defeat me if you want me to talk. Shinobi Transformation!"

Then Yomi's attire changed into a teal green dress with a white slip underneath with the top revealing a lot of bust and a single white collar wraps around her neck. On her arms she had long white gloves and green diamond shaped arm sleeves with white frill underneath. Around her waist is a white apron with shuriken pattern on it and a belt that holds a brown bag and a strip of replacement darts for her crossbow weapon. She also wore a teal beret with a large white bow on the back of it and an even larger bow on the back of her dress. For her legs, she had a pair of white stockings covered by long brown boots with black bows at the top. Lastly she had a long giant sword. And so another fight in a shinobi kekkai began.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Back with Ikaruga...

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Yomi jumped into the air grabbed her sword and swung it down straight at Ikaruga. Ikaruga immediately jumped back and dodged. Yomi attacked again and once more Ikaruga dodged by jumping back. The force of Yomi's attack caused a giant whirlwind to blow through the area forcing Ikaruga to block with her sword.

"She possess incredible power! If I don't do something, I won't be able to last much longer!" she said.

Then Yomi came swinging with again with another attack attacking Ikaruga in the air.

"What's wrong? Getting sweaty from our fight?" she taunted. "Afraid you'll mess up your air you privileged brat?!"

Ikaruga dodged the attack again and jumped back hoping to gain some distance, but Yomi then suddenly lifted up her skirt and strange spiked bomb like things came out and zipped straight for her! Not being able to dodge in time, Ikaruga had no choice but to take the hit. The bombs hit the mark as Ikaruga was hit making her scream in surprise and pain. Smoke billowed everywhere.

"Hah! Take that!" jeered Ikaruga. "Where's your money and wealth now?"

Then from the smoke Ikaruga darted forward with her sword raised and before Yomi could react Ikaruga preapred to strike with her sword, but suddenly Yomi's weapon changed. The sword was quickly replaced with a crossbow. Yomi aimed and then pulled the trigger. Ikaruga immediately rolled back with arrows narrowly missing her. She jumped up and landed on her feet and looked at Yomi to see what she would do next only to see that Yomi's weapon had changed again. This time into a hand cannon. She aimed and then fired. A huge explosion rocked the whole shinobi kekkai confirming that the target was hit.

"Well that was easy," smirked Yomi. "Sorry, but having money doesn't automatically make you a great shinobi. Remember that."

Yomi thought that she scored with her cannon, but when the smoke cleared. There was no sign of Ikaruga. There was nothing left, but her tattered and slightly singed jacket.

"Where'd she go?" wondered Yomi.

Then she looked up in time to see Ikaruga diving bombing straight for her with her sword raised. This time she was wearing nothing, but a black two piece bikini and glowing with an orange-red aura. For those of you that don't know, this is called the Life or Dash technique. A technique that lets a shinobi engage in combat without their uniforms allowing them to focus their attack power and speed, but it's also a very risky move leaving the user vulnerable if they are struck.

Ikaruga attacked by swinging her sword releasing a wave of fire right at Yomi. Yomi yelled in surprise and pain as the fire burned all of her clothes except for a green swimsuit with white frills. Ikaruga then dashed toward her her sword pointed right at her. Yomi immediately went on the defensive by switching her cannon with her sword ready to strike, but Ikargua jumped up and stood on top of Yomi's blade.

"Now! Defend yourself!" she demanded.

"Huh. You certainly have a nasty habit of barking orders from above huh?" sneered Yomi.

She then threw a cat figure in the air which exploded into seeking fireballs. Ikaruga back flipped into the air dodging them all, but that left her open for attack which Yomi took advantage of. As soon as she landed on her feet, Yomi brough her sword straight down ready to slice Ikaruga in half, but Ikaruga blocked her sword just in time. Sparks leapt from the collision of metal. Ikrauga grit her teeth trying to withstand Yomi's attack.

"Damn it... you disgust me! You lead a life of luxury while people like me have to fight just to survive. You don't know what it's like to experience grief and misery the poor suffer every day!"

Ikaruga glared, but then her eyes softened. She knew that Yomi was wrong. She did know what it was like and because of that the softness in her eyes was quickly replaced with determination. With a defiant shout and her aura flaring she threw Yomi off of her sending her flying into the air and then sprawling to the ground.

"Impossible..." groaned Yomi. "How... did she get so strong?"

"Listen up!" said Ikaruga. "Don't you make any assumptions about me because you don't know anything about me! You may not know it, but I too have experience grief and misery. However... I sealed it all away inside Hien! If I'm looking high and mighty it's because of one thing! It's because I'm proud! Proud and prideful of what was entrusted to me!"

She jumped into the air glowing brighter than ever with her sword being cloaked in flames. Her aura also came to life taking on the shape of a phoenix.

"Secret Ninja Art! Hien Phoenix Flash Suite!"

With a fierce cry, Ikaruga unleashed her ultimate attack. A great fire erupted from her sword and barreled right into Yomi. She tried to block it with her sword, but she was overwhelmed by the flames of Hien. Eventually the flames of Hien died down and Yomi lied on the ground defeated. Ikaruga sheathed her sword and walked over to her.

"It's over..." she said.

"D-damn you..." said Yomi. "You'll pay... for doing this to me..."

"Enough talking," said Ikaruga. "You said if I defeated you, you would tell me everything I want to know. So talk. What are you and your comrades doing here?"

Yomi glared at Ikaruga, but she complied. "Fine then. I'll tell you everything I know as part of my agreement."
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Continue...

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Katsuragi and Yuuta were walking around on the school grounds searching for Hikage. They went by the courts where Yuuta had seen her, but she was no where to be seen.

"Damn it! Where the hell is that skank?" muttered Katsuragi. "She's gotta be around here somewhere!"

"Take it easy Katsuragi," said Yuuta. "I understand how you're feeling, but you have to keep a cool head about this especially since we're out in public. Don't worry. We'll find her."

They checked all around the courts still not seeing Hikage while at the same time keeping a low profile, then suddenly they spotted her. She was walking out of the courts and towards a tree. As soon as Katsuragi saw her, she power walked right towards her with Yuuta close behind.

"Katsuragi -pants- S-slow down!" she gasped.

Katsuragi didn't listen. Hikage walked towards the tree and she happened to see them. When she did, she flashed a teasing smile and disappeared from behind a tree. Katsuragi then broke into a run heading towards the tree. Katsuragi and Yuuta came around the tree only to find that Hikage had disappeared. Not only that, the landscape around them had changed. The area had turned into an amber color and there were strange demonic specters floating here and there.

"Damn it! A shinobi kekkai!" said Yuuta. "Looks like we walked into a trap."

"Who the hell cares?!" said Katsuragi. "Where'd the hell did that snake eyed witch go?!"

She took a deep breath and called out in the kekkai; "Hey! Where the hell are you?! Stop hiding and come out and face me you coward!"

Then a bell sounded. Katsuragi turned to find a railroad crossing had appeared behind them. A subway train rushed on by and when it passed by there stood Hikage. As soon as Katsuragi saw her, her blood began to boil remembering what she did to her before.

"Well, well. It's about time you found me," smirked Hikage. "What took you two so long? I would have found someone more exciting if it wasn't my orders, but I guess you two will have to do."

"That's fine by me!" said Katsuragi cracking her knuckles. "I've been meaning to get a rematch with you! Prepare to get your ass kicked!"

"Heh. And I take it that both of you are gonna take me on?" asked Hikage coolly. "How lame. Getting help to fight your own battles. I guess you're as weak as I thought you were."

"What'd you say?!" snarled Katsuragi clearly insulted.

"Take it easy Katsuragi," said Yuuta. "She's just trying to psych you out. If we take her on together we can..."

"Stay out of this Yuuta," interrupted Katsuragi. "This tramp's all mine!

"But Katsuragi wait!"

"Shinobi Transformation!"

But Katsuragi wouldn't listen she ran towards Hikage and transforming into her school uniform and boot attire and leapt right at Hikage her foot raised for a kick. Hikage chuckled not moving. With a shout, Katsuragi launched a powerful kick sending a shockwave of force. Suddenly Hikage suddenly appeared right behind her. Katsuragi immediately reacted by kicking behind her again, but Hikage dodged the attack with ease.

"Come on... why so hot and bothered? Do yourself a favor and calm down a little," said Hikage as they landed on the ground.

"Shut up!" snarled Katsuragi. "I'm like this because that's how I fight! If don't fight the way I do, the how am I supposed to win?!"

Both sides leapt at each seeming like the glided past each other and then landed on the ground again. Then Katsuragi's shirt ripped on her right arm revealing a gash that oozed with blood and Katsuragi found herself looking at the sharp edge of Hikage's knife with Hikage standing right behind her.

"I believe there's an old saying," sad Hikage her eyes gleaming. "Fights are won with skill. Not emotion."

"Damn it! How'd you..."

"Katsuragi! Hang on! I'm coming to help you!" cried Yuuta as she ran towards Katsuragi and Hikage. Then...
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Meanwhile...

choices: Back with the battle of Hibari, Yagyu, and Mirai...
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Yuuta rushed forward and tried to go over and help Katsuragi, but suddenly someone landed right in front of her barring her way. The person drew her katana and slashed straight at her with it. Yuuta immediately leaped back and dodged. When she landed one her feet, she looked up glaring at the perpetrator.

The girl was tan, her hair was dark brown hair is tied in a long ponytail with a white ribbon, wore an all black sailor fuku with red trim with wears wrist guards on her forearms and wearing bandages underneath and had white loose socks with brown dress shoes on her feet. It was Homura.

"You gotta be kidding me," muttered Yuuta. "Another evil ninja."

"Sorry, but I can't let you interfere," said Homura. "If you wanna fight someone, then fight me."

"Out of my way," snarled Yuuta branding her shurikens. "Hang on Katsuragi. Once I'm done with this evil ninja, I'll save you!"

"Heh. Good luck with that," said Hikage. "Because your friend has already been defeated and is about to die."

"That's what you think!" snapped Katsuragi.

She crouched back did a head stand and kicked Hikage right in her face. Hikage dodged with ease and leaped back. Katsuragi quickly got back on her feet glaring daggers at Hikage. Hikage stood calm and collected still smiling slyly. Yuuta wanted to help her and tried going to help, but Homura bared her way.

"I told you, you're fighting me now," she said. "I wouldn't be so worried about her if I was you."

"Hang on Katsuragi! Once I deal with her, I'll come help you!" called Yuuta as she threw a couple shuriken. Homura immediately reacted and blocked them using her katana. Then she slashed at Yuuta swinging her sword which Yuuta dodged.

"Forget about me Yuuta," said Katsuragi. "I told you this skank is mine! Focus on that other dark ninja."

"But Katsuragi..." said Yuuta, but then Homura was suddenly upon her.

"Like I said, worry about yourself!" she said as she pounced on Yuuta making her jump. When Yuuta got back on her feet, she turned around going to try once again to help Katsuragi, but then she found that the space around her had changed. The space was now a grassy landscape with a river in a shade of orange red.

"Another Kekkai eh?"

"Well of course," said Homura who stood right behind her causing her to turn around. "I figured I'd help you focus since you were so worried about your friend."

"How charitable of you," said Yuuta sarcastically.

"Now then..." said Homura taking her stance. "Let's see how you fare when I go all out!"

She reached behind her back and grew six katanas and with a battle cry she dashed at Yuuta her swords aimed right for her.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Someone stops Yuuta

choices: Katsuragi tries to run away and force her way inside the Kekai to help Yuuta
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
"You know I find you so dull. You just keep on kicking thin air and I'm left bored. I wonder when you will actually be a challenge. Like your boyfriend.", Hikage taunted.

"You fu*&ing-", Katsuragi used her metal boots to accelerate her lunge attack causing Hikage to lower her cocky demure. When Katsuragi swung her legs at Hikage, the evil ninja leaned back narrowly missing a hidden blade in Katsuragi's boot. The tip managed to draw blood from the green haired assassin but resulted in drastic consequences.

"Well. Now I guess I have to be serious now.", Hikage pulled out two sets of knives around her fingers and threw them at lightning speed at Katsuragi. The blonde kicked or evaded most of them but a coupled managed to cut her at the arm and shin. "See now look at that. Because you showed your little trump card you had over me, you aggravated your opponent, and now forced you have your best offense become your greatest weakness now."

"I can handle a simple cut.", Katsuragi replied.

"Maybe but that still gives you a big handicap. Oh and one other thing, in fact given how much of a novice you are I should have mentioned this earlier, every one of my knives are poisoned.", she giggled smiling as her snake-like eyes turned purple. The color in her eyes signified nothing but pure pleasure of sadistically realizing her fantasy of utilizing her ninja animal motif in battle. Katsuragi looked at her wounds. Nothing looked out of the ordinary but she guessed it must be a slow-working poison.

"I'll give you the courtesy of what those ones were. Hemotoxin, designed to mess with your red bloodcells. It may not hurt yet but soon you will be in a lot of pain. Just picturing it is making me smile more than I have in my whole life. What will act up first? Blood clotting in your brain causing irreversible damage? Or maybe you will never be able to use those legs of your again even when you get properly cured. Frankly now, I'm just too curious that I almost want to watch you die slowly. But I need to haste things along. Time table you know."

Katsuragi didn't have much choice. Hikage was right there, she wanted payback for all of her taunting and harming you. But she may not have much time, and with Yuuta already inside a Kekai, she would be leaving Yuuta more problems if she felt too weak and Yuuta needed to have a quick escape. But in the heat of the moment the rush for quick and easy retribution often doesn't come to the impulsive at first...
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Slow and Painful wins the race

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
In a split second Katsuragi backfliped against part of the roof structure and propelled her momentum at Hikage. She moved too fast for the her opponent to dodge this time which caused Katsuragi to knock the wind out of Hikage, and allow Katsuragi to tackle her down. Hikage couldn’t breath for a moment as she struggled to get the air back in her lungs. As she was pinned down on her back by Katsuragi her arms were grabbed by the blonde warrior unable to allow her to take out her weapons. Katsuragi grinned as she thought her opponent was taken down, reveling in her victory. But as she failed to realize, Hikage was much more cunning, and more experienced with underhanded attacks. In one quick motion Hikage pulled her arm in front of herself, giving her an opening, to bite into Katsuragi’s arm.

Katsuragi reeled back in pain, and grasped her arm tight. She noticed the bite marks looked uncommon, but realized it looked like an actual snake bite. This worried Katsuragi as she feared she was injected with more poison. “Hehehehe! You don’t have much time left now. That was a direct injection to your bloodstream. Before you had maybe half an hour but now it will be less than 10 minutes.”, Hikage taunted.

Katsuragi could feel an intense amount of pain for her arm as it felt like it was on fire from the inside. Katsuragi knew then and there that it was a mistake to fight back. She was a close ranged fighter who was battling against someone who thrives on that type of prey. Katsuragi threw a smoke pellet down on the ground to provide cover for her to escape. She wanted to help Yuuta but entering a kekai without assistance in the shape she was in, would prove ruinous.

She had to make a hasty retreat back to the academy and take an antidote for the toxin. Every breath she took from that moment on felt scratchy and painful. Like a fever and your whole throat just felt so hot you couldn’t want to speak.

Her right arm thumped hard in pain, she could feel the inside of it being all twisted and limp. She scaled and leapt across the skyscrapers back to the academy, tired and hurting. Then as she made another jump across she felt a sharp pain in left shoulder. She saw she was hit with another one of Hikage’s poison tipped daggers.

“Not talking much now huh? What’s the matter? Snake got your tongue?”, she said smiling and having her own tongue stick out like a real snake. “That last dagger should shave a couple more minutes now. I’d hurry if I were you. By now you could suffer some permanent damage. I’d wager in your arm.”

Katsuragi wanted to speak against her but her throat was in too much pain as was most of her. She stepped back hanging over the edge of the roof. Hikage took out another dagger, waving it in front of herself. “So now, where to stick in this next one? Hmmm, the cheek? Or maybe the thigh. No how about the hand! Yes that would be marvelous.”

“Katsuragi took another step back but noticed she had nowhere else to run to. She was too weak to successfully dodge Hikage’s throw this time. Blocking it would threaten her balance. Too much pain to concentrate. Too much….

In another second she fainted, falling backwards over the edge. Hikage left in delight, feeling accomplished over her actions.
1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.title: Katsuragi fights Hikage anyway

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
“Hmph, you’re good. Not many can out maneuver my attacks that quickly.”

“Thank you, I work hard to get that kind of praise everyday.”, Yuuta threw a couple sets of shurikens at Humura. Her blades blocked every single one. Yuuta didn’t have many options. She needed a way to get past her defenses. But it would be near impossible. Her only weapon were ranged attacks and nothing else.

“You seem to be ill-equipped for me. Guess it was a mistake to come after another ninja so blindly.”

“I don’t need the proper weapons to finish this battle. A true ninja uses everything at her disposal to win.”

“Spoken like a ninja from our clan. You would fit in well.”

“I’m right where I’m needed. C’mon, I’ll give you a clear shot at me!”

“As you wish.”, Homura lunged at Yuuta and readied her sword for a mighty swing over Yuuta’s neck. She swung hard as she could, her blade connected, but in the middle of the swing it stopped. Instead of hearing flesh being ripped apart, she heard metal grazing against each other. Yuuta tightly gripped her shurikens in between her fingers and used them to match steel with Homura. The force of Homura’s swing dug the shurikens into Yuuta’s knuckles, blood leaking, pain unfathomable. Homura reeled back in fear for a moment by Yuuta’s strategy. However her mere flinch was enough for Yuuta to hit her opponent square in the gut, causing multiple puncture wounds in Homura. When Yuuta let go and pulled out her weapons stuck in her hands, she exited the shinobi kekai, hoping to find Katsuragi.

After she easily broke out of the kekai, in large part of Homura being brought down, she saw Hikage chasing Katsuragi across the skyscrapers. Yuuta chased after them hoping to help her hot-headed friend. By the time she caught up to their last position she saw Katsuragi across from the next rooftop fumbling over the edge.

Yuuta snuck up to Hikage, where she was in too much of a high from her helpless prey struggling to survive to notice anything else, which Yuuta was about to take advantage of. But before she could knock out Hikage, Katsuragi fell back over the roof. Yuuta jumped to the side of the building, then tethered herself to the top, swinging herself around, hoping to catch her friend in the process.

Before Katsuragi fell too far Yuuta barley managed to grab her hand. Noticing her condition, Yuuta took out a vile in her bag and force fed it to Katsuragi. A half minute went by in silence, but Katsuragi coughed heavily and showed signs of life. They dangled over feeling tired and beaten, all Katsuragi could muster was, “Thanks.”

“No problem. But she escaped.”, Yuuta explained. “C’mon lets head back to the school.”, Yuuta said carrying her ally back safely.

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Back outside the academy, Kiriya was trying to break through the shinobi kekkai, but he was having no luck whatsoever. He went over to the puppets that he took out before and was inspecting them to see if they had some kind of clue.

"They were disguised as puppets, but I still can't believe they were able to get inside so easily," he muttered.

Then he heard a voice.

"I for one am surprised that they were able to get past our detection network," said a voice. "That's not a small feat considering we have sensors all over campus."

Kiriya turned around to the source of the voice and saw a black cat up in a tree above him. When he saw the cat, he knew who it was. The cat continued to speak.

"One thing's for sure, whoever organized this is someone who knows how things work around here. Someone who is or was once a good ninja."

Kiriya's stared at the cat not believing what he was hearing. He was about to to talk to the cat, but the cat had vanished without a trace. Then suddenly two wormholes opened right next to him and then three people appeared out of the holes. The first person was Ikaruga and from the other came Yuuta who was carrying Katsuragi on her shoulder who had fallen unconscious.

"What the...? Where am I?" wondered Ikaruga as she looked around.

"Seems like we made it outside of the kekkai," said Yuuta.

"Ikaruga! Yuuta! Katsuragi!" said Kiriya with a hint of relief as he ran up to her. "Thank goodness. Are all you alright?"

"We're fine, but Katsuragi is in rough shape," said Yuuta. "She's been poisoned, but I managed to give Katsuragi an antidote."

"Damn," cursed Kiriya. "That just leaves Hibari, Yagyu, Asuka, and (name)."

"Kiriya sensei," said Ikaruga. "I just remembered. There's something I have to tell you all right away."

"Ikrauga what happened in there?" asked Kiriya. "Tell me what's going on."

Then after a few minutes, Ikaruga told Kiriya what had happened and brought him up to speed.

"I see," he said. "I should've known it'd be them."

"What about the others?" asked Yuuta. "Do you know if any of them are OK?"

"I don't know," said Ikaruga. "All I know is that I fought one of the girls and I made her tell me everything. The next thing I know I was kicked out of the barrier, but I do know what they're after. I had the evil ninja I fought tell me."

"And what's that?" asked Kiriya. "Tell us."

Ikaruga then told them what Yomi had told her and what the evil ninja's goal was. Upon hearing, Kiriya's and Yuuta's eyes went wide with surprise and shock.

"What?! It can't be..."

"Why would they...?"

"I don't know, but I do know that we have to get back inside the kekkai as soon as possible and warn the others," said Ikaruga. "Kiriya sensei, if you know a way inside please you have to tell me."

Kiriya hummed hesitantly. "I do. If someone within the barrier is in desperate need, they can call someone outside thus allowing them to force their way into the kekkai, but...it's forbidden."

"Forbidden? Why is that?" asked Ikaruga.

"Because it takes a large amount of power to break the barrier," explained Yuuta. "Especially a shinobi kekkai. There's a huge risk of physical damage or worse. Death."

Ikaruga's eyes widened a little for a split second, but then they were replaced with a firm determination as she walked towards the the barrier.

"Ikaruga what are you doing?" asked Kiriya concerned.

"I'm going to try breaking through the barrier," said Ikaruga. "If I can get one of the girls to sense my presence, I'm sure I'll be able to break through and force my way back into the kekkai."

"Don't do it! You're just risking your life!" cried Yuuta. "It's too dangerous!"

"I don't care," said Ikaruga calmly. "I have to at least try. Now that I know what the evil ninja are after, I'm not gonna let them have their way."

Ikaruga raised her hand forward, focused her power emitting a red aura, and concentrated.

"Come on... come on... someone sense my presence," she thought to herself praying that someone, anyone would feel her.

1113322222222222222222222211222222222222.content:
Meanwhile...

Hikage and Haruka faced their mentor and leader of their academy, kneeling in respect. "We weren't able to retrieve the boy, but the scroll will bait him to come to us on his own.", Haruka explained.

"Excellent. But we have another issue at hand, relating to the boy, is there a chance he is working with another league of ninja?", the headmaster questioned.

"We suspect so, given the sudden appearance at that school, plus his skill came from an well disciplined source. Honestly we'd be amazed if it weren't the case.", Hikage answered.

"But which one?"

"Unknown. That may take time.", Haruka replied.

"Leave in shame, and be grateful for your lives.", the headmaster ordered. The girls left the room with their mentor conversing with the academy leader.

"They delivered the scroll. Perhaps it that threat would be more reserved for the ones who had less significant tasks.", the head teacher stated.

"Rin, not a single ninja in that academy perished. Our discovery must be known by now. We have limited options left. Even though we have the scroll, our specific purpose for it, means nothing without the boy present."

"As Haruka said, he will come here without force."

"Our plan involved him being here by now. Now he will be on guard for our plans now."

"Fear not, our spy within their academy should be able to make use of the situation. Yuuta in fact tells me, it will simple to get him into place for our plan to come to fruition.", she said confidently.

"If she is certain, make sure you see to it personally that it holds true. We cannot leave anything to chance this time. Also inform Yuuta that when they enter the tower, do whatever it takes to kill as many ninja she can before they're aware of her betrayal.", her superior ordered.

"As you wish, master Xenon."

Later...

As master Rin exited the room she telepathically communicated with Yuuta relaying the headmaster's message. "Message to Agent Yuuta, urgent message do you copy?"

"I read you. What happened, (Name) is still here."

"Change of plans, do whatever you must to lure him here. Preferably before your squad arrives so we can discretely proceed to phase 2."

"And if they make it within the tower walls."

"Moment that happens, Execute Operation: Have Your Back."

"Beeeeautiful darling. You won't mind if I have fun with a few."

"I don't micro manage."

The call ended leaving Yuuta with a small but sharp grin to her side. Eagerly awaiting the time when she would be able to reveal her true colors.

"Ugh...what happened? What's going on?" you wondered.

Then belonged to Kiriya who was sitting by your side keeping watch over you.

Kiriya looked at you his face in a very serious expression. "(name). Listen to me. I need you to tell me something," he said. "What happened to you while you were resting at the infirmary?"

Then Kiriya explained what had happened. When he finished telling you, your eyes were wide with shock.

"No...no way..." you murmured. "All of that happened while I was asleep?!"

"Yes. That's why the girls are at the hospital. Only Katsuragi and Ikaruga had major injuries, but... that's not the worst part. The master scroll was stolen."

"No...you're kidding.... I...did all of that while I was asleep?!?!"

"I wouldn't exactly say asleep," said Kiriya. "Someone had put something in your room to put you in an induced coma."

"And we were attacked by those Hebijo girls again and that witch Haruka came back and used me to steal the master scroll!?"

Kiriya answered with a simple nod. You clenched your fists in anger. Then you ripped the covers off of you and got dressed.

"(name)! Where are you going?" demanded Kiriya. "I haven't finished telling you everything!"

"That's weird," she said. "I thought I heard (name) just now."

Unknown to her, you had jumped out an open window undetected and leapt into the darkness.

"Goddammit," you said as you punched the bag harder and harder every time you cursed. "Damn it... damn it, damn it, damn it, DAMN IT, DAMN IT, DAMN IT, DAMN IT!!!!!!!!!"

You were panting hard taking out your anger on the punching bag a little tired, but you still felt angry at yourself.

"I'm a disgrace..." you said. "I'm a disgrace to all ninja...a disgrace to my mother... I don't deserve to call myself a ninja."

"That's not true!" said a voice indignantly.

You turned around and you saw....

"I've heard rumors of an ancient training that the ninja once did, but was eventually stopped due to how dangerous it was and even made it not required for students. And it was called...Hai-kin-gu!"

"Uh....didn't you just say the same thing Ikaruga?" asked Hibari who was a little confused.

"Allow me to explain Hibari," you said. "Hai-kin-gu or crawling tense dread as it's called is one of the most severe forms of training for a shinobi. A training of survival and skill. Shinobi have to survive a deadly terrain like this one for approximately two days with only the bare essentials. After that, shinobi then have to carry out a mission with a specific purpose to strengthen their survival skills."

"Wait... how do you know that (name)?" asked Asuka.

"Because I took this kind of training myself. Twice in fact," you replied. "The first time I almost died. The second time I was close to dying, but I managed to make it through."

"What?!?!"

The rest of the girls looked at you in shock.

"But... I thought hiking was supposed to be fun and stuff!" whimpered Asuka.

"No! I'm scared! I don't wanna go!" cried Hibari her eyes welling up in tears.

"There's a scroll somewhere on top of the mountain over there," continued Kiriya. "The first shinobi to get it will be the winner."

"So it's a competition now?" asked Ikaruga a smirk working to her lips. "Interesting."

"Yeah. Sounds like a lot of fun," said Katsiragi pumping her fist. "Let's do this!"

"But can't we just go on a normal hike instead?" whimpered Hibari.

"Don't worry Hibari," said Yagyu. "There's nothing to worry about because I'll protect you."

"Alright," said Asuka pumping herself up. "Let's do this. I can do this!"

"All right! Now we're talking!" you said cracking your knuckles. "It's been a while since I've had do life or death training. This'll be good for me."

"Actually (name). You'll be staying behind," said Kiriya.

"What?! Why?!"

"You will be undergoing a different type of training," explained Kiriya. "A training that's different, but just as difficult as the Hai-kin-gu."

"Aww come on Sensei! I want in on the action too!" you complained. "Sure it was dangerous and... I almost died both times, but it was good training for me!"

"Enough of your complaining," said Kiriya. "Besides I don't want you help the girls considering the fact that you've done it twice. Now girls...ready..... go!!!"

As soon as he said go, the girls disappeared into the air leaving you and Kiriya by yourselves. You were a little disappointed that you didn't get to go, but you felt a little relieved too. Kiriya then turned to you.

"Now then... (name). Are you ready for your training?" asked Kiriya.

"Yes. I'll do any form of training you ask Sensei," you said. "Bring it on!"

"Very well," said Kiriya. "You will be undergoing training from an instructor who I assigned to you. Wait here and your instructor will be here. Good luck."

And then Kiriya disappeared in a puff of smoke leaving you coughing from it.

"Geez. Sometimes I hate it when he does that," you muttered. "I wonder who my instructor will be."

You answer came sooner than expected for just then...
