Back with Katsuragi, she was trudging in the snow while the wind howled and blew. She shivered as she walked through the snowy wasteland.

"Geez it's cold," she shivered. "If I'm not careful I'm gonna freeze by butt off!"

Just then Katsuragi heard a deep rumble of footsteps coming from just in front of her. Her eyes then widened as a creature stood up in front of her and let out a roar. She was standing face to face with a creature she didn't expect to see. A giant polar bear.

"What the hell?!?!" cried Katusragi. "I thought this was Japan not the Arctic!"

The polar bear growled at Katsuragi and stood up on it's rear paws thinking that she was invading in it's territory and then charged straight for her letting out a ferocious roar.

"You wanna go? Fine then!" smirked Katsuragi. "Time to boogie with the bear!'

She leaped up above the bear avoiding it's charge then gave it a sharp kick to it's back causing the bear to stumble on to it's face on the snowy floor. The bear got back up and then charged towards Katsuragi again, but then Katsuragi side stepped and glomped onto the the bears back and wrapped her legs and her arms around the giant's neck putting it a large headlock. The bear struggled and bucked trying to knock her off it's back, but Katsuragi kept a firm hold not letting go squeezing tighter. The polar bear was soon running out of air and getting weaker by the second.

"What's wrong?" smirked Katsuragi. "Giving up already?"

The beast gave a weak grunt practically saying that it gave up as Katsuragi finally let go and the bear fell to the ground defeated.

"Let that be a lesson to all bears who decide to pick a fight with Hanzo Academy's number one shinobi!" she said.

Then feeling cold from another chilly breeze, Katsuragi couldn't help but let out a small sneeze.

"Geez! It's freaking cold out here!" she shivered. "I better transform into warmer clothes before I freeze to death."

Using the power of the Shinobi Transformation, Katsuragi quickly changed her clothes. Although it wasn't what she expected. She was now wearing a body suit of a sumo wrestler. Not only that, but it was also very heavy.

"What the.... heck is this?" she wondered. Then she shrugged. "Oh well. As long as it keeps me warm who cares? In the meantime... I better get to the top before anyone else does."

Katsuragi then started walking with the suit heavily weighing her down. Then suddenly she saw something else. In the howling winds with the blowing snow, something stood in front of her a few feet away. A strange shadowy figure.

"What the... who is that?" wondered Katsuragi.

The figure stood there as if it was watching Katsuragi then it went straight for Katsuragi making a mad dash toward her. Before Katsuragi had a chance to react the figure attacked her by zipping right by her causing her to stumble and almost fall but she managed to stay up.

"Hey! What the hell?! Show yourself!" Katsuragi yelled. "If you're looking to pick a fight, then I'll give you one!"

"That's fine with me," said a voice. "I've been looking for a fight. Especially with you Hikage."

"What the crap? Hikage? What are you talking-"

Before Katsuragi could react, the figure attacked again knocking Katsuragi back and tearing her sumo outfit lightly. Katsuragi then suddenly realized something.

"Wait a minute... I recognize this! This is what (name) did back from before!" she thought.

"(name)! Is that you?!" she called. "If it is then why are you attacking me?! And why do you think I'm Hikage?!"

"That's something that you don't need to know," you said seeming to come from all around her. "After all you're going to be defeated right here and now."

Then you dashed back and forth attacking Katsuragi with your claws. Katsuragi tried to fight back, but due to her weighted sumo outfit, she couldn't do much of anything. Her outfit also kept getting ripped open with gashes due to your claws. At the this rate, her outfit would be gone and she would be wide open to the cold.

"I gotta turn back and try to fight back," she thought.

She was just about to, but then you attacked again right at her leg. The blow didn't hurt her due to her outfit, but it caused to stumble. She tried to regain her balance, but she couldn't. She fell over and then started to roll down the slope. As she rolled, snow began to stick to her and then she started to turn into a giant snowball.

"Wait.... what the... aw crap! Somebody stop me!" she cried as she rolled down the snowy slope out of sight.

You watched a little surprised as to what had happened to Katsuragi, but then you put it out of your mind.

"At least that's one more down," you said to yourself. "That makes three. And considering the fact that there have been nothing, but those evil ninja girls from before, there should be two left. That swordswoman that Asuka fought and that Haruka girl."

"Yagyū said that it was because (name) thought that she was one of the evil ninja," said Hibari. "Although she doesn't know why. Maybe we got poisoned or something?"

"I don't know, but this could be a problem," said Asuka. "If (name) has been poisoned and is seeing things, then there's a possibility that he could come after us."

"What?! Please tell me you're joking!" whimpered Hibari.

"As much as I hate to say it, but I think Asuka's right," said Yagyū. "(name) will most definitely come after us and to add to that he's an experienced ninja. I'm afraid it's only a matter of time before he finds us and I don't know if we can put up much of a fight against him."

"Then we gotta get moving before that happens," said Asuka. "And we better find Katsuragi and Ikaruga too. Those two are practically by themselves and if (name) finds them... I don't even wanna think about it. Let's go."

She then helped Hibari carry Yagyū and were just about to start walking when suddenly...

"(name) what are you doing attacking us like this?!" she demanded. "Don't you know that you're attacking your own friends?"

"Listen to us (name)!" cried Hibari. "We're not who you think we are! It's us! Asuka, Hibari, and Yagyū!"

"I'm not gonna fall for your tricks Haruka!" you said. "You may have been able to get me the first two times around, but you won't get me a third time! I'm especially gonna enjoy beating you up as payback for what you did! Even if you are an illusion!"

You readied your claws and prepared to attack and Asuka readied her twin swords.

"Hibari! Get Yagyū to safety and run!" she cried. "I'll try to hold him off!"

"No Asuka! I can't!" said Hibari. "(name)'s way too strong for you to fight!"

She then saw you walking towards her cracking your knuckles. "You should be more concerned about yourself," you said. "And trust me, you better be concerned because even though your an illusion Haruka, when I'm done with you you're gonna wish you never laid eyes on me."

Hibari trembled feeling very frightened. She didn't know what to do. She knew she had to fight you, but she was scared of hurting you. But then, Hibari remembered when she cheered you up back when you were upset. That made her pluck up courage and put up her fists.

"I'm sorry (name)... I know you're not thinking straight, but I'm gonna try and set you straight!" she said determined.

You smirked branding your claws. "That's just the way I like it," you said. "Hope you're ready for a beat down!"

Hibari then dashed forward and attacked with a flurry of punches, but you parried each one with ease. She then tried to kick you, but you caught her foot and threw it away causing Hibari to stumble. Seeing an opening, you then gave Hibari a punch to her stomach making her gasp in pain. Hibari held on to her stomach feeling the wind being knocked out of her body.

"Come on Haruka, is that the best you got?" you asked. "If it is, then I'm very disappointed."

"(name)! I'm not Haruka!" said Hibari. "It's me Hibari! You have to to snap out of it!"

Ignoring her plea, you then attacked again slashing Hibari with your claws. They tore through her clothes as well as her skin making her yelp in pain. You slashed and attacked Hibari until her clothes were in tatters and her skin was littered in bruises and cuts. Hibari was in pain and could hardly stand, but she still stood bravely before you.

"(name)... please... you have to wake up..." she said weakly. "please... wake up..."

You answered by slowly walking up to her and gave her one more punch to her gut and punched her right in the cheek making her fall to the ground unconscious. You walked up to her and then stepped on her stomach like a hunter killing its prey.

"And that makes five," you said. "Now that I took out all of the fakes, it's time for me to head up the mountain. Too bad the girls aren't here to see me kick as and get some payback."

And then after taking one last look at Hibari who you thought was Haruka, you walked away heading towards the mountain.

111332222222222222222222221222222222211.content:
You are a "Limiter" in the world of Freezing. You have a genetic power that allows you to manipulate and neutralize a field created by an alien race called Novas. Your a rare and special case as the source of your power called "Stigmata" had suffered a rare genetic disorder making your powers exceptionally limited compared to other limiters. You have already gone to an academy that honed your skills and had a partner called a "Pandora". But due to a recent attack from a Nova your partner died. Many speculate the cause of he death was due to your flawed stigmata forcing you to return to the academy. Your return is expected to be less than welcoming.

You got off the bus dropping you off and you saw the campus for the first time in a year and a half. The memories of your first couple years came rushing back as you walked through the grounds again. It was lucky that nobody knew who you were on sight, but still you couldn't help but feel judged. Sooner or later, the whole school would know about me.

You dropped off your belongings in your old room. Convenient being placed in your old one from your previous years. Your first class wouldn't be until tomorrow so you thought for today you'd go around and see who the top students are this time. "Hmm?", looking out from your window you could see a sparring match with a young blonde woman against another student. You shut your window and lifted the blinds, "This won't be like last time.", you said to yourself. Walking out your door you made your way to where the action was.

As you were making your way to the match you noticed in the courtyard a dark skinned woman, with short white hair, eating a burger along with two other girls. One who was shorter than the rest with white hair but curly loops on her sides and a tall red-head with a pony tail. They all seemed to be socializing but then the pony-tailed one noticed you and called you over.

"Oh hey! You!", she called out.

Not wishing to be rude you went over to see what she wanted. "Yes? May I help you?", you replied.

"You look very familiar do I know you from somewhere?"

Of course someone who went here long enough to have noticed you but still be taking classes would spot you eventually. But from her choice of words she may not know who you are. Not yet at least. Probably the best thing would be to lie, but honesty is always honored among friends. Assuming these people are going to be your friends.
111332222222222222222222221222222222211.title: Plot 1

choices: You run into a young woman with short brown hair (Chiffon)
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
As much as you wanted to tell you the truth, you thought it would be a good idea to lay low just in case. So you played dumb.

(name): Um...no. Sorry you must be confused with someone else.

The red haired pony-tailed girl squinted and look a good look at you. She looked at you up and down and all around trying to figure out where she saw you. Then the girl with white hair and curly loops spoke.

Girl with white hair: What's wrong Arnett? This boy interest you for some reason?

Girl with red hair: Shut up Attia. I'm just trying to figure out who this boy is. I swear I could've sworn I seen of him before.

(name): I'm sorry but again you must have me confused with someone else. Sorry.

Dark skinned girl: Hey. Stop looking at the guy like that. You're creeping him out.

Arnett: Oh come on Creo. I'm trying to figure out who he is.

Attia: Well that's a first.

The dark skinned girl got up from her seat and came up to you. When you saw her, you could see that she was pretty and very kind. Her smile almost made your heart jump out of your chest. But then you out that feeling out of your mind.

Creo: Hey there. My name's Creo Brand. You already met my friends. The one who was looking at you was Arnett McMillan and the short girl over there is Attia Simmons.

Attia: Hey! Don't call me short!

(name): Well it's a pleasure to meet all of you. I'm (name).

Creo: (name) eh? Well (name) it's a pleasure to meet you too.

When Creo smiled at you, you couldn't help but look away. Then you heard the sound of something metal clashing. It was coming from the training grounds. You almost forgotten that you were trying to get to the fighting area to watch the fight. You figured it was time to end the conversation before you missed it.

(name): Listen. Sorry, but I have to go. There's something.....I need to do. Bye!

Then you ran off. Attia, Arnett, and Creo watched in curiosity as you ran toward the grounds.

Attia: Well. He certainly seemed like an interesting boy.

Arnett: Yeah. Hmm. I wish I knew where I saw that kid. I get the feeling that I've heard of him before.

Attia: He's a first year perhaps?

Creo: He definitely isn't a first year. That's for sure.

Arnett: How could you tell?

Creo: I can tell just by looking at him. He's probably a second year at the most.

Arnett: Wow Creo. Since when have you gotten an interest in boys like that? Thinking about making him your limiter?

Creo: It's not like that alright? I'm just saying....

Attia: Now, now you two. Let's not fight. Besides I'm starting to wonder about that boy too.

Creo: You too Attia?

Attia: Yes. In fact, I think this is something worth looking into. We should look into it.

Meanwhile back with you, you followed the sounds of the metal clashing into the training grounds. Then....
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Lie

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Suddenly you heard the sound of a window crashing right in front of you. A young girl with red hair tied in pigtails landed right in front of you. She was covered in scratches and blood and her clothes were in tatters. She was Ganessa Roland. A second year fighting the blond girl you saw earlier, but you didn't know this yet.

Ganessa: Damn it. No fair! What's the point in getting stronger if she's gonna get stronger too?

She looked in front of her to see that a young boy with two girls staring at her. They were Kazuya Aoi, Chiffon Fairchild, and Ticy Phenyl. Ganessa blushed and defensively covered herself.

Ganessa: Hey! What are you looking at you perv?!

Young boy: Um....sorry ma'am nothing.

Then another young woman leaped from the window and landed between them. She was the blond haired woman you saw before who was Satellizer El Bridget. She was tall and practically had not a single scratch on her. As soon as the two saw each other the boy rushed forward toward the blonde girl and hugged her from behind causing both of them to fall to the floor in a very awkward position. Everyone who was watching the scene gaped in shock.

Chiffon: Oh crap! Why did he have to grab her of all people?!?

Ticy: Oh no! Kazuya!

They were expecting Satellia to fly off the handle and kill him, but she had a different reaction that puzzled them. Kaguya who was now burying his face in her breasts crying made Satellia blush with a frightened look on her face and she was trying to push her skirt down so her panties and her garter belt wouldn't show.

Chiffon: Wait a minute. Why is she acting all cutesy and shy all of a sudden?

Ticy: I know. Weird right?

Kazuya: I missed you so much! Don't ever leave me again!

Satellizer: No....please! Let me go! Stop it!

Kazuya: No! Never!

Suddenly a grid like pattern spread itself around them making Satellizer unable to move. When you saw it, you immediately knew what it was.

(name) thinking: What the crap?!? A freezing area?! How is that possible? Is that kid causing it?

Then you saw Ganessa who was almost forgotten in the sidelines. She jumped up and unleashed chains with spikes that came from her back and went for the kill.

(name): Hey! Look out!!!

Ganessa: This fight isn't over yet!

Then what happened next made you freeze in horror. Ganessa's attack connected and the scene was died in red. As soon as you saw the blood, a vision or your memories flashed in your mind. You were next to your partner holding her in your arms. She was covered in blood and she was on the brink of death. You were crying and kept saying sorry over and over again. Your partner said nothing. The only thing that she did was smile at you. Then she passed on in your arms. You seeing your partner die screamed in despair. You couldn't bear to see this scene anymore so you ran. Chiffon hearing your footsteps looked in time to see you run away. At first she was going to call out to you to stop you, but taking care of Kazuya came first. Meanwhile you kept running. You didn't care where you went or how long you had to run. You just wanted to get away from the scene that had just transpired as soon as possible. Soon you stopped running and took a breather. You didn't know where you were but you didn't care. You were too freaked about having that vision of what happened to you and your partner in the past. You clenched your fist and punched the wall in anger and despair.

(name): Damn it! Why?! Why are those memories coming into my head right now?! Why now?!? Why now of all times?!

Sadly the only thing that answered you was a small echo of your voice. Then.....
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Other

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
"Hey are you alright?", said someone.

"Gah...uh? Uh its nothing. Oh its you, Arnett was it?", she along with Creo and Attia came by noticing your ptsd episode.

"Yeah I heard you smashing your hand on the wall. Someone messing with you already?"

"No! It's just nothing. Excuse me I need to go."

"Whoa whoa whoa, easy there captain jumpy. Since your new around here and we've taken a liking to you your not handling your issues alone.", Attia said.

"Taken a liking to me? What, is this one of those classic high school harems?"

The girls all laughed for good minute until they got their composure, "No, were not in love and trying to be your girlfriends. Your just an interesting guy and we wanna be your friends. If sparking our curiosity didn't do it, then that joke certainly sealed the deal.", Arnett explained.

It was both flattering and heartwarming to see people positively gravitating to you. They took you to a bench outside and all gathered around wanting to know what got you so angry and upset. "OK so now that your in a more calmer setting you feel like talking about it?", Arnett asked.

You almost wanted to, but you couldn't. Them knowing about your past would be difficult enough, but wanting to remember it was impossible for you. But you needed to tell them something. They're opening up to you by showing such compassion, the least you can do is provide an answer. "It....upstairs someone named Satilizer was frozen in place during a sparring match. She couldn't move and that...brought back some unpleasant experiences.", you couldn't go any further about it.

"Wait? Satilizer? THE Satilizer lost? Just now?", Attia asked.

"That's who they called her by."

"Oh my god! That's unbelievable! How'd she lose?!", Arnett asked

"Some guy just grabbed her and she was all timid and shy and then her opponent just froze her in place."

"Wait some random guy touched her? Anyone who ever touched her, even accidentally got the piss beaten out of them. And she was like a deer in headlights earlier?", Creo asked.

"More or less."

"We gotta go check this out!", Attia affirmed.

"Hey, we'll do that later. We switched it from (Name's) issues to someone else.", Creo said.

"Oh c'mon he can shrug it off this is more important! I'm going to get the details about this!", she said running off.

"Attia! Ugh, she can be so inconsiderate at times. Hey (Name) are you feeling better?", Arnett asked.

"Yeah, I'll just get some rest in my room and I'll be back in order. And thanks, it's great to know I got you friends like you.", you replied.

"Thank you, that's sweet.", Arnett said with her and Creo blushing lightly at your compliment. Arnett was about to hug you but being so close to her made you uncomfortable. It triggered another flashback of your partner, the memory was the two of you hugging and seeing Arnett about to do the same thing made you terrified. You immediately went to your room without saying anything.

Arnett and Creo were confused. "You think he might be related to Satilizer?", Creo asked.

"There is defiantly something he's not sharing with us."

"Give him time he'll open up. But what was that anyway?"

"Huh?", Arnett wondered.

"You don't show that sort of affection to people."

"I don't know he was just sweet and...never mind Creo let's go. Attia's probably expecting us to be right behind her right now.", Arnett blushed more and not cleverly dodging the question. Creo smiled knowing Arnett had a little crush on you. But truth be told she was a little touched by your compliment too.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Opening up

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
You were back in your room and you immediately went to the bathroom washing your face in water. You grabbed a towel from the hanger and dried off and starred deep into the mirror. You saw yourself, but only reflecting on both your failures and what got you to make them. "Dammit!", you yelled hitting the mirror. You sat on your bed pondering over recent events. "Never again.", you repeated over in your head again and again. "In this line of work......I can never have a relationship."
You were startled when you heard someone knocking on the door. "Who is it?", you asked.....
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Back to you

choices: A loud boom came from outside your window
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Meanwhile in a room with a giant screen showing a map of the area looking electronic. People were surrounded by map giving updates on the pandoras and the carnival which you had just witnessed the final moments of. Above them were three colonels who were watching the fight on screen along with a young woman wearing religious attire. (Sister Margaret) They had just witnessed everything that had transpired and the colonels were surprised.

Woman: Satellizer El Bridget was caught in a freezing area. Origin unknown......

Colonel 1: Does this mean that her opponents limiter was fighting too?

Colonel 2: That couldn't be possible. The carnival was made to be a battle between equals. Not to mention using a limiter would be against the rules.

Then from a camera near the scene a picture of an unconscious Satellizer with an unconscious Kazuya in her arms appeared on the screen. Chiffon and Ticy were also in the picture along with Ganessa standing in triumph and you in the back watching and then running. The camera zoomed in on Kazuya.

Colonel 3: There's the culprit. But why would he interrupt the fight? Is he a limiter protecting his partner?

Woman: Negative sir. He's not a student in this academy.

Colonel 2: But he's wearing the uniform.

Sister Margaret: I see. It's you Kazuya Aoi.

Then the second Colonel squinted his eyes as if he was double checking what he was watching.

Colonel 2: Wait, go back a second. And zoom in at that boy in the back.

The camera zoomed in to where you were and soon your face was on the screen. When the colonels saw you, they all had looks of surprise and concern on their faces.

Colonel 1: That boy. Is he.....

Colonel 3: Yes. There's no mistake. That's the boy who was involved in that incident that happened a year and a half ago. (name).

Colonel 2: But.....what is he doing here? I thought he was sent back.

Colonel 1: Sister Margaret. Do you know anything about this?

Sister Margaret was silent. Then she spoke.

Sister Margaret: Yes. I had him transferred here in the hopes of being a fine limiter.

Colonel 3: Why would you do that? We all know that it is virtually impossible for that boy to become a decent limiter. You are aware of his condition right?

Colonel 1: His condition was the cause of death of a pandora. One of our most strongest assets no less.

Sister Margaret: Yes. I am aware.

Colonel 2: So why then? He is a danger to himself as well as the entire academy. He should be sent back home.

Sister Margaret: What you see as a danger, I see as a glimmer of hope. That is all I can say at the moment. For now, he is attending this academy. Do not worry. I will keep a watchful eye on him. Until then, he'll stays. Now I must go. I have business to attend to.

And with that Sister Margaret left leaving the colonels with worried looks on their faces. She walked out of the room and headed to her office. When she got into her office she sat down on the chair behind her desk and sighed.

Sister Margaret thinking: You may gone through a terrible ordeal (name), but I feel confident that you will be fine. You just need some time to heal and a partner. A partner that you can count on and trust. A partner that has the power to end your pain. I only pray that you will find that partner soon.

Meanwhile back in your room, you were lying down on your bed staring up at the ceiling. You were feeling a little bad for pushing Arnett away when she was trying to hug you. But you felt it was for the best. After all, you were still feeling a little scared after what had happened. The memories of you and your partner that you had tried to forget were now flashing in your mind for some reason.

(name): Damn it. Why are all of my memories coming back right now? I promised myself that I'd forget about all that.

You rolled to your side and looked at your desk and saw a photo. It was a photo of you and your partner smiling and being together. You got up from your bed and walked over to your desk. You picked up the photo and looked at it. Just looking at it made you feel even badder about what happened. You turned away and placed the photo face down so you wouldn't look it anymore. Then looked out your window. The sun was beginning to set and the sky was painted in a deep orange.

(name) thinking: I'm surprised that no one's recognized me yet. But then again I can't be too sure. I can't afford to let anyone find out about my condition or what happened. Because if they do, they'll call me useless or some kind of murderer.

Then you walked back to your bed and plopped down on the bed lying face down.

(name): I never want to go through that again. I'll never be someone's partner or have a relationship. Never again.

Then.....
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: other

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
"Yes?", you asked.

"It's me, Arnett.", she answered.

"Oh, come in.", she opened the door and came in. She seemed to be in an apologetic state from the looks of things. Her hands were twidling and she looked down on the floor looking ashamed.

"Hey so, about earlier. I'm sorry.", she apologized.

"Don't be. I've got issues."

"You don't peg me for someone who has issues."

"Well you shouldn't judge people so intently until you've properly gotten to know them."

"True enough. But honestly I'm sorry."

"Don't be, again not your fault. It's....don't tell Creo or Attia. Especially not Attia. I've had some problems with getting close to someone. And I'm taking my time and trying my best recover. So whether or not your just being flirtatious, all the physical affection you want to give out needs to be off limits."

"Well, fine I guess. I'll accept your wishes. But who said that hug wasn't meant to be flirting? Maybe I got a massive crush on you and want you as my limiter?"

Just when she said that you recalled the painful memories again however this time you diffused the unintended tension with a calmer attitude. "When i do decide to pick a pandora, I am making it strictly a professional partnership. Sorry."

"OH! Jeez look at me, making you uncomfortable twice in one day."

"Hehe, guess your excellent at pushing my buttons. I guess being your limiter would never work after all."

"Ehhahahahaha. Well anyway me and Creo will be having sparring matches for the next couple weeks. Attia has had hers already but maybe if you have time to catch them, Creo and me would appreciate you being there. And hey it might help find you a non-emotionally attached pandora your searching for. Although it's crazy for a limiter and pandora not to be emotionally invested in each other."

"Trust me I know.", you said coldly.

Arnett was curious why you answered that so harshly, "What's he been through?"

"Uh, anyway I'd love to make it to your matches. And Creo's too of course.", you replied trying not to let your issues get in the way again.

"Well she'll be glad to hear that. Any way see ya, talk to you tomorrow then?"

"Absolutely."

Arnett left waving goodbye relieving some of the stress you had mount up earlier today. You went to the desk and turned over the picture and looked for a second. You tried looking for a bit longer but the pain was still fresh. You turned it face down again breathing heavily.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Someone knocks on your door

choices: Kazuya along with Kaho and Arthur comes up to trying to make friends with you.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
The next day, you got up to another new day. You got dressed and got ready your first day in class. You were looking forward to seeing Attia and Creo in their sparring matches later on today, but at the same time you were feeling a little nervous because you were hoping that no one would recognize or know who you were in class. You fixed your uniform and prepared to leave for class. You were about to leave, but then you looked back. You saw the photo of you and your partner lying face down on your desk. You sighed and you walked out of your room trying to get the pain out of your mind.

(name) thinking: I can't think about that right now. I have to at least try to be a little more positive about things. Until then, time to get to class.

Then you set off for class. A little later class was about to begin and you took your seat. Your class was a mix between second years and first years. It was arranged that way because so the first years can learn a few things from the second years. Not to mention it was a great way to get two people together for partnership. Everyone was abuzz and talking about the latest news as well as the carnival. As you walked toward your seat, you couldn't help but overhear what some of the students were talking about.

Boy 1: Hey. Did you guys hear about what happened that the second year's carnival?

Girl 1: Yes. I heard! The untouchable queen Satellizer El Bridget was defeated by Ganessa Roland.

Girl 2: No way! You're joking!

Boy 1: I wish I was, but it's true! I saw it on the TV this morning!

Boy 2: Man. She must have been a powerful pandora to take down someone like Satellizer.

(name): More like a dirty coward.

Just remembering what happened the other day made you annoyed. You scoffed hearing this conversation and took your seat. Then a young woman stepped into the class room. She had short brown hair that extended to her neck. She was very slim, curvy and very young for her age. She was wearing a pale blue shirt with long sleeves with a tie matching her navy blue skirt. She was Yu-Mi Kim. She used to be a pandora who fought in the eighth nova clash, but now she serves as a teacher in the academy. Everyone immediately took their seats and gave her their utmost attention.

Yu-Mi: Alright everyone. Today we have a new student in our class today. I expect you all to give him a big welcome and to treat him with the utmost respect.

Then a boy entered the room. As soon as you saw him, you immediately recognized him. It was Kazuya the boy who you saw interfere with Satellizer's fight the other day. Then another vision entered your mind. You were seeing your partner for the first time in your class. When you first saw her, it was love at first sight. You couldn't help but stare at her. Then she saw you. When she did, she gave you a friendly smile. You shook your head trying to snap out of your vision. Kazuya politely bowed and introduced himself.

Kazuya: Hello. I'm Kazuya Aoi. It's really nice to meet you all.

Then a young girl with short brownish red hair gasped in surprise as if she had seen him before. She was Kaho Hiiragi, a first year student and the class rep. When Yu-Mi caught her outburst she teased her a little.

Yu-Mi: What's is it Ms. Hiiragi? Something caught your eye?

Kaho: No! It's nothing like that ma'am!

Yu-Mi: Calm down I was joking. (laugh) In any case, you can take a seat in any desk that's available Kazuya.

Kazuya: Ma'am.

Then Kazuya went to take his seat. As he walked past a couple of girls, they giggled and went on about how cute he looked.

Girl 1: Oh wow. He's so cute!

Girl 2: Yeah! He's just my type!

Girl 3: Hey Kaho. He's certainly got your attention am I right?

Kaho: Oh be quiet. That's how rumors get started.

Then Kazuya sat down in an empty seat two seats away form you from the side.When you saw him, you couldn't help but recall the past events that triggered your memories to resurface. Not to mention you were trying to figure out who this boy was and how he did what he did when he froze Satellizer. Just thinking about it for some reason made you annoyed.

(name) thinking: Damn it. I don't know why, but every time I look at this guy he annoys the hell out of me. Not to mention I'm still trying to figure out how the heck he was able to use a freezing area without an ereinbar set. Damn.

Then Kazuya looked at you as if he felt that you were staring at him. Both of you stared at each other for about a few seconds. Then Kazuya smiled and waved at you trying to be friendly. You looked away and just ignored him. Class went by pretty quickly and it was soon lunchtime. The cafeteria was abuzz with chatting and the smell of food filled the air. What was great about the cafeteria in the academies was the different foods available and it was all you can eat. Everyone was in groups eating their lunch either chatting about the news or watching the TVs. You were sitting alone by yourself eating your lunch ignoring the noise of bustling students. You didn't like being alone, but you were used to it by now. Besides the only people that you ever talked to was Attia, Arnett, and Creo and they were no where to be found.

(name) thinking: They're probably getting ready for their sparring matches. I wonder if they're at the training field for their sparring matches. Well. Might as well go find out.

You finished your lunch and were just about to leave for the training area when....

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
You finished your lunch and were just about to leave for the training area when Kazuya along with Kaho and another boy named Arthur walked up to you. When you saw them, you instinctively looked away and pretended not to notice them.

Kazuya: Um..excuse me. You're from our class right? I couldn't help, but notice that you look a little lonely being by yourself. I'm Kazuya Aoi. It's nice to meet you.

You said nothing. You simply got up and walked away. You knew that it was a little mean to just ignore Kazuya like that, but you felt that it was for his own good. After all you didn't want to stand out. As you walked away, you heard Kaho and Arthur talk to Kazuya.

Kaho: What the heck is his problem?

Kaho: Talk about rude. Why did you try to talk to that guy anyway?

Arthur: Yeah. He doesn't exactly look like the type that wants to make friends.

Kazuya: I... don't know. I guess... I just hate seeing the guy looking alone like that.

Just hearing Kazuya say that made you feel even more annoyed. You walked briskly away trying to get away as soon as possible. Then the whole cafeteria went quiet. Nothing could be heard except for hushed whispers and murmurs. The reason was Satellizer. When everyone saw her, they either looked or ran away in fear. Satellizer paid no attention. She simply walked to the Burger Queen stand bought three bags worth of burgers and walked away. Needless to say, you were a little puzzled by everyone's behavior. Not to mention you seemed to be the only one who wasn't frightened by Satellizer's appearance.

(name) thinking: So that's Satellizer huh? I wonder why everyone's so afraid of her. She's not that scary.

Kazuya seeing Satellizer walked up to her and grabbed her wrist. Everyone gasped in shock seeing Kazuya's actions and they expected the worst like Satellizer killing him or something, but the exact opposite happened. Satellizer blushed and pulled her hand away which caused her to drop her bags of food. Then she briskly walked away. As she was walking away, she wracked her mind trying to figure out the feeling she had when Kazuya touched her.

Satellizer thinking: He touched me. He touched me, but I didn't feel that horrible sensation. Why?

Then she noticed that someone was right by the exit of the cafeteria staring at her. You. When you and her locked eyes, Satellizer had a look of surprise and a bit of a scowl at the same time. You stared at her back not wanting to stand to no nonsense in case Satellizer was wanting to start something. The whole lunch room went deathly quiet. It was so quiet that you could cut the tension with a knife. Then finally you spoke breaking the silence.

(name): Can I help you with something?

Satellizer was silent for a moment and then her scowl changed into a look of as if she knew something that you didn't. She studied you carefully and then she spoke.

Satellizer: It's you. You're that boy from before.

Hearing that made your heart jump. Not to mention the cafeteria erupted in whispers and murmurs again.

Girl 1: No way! Does Satellizer know that guy?

Boy 1: She must know him! After all she said it herself.

Boy 2: Yeah, but who is that guy? I've never seen him before until today.

Girl 2: Maybe he's a transfer student or something?

(name) thinking: Oh crap. This is the exact opposite of what I wanted. Now everyone's trying to figure out who I am. I better end this conversation before it takes a wrong turn.

(name) aloud: Listen. I don't know where you think you saw me, but all I can tell you is that you got me confused with someone else. Now if you don't mind, I got somewhere to be.

With that you turned around and walked away to the training area. As soon as you left, Satellizer watched you leave never taking her eyes of you. Then she left after you along with Kazuya who chased after her after picking up her burgers. Needless to say everyone was shocked as to what has just happened. Not only were you completely unfazed by Satellizer but you had the gall to talk to her too.

Boy 3: Oh man! You saw that right?

Girl 3: Yeah! That guy just totally talked to Satellizer!

Girl 4: No one's ever talked to Satellizer like that before!

Boy 4: I don't know if I should call him brave or call him crazy!

Meanwhile back to you, you were headed to the training area to see Arnett and Creo's matches. Hopefully you were able to make it before the matches were over. You walked down a corridor and came to a room with big doors. You walked through them and were welcomed to the sight of the training area. A sight you knew too well. The room was black with green lines all around it and as big as a small football field which was split into two sides. Here is where the pandora train to fight simulated matches on fighting nova to prepare them to fight the real thing or have spatting matches to train to see where they against other pandora. On one side was the simulator that simulated nova and on the other side was the simulator that simulated battlegrounds for the pandora to fight in. Pandora were clashing left and right either fighting nova or sparring with each other. You looked around trying to find Arnett or Creo, but the room was filled with mostly third years and their limiters so it was hard to find them.

(name): Man. Where could they be? I didn't think the training area would be this popular.

Then you heard a voice.

(voice): Well. I didn't expect to see you here Mr. (name).

You turned around and you see.....
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Kazuya along with Kaho and Arthur comes up to t...

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
As soon as you saw her you glared directly at her with a grim sense of hate, "Get out of here.", you demanded.

"Mr. (Name) I understand your angry with how certain events went over the last few months--"

"If you weren't important I'd beat the living hell out of you. What happened to her is your fault I know it.", you said holding her by her collar.

"Easy Mr. (Name), I meant no harm to befall your late pandora. We had high hopes for the both of you."

"Because of this damn system and your poor judgement she died that day. Not because of me, no YOU got her killed. So help me don't ever let me find you again or I won't be held responsible for what I'm going to do.", you threatened letting her go.

"Even if you could back up that threat were always keeping track of our most promising assets. Even special cases like you."

"Send my regards to the bureaucrats not getting their hands dirty in this damn war.", you walked away. "First that Satilizer girl, now Sister Margaret. My secret won't be safe much longer. How did Satilizer know me? I never saw her before. Hmm, there's defiantly something she knows. Ugh, never-mind came here to enjoy myself, not get worked up.", you thought.

It took some extensive looking around but you managed to find Arnett and Creo. They were in the audience seats watching other matches. Creo flagged you down and you sat in between the two. Certainly flipped over your mood. "Glad you came, I'll be going in 9 minutes to get ready."

"Awesome, worried I missed your match."

"Uuum...(Name) want one of my soft pretzel nuggets. They are REALLY good.", Arnett asked blushing slightly.

"Oh thank you, sure.", she took one from her tray and fed you one, you took a bite and couldn't believe how right she was. "Oh my god this is amazing.", you reacted.

"Here try it with mustard."

"Eww want me to gag I hate mustard.", you replied. Creo laughed lightly but Arnett felt a bit hurt. You immediately apologized not intending to be rude. "Sorry I was just exaggerating."

"Oh! My bad, uh want another plain one then?", she asked holding another one.

"How can I refuse such a kind offer.", you answered. She fed you another and you ate it.

"(Name) get up and cheer! They just took down a S-class Nova simulation! C'mon get up and roar!", Arnett said. She got up and cheered but honestly you'd prefer to just sit and watch. You instead clapped for the winners and relaxed in your seat. Creo was with you on that and did the same. You started to forget that the point was to find a pandora that would suit you without any emotional ties. But Arnett and Creo seemed to make you stay in the moment.

Across from the arena Sister Margaret saw you with Arnett noticing your positive behavior with her. "Hmm? I think we may have found our replacement.", she thought.

It was time for Arnett to leave and get ready to her small reluctance, "I'm going up soon. You'll see me in the arena, wish me luck?"

"Good luck out there.", you said.

"Don't let them rip your shirt again exposing your assets.", Creo said.

"Very funny Creo but thanks.", she left to her station with you alone with Creo.

"So how long have you know each other?", you asked.

"Just about all 3 years. You've seen her when she's nice, nicer than normal when she sees you even. But when she's fighting...", she hinted she'd be alot more different out in the arena. But you had no idea what she'd be like. "Now answer me a question."

"Shoot."

"Your a second year right?"

"Yeah?"

"How come you came back for a remedial course? No first years does this."

"Held back because of an illness, I'm technically finish my first year but taking second year classes in conjunction.", you lied.

"I see.", Creo responded. She thought it was a decent excuse but still something clicked in her saying it wasn't the full story. "Y'know Arnett has a crush on you right?", she replied.

"I'm not thick."

"Then why are you looking for a pandora who you don't even know?"

"Same reason why everyone does I guess.", you answered.

"Now lemme ask you something, you and Arnett have any limiters?"

"Not yet. Why?"

"Just asking.", truth be told you wanted one of them to be your partner but the fact was you needed to stay distant.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Sister Margaret

choices: Arnett comes back and sits next to you
Someone elses comes and sits next to you
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Then a woman's voice echoed throughout the area.

Woman: Attention. The next mock battle will now begin. Contestants please enter the ring.

Then two people entered the ring. On one side was Arnett and on the other was a another girl that you didn't know. When they entered the crowd erupted in cheers. You and Creo on the other hand sat and watched with anticipation.

Woman: Next match. Third year student Angelia Matoi versus third year student Arnett McMillan. The next match will begin in 5, 4, 3, 2, 1. Begin battle.

Angelia: Volt weapon deploy!

At the sound of her voice, two swords materialized from Angelia's hands. From the looks of things she looked like a fierce opponent.

(name): Oh wow. She looks strong. Hey Creo. Will Arnett be okay?

Creo: Don't worry she'll be fine. I'd be more worried about her opponent.

(name): What do you mean?

Creo: Just watch and you'll see what I mean.

Arnett: Volt weapon deploy, Scythe Machina!

Then a scythe materialized in Arnetts hands. It was about as long as her height and double-headed with one of the blades being longer than the other. At first you were awed by Arnett's volt weapon, but then you noticed something. Arnett had a whole different look on her face. She had a look of complete pleasure and sadism on her face. She looked a lion licking it's chops before pouncing on her prey.

Arnett: Now then....let's have some fun shall we? I swear when I get a hold of this cute little thing I can't control myself.

Then Angelia went on the attack. She brought down her swords and slashed at Anrett with her all her strength, but Arnett somehow disappeared and reappeared behind her. Angelia tried again, but the same thing happened. Then she used acceleration to try to get behind Arnett and get her in a sneak attack. Sadly it would fail for simply used her scythe to defend herself. The metal colliding made a loud clang that echoed throughout the area. Angelia gaped in shock while Arnett looked up with a bored look on her face.

Arnett: Oh come on. I would have at least hoped to get a decent fight from you. How boring.

Angelia: It's not over yet! Don't underestimate me!

Angelia went on the attack again trying to at least score a hit on Arnett, but every attack either missed or was deflected. To make matter worse for Angelia, she was getting tired. Her moves were getting more and more slower. Just when she was about to attack her again, Arnett made her move. With a twisted smile on her face she dodged it again, but this time she attacked. She dodged the attack and appeared in front Angelia with an acceleration that had so much speed, you didn't even see her move. Then she gave her scythe a mighty swing and slashed her at her. Blood gushed out from Angelia's wound while she screamed in pain as her skin as well as her clothes were ripped. Arnett only smiled and she licked the end of her scythe tasting the fresh blood on the blade. This sight made you get chills down your spine and little nauseous.

Arnett: Well, well. Looks like I may be able to have some fun with you after all. Come on! Play with me! Let's play some more!

(name): What the crap?! What's gotten into Arnett? She's become a completely different person now. Not to mention she's super fast.

Creo: That's how she is. Normally she's like any other girl. But when she gets into combat or even thinks about it, she becomes a complete sadist.

(name): Say what?

Creo: That's right. But as twisted as she is, she's a master of her scythe as well as a master of the accel turn. It's because of those things that make her the woman she is. The fourth ranked of the third years. The Scythe Trickster. Arnett McMillan.

Meanwhile back at the fight, Angelia was completely at Arnett's mercy. Arnett had been slashing at her left and right making her covered in wounds. Angelia tried to defend herself, but she couldn't keep it up much longer. Arnett gave her one more swing of her deadly scythe. There was a moment of silence. Then Angelia's chest exploded with blood from a huge gash on her neck and she fell to the ground. Arnett had won.

Woman: The winner of this match, third year student Arnett McMillan.

The whole crowd erupted in cheers while two people who were paramedics placed Angelia on a stretcher and carried her away to be healed. You needless to say were a little shocked about what you had just witnessed.

(name): Whoa. She's.....brutal. Not to mention strong. That other girl couldn't even get a scratch on her.

Creo: I know. Told you so.

(name): Remind me not to get her angry or have her not to think about fighting.

Creo: Heh. Nice idea. Anyway I gotta go. It's my turn up next. Wish me luck.

(name): Um..yeah. Good luck.

Creo: Thanks. Hope you like the show.

Then Creo got up and went to get ready for her match while you stayed your seat. You were still feeling a little creeped out after Arnett and her sadistic side.

(name) thinking: Oh man. I still can't get over it. The way Arnett was fighting was crazy. It 's almost frightening. I never thought she had a dark side like that. (shivers)

Then......
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Arnett's sadistic side

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
"Hey (Name)! Did you see that?! She didn't stand a chance!", Arnett said in breathing heavily.

"Jeez you run from the arena all the way back so quickly? You look like you ran a marathon. And the fight was....man you were just.....different.", you said unsure what to say.

"Creo probably put it best so I won't repeat it. But trust me when I say your safe around me ok. As long as your not on the receiving end of my scythe."

"Good to know.", you answered sheepishly.

"Hehehe, seriously relax.", she wrapped her arms around yours pulling you close to her. You blushed big time and tried to pull away but Arnett wouldn't let you. "Oh c'mon ever been this close to a girl before?", she teased.

"Believe it or not NO.", Arnett then remembered, just as she was about to persist, about your issues and released you.

"Oh god sorry I got caught in the moment. Sorry."

To your surprise you didn't feel like when she tried hugging you before. This time it felt natural, the pain was completely oblivious. For some reason Arnett in particular was instigating relief to your pain. Seeing her so down you decided to let her go along with it, as a sign showing your opening up to her. "Hey it's fine. You can cling on if you want."

Arnett was surprised but slowly accepted your offer. She blushed a shade of pink and her heart beat rised. "(Name) do you like me?"

It wasn't hard to figure out she was fond of you, and even Creo said she is, but still you couldn't allow yourself to go further with it. But still, "Your very beautiful Arnett and I'd be lying if I said I wasn't. But..."

"Your not ready?"

"Something like that. But yeah."

"Well...what ever."

"Huh?"

"Your really cute, your mysterious, funny, handsome what's not to like about you? But hey I won't force myself to wait on one guy. Besides we'll need to find our own partners if were not going to end up as a match."

"I understand. I'm sorry."

"Hey if were still without a partner by the time we graduate I'll leave myself available for you."

"Anyone who has you as a pandora will be the luckiest guy in the world."

"Ditto.", she hugged you this time no flashbacks, no nothing. You returned her hug and wished nothing but the best for her. The announcer started to introduce Creo which meant she was going to show her stuff.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Arnett makes her peace

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Woman: The next mock battle will now begin. Contestants please enter the ring.

Once again two people entered the ring. This time one side was a girl with long red hair and on the other side is Creo.

Arnett: Here we go. Make sure you watch closely (name).

(name): Okay.

Woman: Next match. Third year student Tsubaki Parker versus third year student Creo Brand. The next match will begin in 5, 4, 3, 2, 1. Begin battle.

Tsubaki: Volt weapon deploy! (An axe appears in her hands)

(name): Whoa. That's a pretty big axe. Wonder what volt weapon Creo has.

Creo cracked her knuckles and punched her hands together.

Creo: Volt Weapon deploy. Infinity Fang!

Then a pair of steel gloves appeared in her hands. When you saw them, you were a little puzzled.

(name): A pair of gloves? That's her volt weapon?

Arnett: I wouldn't underestimate her if I was you. I'll admit it her volt weapon doesn't look much, but trust me. There's a reason why she's ranked fifth in our year.

(name): Huh?

Tsubaki: Get ready Creo! You're going down!

Tsubaki raised her axe, charged at Creo using acceleration, and brought down her axe with all her might. Creo stood there completely calm and side stepped the attack. Tsubaki tried again, but the same result happened. Tsubaki kept attacking but Creo was able to dodge them with ease. She hadn't even made her attack yet.

Tsubaki: Damn it! Stay still and fight me!

Creo: Sorry to disappoint you, but you won't be able to hit me with attacks like that.

Tsubaki: Grrrrr!!!! Why you....!!

Hearing that comment Tsubaki seethed in anger and charged at Creo again. This time she charged at her using acceleration and then she began to glow and split into two of herself.

(name): She's using an acceleration and a tempest turn? Amazing.

Arnett: Oh please. That's nothing. She's got nothing on Creo.

(name): Huh? What do you mean Arnett?

Arnett: Just watch.

Back at the match Tsubaki was using her speed and her afterimages from her tempest turn to run around Creo to try and confuse her. Then she appeared from behind and attacked.

Tsubaki: Now I have you!

(name): Oh no! Creo!

From the looks of things it looked like Creo was gonna get hit, but then Creo simply turned around and blocked the axe with one hand.

Tsubaki: No way! She....

(name): Blocked it with only one hand!

Arnett: You ain't seen nothing yet. Creo's just getting warmed up.

Tsubaki tried to pull back her axe trying to get away from Creo, but some reason she couldn't. Creo had a firm hold of her axe and she wouldn't let go. Then she looked at Tsubaki with a confident as well and a serious look on her face.

Creo: You call that a tempest turn? Please. You're way too slow. Don't take this personally, but I think it's time I finish this. I don't wanna drag this out anymore than I already have.

Then Creo suddenly disappeared. Before Tsubaki had a chance to react she left a powerful punch hit her on the side of her face. Next she felt punch on the other side of her face and a punch in the gut. Tsubaki staggered back, but she got her footing. She now had coming out from the side of her lip. She looked around trying to see where Creo was. Then she saw her on her right. She then went on the attack again and slashed at Creo. You were expecting Creo to dodge, but the exact opposite happened. Instead she sliced right at Creo's chest.

(name): Oh no Creo!!

Arnett: Don't worry. She's fine.

Tsubaki: Ha! Got you!

Tsubaki thought she actually scored a hit, but she couldn't have been more wrong. Creo's body was expected to fall after she was hit, but instead it disappeared. It was nothing more, but an afterimage.

Tsubaki: What the...!

(name): It was an afterimage?!

Suddenly Creo appeared right behind her. She charged at her using a tempest turn which made it look like there was three of her. Tsubaki tried to defend herself using her axe, but Creo punched right through her axe shattering it. Then she unleashed a barrage of punches at a lightning fast speed. Blood spewed out from Tsubaki and her clothes were ripped to shreds. Then Creo reappeared in front of her and stood there. Tsubaki staggered for one moment and then she fell down to the ground defeated. The crowd erupted in cheers while you gawked in shock after what you just witnessed.

Woman: The winner of the match, third year student Creo Brand.

(name): No way. She defeated her in an instant. She was as fast as you Arnett. Maybe even faster.

Arnett: Well I don't know about that, but I can tell you that Creo is definitely a strong opponent. She's an expert at close combat and she's well known for her excellent speed which is why she's known for two things. The fifth ranked third year and The Lightning Hammer.

(name): The lightning hammer huh? It definitely suits her.

As you looked back to the battlefield you could see Tsubaki being carried away by medics and being sent to the infirmary and Creo heading back to the rooms. When she looked and saw you in the crowd, she gave you a small wave and you waved back.

(name) thinking: Wow. I never imagined that Creo was so strong. I hate to admit it, but she would make an awesome partner for any limiter. Well almost any limiter excluding me.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Creo fights

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Creo came out of the Arena feeling triumphant and filled with pride. She barley broke a sweat and felt like her skill had improved since her last match. You and Arnett came down to congratulate her with Arnett hugging Creo right then and there. "You were fantastic! Now guys are going to swarm at you to be your limiter.", she complimented.

"Thanks.", she replied.

"Creo you were amazing. I was guessing the whole time how you were winning and you were so fast it was unbelievable. Beautifully done.", you said.

"Thank you. I appreciate it.", she smiled.

You looked at the time and knew you needed to get to your room and get some rest. You had a long day tomorrow so you said your goodbyes to Creo and Arnett. "Seeya ladies I need to get going. Talk to you tomorrow."

"Bye (Name).", Arnett said. She had a cutesy look in her eyes which Creo noticed.

"You are completely infatuated with him. Just make him your limiter already.", she said annoyed with her.

"What? NO! Listen we talked about this before your match. And were going to stay friends.", she explained.

"Arnett you can be dumber than a bag of hammers. You want to be the best? Then have your crush as your limiter."

"A) He wants a professional relationship. B) He's not ready for that even if he wanted an romantic one. C) He likes me but not the same exact way I feel toward him."

"Fine, but give that love-struck face a rest then will ya? It's hard to watch unrequited love."

"Didn't know you felt so strongly about that Creo."

"Oh be quiet."
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Later.....

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
You had just made it back to your room feeling in a better mood. You entered your room took off you uniform, got dressed in your pajamas and plopped down on your bed. You were hoping to try and get some sleep, but for some reason you couldn't. You were still thinking about what you witnessed today at the training area.

(name): Man. I can't sleep. I still can't over how incredible Creo and Arnett were today.

You closed your eyes and thought back to Creo's and Arnett's matches. The way they defeated their opponents without breaking a sweat. The way that Arnett totally destroyed Angelia and the way Creo defeated Tsubaki with ease.

(name): Both of those girls are powerful in their own right. And they don't even have limiters. It's hard to believe that they're only ranked four and five. One things for sure, whoever becomes a limiter for either one of those two is definitely gonna be well protected. Maybe even me. Then again, I don't think I'll ever get a partner again after what I've been through.

Flashes of you and your partner ran through your mind again which made you cringe. You looked at your desk in the corner of your room. The photo of you and your partner was still lying exactly where you placed it. You got up and walked over to your desk and picked up the photo. The photo showed you and your partner looking so happy together. Seeing that photo made your memories come up in your mind again and that made you a little sad. It was hard to believe that you were once so happy.

(name): I can't believe it's been a year and a half since she died. If I had a chance to go back in time...I'd.....I would....

You couldn't even finish your sentence as tears began streaming down your face and dripped on the photo. Then you caught yourself and wiped your tears. You placed the back to where it was before and lied back down on your bed. Then a flashback of what Sister Margaret said to you flashed in your mind.

Flashback (courtesy of Kevkane101
Sister Margaret: Even if you could back up that threat were always keeping track of our most promising assets. Even special cases like you.

(name): Damn her. What the hell does she know? She thinks that me having some kind of condition with my stigmata makes me special? Yeah right. (sigh). I'm just a reject of a limiter. No pandora's ever gonna want me and I'm never gonna want a pandora.

You looked out the window and saw that the moon was shining brightly along with twinkling stars. You stared at the moon for a few minutes and then slowly fell asleep.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Back to you

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Meanwhile in the third year dormitories in a room which smelled of oils and perfume, a woman was sitting on the couch in her undergarments surrounded by three men. One of them was giving her arm a massage, another was pouring her a glass of wine, and the third was massaging her feet. The woman was Miyabi Kanazuki. A third year student who was known to have multiple limiters and gone through multiple baptsims. And she was getting info for her next one.

Miyabi: A first year boy and a transfer student to boot? Fascinating. But the question remains: is he qualified to receive my blessings?

The limiter who was massaging her feet nodded.

Miyabi: Show me.

The limiter dug into his pocket and took out his card and gave it to Miyabi. It is a little card of tech that served multiple purposes including taking photos. Miyabi pushed a button and a picture of Kazuya appeared on the card. Seeing Kazuya made her lick her lips with anticipation.

Miyabi: Oh my. He is rather cute isn't he? I Miyabi Kanazuki deem him worthy to receive baptism. As the limiter eater, it's my job to gobble him up.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Meanwhile.....

choices: You heard a scream coming from a rooftop
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
The next day it was the same as usual. You got up, got dressed, and headed for class. You got to your class and got ready to sit through another lesson about something that you really couldn't care less of. Soon you were at the door to your classroom. As you were about to open the door, you heard some of your classmates talking which made you stop.

Girl 1: Hey! Did you see the matches in the training area the other day?

Boy 2: Yeah. The third years are strong as they always have been.

Girl 2: Yeah. Did you see the way Arnett totally slaughtered that chick? I mean brutal right?

Girl 3: Well, did you expect anything less? I mean Arnett isn't called "The Slashing Trickster" for a reason.

Girl 2: Yeah, but still. I can't help but feel sorry for Angelia.

Boy 1: Yeah, but you got to give Arnett some credit though. She definitely showed off why she's number four in the third years.

Girl 1: You can say that again. Not to mention Creo. She may be number five, but she's no slouch either. In fact, I bet she could give Arnett a run for her money.

Girl 2: No kidding. Maybe she can get even higher. That is if she cane beat numbers three through one that is.

Boy 2: I'll tell you what. I think Arnett's the perfect partner for me. I'm gonna ask her if I can be her limiter.

Girl 1: Forget it. You wouldn't stand a chance. Arnett would turn you down in ten seconds flat.

Boy 2: Oh come on. Give him a chance. You never know. I'm going for Creo. She's got beauty and brawn to boot.

Boy 1: Yeah! Let a guy dream would you?

Girl 2: You boys never change do you?

At this point for some reason you were really annoyed hearing this conversation. You opened the door and entered the classroom. The group of students were were a few seats from your seat almost immediately stopped talking when you came in. They looked at you for a moment and then they looked away and huddled. You paid no attention. You simply walked over to your desk and took your seat. when you sat down, You could hear them talking again.

Boy 1: Hey. You see that guy? That's the guy who talked to "The Untouchable Queen" the other day.

Girl 2: What? No way! That's him?

Boy 2: Yeah. Apparently he had the guts to talk to her. He wasn't even scared of her. And that's not the weird part. Apparently "The Untouchable Queen" knows him for some reason.

Girl 1: Really?

Girl 3: Did they go to school together or something?

Boy 1: I don't know, but word on the street is the guy is a second year and he attended a different academy.

(name) thinking: Damn it. So much for trying to lay low. I wish they'd just leave alone already. Satellizer just had to go and say that she knew me. But the question is where? And how?

A few minutes later, Yu-Mi came in and class was underway. A little later it was lunchtime and you were eating by yourself as usual. You were sitting by the window looking at outside. At first it was the same as usual, but then Satellizer came into the lunch area again. Everyone who saw her once again steered clear and got out of her way. Satellizer bought her her food and walked out of the lunchroom. As she was leaving you and her locked eyes again. This time you didn't say anything. You simply looked away and pretended she wasn't there. Then she left. Not long after, you noticed that a certain someone followed her again out of the lunchroom.

(name): Oh brother. That Kazuya kid is at it again. I'll give him credit for not giving up, but at the same time I wish he'd stop already. If this goes on he'll probably get beaten p or something. Then again why do I care. It's none of my business.
