Kazuya: You monster! Leave her alone!

Miyabi heard Kazuya's remark and gave him a sadistic smile and began walking towards him.

Miyabi: Seems like you still need to be taught a lesson.

As you watched Miyabi walk towards Kazuya, you knew that you had to help him. You didn't want to see him hurt anymore than he already has. You were still a little beaten up, but you had the strength to talk.

(name): Hey! Leave him alone...you slutty bitch! Why don't you pick on someone....your own size?

Miyabi looked to where you were and gave you neutral look. You struggled to your feet using every ounce of your strength to get up.

(name): That's right. Don't waste your time with him! I'll be your opponent!

Kazuya: What the... What are you saying?! Stop it!

(name): Come on! You ain't so tough! You're only tough because you got these limiters with you! Without them you're nothing! You're just a second rate pandora who doesn't know how to control her hormones!

Now Miyabi caught your attention. She stopped walking towards Kazuya and started walking towards you.

(name): That's right! Come and get me you whore of a pandora, if you got the guts! Or are you just a slutty coward!?!

That was the final straw. Miyabi's eyes went wide with anger. Then she used an acceleration to and gave you a punch in the gut making you cough up blood and she elbowed you on the head making you slam to the ground. Then she materialized one of her daggers and raised it over her head preparing to stab you.

Miyabi: You little bastard. I was gonna take my time giving you your punishment, but the only punishment I can give you, IS DEATH!!!!!!!!!

She brought down her knife and you shut your eyes. Then....
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: You jump out of the way to dodge it.

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Just when you thought it was all over, you heard Kazuya scream.

Kazuya: LEAVE THEM ALONE!!!!!

Suddenly a blue light erupted from Kazuya's body and a freezing spread all around the area. Miyabi and her limiters were frozen in place while you at the same time were able to move again.

Miyabi: He was able to cancel out their freezing while casting a freezing on me?! Impossible! No limiter should be able to have so much power!

(name) thinking: Incredible! He did it again! This time it's way more powerful than before! He was able to cast a freezing area without an Ereinbar set! Kazuya......just what the hell are you?

Then you felt a tremendous aura coming from behind you. When you looked, you gasped in shock. Satellizer was now back on her feet. Her face was filled with rage and in each of her hands she had two of Miyabi's limiters. You also saw third limiter lying on the ground with his eyes staring at the sky. You couldn't tell if he was still alive or dead. Lastly at her feet were the phones that they were taking pictures with. They were smashed and broken to pieces. No doubt she probably kicked the crap out of them and destroying the phones so they wouldn't send the pictures they took. When Miyabi saw what Satellizer had done in such a speed, she was frozen in fear. Then Satellizer throwing the unconscious limiters she was carrying aside, charged Miyabi with an acceleration. Before Miyabi had a chance to react, she was hit with series of punishing blows to the face. Then Satellizer gave her a powerful punch in the gut sending her crashing to the ground. You and Kazuya watched in shock as this sudden turn of events played out.Then she slowly walked towards Miyabi with a murderous look in her eyes. Miyabi who was now scared out of her wits was crying and spoke in a timid and scared voice.

Miyabi: Please....let me go. Just let me walk away from this and I'll never bother you again.

Satellizer ignored her. She walked closer and closer to her until a voice stopped her.

(voice): Stop this at once!

You and Kazuya looked to where you heard the voice and you saw the girl with short brown hair and the girl with long blue hair you saw the other day along with Arthur.

Chiffon: I order you to stop this right now and step away from Miyabi this instant! Need I remind you that I'm the student council president!

(name): She's the student council president?!? Seriously?!?

Kazuya: Whew. Thank goodness. Just in time.

Satellizer looked at Chiffon in an icy cold stare. You were expecting that Chiffon not back down, but....you got the opposite reaction. Instead she hid behind Ticy.

Chiffon: Well...it's just a clear violation of regulations. So I would be eternally grateful if she would comply with my request right about now?

(name) thinking: Are you kidding me?!? Some student council president she is!

Satellizer ignored Chiffon and continued her walk towards Miyabi until she was standing right above her. She also summoned her volt weapon and prepared to strike her. Then two more people came onto the scene. The two teachers Yu-mei and Elize. When they saw what Satellizer was about to do, they prepared to deploy their weapons to stop Satellizer, but someone else beat them to the punch. You. Before Satellizer could bring down her weapon, you stopped her by grabbing her wrists.

(name): Satellizer stop! You have to calm down! You can't do this!

Satellizer: DON"T YOU TOUCH ME!!

Unfortunately you would only make things worse by doing what you did. Satellizer's eyes flared in anger and she gave you a wicked punch in the face sending you sprawling flat on your back. You tried to get back up, but then you found yourself staring at the end of Satellizer's weapon with Satelizer staring at you with the same murderous intent in her eyes. If you weren't scared before, you were now. Everyone gasped as Satellizer raised her weapon and prepared to strike you. Just as you thought you were going to die...

Kazuya: Don't do it!

Kazuya activated his freezing just in the nick of time stopping Satellizer and saving your life.

Kazuya: Satellizer please listen to me, you've got to stop this! I understand you're angry! What Miyabi did was unforgivable! I saw everything! But you're going to far! Don't do this! You know that the pandora weren't made to fight each other like this. This is wrong! Besides that boy is not your enemy! He was only trying to help you! If you do this, you'd be no better than Miyabi. So please stop!

Satellizer glared at Kazuya from the corner of her eye, but Kazuya didn't back down or look away. They stared at each other for a good ten seconds, then Satellizer relaxed. Kazuya smiled and then deactivated his freezing. Satellizer also got off of you and deactivated her volt weapon. She was then taken away by Yu-Mei and Elize to discuss her punishment. Your heart was still beating about ten miles per minute after being through what had just happened, but you were still alive. Kazuya rushed to your side and checked on you.

Kazuya: Hey. Are you okay?

(name): I'm...fine. More or less.

You tried to get back on your feet, but your wounds stung. You fell on your knee in pain.

(name) thinking: Damn. Miyabi messed me up pretty good. I can't even get up.

Suddenly Kazuya looped one of your arms around his shoulder and helped you to your feet which surprised you.

(name): Hey. What are you doing? I said I was fine.

Kazuya: No you're not. You're hurt. I'm gonna take you to the infirmary. We have to get those wound fixed up.

(name): But..why? Why are you helping me?

Kazuya: It's my fault that you got into this mess in the first place. Besides it's my way of saying thank you for helping us. Not to mention you're not in any condition to move. It's the least I can do.

You looked at Kazuya in surprise as Kazuya gave you a friendly smile. Seeing Kazuya's smile made you look away embarrassment.

(name): OK... I suppose I could use a trip to the infirmary.

Then you both left to the infirmary. Unknown to you two, a certain gray haired girl with twin ponytails in swirls was sitting on the fence across from the roof where fight had taken place. She had observed everything that had happened. Her eyes narrowed while watching you and Kauzya. After that, she leaped off the roof and disappeared.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Kazuya activates his freezing

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
You slowly opened your eyes expecting a sharp pain in your chest or gut, but you felt nothing. Instead of seeing Miyabi you saw in back of a familiar woman with snow white hair, Creo. With a stern determined look on her face after she managed to knock the knife away from Miyabi, she got out her gauntlets and got in her fighting stance. Miyabi tried to grasp what the hell just happened, "The hell are you? Get out of my way!"

"You'll never hurt (Name), Kazuya, or Satilizer! Not while I'm here.", she said with a threat embedded in her final sentence.

"They-"

"Were standing up to a spoiled, selfish, brat who came close to fatally wounding a fellow limiter. I'd report you, but I think a well taught lesson will suffice.", Creo said.

"Hah! As if a fifth ranked student can stand up against me. Freeze her!", Miyabi ordered her limiters.

"I thought you didn't need your limiters for a real fight. Prove it!", Creo called out.

"Ok then, raaaahhhhhh!", she cried out. Miyabi threw a bunch of daggers around Creo, expecting her to move in multiple directions. But Creo stood still, and kept her guard up. With an opening, she went in to get up close. Miyabi slid to her right and threw a couple daggers at Creo's arms. She managed to rip Creo's sleeves with the force of the daggers sending her back a few feet. If the area was confined Creo would be stuck to a wall but they were on an open rooftop so it was out of her element dealing with someone as competent as Satilizer, but more focused right at the moment. You wanted to help but knew this was now, Creo's fight.

"Just get the hell out of here you don't even know what's going on here."

"You were about to hurt my friend, that's all I need to know."

"For fuck sake just leave and go away!", Miyabi was getting frustrated by Creo. But Creo began getting wiser to Miyabi's patterns of attack. Finally Creo was up close and began striking at Miyabi. Miyabi dodged and redirected a few of Creo's blows but every hit that connected, she felt and was wearing on her. Creo tried to finish it in one good punch, but left herself too exposed causing Miyabi to slash a dagger at Creo revealing her cleavage. Miyabi then took advantage of Creo being distracted by people looking at her assets, and stabbed a dagger right in her knee cap.

Creo fell down in sheer pain from just the sheer appearance of how deep the wound was. Miyabi gloated reveling in her victory, "Serves you right you annoying little shit for being so fucking annoying and getting in MY business. Now you, I didn't forget what you called me earlier. If you beg to be MY limiter, I may let you baptize with me and sleep in m-", Miyabi was cut off by a clean punch to the face with Creo landing blow after blow in Miyabi's pressure points. She punched in the stomach, her "pretty" face, her arms, nearly every part of Miyabi's body got decked.

Creo finished it off with a clean uppercut to the chin sending Miyabi flying a good 2 feet. Miyabi was unconscious for the moment having been taken by surprise. Her limiters helped her up only to start worrying Creo would demolish them. Satilizer got up having Kazuya comfort her and regain her composure. "You alright Satilizer?", you asked concerned about what had happened.

Satilizer just glared at Miyabi saying all that was needed to know. Satilizer stood beside Creo and nodded to each other planning to take down the bitch together.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Someone comes and stops the fight

choices: Chiffon, Ticy, and come on to the scene
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Creo and Satellizer split in two different directions using acceleration making them look like they both disappeared. Miyabi tried to keep up using her acceleration to intercept, but she was still rattled after being hit by Creo. So her speed was almost cut in half. Creo hit Miyabi with a flurry of punches in her face causing her to stagger. Then Satellizer appeared behind her and slashed at her back. Blood sprayed from Miyabi's back and splattered on the floor as she screamed in pain. You and Kazuya looked on, both of you with awestruck looks on your faces.

Kazuya: Wow! She's as fast as Satellizer! Maybe even faster.

(name): No doubt! Miyabi can't even hold a candle to what Creo is capable of! Just watch her kick the crap out of slutty excuse of a pandora!

You and Kazuya were so focused on the fight, you didn't see that Miyabi's limiters had regained consciousness. When they saw that their pandora was in trouble, they knew they had to help her. Back to the fight, Miyabi was know screaming in anger as she fired dozens of her knifes in retaliation. Satellizer and Creo deflected the knifes with ease without even breaking a sweat. After Miyabi gawked in shock, Satellizer and Creo took the opportunity to both attack at once. Satellizer disappeared in an acceleration and slashed Miyabi repeatedly causing her to stagger. To finish it up, Creo disappeared in her own acceleration hit Miyabi with a right cross, a left hook, and a punch in the gut in blinding speed. Miyabi was sent sprawling to the ground. Seeing that Miyabi was done, you rushed to Creo's side totally stoked after what you just seen.

(name): All right! You did it Creo!

Creo: Well I didn't exactly do it on my own, but it was nothing. You okay Satellizer?

Satellizer looked at Creo with a bit of a scowl on your face.

Satellizer: What's a third year like you doing here? Aren't you with her or something?

(name): Hey Satellizer! That's not...

You were a little upset that Satellizer was being a little rude towards Creo, but Creo tapped your shoulder to stop you.

Creo: It's all right. It's only natural for she's doubtful. Actually two first years told me you guys were in trouble, so I rushed on over.

(name): First years? What do you...

Before you could ask what Creo was talking about, you heard someone scream. You looked to see Kazuya who was now being held by Miyabi's limiters. Two of them where in front of Kazuya so he wouldn't escape while the third had Kazuya in a head lock ready to suffocate him. Miyabi was also back on her feet with with a sly smile on her face at the sudden turn of events.

(name): Oh no!

Satellizer: Kazuya!

Creo: Damn it!

Miyabi: Hahahaha!! That's right! I've got your precious limiter! If you don't want me to hurt this boy, you'll stay where you are. Don't try anything funny or I'll have my boys suffocate this bastard!

Creo: Why you..!

(name): That's playing dirty you.....!

Miyabi: I wouldn't be so rude to me if I was you kid. Give up right now. Because if you don't.....

The limiter tightened his grip on Kazuya making Kazuya gasp struggling to breathe. Then Miyabi made a knife appear and pointed it at Kazyua.

Satellizer: No Kazuya!

Miyabi: I said stop. Get down on your knees and surrender. Otherwise this first year's time in this academy will be cut very short.

(name) thinking: Damn it. What can we do? If we move even an inch, Kazuya's as good as dead. There's got to be something we can do. But what?

You wracked your brain trying to figure out how to save Kazuya, but you didn't know how. Then you remembered something. You thought about how you first saw Kazuya when he interfered with Satellizer's fight and stopped her with his freezing. That gave you an idea. You spoke in a low voice so only Creo and Satellizer could hear you.

(name): Satellizer. Creo. Listen. I have an idea, but we need to work together on this. Okay?

You looked especially at Satellizer. You could tell right away that she was the lone wolf type, but you need her help on this. Satellizer looked at you indignant at working with a third year, but she reluctantly agreed.

Creo: What did you have in mind?

(name): Okay here's the plan. Creo when I give the word, you and I will attack Miyabi and her goons. Satellizer when the moment comes, go save Kazuya.

Satellizer: Wait a second. How is that gonna work? They'll kill Kazuya as soon as we try to move.

(name): Then we'll just have to stop them before that happens. Won't we?

Satellizer and Creo looked at each other puzzled. Then you shouted at the top of your lungs.

(name): Kazuya! Snap out of it! We need your help! Don't tell me you're lying on the job at a time like this?!

Miyabi: Heh. You must be delusional. You expect this boy to help? He can't move let alone help you.

(name): Come on! I know about your power! Your power is the only thing that can save us as well as you! Come on! You can do it! Use your power!

Kazuya struggled trying to break free, but he couldn't. The limiter holding him tightened his grip making Kazuya's losing more air. You knew that he wouldn't last much longer so you had to use your secret weapon. It was time to make it personal.

Kazuya: Are you gonna let her get away with it?! Are you gonna let this disgrace of a pandora get away with what she did to Satellizer?! Need I remind you that she practically raped her right in front of you and you're just gonna sit there and do nothing!?

Kazuya's eyes snapped open after hearing you that time. He remembered what Miyabi did to Satellizer and the mere thought of it made his blood boil. He could feel power flowing through his body and he felt himself getting stronger.

(name): Come on! Show that bitch what she's done was wrong! Make her pay for what she did!!!

Miyabi: Are you finished with your little speech? Then I think it's time that we end this.

Before Miyabi could make her next move, Kazuya let out a bellowing scream as his body glowed in a bright blue light. Then a bright blue hexagon pattern spread around Miyabi and her limiters making them unable to move.

Miyabi: What the hell?!? A freezing area?!?

Creo thinking: Impossible! There's no way!

Satellizer thinking: I knew it! I had my suspicions back then, but now I'm sure! He was the one that cast the freezing before! But how? A limiter normally needs an Ereinbar set to cast a freezing, but somehow this boy was able to do it!

(name): Now's our chance! Creo! Attack now!

Music plays. Zen Ball Master 5:45
(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SkIe3G0s...)

Creo snapped out of her shock from seeing Kazuya and charged at Miyabi with you by her side.

Creo: Wait a second. If we both take on Miyabi, then won't her limiters freeze us?

(name): Don't worry. Leave the limiters to me. You focus on Miyabi.

Creo: Okay! You got it.

Then you both separated. Creo went for Miyabi and you went for her limiters. Creo jumped up in the air and gave Miyabi and punch in the face. Meanwhile you did the same move as as Creo and punched the limiter holding Kazuya square in the face forcing him to let go and setting Kazuya free.

(name): Satellizer now!! Get Kazuya!!

Satellizer: Right!

Satellizer used an acceleration to immediately appear at Kazuya's side and carried him to safety. Miyabi who had just recovered from the punch could not believe what had just happened and frankly she didn't like it. Neither did her limiters. Miyabi used an acceleration to try to get Creo off guard with a punch, but she blocked it one handed. One of Miyabi's limiters ran at you with a fist aimed for your face, but you blocked with one hand the same way Creo did. Then you gave the limiter a right cross and sent him reeling back and knocking him out. Creo threw Miyabi's fist to cause her to step back and hit her with a right cross just like you. Miyabi came at Creo with a knife in her hand and attempted to slash her, but Creo side stepped, got in close and punched her in the gut knocking the wind out of her. The second limiter came at you throwing fists left and right, but you dodged every one. When he punched again, you dodged it, got in close and gave him a punch in the gut knocking him out. You both didn't realize it at the time, but you both were fighting in perfect sync. It was almost like a scene from a movie. Satellizer and Kazuya couldn't not believe their eyes.

Kazuya: Incredible...They're both....

Satellizer: In perfect sync!

Miyabi: There's no way! How are they mirroring each others moves like this?!? It doesn't make any sense!

Then you both each delivered the finishing blow to your respective opponents. Creo jumped up in the air and gave Miyabi a superman punch smack in the jaw and you gave the last limiter a punch in the exact same way. Both Miyabi and the last limiter were sent flying and then sent crashing to the ground knocked out cold.
(Music ends)

Creo: Whew. Well that took longer that expected.

(name): Yeah. But at least we won. Nice work.

Creo: You weren't so bad yourself.

Just then....
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Syncronization

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Soon as the dust settled Attia and Arnett ran up to the roof looking for Creo. To their surprise they found Miyabi laying on the ground bruised and banged up badly. And Satilizer next to Kazuya without her acting all nervous. They turned to you and Creo asking what the hell happened, "Creo what did we miss? We could here half the commotion from across the grounds.", Attia said.

Then Satilizer came to you and Creo, "Thank you both. I appreciate your compassion and respect your teamwork. You two are one of the finest partners I've seen here.", she complimented. She left walking to Kazuya probably to discuss about how well they worked together just now. Creo was shocked at how she mistook her and you for a team when you two never even baptized each other.

Satilizer's compliment however forced you into deep thought, "Satilizer gave praise on our teamwork? I had no Creo and me were that compatible. This may be my best option, I'll ask her. But....never again will I fall in love because of this."

Creo contemplated too her thoughts on being your partner, "(Name) and me? We showed great skill and the best pandora said we were the best she'd seen. I'm going to ask him."

"Uhh why did she say you guys were the best when she obviously took down those guys?", Attia asked.

"I think they did most of the work Attia.", Arnett figured out. She looked at the wake you and Creo left and was impressed. You and Creo turned to each other and said, "I want you to baptize with me."

Just then Arnett squealed in excitement thinking you two would have a heartwarming romantic embrace. But instead you and Creo just shook hands. "Wait a minute? What was that?", she asked bewildered.

"Creo I understand the nature of our relationship now, but I hope you understand that I am making this emotionally void.", you stated.

Creo felt no issue about it and nodded in agreement. The two of you walked to off to one of your rooms to begin the baptism. Arnett gave a look saying, "We'll see how long they stay 'professional'." While Attia grew angry at having Creo be a pandora for you.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: The next one

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Creo lead you to her room to receive your baptism. She went into the room limping on her stabbed leg, she went right for the bed and laid down. Seeing her like this, you offered to help her mend her wounds. "Creo, that looks serious. Let me get something."

"I appreciate it.", she replied.

You took out some bandages and rubbing alcohol along with a needle and thread. Creo put pressure on the wound to stop the bleeding, you came and took a look at her stab wound. "Is it bad?", she asked.

"Very. I'm no doctor, but I know when someone went through some shit. We'll take you to the infirmary soon as I at least clean thee wound."

"But before we complete the baptism."

"Yeah."

"(Name), thank you. For all you did back there."

"Your welcome.", as you got the alcohol on the rag you tried to make conversation to ease the pain. "Where you from?"

"Germany. Pffffffft! Mmmmmmm! That never is pleasant."

"What was it like?"

"Beautiful landscapes, lots of likeable people. Had some friends too. But it didn't last there. Now here I am with Attia and Arnett."

"And now me."

"Hehehe. Ahhh! That really stings!"

"Just keep still, it's going to make sure the leg doesn't get infected. Hand me that bandage."

"So what's your background?"

"I prefer not to talk about my past. In any form.", you said gently rolling the bandage up a bit before stitching up her cut..

"Well sooner or later we'll have to move past it."

"The wound wasn't big just deep. But I can't sew."

"Oh you cannot be serious."

You handed her the needle and thread and lett her sew the cut. "If it makes it better you could let me rub your leg."

"Do that, help numb the pain. Ok, AHHH! Grrrrr that fucking hurts. You need to learn to sew so that I'm not torturing myself."

"Duly noted. Hey Creo..."

"Yes?"

"Were both going to try and keep it professional. No emotion carrying us?"

"Yes, its what we agreed to. I have no reason to fall in love."

"Ok. Bandages are all set, we'll wait for he wound to close then I'll get you to the nurse."

"What about you?"

"I'm fine Creo, just a scratch nothing serious."

"Come here.", she took the alcohol and rubbed it on her hands, she gently rubbed your wounds with her mighty but sensitive hands. You winced in pain too, but Creo handled it with care. Soon as she was done, it came time for the baptism. Creo laid further back in her bed and left you some room. You laid right in front of her and spooned next to her. You cuddled and relaxed trying to let the calm peaceful nature of the baptism ease you both of the pain and stress.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Creo's room

choices: A girl with short brown hair and a girl with long blue hair. (Chiffon with Ticy)
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
It was early in the morning when you woke up the next day. You sat up and looked around. You were still in Creo's room. You looked on the bed and saw Creo's sleeping peacefully on her bed.

(name) thinking: That's right. I had a baptism with Creo. She's my partner now.

You slowly got out of bed not wanting to wake her up and looked yourself over. You knew that one of Creo's stigmata was now inside of you, but you were curious about something. Ever since you had your first baptism, you were curious as to how the stigmata got into your body. You looked all over seeing if there was any changes or something different about yourself, but your body was still the same as it was before.

(name) thinking: Hmm The human body and stigmatas are still a mystery to me. I guess it just happens.

Then you looked at the clock on Creo's desk. It said 6:50. There was still a couple hours left before class started. You decided to get dressed and head for class a little early. You were gonna get dressed, but there was one problem. When you put on your clothes, you saw that they were still ripped and were a little bloody.

(name): Aw crap. My clothes. I forgot that stupid bitch Miyabi ripped them up. I should've gotten extra clothes before I came here. Oh well. I better go to my room and change. After that, I'm gonna head to class.

You headed for the door and were just about to leave when you stopped. You looked back and saw that Creo was still asleep. For some reason, you felt that you should tell her that you were leaving, but then you decided to leave anyway.

(name): It's not like I have to let her know where I'm going every two seconds. Besides, I don't want to wake her up. But I guess I should let her know.

You went over to Creo's desk and saw some sticky notes and some pens. You took a pen and wrote on the sticky note, "I'll see you in class. Thank you. (name)." Then you stuck the note next to Creo's clock so she could see it. Then quietly you left Creo's room and headed back to your room. A few minutes later, you made it back to your room. You went to your closet and took out another uniform. Then you took off your old ones and got dressed. As soon as you were finished, you decided that you were gonna sit by the tree that you lied down on the other day until classes started, so you started walking to the campus. The sun was already rising as you arrived at the campus. As you entered the campus, you noticed how quiet it was without all the students bustling around. Not a sound could be heard. Personally you thought it was nice to have some peace after the day you went through. Soon you found your resting tree. You walked over, lied against it, and closed your eyes.

(name): -sigh- It's so peaceful. I should probably do this more often.

You were enjoying the silence so much, you felt a little tired and sleepy. You were about to go to sleep, when a voice broke the silence.

(voice): Excuse me. You're (name) am I right?

You opened one of your eyes to see....
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Wake up

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
(name): Yeah. That's me. Who are you?

Chiffon: Oh! I forgot. I never got a chance to stop you the other day with all the craziness. I'm the student council president, Chiffon Fairchild. And this is Ticy Phenyl.

Ticy: Nice to meet you.

(name): Likewise. So what did you want to talk to me about? I bet it's not everyday that the class rep and her friend just comes to talk to a underclassmen out of the blue like this.

Chiffon: Not one for small talk are you? Alright then. I'll get right to the point. It's about that little incident you got into with Miyabi.

As soon as you heard that name, you immediately jumped to your feet.

(name): If you came here to get your revenge for what happened to that skank, I'll.....

Chiffon: Whoa! Easy! I'm here for nothing of the sort!

Ticy: She's right! Calm down!

(name): Oh yeah? If that's not the case then why are you here?

Chiffon: Look. I just wanted to tell you that you need to lie low for while. Not to mention that you need to stay away from Satellizer.

(name): Lie low? What do you mean? And what does Satellizer have to do with this?

Chiffon: She attacked a third year! Not to mention that you were an accomplice and got Creo involved too. Creo would probably get off easy, but you and Satellizer have gone way too far.

(name): Just a damn minute! That third year was the one who started the whole thing in the first place! Not to mention that slut threatened to kill Kazuya and sexually harassed Satellizer to the point of rape!

Chiffon: It doesn't matter. Being a second year you should know this already. The hierarchy of this school is like a military ranking system and absolute. The third years aren't gonna take two second years attacking one of their own lying down. In fact, they they've been tolerating Satellizer's actions up till this point and to make things even more insane a limiter's involved. Once word of this gets out, they will come for Satellizer and they'll come after you too.

There was a long pause. Then you spoke.

(name): Listen. I appreciate the warning, but I can take care of myself. I'm not scared of a bunch of third years. Besides its none of your business.

Chiffon glared and you glared right back at her. Then the bell began to ring signaling that class was about to begin. You not wanting to be late and not wanting to speak to Chiffon any more than you had to turned around and walked away.

(name): If that's all you want to say to me, then I'm out of here. I'm don't want to be late. See ya.

Ticy: Hey! Get back here! You can't speak to...

Ticy was a little upset that you spoke to Chiffon with such disrespect and was gonna give you a piece of her mind, but Chiffon raised her arm and stopped her.

Chiffon: It's okay Ticy. Let him go.

Ticy: But Chiffon...

Chiffon: It's fine. In fact, he acted the way I expected him to. He's exactly as Sister Margaret said. Brave and not afraid to speak his mind.

Ticy: Yeah. But still....will he be okay?

Chiffon: Who can say Ticy? All we can do is watch and hope he survives.

Meanwhile....

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Back in her room, Creo woke up to the sound of her alarm clock. She opened a sleepy eye and slammed the clock to shut down the alarm. She sat up from her bed, stretched and looked around her room. Everything was the same as it was before. Except now, she now had a limiter. Then she looked at her bedside. She expected to find you next to her, but you were gone. She looked around her room to see if you were still in her room somewhere, but you weren't there. Then she saw the sticky note next her clock. She picked it up and read it. When she finished reading, she sighed in a mixture of exasperation and annoyance.

Creo: He's gone? Hmm. I know that he's a lone wolf type but still, he could have at least told me that he was gonna be leaving. Oh well. It's not like we have to be together every two seconds. Anyway, I better get ready for class. I don't want to be late.

Creo then took a shower, got dressed, and headed for her classroom. On the way to the classroom, she ran into Arnett.

Arnett: Hey Creo!

Creo: Hey Arnett. What's up?

Arnett: Hey, how did it go last night? You know, your baptism I mean?

Creo: Well, nothing seems different. But the baptism was a success. More or less.

Arnett: That's great! So what was it like? Did you and (name) do some stuff during the baptism if you know what I mean?

Creo: Get your mind out of the gutter Arnett. We didn't do anything like that. A baptism isn't anything like what you're thinking. Besides it's just a custom.

Arnett: Oh come on Creo! You could at least try to be a little romantic!

Creo: Why? It's not like (name) and I are a couple or anything.

Arnett: Speaking of (name), where is he anyway? I'd would have thought that he would have been with you when you woke up.

Creo: Nah. He left early this morning before I woke up.

Arnett nearly fell over after hearing Creo's response.

Arnett: What?!? What do you mean he left early this morning?!?

Creo: Calm down Arnett. What's the big deal?

Arnett: What's the big deal?!? What of partner leaves like that without saying anything?!?

Creo: Arnett. You're blowing this out of proportion. It's fine. Besides I don't have to know where he is every five seconds.

Arnett: But Creo if you're both gonna be partners shouldn't you both be acting like partners?

Creo: You do have a point, but (name) made it clear. He wants our partnership to have as less emotion as possible. And I wouldn't want it any other way.

Arnett stared at Creo. Then she sighed and pinched the bridge of her nose.

Arnett: Man. A stick in the mud as usual. Fine. Do what you want. But I still think that you both should act a little more romantic.

Creo: Yeah, yeah. Come on. We don't want to be late for class.

But as Creo and Arnett were about to start walking, they were greeted by a familiar face.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: In the third year's dorm...

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Arnett: Attia It's you. How's it going?

Arnett gave Attia a cheerful greeting expecting that Attia would greet her too. Unfortunately she wasn't in a good mood at all. She had a serious expression on her face. She ignored Arnett and walked straight up to Creo.

Attia: Creo. We need to talk. Now.

Creo: What about? If it's not important, can't it wait?

Creo walked past her not wanting to deal with Attia nonsense.

Attia: You know very well what and no it can't wait. About you being partners with (name). You need to break up the partnership with him.

Arnett: What?

Arnett looked at Attia in shock while Creo stopped.

Arnett: Attia! What the heck are you saying? What do you mean "break up the partnership?" Why would you want Creo doing that?

Attia: Because that boy is nothing but trouble. In case you haven't heard the details from yesterday, Satellizer wasn't the only one who attacked Miyabi. (name) attacked Miyabi as well by attacking her limiters. Any second year who attacks a third year as well as her limiter is only asking for punishment.

Arnett: What?! Hold on Attia, Creo got involved in the fight too!

Attia: She got off easy because of her being a third year. But the next time she won't be so lucky. I don't need you to get dragged to (name)'s level so I want you to break up the partnership. Not to mention you don't know anything about him or who he really is. It's for your own good.

There a long silence. Then Creo spoke in a low voice.

Creo: I told you before. I'm getting sick and tired about you getting up in (name)'s ass all the time. You don't know anything about him either. So stop trying to say that you do. And don't worry about me. I can handle myself. I'm a big girl. So do yourself a favor and mind your own business.

And with that Creo went away. Arnett and Attia watched as she walked away. There was a long pause. Then Arnett spoke.

Arnett: She is right you know. You shouldn't judge people by their covers Attia. Sure (name) is rough around the edges, but he's pretty cool once you get to know him.

Attia said nothing. Then the bell began to ring. Arnett not wanting to be late ran to class. Attia on the hand was seething in anger.

Attia thinking: Damn it to hell! It's bad enough that I've lost Creo, but now Arnett's on his side too?!? It's that boy's fault! He taking them both away from her me! (name).... You're you pay! I'll show you what happens when you steal from The Architect of Evil!!! I'll make you suffer!

Then....
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Attia

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
You were sitting in class going through another one of Yu-Mei's lectures. A lecture about limiters. Everyone else was paying attention, soaking in all the knowledge. You on the other hand were not paying attention at all and were looking out the window. The reason for this was because you heard this lecture already due to you being from another academy, so you felt that you didn't need to hear the same lecture twice. You yawned as Yu-Mei continued her lecture. Suddenly Yu-Mei's voice snapped you out your daze.

Yu-Mei: (name)! Is learning about the fate of world that boring to you?

(name): Wah! No! I mean no ma'am!

Yu-Mei: I understand that you come from a different academy and you probably learned this already, but please pay attention. You need to set an example for the other limiters here you know.

(name): Yes ma'am. Sorry ma'am.

Yu-Mei: Oh I know. Since you're pretty familiar on this subject and you're a limiter yourself, why don't you tell us a little about them?

(name): Yes. Like the pandora, we limiters are also implanted with stigmata which gives us the ability to deploy a freezing area. We limiters are what protect the pandora in battle when dealing with the nova. The sole purpose of a limiter is to neutralize the freezing field that the nova releases so that the pandora can move freely without being frozen in the nova's freezing field. In addition, the limiter can not only neutralize a nova's freezing area, but they can also generate one of their own to restrain other targets including low class nova targets.

Yu-Mei: Very good. I'd expect no less from a second year. Take note everyone. Make sure you remember that. Now moving on to the next thing....

You let out a sigh of relief, glad that you were off the hook. After that, you paid attention through the rest of class just in case that Yu-Mei called on you again. Soon class was over and it was the lunch period. You were on your way to the cafeteria hoping to get a good lunch. But as you were walking, you passed by a couple of first year pandora. When they saw you, they huddled together and began whispering to each other. You paid no attention. You figured they were just a couple of students who gossiping trying to figure out who you were like the students the other day. Then you came to the lunch area. The same thing happened again. A couple of students saw you every time you walked by and then they whispered to each other.

(name) thinking: Geez. Can't they give it a rest already? It's starting to get on my nerves.

You bought your lunch and went to find a decent seat where you could be by yourself, but there was no seat a available. Just then Kazuya came up to you carrying a bag of burgers. You were a little surprised to see him.

Kazuya: (name). Whew. I finally found you.

(name) Huh? Kazuya? What are you doing here?

Kazuya: I came to see you of course.

(name): To see me?

Kazuya: Well yeah. I wanted to talk to you the next time I saw you.

(name): Yeah? What's up?

Kazuya: First of all, I wanted to thank you for helping me and Satellizer the other day. And I also wanted to apologize for getting you involved in the fight.

(name): Um..it's no big deal. I just.....acted on my own. Besides I couldn't stand that slut pushing you guys around like that. I was glad to do it. (looks at bag if burgers) Let me guess. Going to go see Satellizer again?

Kazuya: You bet. I was just gonna meet her for lunch. Oh yeah. There was another reason I came to see you. I wanted to ask if you wanted to eat lunch with me and Satellizer.

(name): Eat lunch? With you and Satellizer?

Kazuya: Yeah. Since we didn't really have time to chat the other day, I figured that we try again. With no interruptions.

(name): Um...well...I...

Kazuya: Oh come on. Please say you will. Didn't you say that you wanted to see the good in Satellizer? Besides you look lonely sitting by yourself.

You had your reasons for being alone, but Kazuya did have a point. You never really had a chance to get to know Satellizer due to Miyabi's interference. Plus you didn't want to admit it, but you were getting sick of being alone. But at the same time, Satellizer knew who you were and what happened to your partner so maybe it wasn't such a good idea. Not to mention you remembered Chiffon's warning about staying away from Satellizer. After a long pause you.....
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: During class....

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
"You know what, I will join you.", you answer.

"Oh good. C'mon we'll have lunch together.", Kazuya replied happy to hear your answer. You both went up to the roof again this time less crazy people. Satilizer was still in the same corner she sat by yesterday but this time when she saw the both of you. A warm smile grew on her face, mostly directed at Kazuya but still circumstances had removed the tension you and her initially had at first. Kazuya sat next to her and got out lunch for himself and Satilizer. He offered you to sit next to him to which you agreed to.

Kazuya handed her, her food and she replied, "Thank you Kazuya. And my thanks to you (Name) for your valued help yesterday.", she said lightly smiling. You were shocked, never was she this happy and yet she barley had a full-blown smile. You and Kazuya must have made one hell of an impression.

"Your welcome.", you answered back. "So Kazuya have you and Satilizer? Been baptized yet?", you couldn't help but ask.

Satilizer then coldly replied with, "That is none of your business"

You halted off that line of questioning seeing she didn't wanna talk about it. Kazuya then went for a less awkward topic, "So (Name) where you hail from?"

"I don't know. I've been bred to be a limiter for so long I kinda lose track of my hometown details."

"Well this is fun isn't it?", Kazuya said sarcastically.

"Well what do we all want to talk about that won't be so uncomfortable with anyone?", and a moment later you all said in unison, "The uniforms."

A half hour of fashion sense later....

"In battle they rip easier than tissue paper. Every battle I've been in the girls always have their busts exposed. Who made these?!", you said.

"I have no idea but they have to get rid of this uniform. One more year of this thing is unbearable.", Satilizer replied.

"Hehehe. It was nice talking to you guys. I gotta run or else I'll be late to class.", you said.

"OK it was nice that you were able to hang out with us though.", Kazuya said.

"I'll be sure to do it again sometime.", you said waving goodbye.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Decided to join Kazuya

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
A little later it was after school and you were on your way back to your room hoping to get some relaxing time. As you were walking back to your room, you couldn't help but think about the time you spent with Kazuya and Satellizer.

(name): You know... I hate to admit it, but... I actually had fun. It's nice to talk to some people once in a while. And who would've thought that The Untouchable Queen would have a soft side. Hahaha. She may be a little serious at times, but once you get to know her she's an ordinary girl. Not to mention Kazuya was nice enough to let me get to know her. Hehe. Looks like I made some more new friends.

Then you remembered Chiffon's warning about staying away from Satellizer which made you puzzled.

(name) thinking: I wonder why Chiffon told me to stay away from Satellizer. Maybe cause she's worried that she could attack me? Nah. She's probably just being paranoid about a second year like any other third year. Speaking off third years, I wonder where Creo and Arnett could be? I know. I'll go look for them and see how they're doing. Besides I haven't seen Creo and Arnett in a while. It'd be since to talk to them. They're probably at the third year dorms. I'll check there first.

So instead of heading to your room, you headed to the third years dorm in hopes of finding Creo or Arnett. When you got there, you looked any signs of Creo or Arnett, but they were no where to be found. As you looked around, you noticed that a couple the third years were looking at you for some reason. It was like a second year have been in their dorm before. As much as you hated being stared at, you paid no attention. You just focused on finding your friends. Suddenly a voice called out to you making you stop.

(voice): Hey! Second year! Stop right there.

Then two third years came up to you. When you saw them, you recognized them as the two girls that lost to Creo and Arnett. Angelia and Tsubaki.

(name) thinking: Oh crap. It's those girls from before. Oh man. Maybe I should've looked somewhere else. Okay. Keep it cool (name). You're in hot water with the third years as it is, so keep it cool.

Tsubaki: What's a second year like you doing around these parts?

Angelia: Yeah. Usually a second year doesn't come here unless they're receiving a baptism. And I don't think you're here for a baptism.

You politely bowed and spoke as politely as you could.

(name): I'm so sorry. I was just looking for a friend of mine. I couldn't find her in the school, so I figured that I'd check here and...

Before you could finish, you noticed that Angelia and Tsubaki were looking at you all over as if they were checking to see if you were telling the truth.

(name): Um...is there something wrong?

Aneglia: You know... you're kinda cute.

(name): Excuse me?

Tsubaki: Yeah. I gotta say second year, you pretty easy on the eyes.

(name): Um... thanks. I think. Well I better be going. Please excuse me.

You politely bowed and tried to walk away, but Aneglia stopped you by grabbing your arm.

Aneglia: Hold on. Don't be in such a rush.

Tsubaki: Yeah. Why don't you stay for a while and maybe we'll help you find your friend? We'll even have some fun together.

As Tsubaki spoke to you, she held your chin with her finger and traced it upward making you shudder. Angelia was also now hugging your arm like she had found a boyfriend. One thing was for sure, you were getting creeped out and a little annoyed at the same time. You tried to pull away, but Angelia kept a firm hold on your arm.

(name): I'm sorry, but I have to go. I don't want my friend to worry about me.

Tsubaki: Oh come on. Lighten up. We'll show you a good time.

Then....
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Continue...

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Just before things got out of hand Creo came and forced then to lay off you. Creo knew what they were up to but instead of telling them off she merely exerted her anger into a single stare. Frankly it wasn't as merciless as it sounded forcing the girls to be borderline scared of Creo now. You were unaware of why the girls were suddenly scared of her but you just assumed it was due to Creo having a big reputation now after that scuffle. "See ya ladies.", you said walking to Creo. "Hey I was just looking for you."

"Don't go near them alone, they're likely to have their way with you if your not careful."

"Oh. I'll make note of that."

"I was wondering (Name) btw, if you could join me for a walk?"

"Uhh. Sure, a long period of time together will strengthen our bond."

"Exactly.", the two of you were completely robotic to the initiation of going out. For you it was simply trying to repress your emotions of attraction toward Creo but you held them back. In her case it was casual and nothing seemed to bother her. You two went over to the school gardens where the sweet aroma of flowers filled the air. Nobody was around at this time of day so it was perfect.

"Hey, whats it like having all the perks of a third-year?", you started.

"Just means your less liable to get punished when you're in trouble. Some added bells and whistles but not much else."

"Well, how did you know Arnett and Attia?"

"Arnett was my room-mate since my first year. Attia I met not long after. How about you? Anyone you've known or getting to know?"

"Kazuya and Satilizer."

"You can't be serious."

"No I'm not kidding. And Satilizer is really kind ounce you get to know her, I think next time you should accompany me if they invite us to the rooftop. Maybe we could get Arnett too."

"I'm not sure (Name), I'd be willing to for your safety at least but Arnett and Satilizer would probably spell disaster if were going for a peaceful method."

"Well it was just an idea."

"(Name) I have to ask though. Why is it you want our partnership to be so devoid of emotion for each other?"

"I don't want to talk about it."

"I'm sorry. It was selfish of me to pry."

"Its ok."

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
There was an awkward silence as the you two walked around. Then you looked up to the sky. It had turned into a peach orange which meant it was getting late.

(name): Well I guess I should head back into my room.

Creo: You want me to walk you back? I don't mind.

At first you were about to decline, but then you remembered how Angelia and Tsubaki tried to take you for "a good time." You could use a body guard.

(name): Sure. Thank you.

Then you both headed for your room. There was another awkward silence as the two of you walked to your dorm. You had to break the ice somehow so you started up another conversation.

(name): So....how's Arnett been doing lately?

Creo: She's fine. She finally found a limiter actually.

(name): Really? Who's the lucky guy?

Creo: I think it's a guy named Morrison Abebe. He's a second year like you.

(name): What's he like?

Creo: Well... when I first met him, he seemed to be a little naive. And a little reckless too.

(name): Reckless? How do you figure?

Before Creo could answer, something caught her eye and you saw it too. A third year pandora and her limiter walked past you two. The limiter had blue eyes and short blond hair. He was almost as tall as you, but he was a little shorter. The pandora had long flowing red hair that went all the way to her back and her eyes were bluish green. As they walked past you and Creo, the girl with red hair looked at you. When you looked at her back you saw that her face was a face that you knew all to well. Cold and emotionless. You watched as the pandora and her limiter walked away.

(name) thinking: What the... Who the heck was that?

Creo: (name)? Let's go.

(name): Yeah. Sure.

Then you and Creo started walking again. As you both headed back, you couldn't help but look back at the pandora you saw. You didn't know way, but you felt a strange feeling from that girl. Soon you and Creo were at the the second year dorms.

(name): Well then. This is my stop. Thanks for walking me home. I guess I'll see you later.

Creo: (name) hold on.

Before you could head to your dorm. Creo stopped you by gently placing a hand on your shoulder. Also she had a serious and worried look on her face.

(name): What is it Creo?

Creo: Listen. You need to be careful. Especially with that girl. Avoid her anyway you can.

(name): Why? Is she bad news?

Creo: You could say that. Her name is Ingrid Bernstein. The Protector of Order. She's a girl that's obsessed with keeping things in order. In fact, she puts order above everything else. Whenever someone breaks rules in the academy, you can be sure that Ingrid will be there to dish out some punishment.

(name): Seriously?

Creo: Yeah. So if you see her, try to avoid her as much as you can.

(name): I'll take your word for it. But don't worry, I'll be okay. I can handle myself. Anyway, thanks again for walking me home. I'll see you tomorrow. Say hi to Arnett for me. Later.

Creo watched as you went back to your dorm. Then she started back to her dorm. As she was walking she couldn't help, but feel worried about you.

Creo thinking: I hope that (name) will be okay. Seeing Ingrid made me worried a little. But.... I'm sure that he'll be fine. He can take care of himself. I think,

Meanwhile...
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Continue...

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
The pandora Ingrid and her limiter were standing on top of a roof prepared for battle. Then a bright flash of blue light erupted in the middle of the desolate city. When the light dimmed down an R type nova emerged and unleashed a freezing area.

Leo: Target confirmed as type R. Freezing radius estimated to be about 200 meters.

Inrgid: I'll only need forty seconds.

Leo: Don't worry. I'll be good for about two minutes.

Ingrid materialized her volt weapon which was two bladed tonfa and leaped off the building diving headfirst at the nova. As she fell, Leo extended his hand and prepared to what was coming next.

Ingrid: Activating Ereinbar Set.

Leo: Freezing!

As Ingrid landed on the ground activating the Ereinbar set, Leo activated his freezing so she wouldn't be caught in the nova's freezing. The nova who know noticed Ingrid went on the attack. It fired stigmata shaped fragments from it's arm at a very high velocity. Ingrid dodged them all by twisting and skimming around them eventually coming to a stop behind the nova. Then it was her turn to go on the attack. Her body began glowing blue and she split into four counterparts of herself. All four of the counterparts attacked the nova at once which eventually revealed the core on the nova's chest. Then Ingrid counterparts became one and she delivered the finishing blow by slashing her tonfa in an x right at it's core. The nova was still for a moment, then it exploded with a loud boom.

Leo: Still one minute and twenty seconds remaining. You took exactly forty seconds. Excellent Ingrid.

Ingrid: You too Leo. Well done.

Leo: Hahaha. I think you did a better job than me ma'am.

Ingrid blushed and looked away to hide her embarrassment.

Ingrid: Idiot.

Later as Ingrid and Leo were leaving the training area, they were greeted to the sight of a certain petite silver haired girl with her limiter.

Attia: You certainly do live up to your reputation. The Protector of Order, Ingrid Bernstein. It's no wonder that you're the seventh ranked third year.

Ingrid: What the hell do you think you're doing here Attia?

Attia: Any reason I can't be? If I didn't know any better, I'd think you're not happy to see me.

Ingrid: Then excuse me then.

Ingrid walked past with Leo wanting to leave Attia behind.

Attia: Can you do me a favor? Two of our second years are in need of protection.

Ingrid stopped.

Ingrid: Which ones?

Attia: The Untouchable Queen of course.

Ingrid's head turned slightly her eyes focused on Attia. Then she turned her head back.

Ingrid: And who's the other? Another Pandora?

Attia: Actually the exact opposite. A limiter. You know him as "The Imperfect Limiter."

Ingrid's head turned again, this time her eyes were wide with shock.

Ingrid: Him? Are you sure?

Attia only answered with a slight nod. Ingrid's head turned back and after a moment she left with Leo following close behind her. Attia watched them leave with a sly smile on her face pleased that her plan of revenge had been set into motion. Now all she had to do was watch and see what would happen.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: In the training area....

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
The next morning you were walking to the courtyard hoping to find your resting tree before class began. It was a little dark due to it being so early, but you didn't mind. At least you got to see the sun rise. You didn't know why, but now you had a habit of going to the tree before class began. It helped you relax. You had just walked into the courtyard and were going to go to your resting tree, but then something or should you say someone caught your eye. There a few feet away from you was Satellizer. She was walking around the courtyard trying to kill some time. At first you were gonna go up to her and say hi, but then you sensed something. Something dangerous. You instinctively hid behind a tree and waited for the unknown danger to come out. Then just as you suspected someone came out of the darkness and walked towards Satellizer. At first you couldn't tell who it was, but then you saw her long crimson red hair.

(name) thinking: It's that girl from yesterday. Ingrid Bernstein. But what's she doing here?

Ingrid: Satellizer El Bridget.

Ingrid walked around Satellizer as if she was examining and assessing to who she was dealing with. Then she stood in front of her. Satellizer kept her guard up, readying for a fight if need be. You kept quiet and readied yourself to intervene in case a fight started.

Satellizer: Who are you?

Ingrid: Silly me. Pardon my manners. My name is Ingrid Bernstein. A third year. You've probably heard of me.

Satellizer: Are you here to avenge your slutty friend?

Suddenly Satellizer wielded her volt weapon and dangerously pointed it at Ingrid's neck. You instinctively gulped as you thought things took a turn for the worse. Ingrid looked at the weapon and then back Satellizer. Then she calmly moved her weapon away from her throat.

Ingrid: I'm well known around here as The Protector of Order. I use my abilities to punish those who induce chaos and disrupt order. Troublemakers like you for example.

Satellizer: Is that a fact?

Ingrid walked past Satellizer before coming to a stop.

Ingrid: As a pandora, I defend order with every fiber of my being. Find yourself a limiter by noon tomorrow. I will personally see to it that you will pay for what you done. You and your limiter both.

Then Ingrid walked away and soon Satellizer left as well. You waited till Satellizer was out of sight before coming out from behind the tree.

(name) thinking: Did I just hear what I thought I heard? Ingrid challenged Satellizer to fight?!

Suddenly, Ingrid appeared right behind you and when you heard her voice, your heart jumped about ten feet.

Ingrid: You know, it's rude to eavesdrop on someone's conversation.

You turned and took a fighting stance ready to fight. Ingrid stood there calm and composed, but then she began to chuckle.

(name): What's so funny?

Ingrid: You'll have to forgive me. I just thought it was a little amusing how you think that you can fight a pandora.

(name): Look lady. I don't know what you want with Satellizer, but if you're messing with her, you're messing with me! And I'm not afraid to fight you if I have to!

Ingrid: I'll gotta hand it to you. You're certainly are brave. Unfortunately you'll have to wait. I'm only here to tell you that you better show up to the fight as well. You're just as guilty as Satellizer is. No. I take it back. Your crimes are much worse than Satellizer's. The only thing I have left to say to you is that you make sure you're there along with Satellizer tomorrow. I want to make sure you both pay for your crimes. Especially you (name). Or should I say, The Imperfect Limiter.

Then Ingrid walked away leaving you with your eyes a little wide in shock upon hearing Ingrid's last words. Your heart was thumping loud in your chest and your hands were know shaking a little.

(name) thinking: How...how did she know that name?! If she knows that then...damn it. First Satellizer and now Ingrid?! Is anyone left who doesn't know? Great. Can things get any more worse?

Then you felt a hand placed on your shoulder. You immediately turned around and prepared to fight the person who tapped your shoulder a little startled, but the person who was behind you was...
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Challenge

choices: Outside the school, at the runway...
In the chopper enroute to the nova...
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
(name): You!?

Sister Margaret: Nice to see you too Mr. (name).

When you saw Sister Margaret, you immediately grabbed her by the collar and were ready to tear her apart.

Sister Margaret: My. You certainly like to grab me whenever you can. Are you in love with me?

(name): Spare me the jokes! You got some explaining to do lady! Mind telling me how the hell Satellizer and Ingrid know about my little secret? And I would choose my words carefully because if I don't like your answer, I'll tear you apart and put your head on a mantle!

Sister Margaret was silent. Then Sister Margaret spoke in a calm manner.

Sister Margaret: It would be wise for you to calm down Mr. (name). What would the students think if they saw some limiter threatening to kill the headmaster out in the open like this? Especially since that limiter just so happens to have a reputation like yours?

You growled at her words. At much as you hated it, but Sister Margaret was right. This wasn't exactly the place to be taking your anger out on the headmaster at school, no matter how much you hated her. You reluctantly let her go.

(name): What do you want this time? I thought I told you the next time I saw you that I won't be held responsible for what I'd do. Not to mention you didn't answer my previous question. Answer me. How do Satellizer and Ingrid know about me? If you told them....

Sister Margaret: I'm not sure how they know and no I never told anyone. The only thing I can tell you is that they probably must have heard about it from the other sisters.

(name): I see. So what are you doing here? If you've come here just to check up on me, I'm fine. I don't need these surprise visits all the time.

Sister Margaret: Actually I came to see you for a different reason.

(name): And what reason would that be?

Sister Margaret paused impressively. Then she spoke in a low and serious voice.

Sister Margaret: There's been a nova sighting.

As soon as you heard the word nova, you felt your heart skip a beat and your blood ran cold. You also had a flashback of your partner dying and the creature that killed her. Just remembering the nova sent an uneasy feeling in your stomach.

(name): You're joking right? If this is your idea of a joke it's not very funny.

Sister Margaret: I would never joke about something like that. A nova has been spotted a few hundred yards from here and is getting close to the academy.

(name): Why are you telling me this? Shouldn't you be sending someone to take care of it or something?

Sister Margaret: That's why I'm here speaking to you Mr. (name). I want you help to intercept it and destroy it before it gets any closer to the academy.

Your eyes widened to the size of saucers and you felt your heart stop for a moment.

(name) Say what?! You can't be serious! You expect me to go out there and take care of that nova given my condition?!

Sister Margaret: No. I expect you and Creo to go out there and take of care of that nova given your condition. After all she's your partner.

(name): Why you smart-ass! How the hell do you know that?!
.
Sister Margaret: I have my ways of knowing. In any case, this is a direct order from the higher ups, so you don't have a choice in the matter. Also Creo also has been notified and is on her way to the runway as we speak. You both will be leaving in about nine hundred hours so I would get going.

(name): And I'm assuming if I say no, you'll have me court martialed or some threat like that right?

Sister Margaret answered with a simple nod. There was a moment of silence between the two of you. Then you looked at your watch and saw the time. It was 7:58. It was about an hour and two minutes before the appointed time. You let out a sigh and you finally spoke.

(name): Fine. I'll go. But don't expect me to be fighting you or those stupid excuses for generals. I'm only doing this because Creo's my partner. And that's what partners do.

And with that, you walked away. Sister Margaret watched you walk away with an emotionless expression.

Sister Margaret thinking: Now. The test finally begins. I wonder how you will fare Mr. (name)? Will you succeed? Or will you fail?

Meanwhile as you were heading to the runway where the choppers were, you were trying to get your thoughts together.

(name) thinking: Damn it all. As if things weren't bad enough. First Ingrid challenges me and Satellizer to a fight and now this crap. Shit! What am I gonna do? If we fight that Nova, there's a possibility that Creo will figure out my secret. I can't let that happen. There's only one thing left to do. I'm gonna have to refrain from using my freezing unless I absolutely have to. It's pretty much my only option. Well then....I guess I better pick up the pace. I don't wanna be late.

You quickened your pace heading for the runway before nine o'clock. A little latter...
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Sister Margaret

choices: The pilot prepares to drop them off.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
You arrived at the runway a half hour later before the time you and Creo were to depart. At first you didn't know where to go or which helicopter that you were supposed to take, but then you saw someone you didn't expect to see. Yu-Mei.

Yu-Mei: (name). You came earlier than I expected.

(name): What are you doing here? Aren't you supposed to be teaching or something?

Yu-Mei: I may be a teacher, but I'm still a Chevalier. Anyway, we don't have time to chat right now. Come with me.

Yu-mei led (name) to a hangar where a black chopper was waiting. Then you both walked into a room with a giant screen. When you both came in, there was someone already in room waiting for the two of you. It was Creo.

Creo: (name). You're here.

(name): Yeah. More or less.

Yu-Mei: Listen up you two. This is really important, so I need you both to listen very closely.

After that, Yu-Mei explain the situation about the nova. It was spotted off a few hundred yards from the academy and was heading towards the academy as well. As far as it's objective was, no one knew. All that mattered was that the nova must be taken out before it got any closer to the school. A little later at nine hundred hours, you and Creo were enroute to the coordinates of where the nova was last spotted. As the helicopter carried you both to your destination, you stared out the window in silence watching as the landscape below zipped by. On the outside you looked fine and ready to fight, but on the inside you was very nervous. You were still worried about Creo finding out who you really were. Not to mention you still hold the horrific experience of losing your partner to the nova. Just remembering it sent shivers down your spine. Then Creo's voice snapped you out of your daze.

Creo: (name)? Is everything okay?

(name): What? Y-yes. I'm fine. I'm okay.

Creo: You sure? You seem a little scared. You haven't said a word since we left.

(name): I'm fine. Don't worry. It's just that I'm nervous with fighting the nova is all.

Creo: It's alright. It's natural to be frightened when fighting with the nova. Don't worry. Just leave everything to me. I'll take care of it.

You said nothing and went back to staring out at the window. Creo looked at (name) with curiousity trying to figure out what was wrong with him. Then....
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Outside the school, at the runway...

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
"(Name) I'm serious, is everything alright?"

"Creo please."

"What's wrong tell me.", she insisted becoming irritated of your question dodging.

"Listen I promise you we'll talk about this when we get back."

"This has been something you keep avoiding since the start, and were now about to fight a Nova. (Name) you are going to have to tell me sooner or later.", she knew this was more than what you were letting on. She could see through the fact that fighting a nova again with her meant something to you that disturbed you. Your thoughts were on the traumatic experience yes, but it was Ingrid's challenge that was on your mind more. But the biggest was the simple matter of the inevitability that you were going to tell Creo about how you lost your first love.

"Creo's right, I need to tell her about why this has been such a difficult transition. Now that were fighting together, she needs to know why I'm so emotionally distant. She'll understand why I need this to be devoid of romance. So that I don't lose someone precious to me again. Sigh....Creo is at least an understanding woman. Heh, maybe..."

"We'll be arriving at the drop-off point in exactly 10 minutes.", the pilot said.

Soon as you heard you and Creo got on your gear and readied for battle. This would mark the start of another lose or a new beginning, hopefully this will turn out better than the last time you faced a nova.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: She asks him again

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Pilot: We're approaching the drop-off point. Once the hatch opens, prepare to drop.

(name): Understood.

Pilot: Also we have no idea what class this nova is, so proceed with caution. If you encounter the nova, commence combat operations immediately.

Creo: Roger that.

The pilot pulled the level and the hatch door opened. Then you and Creo each put on an earphone so you both can keep in touch with the pilot and the base and jumped out of the ship and into the ground below. It was a bigger drop than you expected, but you managed to land on the ground safely. Then you heard the pilot's voice in your ear.

Pilot: Good luck down there. If the nova's too powerful, we'll send for reinforcements immediately.

(name): Roger.

The helicopter zoomed away leaving you and Creo alone. You surveyed your surroundings. The scenery was filled with nothing, but trees. From the looks of things, you and Creo were in the middle of the forest and somewhere.

(name): So. Any idea where we should start looking?

Creo: No clue.

(name): I guess we'll just have to look around until we run into it. Hopefully it won't get the drop on us.

Creo: Don't worry. That nova is going down. I'll make sure of it.

(name): I know you will. Let's go.

Then you and Creo ventured into the forest in search of the nova. It was very quiet. Not even the sound of birds were chirping.

Creo: Geez talk about ominous. It's so quiet that not even the animals can be heard.

(name): Well there is a nova in this forest after all. So it's only natural that the animals would be scared.

(name) thinking: And I don't blame them because I'm scared myself.

You and Creo looked all over for the nova, but it was nowhere to be found. Then suddenly there was a loud boom that made the ground shake. Then a bright green light shone in the distance which made your heart stop. You knew exactly what it was.

Creo: Hey (name). You know what that was right? (name)?

You didn't answer. You were frozen in fear. You had another one of your flashbacks. You recalled the nova that you and your previous partner fought which caused her death and the face that she had before she died.

Creo: (name)! (name)! Snap out of it!

Creo's voice snapped you out of your flashback and brought you back to reality.

(name): What?! What's going on?!

Creo: (name)? What happened? You froze for some reason.

(name): I'm fine. I just zoned out that's all.

Creo: You're still feeling scared aren't you?

You answered with only a nod. Then Creo came up to you and placed her hands on your shoulders causing you to look up.

Creo: Don't worry. I'll protect you. I'll always be there for you, so there's no reason to be afraid. OKay?

Creo then gave you a reassuring smile that eased a little of your fear.

(name): Thanks Creo. I feel a little less scared now.

Creo: Come on. The nova's over there. Let's take it out.

(name): Right.

And so Creo raced ahead with you following suit. You and Creo kept running following the green light until you came to a clearing. There a few hundred feet from them was the nova. It was the same nova that Ingrid fought in her simulation. Only this one was real.

Creo: So. There it is.

(name): This is (name)! We have a visual! ! I repeat, we have a visual! Target is a type R nova and is estimated to be about two hundred and twenty meters from our position!

Yu-Mei: Roger that. Commence combat operations. I repeat commence combat operations. Take that nova down!

Creo: Alright! I'm going!

(name): Be careful Creo. Don't die on me.

Creo: I won't. I'm counting on you if the nova activates it's freezing.

(name): OK. I'll do my best.

Creo: Alright then. Time to take this thing down.

You watched as Creo charged at the nova ready for battle. You hoped and prayed that Creo would come out of this ordeal alive and also that your freezing wouldn't fail you.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Continue...

choices: There was suddenly a large explosion close to your location.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Creo: Now. Activating Ereinbar Set!

Creo's as well as your body began glowing in a bright blue light. You both also felt a shock of pleasure go through your bodies and your senses became one.

Creo: Volt Weapon deploy! Infinity Fang!

Creo donned her volt weapon and headed straight for the nova. You stood a few feet back watching the battle from afar, but you stood ready to help in case a problem should arise. The Nova who had now noticed Creo, went on the attack. It fired shards from his arm, but Creo was able to side step the attacks and dodge with them with ease. The nove fired again, this time Creo punched the shards that came her way shattering like ice. She gunned straight for the nova in an acceleration and rapidly punched the nova in different areas at once causing the nova to falter. Then the nova raised one of his arms and brought it down towards Creo trying to squash her.

Creo: Oh come on. It's gonna to use brute strength to take me down? How boring.

Before the nova's arm could crush her, Creo used an acceleration and got out of the way before the nova crushed her. Then she ran up the nova's arm and rapidly punched the nova in the center until the core of the nova's body was exposed.

(name) thinking: All right! She exposed the core! Now all she has to do is hit the core and take out the nova.

Creo thinking: This is getting to be way too easy. I was hoping that this thing would put up more of a fight. Oh well. Better end this now while I have the chance.

Then Creo leaped into the air, ready to deliver the finishing blow. But then suddenly, the nova activated his freezing, releasing a giant green sphere of light around the area. Unfortunately Creo got caught up in the freezing causing her to fall to the ground unable to move. To make matters worse, the nova's wound on it's chest was healing, making it's core safe from harm.

(name): Oh no! Creo!

Creo: Damn it! I... cant move...

The nova who saw that her prey was caught in it's freezing, began slowly coming towards Creo. You stood in the sidelines, trying to figure out what to do. You knew that had to use your freezing to help her, but you were scared that your freezing wouldn't work and it will be a repeat of what happened before.

(name) thinking: This is what I was afraid of! I have to use my freezing now! But... what if it doesn't work? What if it fails? What if....

You had yet another flashback about your partner dying which made you even more scared, but then another flashback came into your head. This time, you saw Creo.

(flashback)
Creo: Don't worry. I'll protect you. I'll always be there for you, so there's no reason to be afraid. Okay?

You remembered that reassuring smile that Creo had and you felt a little less scared. In fact you felt courage welling up inside you. The nova was now preparing to attack Creo with it's shard attack.

(name) thinking: I know it's been a long time since I've used a freezing and I don't know if I'm capable of using a freezing, but....I have to try. I owe it to Creo! I have to protect her! I have to try!

The nova fired it's shard attack Creo wanting to finish her off. You raised your hand and took a deep breath. Then...

(name): Creo! Here it comes! FREEZING AREA!!!

A blue pentagon light erupted from your hand and spread throughout the area. It neutralized the nova's freezing and set Creo free. Then she dodged the nova's attack just in the nick of time.

(name) thinking: I did it! I really did it!

Then after a few seconds of your freezing being active, it disappeared. The nova fired it's shards again, but this time Creo charged straight at the nova's attack.

Creo: I was hoping you do that. Now you're going down! Tempest turn!

Then Creo split into three of herself and punched the shards that fired at her and sent them right back that the nova. The shards impaled the nova one after another and then the nova's core was exposed once again. This time Creo used her acceleration and went straight for the nova's core. From there she gave the nova's core, a devastating and powerful punch. The nova's core began to crack and nova staggered. Creo jumped away before the nova convulsed and then exploded with a loud boom that shook the earth.

(name): Yes! She did it! Way to go Creo!

Creo: You too (name). You saved my ass back there. Thanks for the assist.

(name): Anytime.

Then you heard Yu-Mei's voice on the earphone.

Yu-Mei: (name)? Creo? Do you copy?

Creo: Yeah. We read you loud and clear Ms. Yu-Mei.

Yu-Mei: Status report.

Creo: Target has been eliminated.

Yu-Mei: Good. Very well done you two. Head back to base. I'm sending a chopper to pick you two up. Stay there and await further instruction.

Creo: Understood. Over and out.

A few moments later, you and Creo were picked up by the chopper and were on your way back to the base. By the time you both got to the base it was close to evening. You both were back with Yu-Mei in the debriefing room.

Yu-Mei: You did a very good job you two. I'm very proud of you both. Now go and get some rest. You're both dismissed.

You both bowed politely and left. Then you walked with Creo back to the dorms.

Creo: (name). You did a pretty good job today. You saved my hide and you helped take out the nova.

(name): Well... I didn't do anything special. You did all the heavy work. Besides, my freezing should have came a lot sooner..

Creo: Don't be so modest. You did awesome today. If it wasn't for you, I would have been a goner. Thank you.

(name): Um.. yeah. Sure. Anytime.

You couldn't help but feel a little embarrassed from Creo's thanks, but you tried not to show it. Soon you arrived to the third year dorm and it was time for you to head back to your dorm.

(name): All right. I guess I'll see you later.

Creo: Are you gonna be okay walking back to the dorms?
