(name): I'll be fine. I'll see you tomorrow okay?

Creo: Okay then. Be careful.

Then after that you headed back to the dorm. As you were walking back, you thought about what had just happened. You were happy that you were able to use your freezing, but at the same time you were worried that it lasted for a few seconds.

(name): I may have been able to help defeat the nova, but my freezing only lasted for a few seconds. Okay. I'm gonna have to not use my freezing unless I have too. I cant risk Creo knowing about my secret. Ingrid either. Especially since I have to help Satellizer fight her, but on the positive side at least I figured out I can use my freezing again. Anyway I better get some sleep. I got a big day tomorrow.

Then...
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Continue

choices: Satellizer steps in and saves you
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
(name): What the...!! What was that?!? Whatever it was, it sounded like it was coming from the other direction! Oh no. I hope it isn't what I think it is.

You raced towards the direction of where you heard the explosions. As you got closer to where you heard the noise, you heard the sounds again and the sounds of metal clashing. You turned around the corner towards the first year boys dorms and what you saw was what you hoping wouldn't be happening. There was Ingrid holding Satellizer by the hair lifting her off the ground. Satellizer looked barely conscious as she hung there helplessly. From the looks of things, Satellizer and Ingrid were engaged in battle and Ingrid was winning. Meanwhile a certain conniving third year who set these two up against each other was sitting in her room a couple buildings down. She closed her phone and looked back at the scene below with a smile on her face.

Attia: Well. Maybe it's a good thing I didn't call Leo. And it looks like our final star has finally shown up. Now things will get interesting.

Back at the fight...

Ingrid: Don't tell me you passed out already. We're not finished yet.

(name) thinking: Damn it. I knew it had to be those two. And from the looks of it, Satellizer's getting her ass handed to her. I gotta go help her.

Leo: Ingrid!

Then Leo came running to the scene towards Ingrid .

Ingrid: Leo?

The moment when Ingrid looked back at Leo, Satellizer used the distraction to her advantage to break free of Ingrid's grip and distanced herself away from her.

Ingrid: You're not giving up huh? You don't have a chance in hell for beating me, you must know that. I even gave you time to find a limiter and you ambushed me. And that's why I'm going to engage the Ereinbar set and wipe you off the face of the earth.

Satellizer got up and readied herself to continue the fight, not ready to give in.

Ingrid: Very well. I'll give you one last chance. Seeing as how we're by the first year boy's dorm, if you can find someone stupid enough to be your limiter, I'll wait until the baptism has taken place.

She turned toward the first year boys who were watching the fight from the balconies above along with the other students.

Ingrid: Well boys? Will none of you come to the aid of The Untouchable Queen?

You looked up to where you were hiding at the first years. None of them said a word.

(name) thinking: Damn it. I can't blame those guys. Not only are they terrified of Satellizer, but even if they wanted to help her, Ingrid wouldn't hesitate to punish them. Someone's gotta do something.

Ingrid: Looks like you're out of luck. Now Leo!

Leo: Yes ma'am.

(name) thinking: This isn't good. If they engage the Ereinbar set now, Satellizer doesn't stand a chance. I gotta get in there and help her!

You were just about to jump in to stop Leo and Ingrid, when you heard a familiar voice.

Kazuya: Hold on! Wait!

The voice belonged to kazuya. He had now joined the fray and was ready to fight with Satellizer.

Kazuya: I'll do it! I will become Satellizer's limiter!

Ingrid: Well. I never expected anyone to come to her defense. I guess you have the right. But let me warn you before you join up with her. She is an enemy or hierarchy and order. If you become her limiter tonight, you will share her fate. Are you prepared for that?

Kazuya: Look ma'am, I didn't come to this school to rock the boat all right? But I'll be damned if I sit back and watch you both gang up on Satellizer like this.

At this point, you came out from the corner and joined the fight as well.

(name): That goes double for me!

Kazuya and Satellizer were surprised with your sudden appearance while Ingrid's eyes narrowed in a glare.

Kazuya: (name)? What are you doing here?

(name): What's it look like? I'm here to lend a hand. You are my friends after all. I'm not gonna stand by while my friends are getting picked on by a third year. Especially this girl right here.

Satellizer thinking: These two.. Why would they...

Ingrid: So (name) too huh? It won't make a bit of difference. It saves me the trouble of finishing you off later. I'll take all of you out. Hurry and perform the baptism.

Kazuya: Satellizer listen. I know we've only known each other for a short time, but I want to help you. Please administer the baptism.

Satellizer: I....I can't...

You were expecting for Satellizer to be all for going for the baptism, but you were surprised to see that Satellizer was blushing and avoiding eye contact with Kazuya.

Kazuya: Why not? At this rate, you'll never win Do you hate me that much?

(name): Yeah Satellizer. What's wrong? You need administer the baptism for Kazuya right? So why can't you do it?

Satellizer: Because... it's dirty. It's so dirty that I can't stand it! The sensation is like my body is being licked! The Ereinbar set...makes me sick to my stomach.

Satellizer turned away blushing in shame while everyone else who heard it looked on with confusion. You, Ingrid, and Leo on the other hand blushed with embarrassment.

Kazuya: I didn't know forming the Ereinbar set was as nasty as all that.

(name): Kazuya I can assure you, it's nothing what Satellizer is saying or thinking. I mean... it's a little weird but...it's not what you think.

Ingrid: He's right. Sharing your sensory input with someone does take a little getting used to, but there's nothing wrong with it. Most people think that their first set was a sacred experience.

(name): I wouldn't go as far as sacred.

Ingrid: Enough! Leo, form the Ereinbar set!

Leo: Yes ma'am!

Leo and Ingrid both began to glow as they activated the Ereinbar set. Leo then immediately activated his freezing area. Satellizer tried to get out of the way, but she was still hurt from Ingird's recent assualt resulting her being caught of Leo's freezing. Ingrid then closed in on Satellizer, ready to finish her off.

Ingrid: You're finished Satellizer!!

Suddenly Kazuya stepped in and lauched his freezing knocking Ingrid back and canceling Leo's freezing.

Ingrid: Impossible! How the hell can he cast a freezing area without a baptism? In that case, I better take care of you first.

She closed in on Kazuya preparing to strike him down, but you rushed in and went straight for Ingrid defending him.

(name): No you don't!

You attacked Ingrid with a flurry of punches and kicks, but Ingrid dodged them all.

Ingrid: Oh please. Did you really think that a little boy like you can land a blow on someone like me? You're wasting your time.

(name): We'll see about that!

Then you attacked again. This time Ingrid sidestepped the blow and used her tonfa to hit you in the stomach sending you few feet into the air and straight to the ground hard. You gasped trying to catch your breath. You were about to get up and try to fight again, but you found Ingrid standing over you preparing to strike you with her tonfa.

Ingrid: Now. It's time I finished you off. Time for you to be punished!

Just when you thought you were done for....
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: There was suddenly a large explosion close to y...

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Just when you thought you were done for, Satellizer who was finally able to move, jumped in and slashed Ingrid on her chest ripping her tank top and making a small gash on Ingrid's right breast. Ingrid recoiled back from being caught off guard. You immediately sprang to your feet and went straight for Ingrid.

(name) thinking: She's dropped her guard! Now's my chance!

(name) aloud: Take this!

You swung your right fist and punched Ingrid in the face hard. The blow echoed around the area. Everyone who had just watched what happened could not believe their eyes.

Kaho: Did.... Did he just....?

Arthur: He punched her!

Leo: No Ingrid!

Leo rushed to Ingrid's side as she stepped back holding her cheek in shock.

(name): How'd you like that? Didn't think I could land a blow did you?

Leo: Ingrid, are you alright? Come on talk to me! Say something.

Ingrid said nothing. Then she looked up her face etched with anger.

Ingrid: Damn you... Damn you for disrupting the order of things!!!

Kazuya: How come keeping people in line is the only thing that you care about?

(name): Yeah! What's the point?

Ingrid: Shut up! You will submit!!!

Ingrid went on the attack again gunning straight for you, but Satellizer jumped in and blocked it with her Nova Blood. Then both fighters used Acceleration and were fighting at high speeds, while you and Kazuya could only watch trying to keep up with the fight.

(name): Man. This is crazy. This is even more intense than when we fought Miyabi earlier.

Kazuya: Why is she so obsessed with order?

(name): Beats me.

(voice): You haven't figured it out yet?

You and Kazuya turned to the sound of the voice and there was Ganessa Roland.

Ganessa: That's her pet cause. She's as committed to upholding her as her responsibilities as a pandora.

(name): Wait a sec. It's you! You're that girl from before!

Ganessa: And you're that limiter everyone's been chatting about. I must say that you're not what I expected.

Kazuya: Ganessa, is there a reason why she's like this? If there is, would you please tell us?

Ganessa paused. Then her face turned solemn.

Ganessa: The reason being is because of of a friend of hers. It happened a little over a year ago, when I was still a first year at West Genetics. The Untouchable Queen hadn't been there back then and I'd say it was a good thing she wasn't. The faculty sent us on an off-site carnival for the first years for experience and to toughen them up. Then suddenly, a Type S nova appeared out of nowhere causing our platoon to panic and broke formation. A support group was sent and defeated the Type S, but sadly the platoon leader, Marin Maxwell didn't make it.

(name): So...in other words, Ingrid watched her die?

Kazuya: I can't imagine what she went through losing a friend like that.

Ganessa: Those two were inseparable best friends. I'm sure that Ingrid believes that if the first years had maintained discipline and upheld order, Marin wouldn't have died that day.

(name): That's... so sad.

You now felt sorry for Ingrid for finding out her reasons for being obsessed with order. In a way, you could relate as to how she was feeling losing when it came to losing someone special to you. Suddenly an explosion interrupted your train of thought. Satellizer wasn't able to protect herself from Ingrid's attack and was sent to the ground.

Ingrid: Now Leo!

Leo: Right!

Leo activated his freezing holding Satellizer in place. Kazuya immediately upped the power of his freezing, casting an omnidirectional freezing, cancelling out Leo's freezing and making Ingrid unable to move.

Ingrid: He cast an omnidirectional freezing?!? Impossible! This unbapitized freak has the same abilities as a nova?!

Attia who was still watching the scene jumped up at the sight of what had just happened.

Attia: Impossible! Who the heck is this kid and how is he able to do that?!

Back to the fight...
(name): Kazuya! Keep it up! I'll take out the limiter!

Ingrid: What are you waiting for Leo?! Hurry up and undo that little bastard's freezing already! He's headed straight for you!

Leo only had enough time to look up at your fist connecting to his face. You gave Leo a right cross to the face, then a left, a knee to the stomach and a spinning roundhouse kick sending Leo to the ground.

Ingrid: Leo!

(name): Satellizer! Take her out!

Satellizer went straight for Ingrid ready to finish it. With her limiter unconscious and herself being caught in Kazuya's freezing, it seemed that Ingrid was finished. Or so you thought. Ingrid had one more technique she had at her disposal.

Ingrid: Activate, Pandora Mode!

In an explosion of power, Ingrid's hair turned white, rings of light appeared around her wrists and ankles, and her eyes turned golden yellow as her Pandora Mode was activated. She also was now unaffected by Kazuya's freezing as she slowly walked towards you.

Kazuya: She's activated Pandora Mode?!

(name): So... this is the form a pandora takes when she engages Pandora Mode. The technique a Pandora can use to move freely around a freezing field without being frozen. I've heard tales about it, but... I never imagined I'd get to see it with my own eyes.

Ingrid: Now it's time for you pay for your crimes! Anyone who flouts the rules will one day abandon their comrades! It's my duty to make sure that pointless deaths like Marin's will never happen again. And they only way to do that is to purging these weaklings from our ranks!!!

Ingrid slashed her tonfa creating an air vacuum shock wave that was able to reach Satellizer who was a few feet away. Ingrid launched the shock wave again. Satellizer tried to defend herself, but due to the overwhelming power, Satellizer was knocked to the ground and her volt weapon was destroyed entirely. When Satellizer's eyes regained focus, she saw that Ingrid was standing over with her weapon raised.

Ingrid: You will die so that others may live!

She was about to drive her weapon down to deliver the finishing blow, but then you stood in her path.

Ingrid: Get out of my way!

(name): Never! You think that killing those who defy the rules is something that will help people live?! That's wrong! It's nothing more, but utter nonsense. If your friend Marin saw you the way you were right now, she'd not only disapprove of this, but she'd be ashamed of you! Especially after what you just said!

Ingrid: Shut up!

Ingrid then hit you in the face on the blunt end of her tonfa. You were sent flying into the air and face first to the ground. You felt like you just got hit by a truck. You tried to get back on your feet, but you couldn't. Ingrid was now standing behind you ready to strike you down.

Ingrid: I was gonna save you for last after I finished The Untouchable Queen, but now I'm letting you die first!

Ingrid raised her tonfa and prepared to strike you, but then another freezing area spread and forced Ingrid to the ground and at the same time deactivating her pandora mode. You looked to see the person who cast the freezing was none other than Kazuya.

(name): His freezing was not only stronger, but it was able to shut down Ingrid's Pandora Mode?

Kazuya: He's right Ingrid. And I think so too! How could you say that about Marin? How could you even think that her death was pointless when we all know it wasn't!

Ingrid: What the hell do you know!? You've never even heard of her before tonight!

Kazuya: You're right! I don't know! All I know about her is what I heard about her. But still, her death could've never been pointless. When she died I think that she upheld the principles of a Pandora all the way to the end.

Ingrid: Shut up... Shut the hell up!!

Kazuya: She could've never had died in vain. And neither did my sister!

Ingrid: Your sister?

Satellizer: That boy is Kazuya Aoi.

Ingrid: Aoi? Wait... don't tell me that you sister was...

Kazuya: My sister said to me that it wasn't just stigmata that she carried on her back. She carried our hopes and dreams as well because we are the only ones that can defeat the nova. Those were her last words before she died.

As he finished, a tear slid down his cheek. Then Ganessa walked up next to him.

Ganessa: I agree as well. When the first years left Marin, she never called them back into formation. Instead she told them to run. Marin knew that the first years wouldn't stand a chance against the nova the way they were due to them not having limiters. So she stayed behind to fight the nova to buy time so the first years could escape. She could have gotten away, but didn't. She wanted to protect the underclassmen no matter what, even at the cost of her own life.

Ingrid began to cry realizing that Marin's death wasn't pointless and that she was wrong about everything. Satellizer walked up to Ganessa with a puzzled look on her face as if she was asking why she had intervened.

Ganessa: What's that look? Gratitude? Don't get the wrong idea. I didn't do it as a favor. I only did it because she had to find out sooner or later and it seemed like a good time as any.

Then Ganessa walked past Satellizer and headed back to her dorm. As you, Kazuya, and Satellizer, you all headed back to your respective dorms as well. Back in her room, Attia was angry that her plan had failed.

Attia: Damn. That didn't work out the way I hoped. No thanks to that boy Kazuya my plan backfired. No matter. I got other ways of getting payback at you (name). It's only a matter of time.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Satellizer steps in and saves you

choices: In Tibet, in a small mountain village...
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
After everything had calmed down, you were back in your room icing your stomach. After everything calmed down, you headed back to your room while Satellizer went to drop off Kazuya at the first year dorm.

(flashback)
Kazuya was helping you get back on your feet after you were punched by Ingrid.

Kazuya: Hey (name). Are you alright?

(name): A little banged up, but I'm fine. More or less.

Then Satellizer came up. When Kazuya saw her, he was happy to see that she was alright.

Kazuya: Looks like I owe you another thank you Satellizer. And you too (name).

Satellizer blushed and looked away with embarrassment.

Satellizer: It.... it was nothing.

(name): It's not a big deal. Glad to help.

Kazuya: Wait. Now that I think about it, (name) where have you been? You've been gone all day.

(name): Let's talk about it later. Right now we better get back to bed. The last thing we need is the teachers finding out what happened just now. Kazuya, you better get back to your dorm. Me and Satellizer have to get back to the second year dorms.

Kazuya: Okay then. I guess I'll see you both later. Be careful.

(name): We will.

Kazuya: You sure you're gonna be okay (name)? You were hit pretty hard.

(name): Don't worry. I"m tougher than you think. I'll see you tomorrow.
(flashback ends)

(name): Rrghh!! Damn it, it hurts. Sure hope it doesn't leave a mark.

You removed the ice pack revealing a large bruise on your stomach. From the looks of things, it sure was heck gonna leave a mark. You lied back down trying at least try to ease the pain a little. As you lied down, you had what you heard about Ingrid and her friend on your mind.

(name): Still can't believe Ingrid's the way she is because of the death of her friend. Goes to show when a person loses someone they care about, their personality can change and they can go through a lot of pain. I should know. I've gone through that exact same pain. (sigh) Anyway, I better get some sleep. Today may have been crazy, but that doesn't mean tomorrow won't be better. (yawns) Well, off to sleep.

Then you went to sleep hoping that the next day won't be as crazy as it was today.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Continue...

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Somewhere in Tibet in the Temple of Kunlun, a joyous occasion was taking place. The elders stood in front of a young girl with blue hair who was kneeling in front of them.

Elder: So you wish to set out on a journey young one? Very well. Go in peace child. May the goddess Kunlun be ever by your side to guide and protect you. Look thou, Rana, and find he who is the one who will guide your destiny. The young man to whom you are fated. Now arise!

The girl named Rana stood up and bowed in respect to the elder.

Rana: Yes Patriarch. I'm sure that I will find him. I will make make you all proud.

Then the girl named Rana left to start her journey. The elders looked on in a mixture of worry and pride.

Elder 2: It seemed like only yesterday when she first started her training, Now she is all grown up and is a master now.

Elder 3: Will she be alright? She is still rather young.

Elder: Fear not. Rana is a strong young girl. Kunlun will be watching over her. I have great faith that she will be fine and she will find the man she's bound to by fate. I understand your worry, but for now all we can do is pray to Kunlun for Rana's success.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: In Tibet, in a small mountain village...

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Two days had passed since the fight with Ingrid. It was another day of class and learning about the nova for you. You sat through class listening to the lecture that you've heard a lot of times before. A holographic picture of a nova appeared in front of the classroom. It wasn't a perfect picture, but you didn't need a picture to remember the details what a nova was and what it could do.

Yu-Mei: This is your standard Nova. As you already know when they materialize into our world from their dimension, all living things are forcibly restrained within a certain range. To put it simply, their appearance causes a freezing area. This is where the limiter must do his part to neutralize the Nova's freezing area and create an area within which his pandora can kill her enemy.

You looked over at Kazuya who was staring at the Yu-Mei taking in every bit of her lecture.

(name) thinking: A freezing huh?

(flashback)
Ingrid: He cast an omnidirectional freezing?!? Impossible! This unbaptized freak has the same abilities as a nova?

(name) thinking: I still don't get it. Kazuya shouldn't be able to cast a freezing due to him being unbaptized, but he was able to do so anyway. How?

Later after class, you decided to ask him and find out for yourself. Just as you left the classroom, you saw Kazuya heading down the hall.

(name): Kazuya! Wait up!

Kazuya: Oh. Hey (name). What's up?

(name): Listen. There's something that I have to ask you about.

Kazuya: What is it?

(name): It's about what happened the other night. You know, the fight with Ingrid. How did you do that?

Kazuya: Do what exactly?

(name): You know what I'm talking about. Your freezing. How were you able to use a freezing field to that degree? I've never seen anything like it.

Kazuya thought about this scratching his head.

Kazuya: Hmm. I....I don't know how I did that.

(name): What?! You're kidding me! You really don't know?

Kazuya: Um....yeah....no idea.

(name): Seriously? You've never been baptized and you cast a freezing out of the blue and you're telling me that you don't know how you did it?!

Kazuya: Yeah more or less. Satellizer was in trouble and the freezing just sort of happened. I know it's weird, but that's what happened.

(name): I see. Hmm.

Kazuya: Anyway sorry to run, but I gotta go meet Arthur and Hiragi. Apparently they wanted to talk to me about something too. I'll see you later (name).

(name): Wait Kazuya..!

Before you could stop him, Kazuya had dashed off.

(name): Geez. So much for that. I wish that he knew how to. I'd give anything to have a freezing like that. But sadly I can't. I may be able to use a freezing now, but it's weak.

You looked at your hand and memories of your past came back into your mind. Then you remembered the time that you activated your freezing when you and Creo encountered the Nova. You clenched your fist.

(name): If I didn't activate my freezing right when the nova activated it's freezing, Creo would be dead. I have to make sure that she doesn't know anything about this. For that matter, I have to make sure that no one knows about this. Especially Creo. If she were to find out...

(voice): Hey! (name)! There you are!

Then you heard a voice call out to you snapping you out of your thoughts. You turned to the voice and there was...
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Continue...

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
"Hey there (Name) hope your feeling less depressed now because now we've arrived to make your day.", Arnett said acting unusually peppy.

"Heh, definitely feel better when you and Creo show up.", you said.

"Hey (Name) I was wondering if you could meet up with me and Creo later tonight. To just hang out.", she said in earnest.

"Oh, I'd.....I'd like that.", you answered a bit hesitant but figured what the hell.

"Oh sweet! And oh shoot because I'm happy your coming and I am going to be late for class. See ya.", Arnett said quickly running.

"She's normally not this lively. Oh and uhhh (Name).", Creo said feeling a bit nervous.

"Hmm? Yeah what?"

"I was wondering if you would join me for dinner tonight before we meet with Arnett. Dinner then a get together?", Creo asked.

"Fine by me, I'd love to.", you replied.

"Good. Meet me here at 7 and we'll treat ourselves to a decent night.", she handed you the card and left to get freshened up.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Arnett and Creo

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
A little later you were in your room getting ready for your night with Creo and Arnett. You took a shower and then you got dressed making sure that you were at least half way decent. You were wearing black dress shoes, a pair of black dress pants, a white t-shirt with a white button down. You looked at yourself in the mirror checking to see if there was anything out of place. Everything looked fine. You had never dressed up fancy for a dinner before. To be honest, it had been a while since you had went out with anybody and you were feeling a little nervous.

(name): Okay. Looks like I'm good to go. It's definitely been a while since I've went out like this. I hope that Creo and Arnett don't think this looks too weird.

Then you realized something. This was the first time in a while that you cared about how you looked. You haven't felt this way since you were with Makoto.

(name): Why in the world am I caring about what Creo and Arnett thinks about how I look? I never before so... why now?

You also remembered Creo looking a little nervous when she was asking you to dinner.

(name): And also.... I wonder why Creo was acting nervous like that? I mean we're just going out to dinner right? It's not like this a date or anything. Wait a minute. Could it be that she wants it to be a date? But... that would mean that she.... No. It couldn't be. I specifically made this relationship emotionally void. I promised myself I'd never fall in love again.

You looked yourself in the mirror and stared at yourself for a minute or two. Then you sighed and ran a hand through your hair.

(name): Good grief (name). What's wrong with you? You've become so depressed that you've practically forgotten how to be happy. I got to try to be more positive. Maybe going out tonight will help me clear my head. Well, I better get going. Don't want to be late.

After making sure you looked good and nothing was out of place, you headed out. A little later, you arrived to where you were supposed to meet Creo and Arnett. When you went inside, you were amazed. It was a lot bigger than it was outside. Inside there were three separate rooms. The first was the main hall where everyone dined on cuisine and other foods. The second room had a bar where you can booze it up while watching TV. The third was a dance floor where you can dance the night away. It was pretty much like a night club. One thing was for sure, you had never seen a place quite like this before.

(name) Man. This place is pretty swanky. I definitely have never been in a place like this before. I wonder how Creo knows this place? For that matter, where is she? I hope she's not running late. Maybe I should find her at a table.

Then...
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Later....

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Soon as you were wandering trying to look for her she already was walking toward you. She was in a stunning dress in red complete with having brushed up her makeup, sporting a hot red color on her lips and green eye shadow. She effortlessly took your breath away, leaving your mind as blank as a rock. "Hello (Name).", she said politely. Your dumbfounded face worried her for a moment until she snapped her fingers in your face bringing you back to earth.

"Gah..uhhh...hey.", you replied.

"Is something wrong with how I appear to you?"

"Certainly hot....I mean not. Not. Certainly not hehe. (Jeez pull yourself together. Remember that there is no room for this anymore.)", you quickly took a deep breath and finally regained your senses. You started acting normal at last and didn't let Creo's fetching looks distract you. You held out your arm so she could cling to it like an old fashioned refined couple while you two made your way to your seats. Arnett and her limiter were already seated.

"Hey! Morrison this is my friend (Name).", she introduced.

"Hi.", you shook his hand with him having a likewise reaction.

"Like what you've seen tonight?", Arnett asked.

"Yeah this place looks fantastic.", you answered.

"Yeah but anything else? Ahem!", she exhaled heavily hinting at Creo most obviously. You already did and truth be told you liked it a lot but that wasn't what you and her agreed to.

"I'm positive, I was so nice looking he froze in place. And no limiter was around to force him.", Creo replied taking a friendly jab at your reaction. You felt embarrassed by it but frankly you were determined to get some shred of payback later tonight.

A couple hours passed after having a pleasant dinner conversation with Arnett, Morrison, and Creo.

"And that is how me and this lovely young lady ended up as my pandora.", Morrison ended his story.

"Revolving around a fountain? People get introduced so abnormally. This place is cursed to have people meet under crazy circumstances.", you replied. Arnett and Creo laughed at your general comment.

"So (Name) have you ever danced before with a pandora?", Arnett asked.

Actually you didn't even with Makoto, "Not really.", you answered.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4tEj6gXA...

"Oh come on loosen up. Very least see how it's done.", she took your hand and took you out on the dance floor. "Hold my waist, get in close, take my hand, and now just move with the music.", she said.

You felt a bit flustered being near her like this and considering her feelings for you in the past it made you feel uncomfortable. However while you two danced you both seemed to be doing fine as a pair. In fact ounce you were amazed by how easily you followed her, the awkwardness left you. Creo saw you two dancing and was pretty happy that you were feeling comfortable being around someone. The only one not too pleased was Arnett's limiter.

"Swoop in on my girl huh? Well two can play at this game.", he thought. Morrison took Creo's hand and danced with her two trying to make you jealous. While you and Arnett were enjoying yourselves you noticed Creo with him but for some reason you felt unhappy about it. Arnett noticed and got very mad ending your dance.

"Morry what are you doing?"

"Dancing with your friend."

"Knock it off, it's about as opposite from what your thinking as it gets. (Name) doesn't mean that way to me."

"I thought he did.", said Creo.

"Seriosuly? C'mon it's always been the norm for a pandora and limiter to be lovers. That's how me and Morry are.", Arnett said.

"Except what about the ones who don't think that way?", you interjected.

"(Name)?"

"Arnett I appreciate what your doing but you have got to stop.There is a reason why were not a couple, me and Creo."

"What? She's not pretty?"

"No."

"She's not your type?"

"NO!"

"Then what?"

"I don't have to answer you."

"No wait I think we both deserve one (Name). I'm your partner and if either of us are going to survive you need to be honest with me.", Creo protested.

"I can't."

"What? Tell us why you don't want to be with Creo?"

"Shut it Arnett."

"Tell me."

"Creo..."

"Tell us."

"I CAN'T BE REJECTED AGAIN!", you yelled.

You took off leaving without saying a word. Creo and Arnett were stunned by your answer. Suddenly it all became clear as to why you were so distant. They understood now.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Truth comes out

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
You slammed the door shut and sat on your bed, your hands digging into your head frustrated about everything. Being a limiter, the Nova, and pandoras. You couldn't seem to take it anymore after having all of them cause you nothing but consistent grief. You kept like this until you heard someone knocking at the door, "(Name) please open up.", it was Creo. You weren't angry at her at all, yet you replied in an angry tone, "Leave me alone Creo."

"(Name) please, I want to talk to you. I want to help you, and I can only do that unless you talk to me. Why are you so angry?"

"I don't want to talk about it."

"That isn't an excuse anymore, you've put this off long enough and I deserve an answer. I'm your pandora and we can't connect if you push me away like this."

"It's too painful for me ok!"

"Well what are you going to do about it?"

"I DON'T KNOW! I......I don't know. Sigh............Creo I'm not mad at you. Or Arnett."

"Then tell me what your so angry about so I can help understand you. Let me in.", Creo waited patiently until you finally did. You sat on the bed with Creo sitting across from you on a chair waiting to hear your story.

"It happened last year, I was already a limiter to another pandora. We were a pair for two years, we were close. Closer than I thought we would be. Her name was Makoto, we hit it off well and we worked well against the Nova's but even better we seemed to be great together when we weren't risking our lives. I fell in love with her and assumed she loved me back. Mind you we had done the baptism and had slept together for months trying to boost our compatibility. But I found out one day she didn't love me back. He.....after all we were ALL we been through she felt nothing back. She had her eyes set on some other limiter, but she wasn't going to dump me for him, she wasn't cruel. It's just she honestly didn't fell the same way yet all we did was nothing but intimate. Things fell apart after that and............came back here to find another pandora. One that wouldn't make me go through that same thing again. To tell you the truth Makoto was a lot like Arnett, sweet, lovely, looked interested in me romantically. As much as would like to date her, this kinda thing isn't how I can really feel for someone anymore. That's why you were the only person I could turn to to be my pandora."

Creo felt your emotional turmoil and hugged you tightly. You stood still unable to properly return it. Creo met with your eyes, you two looked deep into them. You each felt something you looked away, you couldn't make the same mistake again. Creo let go and left for her own dorm, "Hey, I care about you no matter if I think of you as either a friend or a lover.", she said finally leaving.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: In your dorm room

choices: Meanwhile in the third year's dorm...
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
A little later after Creo had left, you sat in your room by yourself thinking about what she said to you.

(name): She cares about me?

You thought back to all the times when you were with Creo. When you were fighting with her and when you hanging with her. Then you shook your head as if you were trying to shake the thoughts out of your head.

(name): Ah. Who am I kidding? Creo says that now, but if she were able to find out the truth about what happened to Makoto, she'd hate me. Arnett too. In fact, the whole school would probably hate me if anyone found out. (sigh) Damn it. Why do things always have to be this way? Can things get anymore complicated?

Suddenly as if right on cue, there was a knock on your door. You sighed with exasperation as you got up and headed for the door.

(name): Looks like I spoke to soon. It's probably Arnett wanting to check up on me too.

You went to the door and opened it. You were expecting it to be Arnett and were ready to tell her that you needed to be left alone, but it wasn't Arnett. It was Arthur. The boy who you saw hanging out with Kazuya before.

(name): Wait. You're a friend of Kazuya's. Arhtur right?

Arthur: I'm so sorry to bother you this late sir, but there's been trouble.

(name): What kind of trouble?

Arthur: It's Kazuya. He's been...

A little while later, you and Arthur were running towards to other part of the academy. Arthur brought you up to speed of what happened along the way. Apparently Satellizer had invited Kazuya to her room and he along with Arthur and Kaho were heading for the second year girl's dorm. Then they were confronted by three second years, Audrey Duval, Tris Mckenzie and Aika Takeuchi. All three of them had all lost to Satellizer in the recent carnival and upon hearing Kazuya becoming Satellizer's limiter, decided to take out their frustrations out on him and tortured Kaho and Arthur who had interfered. Kazuya activated his freezing to try and them, but then he fainted process. Then a girl came and rescued them by defeating all the second years at once. Soon afterwards Kazuya and Kaho were transferred to the infirmary.

(name): So how's Kazuya now? Is he alright?

Arthur: I don't know. All I know is, he hasn't woken up since he lost consciousness and they moved him to the infirmary.

Then they rounded the corner to where the infirmary was. When you got to the infirmary, you were surprised to find that there was someone waiting outside of the infirmary. She had waist-length blue hair that was tied in a ponytail by orange hair bands. She was young and had blue eyes and she had a small blue tattoo in the corner of her left eye.

(name): And... who might this be?

Arthur: Oh. That's the one who saved us. I've never seen her before though.

The girl with blue hair stood up from the bench and gave you a friendly smile.

Girl: Hello there. Are you a classmate of Kazuya's?

(name): Yes I am. Um... pardon me, but.... how is he? I mean Kazuya.

Girl: Don't worry. The doctor said that he'll be fine. Perhaps you along with your friend inside would like to wait with me. My hope is that the doctor will allow him to have visitors soon.

(name): Wait a sec. "wait with you"? Are you... a student here?

Girl: Well I haven't been enrolled in this academy yet, but I will be first thing tomorrow. My name is Rana Linchen. It's very nice to meet you.

(name): Rana Linchen huh? I'm guessing you're a transfer student?

Then Arthur interrupted. He led Rana away down the hall close to another room down the hall.

Arthur: Hey! Rana? Could I borrow you for a quick moment? Hiragi said that she wants thank you for saving her life too.

Rana: But I'm waiting to see Kazuya!

Arthur: Just trust me on this okay? This has to come first.

And with that Arthur led Rana disappeared into the darkness of the hallway leaving you by yourself.

(name): Now what was that all about?

Just then the door opened and out walked Elize Schmitz another teacher at the academy. You immediately went up to her.

(name): Excuse me? Ms. Schmitz?

Elize: (name)? This certainly is a surprise. Can I help you?

(name): Yeah. I'm here to see Kazuya Aoi. Is he okay?

Elize: Kazuya? Oh yeah. He's fine. He's just exhausted that's all. You sound worried about him.

(name): Well... I'm not. I mean...maybe just a little.

Elize: It's okay. It's only natural to be worried about about a friend. You know Satellizer showed up not to long ago as well.

(name): She's in there too?

Elize: Yes. She may be the Untouchable Queen, but she cares about her friends.

Then she walked past you leaving you standing outside Kazuya's room. At first you weren't sure if you should go see them or not because you wanted to respect Satellizer's and Kazuya's privacy, but at the same time you wanted to know if Kazuya was alright. Then Elize spoke up.

Elize: Well? What are you waiting for? Go see them. You can least stop by and say hi.

(name): But I...

Elize: He needs his friends by his side. Sometimes seeing your friends can help ease some stress off your mind.

(name): Wait. How do you...?

Before you can ask what Elize was talking about she had already left leaving you by yourself. After hearing what Elize had said, you knew that she was talking about you.

(name): How could she possibly know about....? Never mind. I guess I'll go see them. Maybe it will ease some stress off my mind.

Then you knocked on the door and entered. You found Satellizer standing next to Kazuya wearing a satin outfit.Satellizer heard you come in, she was looked up in surprise.

Satellizer: (name), it's you.

(name): Hey.

Satellizer: What are you doing here?

(name): I figured that I stopped by for a little visit. So, how is he?

Satellizer: He's fine, but he's still unconscious. The doctor said he'll be back in class tomorrow morning.

(name): That's good news. By the way, what's with the getup? I mean are those pj's or something?

Satellizer immediately blushed and looked away.

Satellizer: Y-yes! These are pj's! Got a problem with what I wear?

(name): Hahaha. No. Not at all.

Satellizer: In any case, where have you been? I haven't seen you for a long time.

(name): Well... let's just say that I've been busy with stuff. In fact, I got a lot on my mind at the moment.

Satellizer: I see.

There was a long pause. You didn't know what to say or how to break the silence. Then you had a thought. Satellizer knew your secret and yet here she was talking to you. This made you feel a little curious.

(name): Hey Satellizer. Can I ask you something?

Satellizer: What is it?

(name): Well... do you...consider me a friend?

Satellizer looked at you in mixture of confusion and surprise.

Satellizer: What makes you ask that?

(name): It's just a question. I"m curious that's all.

Satellizer: Well to be perfectly honest, when I first heard of you and what you did I hated you. But... that all changed a little while back. When we were all together back at lunch and when you and Kazuya stood up for me, I realized that you couldn't be all bad. So... yes. I consider you a friend.

You were taken aback by Satellizer's response, but at the same time you felt a little better.

(name): Thanks Satellizer. That means a lot.

Satellizer: Sure. Anytime.

(name): Anyway, I gotta go. I don't want to interrupt your alone time with Kazuya.

Satellizer: Shut up would you?

(name): Hehehe. See you in class tomorrow. Try not to stay up too late.

And with that, you left the infirmary. As you stood outside the door, you thought about what Satellizer said. You couldn't help, but smile a little.

(name) thinking: Heh. Thanks Satellizer. At least there's someone who considers me a friend regardless of my past.

Then you went back to your dorm room wanting to get some sleep.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Continue...

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Back with Creo, she was walking back to the third year's dorm with what you told her and your recent behavior fresh in her mind. One thing was for sure, she had never seen you in such a state before. She wanted to find a way to help you and to make it better, but she didn't know how to. Then she decided to head to the pool to try to ease her stress. She went to the locker rooms and changed into her swimsuit. She wore a white two piece swimsuit with green around the edges. When finished getting dressed, she walked to the pool area. As she came in she noticed that Arnett was already there dipping her feet into the pool. When Arnett saw Creo, she immediately went up to her.

Arnett: Creo! There you are!

Creo: Hey.

Arnett: So how'd go with (name)? Is he okay?

Creo: To be perfectly honest, I'm not really sure. But he's not angry at us if that's what you mean.

Arnett: But... was it true about what he said? Was he distant because of a heartbreak or something?

Then Creo explained about what you told her about your past. When she finished telling the story, Arnett looked at Creo her eyes wide in shock.

Arnett: You gotta be kidding me... So that's why he was acting the way he was.

Creo: Yeah. I know.

Arnett: And he was partners with a girl named Makoto? I've never heard of her.

Creo: Me either. I'm guessing that she was a Pandora that attended a different academy along with (name).

Arnett: Yeah. That also explains why he kept his distance from me. Damn. I feel so sorry for him. I wish there was something we could do for him. I especially want to give Makoto a piece of my mind! Why would she even reject (name) like that?

(voice): It was because she was forced to do so.

Arnett and Creo turned around and there walking towards them was Attia.

Arnett: Attia? Wait, what are you talking about?

Attia: As you recall, Creo told you that Makoto had her eyes on another limiter right? Well there's a logical explanation on that. It was because the limiter that Makoto had her eyes on... was seduced by someone who wanted to make (name) suffer.

Arnett: What?!

Arnett stood up and looked at Attia in shock while Creo sat still and listened quietly. Attia continued.

Attia: You see she liked (name) and wanted to be with him. However, when she found out that (name) liked Makoto, her lover grew into jealousy and hate. She wanted to make (name) pay for liking another woman so she made a plan to make him pay. She was aware that Makoto didn't feel the same way about him and she liked another limiter, so she took the limiter that Makoto liked and she pushed Makoto towards (name). She hoped that (name) would end up being heartbroken and distant after finding out about his crush didn't love him. Sad thing is, she actually managed to succeed.

Arnett: That's... that's so messed up!

Arnett's hands clenched into fists almost to the point of drawing blood. Creo simply sat still and didn't say a word.

Arnett: Who the hell would want to do such a thing to (name)?! Tell us!

Attia was silent and then she looked up with a evil glint in her eye.

Attia: Satellizer El Bridget.

The moment Attia said her name, Arnett gasped in shock and Creo's eyes snapped open in surprise.

Arnett: No way... The Untocuhable Queen? She's the one responsible?!

Attia: I'm afraid so. When some of the third years told me about it, I was as shocked as you.

Arnett was silent clenching her fists again. Then she face turned into an angry scowl.

Arnett: That bitch... she'll pay.

Attia: I figured that you would react that way Arnett. But you'll have to be patient. I already have a plan set to make The Untouchable Queen pay. You two are my back up plan if all else fails.

Arnett: But...

Then Creo suddenly stood up which made Arnett go quiet and for the first time since Attia came in, she spoke in a low tone.

Creo: Attia. What you're saying about Satellizer... is this true?

Attia: Yes. It is. I've never lied to you before have I?

Creo: Good. That's all I need to hear.

Arnett: Creo? Are you OK?

Creo was silent. Then when Arnett looked at Creo's face, she saw that Creo's face was filled with nothing but anger. Pure anger.

Creo: To be honest, no. I feel angry and the need to punch something. But I know who I can take it out on.

Attia: Easy there Creo. Like I said, you're the back-up. I've got a plan set to make sure that Satellizer pays. But for now, try to keep your anger in check. Save it for when you need to fight Satellizer.

Creo said nothing with her hands clenched into fists and her teeth grinding in anger. Then she left the pool. At first Arnett, didn't know what to say or do but then she followed suit. After they both had left, Attia went over to a table and sat down. She smirked in triumph pleased with herself.

Attia: That takes care of my back up plan. Now all I have to do is have a chat with our cute little exchange student and then (name) is as good as done. One thing's for sure, things have gotten a little interesting around here.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Meanwhile in the third year's dorm...

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
You woke up in bed, you were still tired, you felt sick to your stomach and didn't want to get up. You just wanted to stay in bed and wish that everything would go by without you. You were worried that Creo would learn who you were, the Limited Limiter who failed his partner. You were getting in too deep in this partnership and it was worrying you more and more. Yet the alternative to remain distant felt just as sickening if not more so than speaking the truth it felt. Would she understand? Would she forgive? How would the others react? Probably with disdain and anger and disgust for having known you.

You knew that there were dozens of points you could have said the truth much earlier and sparred them the pain quicker but remained silent. It wasn't your fault you said over and over, it wasn't hers, it happened. But things ended terribly, multiplied by how she wound up after the fact. Her death and how you both felt before hand was the worst period of your life and you wouldn't repeat the past. But you couldn't make the steps to lead you away from them. Trapped in a cycle, lapping over and over.

You snapped back when you heard a knock at the door, "(Name)! It's your two favorite girls!", you recognized Arnett's voice and assumed Creo was with her. Somehow while you were worried about what they would think or say upon what they might find out about you, their arrival was felt by a warm comforting feeling forcing you to get up and open the door to speak with them.

You got dressed into some casual clothing and opened the door for them. "Morning.", you greeted.

Suddenly Arnett greeted you with a warm strong hug almost making you lose your balance. "Hooof! Easy there Arnett!"

"Sorry, but you needed a wake up call and that felt like the best way to get your blood flowing."

"I'm taking an off day today, not feeling well."

"You have a fever?", Creo asked.

"Not sick, just not up to snuff to do anything. Creo we'll train later tomorrow."

"Well I'd like you to come with me today for something, because we need to have a serious talk about something and I'd like for you to understand-"

"I get the picture, fine. Just give me a few and I'll be out and ready."
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: The next morning...

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
After a few minutes of getting dressed, you left with Creo. She lead you down to a hallway and then she stopped at the end of the hall close to a vacant classroom.

(name): OK Creo.What's up? You said it was something serious after all.

Creo was silent for about a moment. Then she turned around and faced you with a serious frown.

Creo: (name). There's something I need to ask you first of all.

(name): I'm listening.

Creo: You know Satellizer right?

(name): Yes. I do. She's a good friend.

Creo: And have you had any problems with her in the past.

(name): No. Not really. I mean, we had our issues when we met each other, but other than that I can't think of anything that comes to mind. Why do you ask anyway?

Creo: It's nothing. I'm just wondering is all.

Now you were feeling skeptical. Creo asking about Satellizer out of the blue like this. Something was up. But before you could ask why, Yu-Mei just happened to be passing by.

Yu-Mei: (name)? Creo? What are you two doing here? Class is about to start any minute.

(name): Me and Creo were just talking Ms. Yu-Mei. You don't have to...

Creo: Sorry Ms. Yu-Mei. We'll head to class right away. I'll talk to you later (name).

(name): Wait a sec. Creo.

Before you could try to ask Creo anything regarding her questions, Creo had walked away.

(name) thinking: What the heck was that about? Why would she ask me about Satellizer?

Then Yu-Mei's voice snapped you out of your track of mind.

Yu-Mei: Hey (name). Come on. Didn't you hear me? You have to get to class. You'll be late.

(name): Yeah, yeah. I hear you. I'm going already.

Yu-Mei: And also we have a new student in our class, so make sure you give her a good welcome.

(name) thinking: Transfer student? She must mean Rana. She must be in my class. Guess she wasn't kidding when she said she would be enrolled here. Well, guess I better go. Yu-Mei will keep nagging me if I don't get to class.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Continue...

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Later in class, Rana was writing her name on the board and introduced herself to the class. She was now wearing the school uniform and she had her hair in a ponytail with orange bands.

Rana: Hello! I'm named Rana Linchen. I hope I'll make many good friends here in West Genetics. It's nice to meet you.

Yu-Mei: Now like (name), Rana is a year older than most of you and transferred here as a second year so she could learn the basics. Only in her case, she's learning the basics of being a Pandora. I'd like you all to treat her nicely and make sure she's welcome.

All the students: Yes ma'am.

Yu-Mei: Now let's see... As for your desk Rana...

Yu-Mei was about give Rana a place to sit, but then Rana had already picked her seat. She walked over to a desk that was next to of all people, Satellizer.

Rana I'll sit here, if no one minds.

Satellizer looked at Rana, then she turned away not interested.

Satellizer: I don't mind. Do what you please.

As Rana took her seat, you couldn't help, but feel a little uneasy about the whole thing.

(name) thinking: Why would she sit next to Satellizer of all people? Is she trying to pick a fight or something? Hmm. I guess it doesn't matter to me, but still...I can't help but worry.

After that, it was time for your next class; P.E. You were on your way to the boys locker room to change into your P.E. clothes. As you were you looked around to try to find anyone you could talk to before you went to class. Then you ran into...
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Later in the classroom...

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content: Then you ran into the last person you expected and wanted to see. Attia. She was walking towards you on her way to the third year's dorm. The moment you two made eye contact, Attia glared daggers straight at you still resenting the fact that you took her friends from her. You gave no reaction to her by looking away and ignoring her. You walked right past her wanting to get to your next class. Attia stopped and looked back. She watched as you walked away out of sight. Then she headed for the third years dorm.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Attia

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
The class was all grouped together and it was the only thing outside of tournament competition where a taste of real combat could be experienced among the limiters and pandoras. Soon as you went out in the field you linked up with Creo, you were still curious regarding her question about you and Satellizer so you figured get it out of the way now. "Hey Creo,", you said hugging her, "Quick question why did you ask about Satellizer earlier?"

Creo didn't want to say because she thought talking about your previous relationship and the behind the scenes regarding it would place you into an unfocused state of mind. So she cleverly dodged the question by changing the topic to something else more technical. "(Name) I have been thinking lately and, I think maybe....we need to break down our physical barrier."

"What?"

"(Name) about what I said after you told me your past it got me to think about how I feel about you.", her words wiped away what you asked about earlier in the beat of a heart. It felt like she was going to confess something to you. From the tone of it she seemed to have an attraction to you and it was obviously mutual to you alone.

"Creo are you saying-"

"I'm not saying anything because I don't know yet. But,", she placed her hand on your cheek, "I may give you an answer yet.", soon as she finished she held you tightly around her arms. Your heart beated fast, you returned her hug, your faces were touching side by side. You weren't sure what it meant but it meant something good. For the very first time since Makoto, you felt like maybe in all of the chaos the world gave you managed to find love. It couldn't be the same, it wasn't, no Creo was special and you felt nervous but still excited. Giving it more thought you had a sense even if she didn't like, LIKE you, she would say it where it wouldn't come close to how Makoto broke your heart. Never again.

Soon as you let go Creo smiled in both relief and excitement. She was happy to finally say what was on her mind with you but felt like she could enjoy how you were taking the news. A bit of pride washed over her seeing how, while not advertised, you clearly showed signs that you were ecstatic about her trying to figure out if you were her guy. Or more accurately THE guy for her. She saw how from the blush on your face if stoked up something in you, but from the limiter exercises you were putting in a lot more aggression.

The class went on like usual with the typical order but it was time for a match between two sets of pandora and limiters. Given recent events it was no shock to anyone that Rana would be the one to be called out.

"OK Rana now is there anyone exactly you would like to spar with?", the coach asked.

"If I would like to make a suggestion, I know it is non-traditional but wouldn't it be a good idea to have Rana's opponent be a pair randomly selected, in both limiter and pandora class?", said one of the classmates.

"That is an excellent suggestion. Something to note: In battle despite your survival chances being slim if separated with your designated partner, it is always in good thought to have some connectivity with more than one pandora or limiter. That way two teams can work together to kill a Nova."

"How about the Untouchable Queen?", said a random student.

"And (Name).", said the one who made the suggestion.

"Good idea.", the coach agreed.

You weren't sure about this and thought that this was crazy, "Creo I don't think partner switching is a wise idea."

"It's fine working with other pandoras helps our real partners see how well we work as a unit. Helps forge bonds with our partners.", Creo reassured.

"Just that I never had that in my academy.", you felt better seeing Creo wasn't too worried even with Satellizer being your partner for the match. Satellizer herself on the other hand didn't like the fact. Kazuya understood her and was the only one she would allow to be her limiter. However she didn't refuse to the circumstances being that you two have an understanding and you two were able to tolerate the other. This would defiantly be an educational match.
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: A non-traditional suggestion

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
"All right then," said the coach. "This battle will be for 2 minutes. This is just a training exercise so make sure you play fair. This battle will be between Rana Linchen vs Satellizer El Bridget and a limiter (name)."

Rana took her stance and Satellizer took hers. You took a stance as well.

"Make sure you stay back (name)," said Satellizer. "I don't want you getting hurt. Plus, I want you to be ready when you deploy your freezing."

"Right," you said.

Then Satellizer deployed her volt weapon Nova Blood and went on the attack. She slashed at Rana aiming for her chest, but then Rana suddenly leaped into the air and dodged Satellizer's attack. The class gasped in wonder.

"Whoa! You see that?" one student said.

"She jumped so high! And she's fast!" said another.

Then Rana went on the offensive and attacked Satellizer with a flurry of punches. Satellizer dodged each and every punch and attacked again with her blade, but once again Rana ducked and dodged the attack once more and she attacked again, but Satellizer was able to dodge by stepping back out of the way. Seeing Rana's moves and how she dodged made you get that she was a close range fighter like you which made you want to take a crack at her.

"Satellizer, let me have a go at her," you said running towards Rana joined the fray.

Satellizer was about to protest, but you were already on Rana. Rana was a little surprised at first, but she accepted your challenge. You attacked Rana with a series of punches and then went for kicks. This time instead of punching, Rana met your blows head on with her own. When you both broke away, Rana spoke to you.

"Impressive," she said. "I've never seen anyone like you match my blows before. Even though I'm holding back a little."

"Same to you," you replied. "You're not so bad yourself."

You both then clashed again kick with kick and punch with punch. You were a little surprised at first, but at the same time you felt a little excited. The class was a little excited too.

"Check that out! (name)'s not a bad fighter!" A girl said.

"Yeah. He can definitely hold his own in a fight. That's for sure." said a second.

"He is Creo's limiter after all," said a third. "Maybe Creo's fighting skills are rubbing off on him. Right Creo?"

Creo said nothing. She simply stood there watching the match.

At this point, you and Satellizer kept fighting Rana switching back and forth and Rana kept dodging and blocking every blow. Then Satellizer feinted an attack and called out to you.

"(name). Do it! Now!"

"Right!" you nodded.

"Here's hoping it works again," you thought to yourself.

Then you held out your hand and it began to glow blue and then you released your freezing.

"Freezing area!" you shouted as the same blue pentagon like net erupted from your hand and began heading towards Rana. It seemed that she was gonna get caught in it, but suddenly it stopped just inches away from her feet. You tried to make it go further, but you couldn't. Not to mention you couldn't maintain it for long, so it quickly dissipated. The class was a little surprised seeing that. Creo especially. She had never seen anything like that before and this worried her a little.

"What was that?" she wondered. " I know that (name)'s switched partners, but his freezing should have been stronger than that. Was his freezing always that way?"

"Damn it!" you cursed to yourself. Then you heard the coach call out.

"That's it! Time's up! Nice work ladies."

Satellizer and Rana stopped fighting and stepped back. The coach then came up to you.

"(name)? You okay? You're freezing as a little weak back there."

You realizing that everyone saw your weak freezing quickly made up an excuse.

"Um... nothing. I'm fine. I... wasn't able to sync with Satellizer. That's all."

"Well that's to be expected. You were with a different partner, but try to make sure that your freezing's in ship shape. Got it?"

"Yes. Of course," you replied to the coach. "Good match Rana. You're a pretty strong fighter."

"You as well," said Rana.

Then Ganessa came up.

"Oh come on. You call that a match? We all know that she was holding back. She didn't even use her volt weapon. Let me fight the transfer and I'll show you how it's done."

"Um...OK," said the coach. "Sure why not."

You stepped off to the side wanting to watch the match. Then...
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Rana vs Satellizer and (Name)

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
Then the match got underway. You, Satellizer stood off to the side wanting to watch the match.

"Okay. This will be another mock battle. This time, the match will last for over 3 minutes."

"Well then new girl, shall I show you how we operate at West Genetics?" Ganessa asked smugly. "Even country bumpkins deserve a proper welcome after all."

"Geez. Does she ever shut up?" you muttered to yourself. "And she's supposed to be the number 1 ranked second year? What a laugh."

"Trust me. I know how you feel," said Satellizer.

Then Ganessa activated her volt weapon. Four familiar chains with flails at the ends sprouted from her back.

"Chains of Binding!" she said.

Just seeing them made you remember back to when you first saw Ganessa attack Satellizer and causing your memories to come back to the surface, but you quickly shook that thought out of your mind and watched the match. Ganessa then went on the attack and flung her chain straight at Rana. Rana stood there unmoved, then she activated her volt weapon as well.

"Four Mind Sets!" she yelled as a pair of metal gloves and a pair of metal boots materialized on her hands and feet. She then deflected Ganessa's attack. Seeing her volt weapon for the first time made you and Satellizer's eyes widen a little in surprise. And you weren't the only ones surprised. Creo was too.

"Her volt weapon..." said Creo. "It's..."

"Just like Creo's." you finished.

The students reactions were more puzzled than surprised.

"That's her volt weapon?" said one. "A pair of gloves and boots?"

Rana then leaped high into the air causing dust to kick up into the air. Ganessa looked up trying to keep her eye on Rana, but thanks to the sunlight, she couldn't see her. Rana took advantage of this by dive bombing towards her with a kick. The impact caused another dust cloud to kick up. At first it looked nothing happend, but then Ganessa's shirt suddenly ripped open causing her breasts to be exposed. Rana then went for a one legged drop kick, but Ganessa blocked the attack using one of her chains and sent her back. Then two stared at each other down daring each other to make a move.

"Nice kick," said Ganessa with a grin. "You may not look much, but you're not bad for a rookie."

"And your wits are as sharp as your tongue," said Rana.

You couldn't help, but grin slightly from Rana's slight insult. Ganessa's clothes returned to normal her smile quickly changed into a glare.

"If you're trying to aggravate me, I must may you're doing an excellent job!" she snarled as she launched all four of her chains at Rana.

All four of the chains were aimed directly at Rana's blind spots. One above her head, another behind her head, another a few feet away from her feet on her right, and one more on her left behind her leg. Having no way to dodge, Rana had no choice, but to take the hit. The chains hit their mark causing a mighty boom that shook around the area.

"Damn! She hit all of her blind spots!" you instinctively yelled.

"Well of course," said a student. "That's Ganessa's specialty."

Ganessa had a victorious grin on her face thinking that she won, but that look quickly changed into shock. For when the dust cleared, there stood Rana. Her clothes were a little torn and she had some scratches (and her skin was exposed as well), but she was fine. She had her arms crossed and was in a defensive stance.

"She took the hit and protected all her vital points!" Ganessa thought.

"Cheeky girl!" she said aloud as she retracted her chains and flung them at Rana once again. "I think I'll have to put you in your place!"

Rana charged toward Ganessa heading straight towards her chains. She jumped over the first one, dodged the second in a back flip, kicked the third out of the way in mid air, and punched the last to the ground. Now Ganessa was wide open for an attack Before Ganessa could react, Rana was inches away from her face with her fist aimed directly at her midsection.

"Let me ask you something," said Rana coolly. "Do you know when is the best time to counterattack is? After surviving your opponents strongest attack."

"You can't damage a pandora at this range!" said Ganessa. "You're too close!"

Suddenly Rana's fist began to glow a bright yellow. You sensed a powerful energy going through that fist. If Ganessa got hit from that fist, it would all be over. Then...

"That's enough!" the coach called.

The 3 minutes were up. Rana and Ganessa stepped back while the coach walked towards them applauding.

"Well done you two," she said. "Make sure you take note everyone. That's the kind of battle I would like to see."

Then a couple of the girls ran up to Rana excited as to what she just did.

"Way to go Rana!" said one.

"Yeah! You were incredible!" said another.

"Looks like Rana's gonna give our number 1 second year a run for her money!" said a third.

"And The Untouchable Queen as well!" said a fourth.

As Rana talked to her fan club, you couldn't help but stare at Rana trying to figure out what had just happened.

"That girl.." you thought. "She's got some serious power. If this wasn't a mock battle, Ganessa would be breathing through a hole in her stomach. Not to mention she held back when she fought me and Satellizer. Amazing."

Back with Creo, she was thinking the same thoughts you were.

"Man. I could feel that power coming through her. She's more powerful than I thought."

Meanwhile from above, Arnett and Attia were standing near a window looking down at the class. They had witnessed the fight as well and they were impressed.

"Our little transfer student intriguing isn't she? It's just like what you said Attia," said Arnett.

"Well, I guess that settles it then," said Attia. "We'll wait till Creo gets back and then we'll proceed with the plan."

A little later...
1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.title: Other...

1113322222222222222222222212222222222111.content:
A little later it was the lunch period and you were at the cafeteria getting your lunch. You were going to eat your lunch by yourself the same as usual, but then a certain someone called out to you.

"Hey! (name)! There you are!"

You turned around and coming towards you was Kazuya. You were a little surprised to see him considering that he was at the infirmary.

"Kazuya," you said. " You're feeling better?"

"Yes," said Kazuya. "I was just released a while ago. Now I'm feeling a lot better now."

"Well that's good," you said smiling.

"Hey. Since we're here, you wanna eat lunch with me?" asked Kazuya.

"Sure. Why not?" you said. "It has been a while since we've hung out together."

So you and Kazuya picked a table by the window and you two had a nice friendly chat. A few moments later, Kaho and Arthur came to the table.

"Yo Kazuya. How's it going?" said Arthur.

"I'm good," replied Kazuya.

"Mind if we sit here?" asked Kaho.

"Sure by all means. Take a seat." said Kazuya as Kaho and Arthur sat in front of them.

You felt a little awkward having them sit near you, so you tried not to pay any attention to them. Kaho and Arthur noticed this and whispered to Kazuya.

"Hey Kazuya. Can we talk to you without this guy around?" asked Arthur. "He's kinda..."

You paid no attention to Arthur. You just ate and drank your lunch in silence pretending not to notice. Kazuya looked at you and then he looked back at Arthur.

"It's fine," he said. "He's a friend. He's just a little... anti-social."

"Whatever you say," said Arthur.

"So have your injuries healed?" asked Kaho.

Kazuya nodded. "Everything's good."

"More importantly, please tell me you changed your mind about becoming Satellizer's limiter?"

This made you stop eating.

"Not this again," said Kazuya sounding slightly annoyed.

"Look. We're just worried about you okay?" said Arthur. "If you hadn't gotten involved with her, those girls wouldn't have beaten you up."

"Can't you guys drop it already?" said Kazuya. "and why is everyone calling her The Untouchable Queen? I mean where did that come from anyway?"

"It's something she did," said Arthur ominously.

"Like what?" asked Kazuya.

"She injured a limiter so badly, he'll never be able to recover." said Arthur. "Truth is she went to East Genetics before she came here, but it wasn't a change of schools. She got kicked out for causing too much trouble."

"Yeah. It happened around two years ago," continued Kaho. "She's had a bad reputation for a pretty long time now. That's why people stay away from her."

This was new to you. You knew Satellizer had a pretty bad rep, but what you didn't know that it was due to everything Arthur and Kaho talked about. You kept quiet listening very closely.

"Who was the limiter?" asked Kazuya. "What happened to him?

"Such a sweet sound. I love it when you call me by my name," said Rana. "Since you're calling me by my first name, I'll call you just plain Kazuya. If that's okay."

At this point...

Then you noticed someone coming towards your table. It was...
